1b1('dul ba): //'dul ba gni//bam po kyu gsum pa//gzigs nas kyang kha la
1b2('dul ba): sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kha lo sgyur ba mi skye bo rla ba rbab po//rid pa nyam chung ba dbang
1b3('dul ba): po nyams pa skye bo mang po'i mig gis ba mi phod pa 'di ci yin/lha 'di ni bos
1b4('dul ba): thebs pa zhes bgyi'o//kha lo sgyur ba nad kyis thebs pa zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/lha
2a1('dul ba): /mi 'di gang 'dis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/lha 'di ni blos thobs pa zhes bgyi'o///
2a2('dul ba): kha lo sgyur ba nga yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid
2a3('dul ba): las mi 'daso//kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sbyar cig/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo //'di ltar de pho brang du phyin
2a4('dul ba): nas nga nad las ma 'das shaM sa grag po'i don de nyid ba sam par bya'o//kha lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sbyar nas pho brang
2a5('dul ba): nyid du chas te/der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gau nang du gsheg sa nas bdag kyang na da las ma
2b1('dul ba): 'das pa lta zhig ces mi dgyes shing thugs ngan dgodangaso//'dir smras pa/mi ni lus ring skya bo rbab rbab po//rang dbang med pa'i nad thebs 'dir
2b2('dul ba): gzigs nas//nad las bdag ma 'das pa lta zhig ces//de nas mi dgyes thugs ngan dgongs par mdzad//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
2b3('dul ba): kha lo sgyur ba la smras pa/kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhon nu yid dga' ba dang mgu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/bskyed mos tshal la mngon
2b4('dul ba): pAr de ga' bar gyur tam/lha ma lagaso//de ci'i slad du zhe na/lha gzhon nu bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba na/mi skya bo rbab rbab po
2b5('dul ba): rid pa nyam chung ba dbang po nyams pa/skye bo mang po'i mig gis blta mi phod pa zhig gzogasaso//gzigs nas kyang bdug la bka' stsal pa/
2b6('dul ba): kha lo sgyur ba mi skye bo rbab rbab po rid pa nyom chung ba dbang po nyams pa/skye bo mang po'i mig gis blta mi phod pa 'di ci yin/de la bdag gi/
3a1('dul ba): 'do sngags //sku dzin gyis bas gnas pa//de di ska ces gsus te/kha lo A brgyud kyis pongs pa nam
3a2('dul ba): bya ba 'di ci yin/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//mi 'di gang gnod pa 'dis 'gum par 'gyur ba'i gnas de mchis te/lha de ni bros
3a3('dul ba): thobs pa zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad ces gsung ste/kha lo sgyur bang yang nad kyi chos dang nad kyi chos nyid las ma 'das sam/de la bdag gis 'di skad
3a4('dul ba): ces gsol to//lha yang snyun gyi chos dang snyun gyi chos nyid las ma 'das so//de 'di skad ces gsung ste/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sbyar
3a5('dul ba): cig/pho brang nyid du 'dong //'di ltar nga pho brang nyid du phyin nas/nga nad las ma 'das shes grag pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o//lha gzhon nu de pho bla
3a6('dul ba): gi nang du gshegs nis/nga yang nad las ma 'das pa lta zhog ces mi dgyes shing /thugs ngan dgongs so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems
3b1('dul ba): te/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /gzhon nu skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang
3b2('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ma la bdag gis gzhon nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin li ci nas kyang 'di la dga'
3b3('dul ba): zhing rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba snyam mo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin te ci nas
3b4('dul ba): kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung ba mi 'gyur bar byaso//'dir smras pa/de'i tshe dga' nas bdag 'dor mi gzhug phyir//gzugs dang sgra dang de dang ro rnams dang //reg bya yid
3b5('dul ba): du 'ong ba gtso rnams kyi//'dod pa yon tan lnga po yang byin no//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyed mos tshol gyi gzhir gshegs pa bzhid par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba
3b6('dul ba): la/kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig bzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig/dang der ngo zhugs nas/bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas/de nas byang chung
3b7('dul ba): sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kye kha lo sgyur ba re zhig gzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig/der nga zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir 'gro'o//lha bka' bzhin
4a1('dul ba): 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas gzhon pa bzang po bshams te/byang chub sems
4a2('dul ba): dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song na sa phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces smras so//lha bcibs pa bzang po ba shams
4a3('dul ba): lags kyis/lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzhon pa bzang por zhugs te/bskyed mos tshal gyi
4a4('dul ba): bzhir byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas/ras kha dog sna tshogs lngas byis pa'i bla re bres pa dang /khyogs khyer ba dang /mdun nu
4a5('dul ba): me sgron thogs pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /bud meng skra ba shig po rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rje so bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzigs so//
4a6('dul ba): gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur bu la gsungs pa/kha lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /khyogs khyer ba dang /mdun na me sgron
4a7('dul ba): thogs pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /bud med sgra bo shigs pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhi no rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di
4b1('dul ba): yin/lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o//kha lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/lha mi 'dris slan chad sdug pa'i phra ma mi mthong zhing /bu pho dang bu mo dang /bran+da pheM dang
4b2('dul ba): bran mo dang /las bgyid pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams kyang ma lags la/de dag gis kyang sla ni chad 'di mi mthong bas/lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o//
4b3('dul ba): khe lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'ad so//kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta
4b4('dul ba): phyir spyir cig po brang nyid du 'dong ngo //'di lta nga po brang nyid du phyin nas/nga 'chi ba las ma 'das shes grags pa de'i don nyid bsam par bya'o//kha lo sgyur bas
4b5('dul ba): shi rta phyir bsgyur nas/pho brang nyid du chas te der byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa pho brang gi nang du gshegs nas/bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma 'das pa lta zhig ces mi
4b6('dul ba): dgyes shing thugs ngan dgongs//'dir smras bya/tshe zad pa yis 'du shes bral gyur cing //sems med mi yi ro zhig gzigs nas ni//'chi las bdag ma 'das pa
4b7('dul ba): nig ces//de nas mi dbyes thugs ngan dgongs pa mdzad//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha lo sbyang ba la smras pa/kha lo sgyur ba ci gzhonu yid dga' ba dang /
5a1('dul ba): mdun pas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/bskyed mos tshal la mngon par dga' bar gyur tam/lha ma lagaso//de ci'i sladadu zhe na/lha//
5a2('dul ba): gzho nu bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung po ni ras kha dog sna tshogs las bgyis pa'i bla re bres pa dang /khyogs khyer ba dang /mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /skye bo'i tshig
5a3('dul ba): chen po mngon nas mchi ba dang /bud med sgra bshigs pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba zhig gzig so//gzigs nas kyang bdag la gsungs po/khe
5a4('dul ba): lo sgyur ba ras kha dog sna tshogs las byas pa'i bla re bres pa dang /khyogs 'khyer ba dang /mdun na me sgron thogs pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen po mdun nas 'gro ba dang /
5a5('dul ba): bud med skra bshigs pa rnams ngu zhing rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'brang ba 'di ci yin/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o//de 'di
5a6('dul ba): skad ces gsungs te/khe lo sgyur ba shi ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin//de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha mi 'dis slan tshad sdug pa'i pha ma mi mthong zhing /bu
5a7('dul ba): po dang bu mo dang /bran pho dang bran mo dang /las bgyid pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyang ma lags la/de rnams kyis kyang slan chad 'di mi mthong bas/lha
5b1('dul ba): 'di ni gum pa zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad cesu gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba nga yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das sam/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol
5b2('dul ba): to/lha yang 'chi ba'i chos dang 'tsho ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das//des 'di skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta phyir sgyur cig/pho brang nyid du 'dong ngo //
5b3('dul ba): 'di ltar nga pho brang du phyin nas 'chi ba las ma 'das shes grags pa'i don de nyid bsam par bya'o//lha gzhonu de pho brang gi nang du gshegs te/bdag kyang 'chi ba las ma
5b4('dul ba): 'das pa lto zhig ces mi bgyes shing thugs ngan dgongaso//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig
5b5('dul ba): yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur grang /gzhonu skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du
5b6('dul ba): 'ong gis/ma la bdag gis gzho nu la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin la ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu 'byung por mi 'gyur bar bya'o snyamo//de nas
5b7('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga las phal mo che zhig byin nas ci nas kyang 'di la dga' zhing rab tu byung bar mi 'gyur
6a1('dul ba): bar byas so//'dir smras pa/grong khyer dam pa dpal ldan yid 'ong dUr//lha yi ltar gyur sgron ma dang mtshungs pa//'dod pa'i yon tan lnga pos kun
6a2('dul ba): dgyes pa//mig stong dga' ba'i tshal ni gnas pa bzhin//de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams 'di snyam du sems te/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rgyu
6a3('dul ba): skyobs can yin thad kyi 'on kyang rkyen bsgrub par bya dgos te/'di ltar rgyu'i stobs chen po yang rten gyi stobs la ltos so snyam nas/dri rnams kyi mi skra bregs shing gis du
6a4('dul ba): smig gyon pa lag pa ni lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang /khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig sprul to//chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bskyed
6a5('dul ba): mis tshal gyi gzhir gshegs par bzhed par gyur pa de'i tshe kha lo sgyur ba la kha lo sgyur ba re shig gzhon pa bzang po myur du shoms shig dang /der bzhugs nas bskyod
6a6('dul ba): mos tshal gyi gzhir gsheg so zhes gsung bar 'gyur bas de nas byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kha lo sgyur ba re shig gzhon pa bzang po myur
6a7('dul ba): shoms shig/der zhugs nas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir gau sheg so//lha bka' bzhi ni 'tshal zhes kha lo sgyur bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar
6b1('dul ba): mnyan nas gzhon pa bzang po bshams nas/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to//
6b2('dul ba): lha bcibs pa bzang po bshams lags kyis/lha da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa gzhon pa bzang por zhugs nas bskyed
6b3('dul ba): mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa lag pa na lhung bzed thogs pa zhig khyim nas khyim dang khang po nas
6b4('dul ba): khang par rgyu zhing 'gro ba zhig gzig so//gzigs nas kyang kha lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa/kha lo sgyur ba mi skra bregs shing lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /
6b5('dul ba): khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'di'i gos kyang kha dog mi mchu ngas te/ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'di ci yin/lha de ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o//kha
6b6('dul ba): lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/lha rab tu byung ba de ni dul ba legs pa dang yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /don spyod pa legs pa dang /chos spyod pa legs pa dang //
6b7('dul ba): dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas//skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
7a1('dul ba): tu b+hU s+t+wa~M/lha d-idi ni rab tu byung ba ste/lha 'di ni rab tu byung ba zhes 'gyi'o//kha mo bsgyur ba de'i phyir shi rta 'di rab tu byung ba gangan pa der log smra sgyun cin
7a2('dul ba): lha bka' bzhin 'tshal nas/kho mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya ShAba~M pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rar tu byung ba gang na ba der bsgyur te//de nas byang chub sems dpa'
7a3('dul ba): shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye mi khyed ci'i phyir skra bregs shing lag pa ni lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /khang pa nas khang
7a4('dul ba): pa rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dag mi mtshungs te/ci nas kyang mo gzhan gyi dag deng mi 'dra ba yin/des 'di skad ces smraso//gzho nu bdag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bgyid
7a5('dul ba): mi khyod ji ltar ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya//gzho nu bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang /yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /don spyod pa legs pa dang /chos spyod pa
7a6('dul ba): legs pa dang /dge ba spyod pa logs pa dang /dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag par
7a7('dul ba): kho nas khyim nas khyim med pa ri rab tu byung ste/de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o//kye mi khyod kyis dul ba legs pa dang lnga dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /
7b1('dul ba): don spyod pa legs pa dang /chos spyod pa legs pa dang /dge baspyod pa legs pa dang //dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos
7b2('dul ba): nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba leg so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas/khe lo sgyur ba la gsungs pa kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir
7b3('dul ba): shing rta phyir sgyur cig/pho dang nyid 'dong //'di ltar nga pho drang du byin nas don 'di kho na bsam par bya'o//khe lo sgyur bas shing rta phyir sbyar nas/pho brang nyid chas te//
7b4('dul ba): der pho brang du gshegs pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa/kye ma'o bdag ni skra dang kha~M spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig dgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas
7b5('dul ba): khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o snyam pa'i don de nyid dgongaso//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis kha l-i sgyur ba la smras pa/kha l-i sgyur ba cigazho nu yad dga' ba dang /
7b6('dul ba): migu bas bskyed mos tshal gyi gzhir byung ngam/bskyed mos tshal gyi mngon par dka' bar gyur tam/lha ma la gso//de ci'i sladu zhe na/lha gzhonu bskyed mos tshal gyi
7b7('dul ba): bzhir drung ni/mi skra bregs shing gos ngur smrig 'tshal ba bsug pa na lteng bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /khang po nas khang par rgyu zhing miche ba zhig gzigs/
8a1('dul ba): gzigs nas kyang bdagu la 'di skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba mi//glegs la lag pa na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /khang pa nas khang
8a2('dul ba): par rgyu zhing 'gro la 'dri'i gos kyang kha dog mi mtshungs te/ji ltar yang mi gzhan dag gi dang mi 'dra ba 'dri ni yin//de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha'o ni
8a3('dul ba): rab tu byung ba zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ci yin/de la bdag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//lha rab tu byung
8a4('dul ba): bdon dul ba legs pa dang /yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /don spyod pa legs pa dang /chos spyod pa legs pa dang /dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang
8a5('dul ba): dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang khe spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba ste/lha 'di ni rib tu
8a6('dul ba): byung ba zhes bgyi'o//de 'di skad ces gsungs te/kha lo sgyur ba de'i phyir shing rta 'di rab tu byung ba gang na ba de logasu sgyur cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes byang chub
8a7('dul ba): sems dpa' shAkya thub pa'i ltar mnyan nas shing rta de rab tu byung ba gang na ba de log su bsgyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pas rab tu byung ba de la 'das
8b1('dul ba): ces gsungs te/kye mI khyod ci'i phyir skra bregs la lagra na lhung bzed thogs nas khyim nas khyim dang /khang pa nas khang par rgyu zhing 'gro la khyod kyi gos kyang kha dog mitshungs te/ji
8b2('dul ba): ltar yang mi gzhan dag dang mi 'dra ba yin+da/des 'di skad ces gsol to//gzho nu bo dag ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/kye mi khyod
8b3('dul ba): ji ltar rab tu byung ba zhes bya/des 'di skad ces gsol to//gzhon nu bdag gis dul ba legs pa dang /yang dag paro sdom pa legs pa dang /don spyod pa legs pa
8b4('dul ba): dang /chos spyod pa legs pa dang /dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang //dge legs spyod pa legs par rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang
8b5('dul ba): dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba zhes/de ltar na bdag rab tu byung ba zhes bya'o//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/kye mi khyod kyis dul ba legs pa
8b6('dul ba): dang /yang dag par sdom pa legs pa dang /don spyod pa legs pa dang /chos spyod po legs pa dang /dge ba spyod pa legs pa dang /dge legs spyod pa legs par
8b7('dul ba): rig nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba leg so//lha de nas gzhon nus gsungs
9a1('dul ba): gakha mak+Sha/ ba de'i byu shid / kyi/ TI//po byung nyid du 'ang ngo //'di ltar Sh+Ta du sbyin+da nas/don 'di bsam par gyura'o//bdag gas
9a2('dul ba): shIng rta bsgyur nas gzho nus pho brang du zhug so//rgyal pos bsams pa mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze de rnams kyi tshig yang dag par bden par mi 'gyur glang
9a3('dul ba): gzhonu sgra dang kha spu blugs nas gos ngur smrig bgos te/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur du 'ong gis ma la bdag gis gzhon zhing pa'i
9a4('dul ba): byung du ting wA/ci nas kyang dril sems g.yengs par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam nas/gzhonu shAkya thob pal 'di skad ces smras//gzhon nur sh+log/khyod shing po'i grong du
9a5('dul ba): sod la las kyi mtha' la ltos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' rgas pa dang /nad pa dang shi ba mthong nasA ni yid byung /rab tu byung ba la ni mngon par zhon pa'i blos
9a6('dul ba): shAkya zas gtsang gi tshigs gsun nas/shod+hAr zhugs te ning pa'i grong du skus gshegs kyi thugs kyis ni ma yin no//de la la ma kAr gter lnga brgyas khanye bar bstan
9a7('dul ba): tesgra phyung ba gzhonu bdag cag ni khyod kyi nye du'i gter lags kyis bdag cag bzhis shig/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/re shig de rnams kyis blun po'i yongs su
9b1('dul ba): bzung ba byas nas ci zhig byas khyed nga la dgos pa med kyis song shig/tshig su bcad pas kyang gsungs pa/gang gis nga la 'chi ba'i gtam smras pa//de dag kyang shi gtam
9b2('dul ba): du gyur pa yin//bdag kyang shi nas ring po mi thogs par//gzhan dag gi yang gtam du 'gyur bar 'ong //de rnams kyis yang sgra phyung ba//gzho nus gal te ma bizhes na/
9b3('dul ba): bdag cag rgya mtsho chen por 'jug/byang chub sems dpas ci bde bar zhugs shig ces gsungs pa dang /de rnams rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du zhugaso//byang chub sems dpa'
9b4('dul ba): gshegs pa dang /ci tsam na zhing pa skra gyen du 'greng ba/lag pa dang rkang pa ser ka byung ba/lus rdul gyis yogs pa dag cig dang /rmon pa lcags zer bu rnon po can gyis
9b5('dul ba): lus dral bas rgyab dang mjug ngo'i phyogs khrag gis yog pa/ltogs pa dang skom pas dbugs rdzangs shing snying ka'i phyogs nas dbugs rdzangs pa ring du 'dren la gnya' shing gis
9b6('dul ba): mnan pa'i rma las rAg khrag 'dzag pa la sbrang bu dang 'bu'i tshogs za ba/thong lcags kyi rkang pa rma byung zhing /kha dang sna nas kha chu dang sna chu 'dzag la sbrang ma dang s+ya/shaM sbrang dang sbrang
9b7('dul ba): bu mchu rings kyis yig pa rnams gzigs//gzigs nas kyang thog ma med pa'i dus nas bsod nams bskyed cing bsogs pa'i thugs rjes kun nas bskyod pa'i thugs kyis zhing
10a1('dul ba): rnams la 'di skad ces gsungaso//shes ldan dag khyed su'i yin/de rnams kyis gsol pa/lha'i lag so//des gsungs pa/shes ldan dag deng phan
10a2('dul ba): chad bran du mi bya/mngag gzhug par mi bya/rang dbang can gar dga' bar 'gro bar byas bde ba la reg par gnos shig/rlon pa rnams kyang bkrol nas gsungs pa/khyed cag
10a3('dul ba): kyang deng phan tshod rtsa mchog ma nyams pa la za zhing /chu ma rdul ma snyogs shing deng bdog la 'bung shig/khyed la phyogs bzhi nas kyang rlung bsil ba ldang bar gyur cig/de nas
10a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' yid byung ba de nyid kyis yab shAkya zas gtsang gi zhing blas kyi mtha' la gzigs nas shing 'dzom bu'i grib ma gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/shing
10a5('dul ba): 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs te/'dod pa las dben pa'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas shing dben pa las skyes
10a6('dul ba): pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba zag pa med pa dang 'dra ba'i bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhug so//skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang /byang chub sems dpa' spangs te/mi 'gro bar
10a7('dul ba): shing gzhan rnams kyi drung na sdod do//rgyal po zas gtsang gis bsams pa/byang chub sems dpa' ring zhig thogs te/'di ltar snga dro'i dus las yol gyis ltar 'gro'o
10b1('dul ba): zhes de shing rtar zhugs nas zhing pa'i grong du song ste phan tshun du byang chub sems dpa' tshol zhing 'dzam bu'i drung du phyin to//de'i tshe nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shA
10b2('dul ba): phyogs gzhol shar phyogasu bab shar phyogasu bab par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i mthus shing 'dzam bu'i grob ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang
10b3('dul ba): gi nyi ma'i gung yol nus shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma shar phyogasu gzhol/shwar phyogasu 'bab/shar phyogasu bab par gyur na shing 'dzim bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i
10b4('dul ba): sku mi gtong ba mthong ngo //mthong nus kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzhon na rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/'di ltar da ltar nyi ma'i gung yol nas shing gzhan rnams kyi
10b5('dul ba): grib ma shar phyogasasu gzhol/shar phyogasu 'bab/shar phyogasu bab par gyur nas/shing 'dzam bu'i grib mi na byang chub sems dpa'i sku mi gtong ba ngo mtshar che'o snyamo//
10b6('dul ba): dri nas dga' bo'i brasti stang byas te/byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/ji ltar bltam ches ni g.yos pa ltar//'dzam bu'i
10b7('dul ba): grib mas khyod sgra mi gtong //blo chen khyod kyi ya mtshan gnyis 'di ste//kun gzigs khyod kye nangs la phyag 'tshalo//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis byang chub sems
11a1('dul ba): dpa' skyil mo krung bcas pa las bslang nas/shing rtar zhugs te dur khrod kyi nang nas ser skya'i gzhir gshegs pa na/byang chub sems dpa' dur
11a2('dul ba): khyod kyi nang nas mi ro rnam par spros pa dang /rnam par 'bras gzhigs pa dang /rnam par bam pa dgu gzigs nos de shin tu skyo ba skyes te/shrIng rta zhugs bzhin du
11a3('dul ba): skyil mo krung bcas nas bzhugaso//de nas yang rgyal pos skyil mo krung bcas pa las blangs nas/ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/grong khyer gyi nang du 'jug pa na mtshan
11a4('dul ba): mkhan rnams kyis/gal te gzhonu zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur bar lung bstan par rig nas/de rnams kyi rgyal po
11a5('dul ba): zas gcing la 'di skad ces smras//gal te de yi bzang po gzigs bzhed na//de'i slad du de gung bdun bar du srungs shig dang //mi dbang gdugs ni bdal bar gyur pa
11a6('dul ba): na//rin chen sna bdun 'byung bar the tshom med//khyod sras rin chen bdun po yi//dbang phyug gi ni rgyal por 'gyur//rgya mtsho la ni thug pa'i sa//chad pa med
11a7('dul ba): par skyong bar 'gyur//'on te sa ni spangs nasu//bosnyings med na gsu bzhud nas ni//thams cad mkhyen pa thob gyur nas//'gro ba sgrol bar mdzad par 'gyur//
11b1('dul ba): shAkya dus legs kyi bu mo ri dgasu skyes zhes bya ba de skar khung na 'dug pas byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas tshigasu bcadade smras pa/kye ma 'di yi yum bde zhing //yab de yang
11b2('dul ba): ni bde ba yin//kye ma gang gi khyim thab 'gyur//bud med de yang myo ngan 'das//skyes mchog bsam gtan po de yis//mya ngan 'das pa'i sgra thos nas//mya ngan
11b3('dul ba): 'das pa zhi nyid du//mkhyen nas de la thugs dgyes gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' legs par smras pa'i phyir mu tig go phreng ba 'phangs pa dang /byang chub seM 'i
11b4('dul ba): mthus skar khung nas song ste/de'i mgul du 'khris par 'gyur to//skye bo'i tshogs kyis nang du song ba de mthong nas/de rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtso la rgyas par
11b5('dul ba): smras nas/rgyal po zas gtsang gis ri dgas skyes 'khor nyi khri dang /byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mor blang so//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo sa 'tshom
11b6('dul ba): dang ri dgras skyes la sogs pa'i 'khor bud med drug khri yod do//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gcung bre bI zas dang /zas dkar dang /tshad med zos gsum dang
11b7('dul ba): lhan cig gcig tu tshogs nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis//byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa
12a1('dul ba): la gal te zhag bdun gyi bar du rab tu ma byung na/'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyuraro zhes lung bsnun gyis de lta bstan bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhag
12a2('dul ba): bdun gyi bar du bsgrims te/bsrung bar bya zhing grong khyer yang legs par bsrung bar bya'o//de nas de rnams kyis ser skya'i gzhi'i grong khyer ra ba rimo pa bdun dang 'obs rim
12a3('dul ba): pa bdun gyis bskor nas grong khyer gyi sgor 'phar lcags las byas shing /sgo 'phar rnams la dril bu shin tu sgra gsal ba btags te/sgo phye na de'i sgras dpag tshad gcig
12a4('dul ba): kho ra khor yug tu grags par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i ni khang bzangs kyi gzhi na bud med yid 'phrog pa gzugs bzang ba rnams dang /gaur dang glu dang rol mo rnams kyi
12a5('dul ba): spyod pas bsnyen bkur byed du bcug go/blon po rnams ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi dang lhan cig ra ba'i phyi rol kho ra khor yug tu gcan pa byed du bcugo/blon po rnams
12a6('dul ba): ni dpung brgyas tshugs pa yang byas//btsun mo'i 'khor gyi sgor yang sgo phyi na da'i sgras rgyal po zas gtsang gi pho brang du grags cing de zos nas/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mi dang
12a7('dul ba): grong khyer gyi sgo srungs rnams dang /pho brang 'khor gyi mi grong khyer gyi phyi rol nas srung du bcug pa rnams bag dang ches te 'dug par 'gyur ba de lta bu btag so//byang chub seM'
12b1('dul ba): nisteng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi skyes pa med par zhugs nas/pi wang dang gling bu dang khar rnga dang /sgra snyan la sogs pa rol mo'i cha byad dag nye bar len cing /'byor pa chen pos bzhun
12b2('dul ba): so//mtshan mo ni rgyal po zas gtsang yang dpung gi tshogs/yan lag bzhi dang shar sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug/lho phyogs na ni bre bo zaso//nub phyogs na ni zos dkaro//byang phyogs
12b3('dul ba): na ni tshad med zas//grong khyer gyi dbus kyi 'dram po byed pa ni shAkya ming chen no//de shar sgor song nas smras pa/su zhig mel rtse byed/su zhig me la rtse byed/rgyal po zos
12b4('dul ba): gtsang gis smras pa/kho bo me la rtse byed//lha mel rtse mdzod cig/mel tse mdzod dang khyod la legs par 'gyu ro/zhes smras te/tshigasu bcad smos pa/'jig rten
12b5('dul ba): gnyid log ro dang mtshungs//gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song //'di ni mi nyal rtag tu mkhas//de bas ma nyal mel tse byos//lho sgor song nas smras pa/su zhig me la tse byed//
12b6('dul ba): su zhig mel tse byed/bre bo zas kyis smras pa/kho bo me la tse byed//lha me la rtse mdzod cig/mel tse mdzad dang khyod la legs par 'gyu ro zhes smras nas tshigasu bcad smras pa/'jig
12b7('dul ba): rten gnyid log ro dang mtshungs//gnyid log bdud kyi dbang du song //gnyid log 'chi bdag dbang du song //de bas ma nyal me le tse byos//nub sgor song nas smras pa/su
13a1('dul ba): gso rjod//sa sa gyud/ /kyi sgru pa//mams rgyad//snam ma ma // lam kyi pa lags
13a2('dul ba): bar 'gyuraro zhes smras nas tshigasu bcad de sbas pa/gnyid log pa ni rtag tu myos//myos 'gyur bres pas 'thungs pa nyal//dgon pa nag su nyal ba 'dras//de bas ma nyal
13a3('dul ba): mel tse byos//byang du song nas smras pa/su zhig mel tse byed/tshad med zas kyi smras pa/kho bo mel tse byed//lha mel tse mdzod cig/mel tse mdzod dang /khyod
13a4('dul ba): la legs par 'gyur zhes sbas nas/tshig su bcad de sbas pa/ri nyal ri sul nyal ba bzhin//rgya 'tsho chur ni nyal ba dang //ljon shing rtse la nyal ba bzhin//de
13a5('dul ba): bas ma nyal mel tsa byos//dbus kyi bzhi mdo dang sum mdo dag tu song nas smras pa/su zhig mel tse byed/su zhig mel tse byed/srung ma rnams kyis smras pa
13a6('dul ba): bdag cag mel tshe bgyod do//mel tse byos shig/mel tse byos dang /legs par 'gyur zhes smras nas/tshig su bcad de smras pa/chos spyod chos ma yin ma spyod//bden
13a7('dul ba): pa spros shig brdzun ma smra//mun pa chen por 'jug par 'gyur//de bas ma nyal mel tse bos//de nam lang nas shakya ming chen gyis rgyal po bras gtsang la sbas pa/la
13b1('dul ba): dga' dgung spyod par byed pa na 'di skab du dgongs te/bdag la gzhan dag gzho nu shAkya thub pa ni skyes pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir grags 'dzin ma dang /sa 'tshom dang /
13b2('dul ba): ri dgas skyes dang /bud med drug khri sbrengs nas rab tu byung ngo zhes gzhi des kha zer bar 'gyur du 'ong gis/ma la bdag gis grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' dgu
13b3('dul ba): spyad par bya'o snyam nas/des grags 'dzin ma dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyad pa dang /grags 'dzin ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/de 'di snyam du sems te nam lang nas
14a1('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i spyan du gsolo snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang ldan pas tshigasu bcad de
14a2('dul ba): gsungs pa/bud med dang bdag khyim nyal ba'i//tha ma deng gi 'di yin te//phyin cad khyim du bud med dang //nga ni lhan cig mi nuso//de nas bud med de rnams gar dang
14a3('dul ba): glu dang /rol mos dub nas/kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang //lag pa dag lhug par btang nas//brla bi'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing gnyid log
14a4('dul ba): gi/byang chub sems dpas bud med dag thams cad kha nas kha chu 'dzag cing skra zhig la gos dang lag pa dag lhug par btang nas/brla ba'i tshig byung rgyal du brdol zhing
14a5('dul ba): gnyid log pa gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang btsun mo'i 'khor la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyed nas/des tshigasu bca de gsungs pa/rlung gi shugs kyis pad+ma'i tshal
14a6('dul ba): ltar sa gzhi 'dir//lag pa dag dang rkang pa brkyang nas 'gyel gyur te/skra rnams zhig tsong mdog dang rkub kyi phyogs kyi snang ba//shAkya'i sras kyis gzigs nas rang
14a7('dul ba): bzhin skyo bar gyur//tshul dang bral ba'i bud mod na chung tshogs 'di dag/dur khrod 'jig su rung ba'i rang bzhini 'drar mthong nas//sems can byis pa'i spyod pa'i yul/
14b1('dul ba): dod dga' na//sems dang blo gros dran dang bral ba yon nam no//'dod pa tha chad 'dam dang mda' mdung drug ni 'dra//rmi l+h+wam lta bu yin te cha chu'i rlong mtshungs//'dod pa
14b2('dul ba): byung me rkyod dang sdig pa'i rgyur gyur pa/mtha' ngan sbrul gyi dbang po lta bu bdag gis skyes//bar sgrubs der skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo'i rmi lam du bani rnaMs pa/zla ba sgra gcan
14b3('dul ba): gyis zin pa dang /nyi ma shwar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa dang /skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bangadagA lo phyag byas pa dang /bdag nyid dgod cing ngu ba'o//grags
14b4('dul ba): 'dzin ma'i rmi lam du brgyad rmis pa/bdag nyid kyi khyim gyi khyim gyi gdung chags pa dang /bkra shis kyi malo khri chag pa dang /lag pa'i gdub bu chug pa dang /so'i phreng
14b5('dul ba): balhags pa dang /sgo'i lan bu zhig pa dang /dpal khyim nos byung ba dang /zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pa dang /nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nub pa'o//byang
14b6('dul ba): chub sems dpas kyang rmeng lam lnga rmis pa/sa chen po nyid kyi gzim mal du byas shing /ri rab ri'i rgyal po dbu rten du bcug phyog g.yon pa shur phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por
14b7('dul ba): 'jug/phyag g.yas pa nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho chen por 'jug/zhabs gnyis rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa dang /'grong ba zhes bya ba'i rtsa'i rigs lte ba nos byung nas nam
15a1('dul ba): rgyu mkha'i bar du 'phags te 'dug pa dang /bya kun nas dkar la mgo gnag pa rnams kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas pus mo'i lha nga la thug gi bar
15a2('dul ba): du ldang ba dang //bya sna tshogs phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs nas mdun du kha dog gcig tu 'dug pa dang /mi gtsang ba'i ri'i steng nas bdag nyid mi gtsang bas ma gos par 'chag
15a3('dul ba): pa/rmi sna nas kyang thugs dgyes te dgongs pa/nga'i rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis pas ring po mi thogs pa kho nar bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyuraro//snya mo//de nas
15a4('dul ba): grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa' la rmi lam gsol pa/lha de bzod bdag gi g.yar mal du brgyad rmis pa/bdag gi sdum pa'i gdung chag pa dang /bkra shis
15a5('dul ba): kyi mal khri chag pa dang /sug pa'i gdu bu chag pa dang /so'i phreng ba lhags pa dang /sgra'i lan bu zhig po dang /dpal sdum pa ni sa byung ba dang /zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin
15a6('dul ba): pa dang /gdugs shar phyogs nas bdal nas de nyid du nub pa rmis lagaso//byang chub sems dpas grags 'dzin ma'i yid mi bde ba gsal ba'i phyir rmi lam rnams bshad
15a7('dul ba): pa/bdag gis khyim gyi gdung mgo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de mi 'dug gam/bdag gi bkra shis kyi mal khri cha go zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang mchog ste 'dug pa'o ni yin
15b1('dul ba): modalag pa gdug cha go zhes smras pa gang yin pa ci chug gam ma chag rang nyid rtogs shig/sngo'i phyung ba lhag so zhes smras pa gang yin pa de yang so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin
15b2('dul ba): pas ci lhags snyam ma lhags rtogs shig/bdag gi zan du zhig zhes gang smras pa/de yang khyod kyis so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas ci zhig gam+ba ma zhig rtogs shog/khyim
15b3('dul ba): nas dpal byung zhes smras pa/gang yin pa de ni bud med rnams kyi dpal ni khyi yin lar ni 'dug pa nyid do//zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin ces smras pa gang yin pa da ni zla ba 'di mngon sum
15b4('dul ba): du 'dug pa ma yin nam/nyi ma shar phyogs nas shar nas de nyid du nubo zhes smras pa gang yin pa de ni da dung yang nam phyed yod de/re shig shar kyang ma shar na nub par lta ga la
15b5('dul ba): 'gyur zhes de ltar brda' sprad nas/btsun mo grags 'dzin cang mi smra bar 'dug/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa grags 'dzin ma'i rmi lam de 'dra ba rmis pas gdon mi za bar/
15b6('dul ba): nga kho na bdag 'gro baN+DI byas 'di la tshig zur gyis bstan snyam nas/des de la tshig zur gyis bstan pa dang /grags 'dzin mas gsol pa/lha khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag
15b7('dul ba): khrid cig/byang chub sems dpas mya ngan las 'das pa las dgongs nas bka' stsal pa/de bzhin du bya ste gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang der khyed bkri'o//de nas brgya byin dang
16a1('dul ba): tshangs pa la sogs te/lha rnams kyi sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas/byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang
16a2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to//nags kyi spre'u ni spyod yul rgyu 'dra zhing //yan par 'dug pa'i rte'u dang 'dra'i thugs//gal te 'dod pa'i yon tan las bzlog
16a3('dul ba): na|de nas shin tu gsal ba'i snang ba gzigs//blo gros bzang po bzhengs shig bzhengs//sa ni spangs te bzhud mdzod la//thams cad mkhyen nyid brnyes nas ni//'gro ba
16a4('dul ba): dag ni bsgral bar mdzod//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/kau shi ka ma mthong ngam/nga ni ri dgas bdag po brgyas bskor ltar//mi ni mtho ldan gzha' mtshon ral gyi thig//
16a5('dul ba): rta glang shing rta dpung tshogs mang po yis//grong khyer ser skya kun nas yongasu bskor//zas gtsang la sogs shAkya'i tshogs 'di dag/glang chen rta zhon legs par go bgos lus//
16a6('dul ba): mi sdug sna tshogs lag na mtshon thogs te//khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs gzhi nang gnas//pho brang dang ni khyim sgo dang //de bzhin grong khyer sgo dag kyang //bcad nas gtan
16a7('dul ba): pa dam bcug ste//de bzhin kun nas bsrungs par gyur//rA dung pa Ta ha sgra rnga skra yis//khyams dang rta babs khang bzangs nang gnas shing //glang chen rta dmag 'bad pa'i skye
16b1('dul ba): 'i tshogs//rgyun tung mi gtang phyir srung bar byed//brgya byin gyis gsol pa/des bamar me mdzad kyis lung bstan dang //sdug bsngal gyis gdungs 'jig rten 'di dang yang //khyod kyi
16b2('dul ba): sngon gyi dam bcas dgongs mdzod la//khab dag spongs te nges par 'byung bar mdzod//ji ltar khyod ni bgegs med par//deng nyid nagasu gshegs 'gyur ba//bdag tsog
16b3('dul ba): tshangs pa sogs bcas pa yis//lha rnams kyis ni de bzhin bgyi//byang chub sems dpa'a'i logs zhes gsungs nas/thugs dgyes par gyur to//de nas lha rnams kyi
16b4('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis gnyid kyis myos par byas nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lngas rtsen la bsgo ba/grogs po byang chub sems dpa' steng gi khang bzangs nas 'babs kyis skas
16b5('dul ba): yong shig/des skas blangs po la byang chub sems dpa' bobs pa dang /de nas brgya byin gyis brda' byas ma thag tu zha 'bring ba 'dun pa gang na ba der gshegs na/ji tsam na
16b6('dul ba): 'dun pa gnyid stug pos non par gzigs nas/byang chub sems dpas bsgrims te bslangs nas/tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis gsungs pa/'dun pa longs kyi khyim nas
16b7('dul ba): myur du ni//nga yi rta pa rin chen bsngags ldan long //sngon gyi rgyal bas longs spyad dka' thub tshal//thub rnams dgyes par mdzad par ngagashegaso//'dun pa gnyid 'og
17a1('dul ba): pa'i mig phye nas smras pa/lha khyod bskyed mos tshal gyi dus ma bag/nges pa khyod dang 'ga' yang kho na ma mchis//khyod la dgra po su yang ma mchis na//
17a2('dul ba): dgung phyed khyod la bcibs pas ci zhig bgyid//byang chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa//bdun po khyod kyi lan 'ga' yang //nga yi tshig ni ma bcag na//nga yi deng dus tha
17a3('dul ba): ma la/nga yi tshig ni ma bcag shig/'dun pas gsol pa/gzhonu mtshan mo 'di ni 'jigs pa dang 'jig su rung ba mchis pas/bdag bcibs pa mi len na//
17a4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/lan dang yang lan gyis gdon mi za bar skye bo sad par 'gyur gyis bdag nyid song la/rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan sta gon bya'o snyam nas/
17a5('dul ba): de nas nyid kyis pho brang gi sgo phye nas/rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gzung bar brtsams pa na/de khros pa'i me rab tu 'bar bas rkang pa 'phra//'jing kyog byed la phar 'bros tshul
17a6('dul ba): 'bros shing 'dug tu mi btu'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i phyag bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa/'khor lo dang bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'i khyil pa mnga' ba skrag pa
17a7('dul ba): rnams la dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs nas gsungs pa/bsngags ldan za ma yau ni khur long ste//dka' thub na gsum thogs nga skyol cig/byang chub thob
17b1('dul ba): nas myur du 'gro bkun//bsam gtan rnam thar char gyis tshim par bya//chos nyid kyis dud 'gro yang gdums na byi yang mi byed pas d+hA'i rgyal po bsngags ldan ma g.yo bar 'dug go/
17b2('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' thugs dgyes pa skyes te/rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan bltas nas bzhengaso//brgya byin dang tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'
17b3('dul ba): phyir go shegs pa'i phyir lha'i bu bzhi po bsgo ste gzhag pa/'gram dang nye 'gram dang lo ma dang lo ma gyon pa'o//byang chub sems dpas de rnams la gsungs pa/shes ldan
17b4('dul ba): dag nga sus bkur/de rnams kyis gsol pa/bdag cag gis bkur lagaso//khyed cag la stobs ji tsam yod/gcig gis gsol pa/gzho nu bdag gis ni sa'i rdul ji snyed
17b5('dul ba): mchis pa khur du thogs te mchi'o//gnyis pas gsol pa/bdag gis ni rgya mtsho chen po bzhi dang /mtsho dang mtshe'u dang /lteng kwa dang chu mig rnams kyi cha ba ji snyed mchis po de
17b6('dul ba): thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o//gsum pas gsol pa/bdag gis ni sa la ri ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o//bzhi pas gsol pa/bdag gis ni
17b7('dul ba): sa la rtsa dang /shing dang yal ga dang /lo ma ji snyed mchis pa de thams cad khur du thogs te mchi'o//de nas byang chub sems dpas zhabs sa la bzhag pa na/de rnams kyis
18a1('dul ba): bskul bar yang ma nus nas ngo mtshar skyes te gsol pa/gno nu bdag cag gis ni byang chub sems dada' rnams la stobs 'di 'dra ba mnga' bar ma 'chal te/
18a2('dul ba): gal te 'tshul na/bdag cag mi mchis lags pa zhog/gtam de 'dun pa sngar sad pas thos nas/byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar song ba dang /de nas byang chub seMd
18a3('dul ba): rnga'i rgyal po bsngags ldan la bcibs/'dun pa yang 'phongs la zhon nas/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpe'i mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i
18a4('dul ba): mthus rta rin po che bsngags ldan steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags pa dang /pho brang no gnas pa'i lha rnams byang chub sems dpa' dang bral bas ngu bar btsam so//de rnams
18a5('dul ba): duba'i mchi ma'i thig pa rnams lus dang sa la ba'o//'dun pas gsol pa/gzhonu char gyi thigs pa dag 'bagro na ci lhas dpung chub bam/byang chub sems dpas gsungs
18a6('dul ba): bas/lhas char phab pa ma yin te/'on kyang pho brang ni gnas pa'i lha rnams nga dang 'bral bas ngu bar brtsams te/de rnams kyi mchi mi'i thogs pa rnams lus la bab pa
18a7('dul ba): yin no//de nas 'dun pa meg mchi mas gang zhing dbugs dron po'i shugs ner gyis/phyung nas cang mi slu bar 'dug/byang chub sems dpa'i sku thams cad kyis
18b1('dul ba): glang po che'i gzigs stangs kyis/g.yas phyogasu gzigs te dgongs pa/nga bud med dang lhan cig khyim na nyal ba'i tha ma ni 'di yin snyamo//yang dgongs pa/gal teng
18b2('dul ba): shar sgro spas te/sgo gzhen nas byung ni gzhon nus ni bdag la tha ma'i yang ma bltaso snyam du rgyal po mi dga' bar 'gyu ro snyamo//ji tsam na rgyal po zas gtsang gnyid sdug
18b3('dul ba): pos non pa gzigs nas/des de la bskon pa mdzad de gsungs pa/yab gus pa ma mchis pa dang /zhes ma mchis pas skrag nas//mchis pa ni ma lags te/
18b4('dul ba): gzhan du na 'jig rten rga ba dang //'chi bas bcom pa rga ba dang /'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs pa las yongasu 'grol ba'i slad lcags sngo//ji tsam na shAkya ming chen
18b5('dul ba): 'dam po byed pa skye bo nyung zhing phyugs der phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i gshegs par mchis pa mthong ngo //de nas smad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gang nis smras pa/
18b6('dul ba): gzhonu 'ad ci mdzod/ming chen 'gro'o//gzhon nu 'di ni rigs pa ma lag so//ming chen gang gi phyir dam bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du dkar ba brgya stong du mas/sems
18b7('dul ba): can rnams kyi don du byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa des na dang ci khyim na 'dug pod dam/'di ni nges te dka' thub kyi tshal du 'gro'o//nga nas gsung tshig drag pos shAkya
19a1('dul ba): ming chen spyod pa dang cho nges btab te kyi hud/deng du rgyal po zas gtsang dang //shAkya dag ni thams cad kyis//yang dang yang du bsams pa yi//re ba 'dras
19a2('dul ba): bu med par gyur//deng du rgyal po zas gtsang ni//sras kyi mya ngan gyis gdungs pas//lag bsgrengs shin tu sdug bsngal zhing //mi bzad sgra ni 'byin par 'gyur//sa mtsho grags
19a3('dul ba): 'dzin ri dgas skyes//de bzhin btsun mo'i 'khor rgyas pa'ong //don grub dang ni bral ba yis//shin tu sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhes smras nas/de spungs pas grags 'dzin
19a4('dul ba): mablangs te/smyos pa/don grub 'di ni gshegs gyur gyis//khyim theb sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas//sdug bsngol nyams thag dur 'ong gis//khyim thab sdug pa de rtog
19a5('dul ba): shig/khyod kyi khyim thab gshegs 'gyur 'di ni mthong dka' ste//khyod kyis 'di ltos khyim thab mthong ba'i tha ma yin//kyi hud phongs pas bdag gis mtshon mo gus btab kyang /
19a6('dul ba): sus kyang lon ma sbyor bas bdag gis mA nyim//des ni de ltar khus kyang //'di ltar lha rnams byin brlabs kyis//dgon par 'o dod bos pa bzhin//'ga' yang sad par ma gyur to//
19a7('dul ba): de nas shAkya ming tshon sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba gdungs nas/de rings par rgyal po zas gtsang gi drung du song nas/rgyal po zas gtsang bslang ste smras pa/don grub 'di ni bzhud
19b1('dul ba): lags kyis//sa bdag de ni bzlog par mdzod//sras kyi mya ngan gyis thebs nas//sdug bsngal gyis gdungs bshums 'gyur mchi//ma stes yang gnyid ma sa //de nas brgya byin dang
19b2('dul ba): tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyang lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor nas/byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' bskor cing dong ste/g.yas
19b3('dul ba): phyogs nas/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams spyod lam zhi ba dang /g.yon phyogs nas 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng nas/lha'i rol mo'i khyad par sna tshogs dang /
19b4('dul ba): mdun na brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa rang rang gi spyod lam gyis dong ngo //nam mkha'i ngos la gnas pa'i lha brgya stong phrag du mas ni byang chub sems dpa'i stong nas/lha'i me tog
19b5('dul ba): ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po rnams gtor to//a ka ru'i phye ma dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /ta ma la'i mdab ma'i phye ma dang /lha'i me tog man+da ra bar+tha/
19b6('dul ba): kyang gtor to//lha'i rol mo'i cha byad sna tshogs kyang brdung so//gos rnams kyang gtor to//'dir smras pa/mkho' la lha rnams gzha'i sgra chen 'byin byed la//dga' ba'i yid kyis
19b7('dul ba): gos kyi g.yab mos 'debs byed cing //kha cig byang chub sems dpa' la ni bstod byeng //nam mkha' la ni sor mo brgya phrag bsgyur byar byed/kha cig dag ni sgo rnams 'byed byed cing /
20a1('dul ba): me tog man dar bas 'bor bar da//kha cig dag ni bcings pa'i nang 'dzin cing //bde bar gshegs la rtog cing rjes bzhin drung //kha cig dag kyang gams
20a2('dul ba): nas rjes bzhin 'drang //g.yon nas 'gro ba dag kyang rjes bzhin 'brang //brgya byin de bzhin tshangs par bcas pa dang /lus ngan bdag nyid shul ni mtshon par byed//zla ba nya rgyu
20a3('dul ba): sbyar tshogs kyis ltar//bdag nyid chen po lta tshogs mdun bdar nas//dka' thub nags na thub rnams dgyes byed pa//'phags pa dgyes pa'i nagasu thugs dgyes gshegs/
20a4('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer ser sgra'i gzhi nas phyir byung ba dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams yid dga' ngas spro ba bskyod pa/grogs po khyod yun ra
20a5('dul ba): po nas/nam zhig nang bgegs las thor te dka' thub kyi nag su 'gro bar 'byor snyam du dgongs pa bskyed pa gang lags pa de deng du yongasu rdzogs pa logs kyis/nam khyod kyis bla
20a6('dul ba): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa de'i tshe bdag cag la yang dgongs shig/byang chub sems dpas de bzhin du bya'o zhes dam bcas nas/sku thams cad kyis gas
20a7('dul ba): phyogasu byung ba che'i lha skyes kyis gzigs nas/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bstan pa yis//lam gyi mchog ni mthob po ro//grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ni slar//da ni 'jug
20b1('dul ba): pabar mi bya'o//zhes gsungs//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thun gnyis dpag tshad bcu gnyis byon nas/bcibs pa las babs twe/rgyan bkrol nas/'dun pa la bka' stsal pa/
20b2('dul ba): 'dun po rgyan dang rta khyer la slar song shig/'dir smras pa/kha lo sgyur khyod nga'i rta 'di dang /rgyan 'di rnams kyang gnyen pa dag la byin//ro ni 'dod pa rgya chen spangs na su//da ltar 'di
20b3('dul ba): nyid du ni tha khrung bya//de nas 'dun pa gdong la mchi ma char bzhin 'bab pas byang chub sems dpa' la gsol pa/seng+ge stag gis bltam pa dang //phyugs rjes bltam pa'i nags tshal du//
20b4('dul ba): 'ba'i shig sku gnyen dang bral nas//'phags pa ji ltar spyod par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/skye dgu 'di ni skye na'ang gcig pu skye//de bzhin 'chi na'ang gcig pu
20b5('dul ba): 'chi bar 'gyur//'di ni gcig pus sdug bsngal myong 'gyur gyi//'khor ba la ni grogs yod ma yin no//'dun pos gsol po/kyi hud gzhon nus sdug bsngal ma gzigs te//
20b6('dul ba): zhabs 'jam blang chen rta la bcibs goms pa//sa gzhi rtswa dang rdo bas bltams rngub par//ji ltar zhabs kyis gshegs shing nagasu rgyu//byang chub sems dpes gsungs pa/
20b7('dul ba): bdag 'jigs pa de ni lan 'ga' yang //skyed la btsam med bde bar goms la min//mgon bcas la min rigs btsun la ma yin//dpa' dang btson min skye bo dga' la min//
21a1('dul ba): rgabs 'che dag 'jigs pa dag/bskyed nas 'ong bar 'gyur zhes grags//don ma byas shing ma brtsams par//'chi bar yang ni 'gro bar 'gyur/
21a2('dul ba): 'dun pas gsol pa/rgyal po bgres pa ni sras kyi mya ngan gis 'grongs par 'gyuraro//'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa'i phyir 'dun po'i tshig
21a3('dul ba): thugs la ma bab bo//de nas byang chub sems dpas/ut+pal sngon po 'dra ba'i ral gri shugs byung nas gtsug phud bregs TI steng gi na mkha' la bor ba dang /lha rnams skye
21a4('dul ba): dbang mo brgya byin gyis blangs nas bkur sti chen po byas te/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer nas gtsu ga bud kyi mchod pa chen po gtsug so//bram ze dang khyim
21a5('dul ba): bdag dang po can rnams kyis phyogs der dbu skra blangs nga'i mchod rten zhes bya ba brtsigs te//da dung yang mchod rten la phyag bde ba'i dge slong dag phyag bye'o//
21a6('dul ba): 'dul ba ga ni//bamo po bya bzhi pa//byang chub sems dpes gsungs pa/'dun pa ji snyam du sems//gang la 'di lta bu'i brtul ba yod pa de cig ga yang
21a7('dul ba): khyim pa khyim na gnas par 'gyur ram/lha ma lagaso//bdun pas bsams pa/gzhonu ni rgyal rigs kyi nga rgyal can yin pas 'di phyir bzlog par mi nuso//ma
21b1('dul ba): de nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la lces bldags pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'i phyag 'khor lo dang /bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa
21b2('dul ba): mnga' bas byugs nas gsungs pa/bsngags ldan song shig dang /mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas/khyod kyi byis pa gzo bar 'gyur ro//'dun pa la yang gsungs pa/
21b3('dul ba): khyod kyis bsngags ldan pho brang du ma bkri shig/de skad ces gsungs pa dang /'dun pa skad 'dzer cing mig mchi mas gong nas rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan khrid de yang dang yang du
21b4('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la lta zhing song //de gnyis kyis thun gnyis kyis son pa'i sa gang yin pa de nas zhag bdun gyis phyir 'khar to//'dun pas bsams pa/gal te lhan cig
21b5('dul ba): tu dong na smre sngags chen pos bdag shi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des bskyed mos tshal du 'dug nas bsngags ldan btang //des skad phyung ba dang /pho brang gi skye bo dang /skye bo'i tshe Da
21b6('dul ba): gzhan gyis kyang skad shes nas re ste phyir phyung ba las/byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas bsngags ldan de'i mgul du 'jus te ngu bar brtsam so//'di ni chos nyid yin te dud
21b7('dul ba): 'gro'i skye gnasu song ba'i srog chags phal pa gzhan la yang kun rdzob kyi shes pa yod na/rta'i rgyal po bsgrags ldan la lta smos kyang ci dgos pas/des skye bo'i tshogs
22a1('dul ba): chen po smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra thos te dbugs khong du song ba nyid kyis brnangs te/shi nas de sgra gcan gyi bram ze las drug la brtson pa zhig gi rigasu
22a2('dul ba): nyid 'tshams sbyor ba blang //gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub pa de'i tshe de la dmu rgod kyi gdams pas btams
22a3('dul ba): nas 'khor ba'i dgon pa las bsgral te shin tu mthar phyin pa'i 'grub pa dang /bde bar mya ngan las 'das pa la 'jog par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' la ngur smrig gi
22a4('dul ba): dgos pa byung nas/grong khyer dpe mod du khyim bdag phyug po nor mang la longs spyod che ba yongasu gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba/rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi
22a5('dul ba): bu la nor gyis mgran pa zhig gnas pa de/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//de rtse bar
22a6('dul ba): byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod pa byed pa na khye'u zhig bci so zhes bya ba nas/de bzhin du khye'u bcu bco so zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/de dag thams cad rab tu byung nas//
22a7('dul ba): rong sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon sum du byas//de dag gam rgan mo des/de dag la sha na'i gos dag cig byin pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/yum bdag cig yod/
22b1('dul ba): su mya ngan las 'da' bas 'di dag bdag cag la mi dgos te 'on kyang rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras gzho nu shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
22b2('dul ba): 'tshong rgya bar 'gyur ba zhig yod kyis 'di dag de la phul cig/des na khyod kyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas//'bar ba dang gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang //
22b3('dul ba): glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag byas nas phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings yongasu mya ngan las 'das//rgan mo des kyang 'chi khar gos de dag bu mo la gtad nas
22b4('dul ba): ji ltar gyur pa rnams smraso//de'i bu mo de yang nad kyis thebs te/'chi bar shes nas des kyang shing drung zhig tu bzhug nas//shing de la gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa de la khyod kyis 'di
22b5('dul ba): dag rgyal po zas gtsang gi sras la phul cig ces gsol to//lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/des de dag shes nas blangs te//de
22b6('dul ba): nas rngon pa rgas 'khogs pa lta bu zhig tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas de dag bgos te lag nas mda' gzhu thogs nas//byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i lam kar bsdad pa dang
22b7('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' yang rim gyi lam der phyin nas rngon pa lag na mda' gzhu thogs shing gos ngur smrig gyon pa zhig gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang mi de la gsungs pa/ka'i nang rje
23a1('dul ba): shan rigs 'o ni ba tu byu shA la 'tshanam bu sbyin gyis/kA sh+ma ka u phran 'di dag khyer la'i ni bdag la byin cig/des gsol pa/gzhonu bdag la smad
23a2('dul ba): dag khyod kyis rgyal bu gzho nu bkrongs nas/ka shaM ka'i ras phran gyi gos 'di dag blang so zhes gzhi des g.yar mtsho bar 'gyur lags pas/bdag 'di dag mi 'du'o//byang chub sengs
23a3('dul ba): gsungs pa/kye nang rje nga ni mthu ji lta bu dang ldan pa 'jig rten thams cad kyis shes te su zhig gis nga dkrongs par nus/khyod kyis nga dkrongs par su zhig yid ches kyis bag tsha ba
23a4('dul ba): med par byin cig/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la btugs nas sha na'i gos dag phul te/ka shi ka'i ras phran rnams blang mo//
23a5('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa'i sku dang sha nA'i gos de dag 'tshem par ma gyur pa dang /de 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye ma sha na'i gos rnams bdag gi sku dang 'tsham par gyur cig snyam nas
23a6('dul ba): tshig tu smras ma thag tu/sha na'i gos de dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang /lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus byang chub sems dpa'i sku
23a7('dul ba): dang 'tshom par gyur te/byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/da ni bdag rab tu byung zin phyis/'gro ba rnams rje su bzung bar bya'o snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gdon
23b1('dul ba): kaShos blan rdzogs dang// rnams//drang po sbyin gyis b+hU sa nas/snum cu tu gsum gyi lha rnams kunang du/shi ka'i mamod nga chen pa bcugs//bram ze dang khyom bdagu dang
23b2('dul ba): pa can rnams kyis kyang phyogs dI ngur smrig blangs pa zhes bya ba'i mchod rten brtsigs te/dadung yad mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i dge slong dag phyag byed//de nas byang chub se'i
23b3('dul ba): dbusgra bregs shing na btso ngur smrig ma nai pas te dka' thub kyi nagasu phan rgyun rgyu zhing drung srung ngani slong gi bu'i bsti ga na sgo gshegs pa dang /de'i tshe drang srong ngan slong gi bu lag pa la
23b4('dul ba): ma sems sa dun cing jug pa d+me lta byu byang chuchu sems da mi gzigs nas gsus pa snying chen pa ci byor lag pa 'gram la ga/de sa/sems
23b5('dul ba): chud cing 'dug/des gsol pa/bdag gi bo ste gnas 'din shing rtal rnams gser gyi lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu chags pa las de rnams snga ma kha bzhin du ma gyu
23b6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/drang srong chen pa gang ga'i mthus pasti gnas 'din ta la rnams gser gyi lo ma dang me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa/de na badrang na pa de'i tsha
23b7('dul ba): yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/dka' thub kyi nag su gnas pas//gal te des rgas pa dang na ba dang 'tshe ba yang dag par mthong nas yid byung ste/dka' chub kyi gnas par gyur na
24a1('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal 'di de'i yin par 'gyur ba zhig de skad ces gsungs pa dang /drang srong dran spong gi bus byang chub sems dpa' la rtag par brtsam so//de nas
24a2('dul ba): gzugs bzang zhing zhi ba'i tshe byad du mthong nas/yun ring du brtags te/ngo mtshar skyes nas gsol pa/kye rab tu byung ba de khyod kho na ma lags grang byang chub sems dpas gsungs
24a3('dul ba): padrang srong chen po de ltar ngeso//de nas ngan spong gi bu ya mtshan skyes pa'i mig boglad de bltas nas//byang chub sems dpa' thog mar gradan la spyan drangs te me tog dang 'bras
24a4('dul ba): bus bstab so//de ltar kun tu dgyes par byas pa dang /byang chub sems dpas skad cig bzhis nas gsungs pa/drang srong chen po 'di nas/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir ji
24a5('dul ba): srid yod/des gsol ba//dpag tshad bcu gnyis mchis byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi nyi'i 'dir gnas pa ni rung ba ma yin te/shAkya rnams
24a6('dul ba): kyis grong khyer gyi 'khrug par byed par 'gyur gyis la la bdag gong gi rgalo snyam nas de gang gA rgal nas myo thar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /rgyal po'i khab tu byon te//byung
24a7('dul ba): chub sems dpa' ni gza'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas de dang de rnams la mkhas pa yin pas shing ka ra bi ra 'i lo ma las lhung bzed byas nas spyod lam zho bas rgyal po'o
24b1('dul ba): du bsod snyoms kyi phyir bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po gzugs can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi na 'dug pa des de 'gro ba dang ldog pa dang lta ba dang /rnam par lta ba dang /bskum pa
24b2('dul ba): dang brkyang ba dang /chos gos snam sbyor dang /lhung bzed thogs pas mdzes pas/bsod snyoms spyod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/rgyal po'i khab
24b3('dul ba): na rab tu byung ba ji snyed cig gnas pa la ji ltar rab tu byung ba 'di'i spyod lam de lta bu ni 'ga' yang medo snya mo//'dir smras pa/ji ltar mig can 'gro ba ltar//rab tu byung ba bsgrags
24b4('dul ba): par bya//'dis ni rtag par mdzad nasu//rab tu byung ba yang dag bzhad//khyim gnas 'di ni sdug bsngal te//'di ni rdul gyis gnas yin zhing //rab tu byung ba bar snang ltar//
24b5('dul ba): mkhyen nas de tshe rab tu byung //rab tu byung nas sku yis ni//sdig pa'i las ni spangs pa dang //gsung gi sdig pa spangs nas ni//'tsho ba kun nas dag par mdzad//des ni ma g+ha
24b6('dul ba): d+ha ya~M ni//grong mchog rgyal po'i khab gshegs nas//mgon po shes bzhin drin ldan pa//bsod snyoms phyir ni gshegs pa de//bzo sbyangs ma ga d+ha yi bdag/khang bzangs pa/
24b7('dul ba): na ni 'dug pa mthong //mthong nas sems dad de nas ni//blon po rnams la 'di skad smras//mtshan mchog gis ni rgyas gyur cing //kho log phun sum tshogs pa dang //gnya'
25a1('dul ba): shing gang du lta ba dang //'di la shes ldan dag ltos shig/spyan mi 'dreg lnga yid bzhungs shing //dman pa'i rigs las ma 'khrungs 'dri//glang du gnas nga
25a2('dul ba): gshegs gyur pa//rgyal pos po nya rjes bzhin btang //de nas pho nya la sgo ba//dge slong de ni gar 'gro zhing //gang du gnas ni btab pa yi//rjes bzhin du ni 'brang bar gyis//
25a3('dul ba): de ni bsod snyoms gshegs pa na//sgo drug legs par bsdams nas ni//shes bzhin dran dang ldan pa yis//lhung bzed myur du gang bar mdzad//bsod snyoms spyad pa byas
25a4('dul ba): nas kyang //thub pa grong khyer phyir byung nas//skya bsed las ni mngon gshegs te//de la gnas ni btab par gyur//gnas btab pa ni shes nas kyang //pho nya ga cig gos
25a5('dul ba): bsdud byas nas//gzhan ni myur du slar log ste//rgyal po la ni tshig smras pa//rgyal po chen po dge slong de//seng+ge 'am skrag gi drug gu dag/ri sul dag na gnas pa ltar//sku
25a6('dul ba): bsing ge nr-i steng na gnas//phyi rnams kyi tshig thos nas//sa bdag shing dru tshugs na smin//de ni blan pos yongs bskur nas//myur du kho nar dong bar gyur//gzhan pas
25a7('dul ba): bgrod pa'i ser zhon te//de ni gzhon pa las babs nas//rkang gnyis nye bar song nas ni//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mthong //rgyal pos 'dug nas dgyes pa dang //
25b1('dul ba): mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gsol nas//de ni ma kheng mi bslang bar//don 'di dag ni rab gnaso//dge slong lang tsho dang po la//bab par yang dag gnas gyur cing //'di 'dar gzi
25b2('dul ba): brjid ldan pa la//bsod snyoms spyod pa mdzesu ma lags//khang pa nyams dga' dag dang ni//bud med rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang //longs spyod mchog ni khyod gsol na//nyid kyi
25b3('dul ba): gdung ni zhu yis gsungs//rgyal po gangs ri nye ba na//yul gyi ljongs ni nor dag par//'bru dag gis ni gang gyur pa//ko sa la zhes grags pa yod//bu ram shing ba nyi ma'i rus///
25b4('dul ba): shAkya dag ni dri na gnas//rgyal po nga'i rigs rgyal rigs te//nga ni 'dod pa don mi gnyer//sa 'di ri dang bcas shing rgya mtshor bcas//rin chen kun dang ldan pa bskyengs gyur
25b5('dul ba): kyang //mi ni nam yang ngoms par mi 'gyur te//so ga che dus shing gis me bzhi no//'dod pa rnams ni sha kho na 'brel ces gsungs//mi dbang rgal bar dka' zhing 'od ma rtsub
25b6('dul ba): 'dra/sdug bsngal dang ni mya ngan 'jigs pa yi//rtsa ba'i gtso ste blo ngan rnams kyis sten//rgyal po ngas ni byung ma thag tu yang //'dod pa rnams la mi dga'i blo bskyed na//'jigs
25b7('dul ba): byed chos kyi dgra bor gyur pa dag/bor ba de kho slar yang ji ltar blang //rtse mo sna tshogs yangs par gyur pa yi//lhun po gangs can rlung gis bskyod srid kyi//ngo yi blo ni thar pa la
26a1('dul ba): rten pa//'dod pa'i shugs kyis bskyod par mi nuso//'jig rten 'di ni 'dod par bying gyur nas//'khor ba'i 'khor los yongasu mabyams pa la//ma/
26a2('dul ba): dbang nga skyabs yin te gzhan med pas//'jigs pa tsho las de ni thar par bya//'dod pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mkhyen//mya ngan las 'das pa zhig gzigs pa//spang
26a3('dul ba): phyir gang dung mi yid//dga' ba dag tu 'gro bar bya//rgyal po gzugs tshan snying pos gsol pa/kye rab tu byung ba brtul zhugs 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer//des gsungs
26a4('dul ba): po/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub//rgyal pos gsol pa/kye rab tu byung ba gang gri tshe khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs
26a5('dul ba): rgyas par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag la yang dgongs shig/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/de bzhin du bsam par bya'o//zhes gsungs nas/rgyal po'i khab nas byung
26a6('dul ba): skye/bya rgod phung po'i ri dang ha cang yang mi ring bar drang srong rnams kyi bsti gnas der gshegaso//de rnams spyod pa dang gnas pas bsam gtan lo brtson par brkus te/
26a7('dul ba): de rnams gang tshe rkang pa gcig gis nyin thun gcig 'gring pa de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' 'thun gnyisu bzhengaso//gal te de rnams gdung ba lnga'i sbyor ba nyid 'thun
26b1('dul ba): ga 'dug da rgyu/byung chub sems dpas kya sbyor ba sa drug brgyan so//do nas rnams ma mtshan skyes nas/dag sbyong 'dzin can nag zhes smras pas/dge sbyong rgyun
26b2('dul ba): po dge sbyong chen po zhes bya bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpas de rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed brtulo zhugs ci zhig den du gnyer/de na kha cig gis gsol pa/brgya
26b3('dul ba): byin nyid do//kha cig gis gsol pa/bdag cag ni tshangs pa nyid do//kha cig gis gsol pa/bdud nyid de//byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/drang srong 'di dag ni slar
26b4('dul ba): yang lhung ba/lam log par zhugs pa ste/lam de ni dag pa ma yin no snyam nas/des rgyu sngal shes kyi/bu ring du 'phur gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /sgyu rtsal shes
26b5('dul ba): kyi bu ring du 'phur la 'di skad ces gsung so//ring du 'phur gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na khyod kyi drung du kho bo tshangs par spyod pa spyad do//des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma bdag
26b6('dul ba): la mi bde ba med kyis khyod cing de ba kho nar bzhugs shig/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/ring du 'phur khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig rtogs par gyur/des gsol pa/tshe dang
26b7('dul ba): ldan pa go'u ta ma ci yong med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te smyo rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur dad pa de la ning yang dang la/sgyu rtsal shes
27a1('dul ba): na kyi mye ma kyis pa na sbyi du rgyu ba'i byi ga cig su na 'a /la ba ldan / da par blunas teg phyin pa na
27a2('dul ba): la de /da par na phyogs khyen ma 'dun ma med par gyu / mi ni ma
27a3('dul ba): ste/nis de mngon ste de na ya la shes kyi bu 'du gang na byud ga/shegs ni nanan/ma shes kyi dul di
27a4('dul ba): ga sa//rang du yu da kyis kyi yi med pa'i blo mched kyi gyi chos 'di mi ni mngon pa sa shes pos mngon sum du byas sa ma/des 'din kyis
27b1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma med de bdag gis ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar gyi chos de drug rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byaso//tshe dang ldan pa go& ta ma de lta na khyod kyi ji tsam
27b2('dul ba): bdag gi yang de tsam la/de dag gis ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la'o skol mtshungs shing mnyam ste 'dra bar thob kyis tshur spyon/'o skol gnyis kas 'khor 'di
27b3('dul ba): yongasu drang bar bgyi'o//de nas sgyu rtul shes kyi/bu ring du 'phur byang chub sems dpa'i thog ma'i slob dpon nyid kyis/byang chub sems dpral rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod
27b4('dul ba): pa'i dam pas mchod do//de'i rtogs pa dag yang dga' ba dang /mgu bar gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'ji snyam du dgongs te/lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma
27b5('dul ba): yin/mthong bar nus pa ma yin te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin no snya mo//de nas byang chub sems dpas lam de nus pa med par rig nas/
27b6('dul ba): ras byed kyi bu lhag spyod ga na ba de dag shegs te byon nas/rang byed kyi bu lhag spyod lo//'di skad ces gsungaso//lhag spyod gal te khyod la mi bde ba med na/khyod kyi drung du nga tshad
27b7('dul ba): par spyod pa spyad do//des gsol pa/tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma bdag la ma bde ba med kyis khyod ci bde ba kho nar bzhugs shig/khyod kyis chos ji snyed cig mngon sum du byas
28a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du'o//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/rangs byed kyi bu
28a2('dul ba): lhag spyod dad pa la ni bdag kyang dad la/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la brtson 'grus dang /dran pa dang /ting 'dzin dang /shes rab yod pa lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang /dran pa
28a3('dul ba): dang ting 'dzin dang /shes rab ni bdag la yod na/rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyi bar gyi chos 'di snyed cig mngon sum du
28a4('dul ba): byas na/bdag gis kyang ci'i phyir chos 'di dag mngon sum du mi bya snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos de rnams kho na ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dang /ma rtogs
28a5('dul ba): pa rtogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtul ba dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas te//gcig
28a6('dul ba): bu dben pa bag yod pa rtul ba dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/ring po ma thogs pa/kho nar chos de mngon sum du mdzad par 'gyur ro//chos de mngon sum du
28a7('dul ba): mdzad nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang /rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod la 'di skad ces gsungaso//lhag spyod khyod kyis 'du shes med 'du shes
28b1('dul ba): med min gyi skye mched kyi bar du chos 'di dag rang gi mngon sum du byas sam/tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma mad lags te/bdag gis 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched rgya
28b2('dul ba): bar gyi chos 'odadi dag mngon sum du bgyis//byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/tshe dang ldan pa lhag spyod bdag gis kyang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi chos
28b3('dul ba): 'di dag rang gi mngon sum du byas//tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma de lta na khyod kyis ji tsam pa bdag gis kyang de tsam la bdag gi ji tsam pa khyod kyi yang de tsam pas don 'di la 'o skol
28b4('dul ba): mtshungs shing mnyam ste/'dra bar thob kyis tshur spyon 'o skol gnyis kyis tshogs 'di yongasu drang bar bgyi'o//de nas rangs byed kyi bu lhag spyod byang chub sems dpa'i thogs ma'i
28b5('dul ba): slob dpon gyis byang chub sems dpal rjed pa'i dam pas brjed cing mchod pa'i dam pas mchodado//de'i shes pa rnams la yang dga' ba dang mgu bor gyur to//de nas byang chub seMde'
28b6('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/lam 'di ni shes par nus pa ma yin mthong bar nus par ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin//skya mo de nas byang
28b7('dul ba): chub sems dpa' lam de yang nus pa med par rig nas gshegaso//rgyal po zas gtsang bu'i mya ngan gyis rtag tu gdungs nas/byang chub sems dpa' btsal ba'i phyir pho nye btong
29a1('dul ba): byalas des ji ltar gzho mas cad sgrub pa/ras byed kyi bu lhag spyod dang ldan cig gzhugs pa las rgyal po'i kha nas phy-ir d+hA /rim gro ba med
29a2('dul ba): par 'khyams nos//thos nas rim gro byed pa su myi brgya bdang //grong khyer rtswas bstun du shAkya legs par rab kyis kyang de bzhin du bos nas des kyong rim gi byed panyis rgya/
29a3('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro pa lnga brgyus yongasu bskor nas/dka' thub kyi nagasu rgyu ba na des dgongs pa dka' thub kyi nag sa gang na ba der spyod cing gnas pas ni bdud rtsi
29a4('dul ba): thob par mi nus kyis/ma la bdag gis rim gro byed pa lnga zhig blangs la lhag ma ni dgye'o snyam nas des yum gyi phyogs las gnyis/yab kyi phyogs nas gsum khrid de de
29a5('dul ba): rnams kyis de'i rim gro byed//de nas byang chub sems dpa' rim gro lngas yongasu bskor to//ga yA'i sgo phyogs na lding rgyas 'od srung gi sde'i grong brdal gang na b.rar+g+haM zhing gaskye
29a6('dul ba): tI byon nas/de phani tshun du chag pa no//phyogs dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshol cheng tshing mdzes pa/hU~M kr-I ne ra na dzi nA bsil bar 'bab pa gser gu can 'jug
29a7('dul ba): ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon mo dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/
29b1('dul ba): ma'os phyogs 'di ni dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa nags tshang tshing mdzes pa chu klung ne ran dza na bsil bar bab pa/gser gu can 'jug ngogs bde zhing mtha' rgya che la gsing ma sngon
29b2('dul ba): po dang shing sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dga' dga' ltar 'dug pa zhig ste/kye ma'o spong ba don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu nags khrod 'dir brten na spong ba bya bar nuso//bdag spong ba don du
29b3('dul ba): gnyer ba yin pas ma la bdag kyang nags khrod 'dir la brtan la spong ba bya'o snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' nags khrod du zhugs te shing zhig gi drung du bzhugs nas/tshems
29b4('dul ba): la tshems gtad/ljags rkan la bcar thugs kyi thugs mngon du bzung mngon du bsdams shin tu mngon du bsdamaso//de thugs kyis thugs mngon du bzung mngon du bsdams shin
29b5('dul ba): tu mngon du bsdams pas be spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur te/dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phying ka lag tu bzung mngon du bsdams/
29b6('dul ba): shin tu mngon du bsdams na/de'i ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul 'byung ba de bzhin du de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' tshems la tshems gtad/ljags rkan la btsir te/
29b7('dul ba): thugs kyi thugs mngon du bzung mngon du bsdams shin tu mngon du bsdams pa na ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas rdul byung bar gyur kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi/brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/
30a1('dul ba): sgyu ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam pa gzhag pa yin//byang chub
30a2('dul ba): sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyamasu myong ba yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnas//de
30a3('dul ba): nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la bdag gis rnam pa bam pa'i bcom gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par byang snyam//des rnam par bam pa'i bsamA ga d+hAn
30a4('dul ba): dag lo snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa ni zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba bgagaso//de
30a5('dul ba): zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba bgags pa dang rlung thams cad spyi bo'i nang du sob nas/de de'i dbu la dbu'i char ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes//dper na mi stobs dang
30a6('dul ba): ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i spyi bor lcags kyi phur brnon pos btab na de'i mgo 'a tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpo rnam par blam pa'i bsam
30a7('dul ba): gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/dbul dbu'i tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsamaso pa yin/skye ma sbyang ba ma yin gyi sbyangs pa
30b1('dul ba): yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba yid du mi
30b2('dul ba): 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te ma gnas//de 'di snyam du dgongs te me la bdag gis lhag par bam po'i
30b3('dul ba): bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam mo//des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/de rnam par bam pa'i bsam
30b4('dul ba): gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba 'gag so//de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba 'gags pas rlung thams cad
30b5('dul ba): stan gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyas par gyur to//dper na 'gar bas spyad pa bus na rlung thams cad kyi rgyun grwa gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyu ba de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam
30b6('dul ba): pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa ni/rlung thams kyikyi rgyun stanA gnyis kyi bu ga nas rgyas par gyur kyang /de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brnams pa yin/sgyu ma
30b7('dul ba): sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no//byang chub sengar
31a1('dul ba): sdug bsngal mi bzad ba rngub pa rgyu ba yod du mi 'ong ba'i tshong ba de lta bu nyams myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir/thugs yong su gtugs te
31a2('dul ba): miganaso//de 'di snyam du dgongs te ma la bdag gis lhag par yang rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam//de nas lhag par rnam par tha
31a3('dul ba): pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/de rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang
31a4('dul ba): 'byung ba bgag so//de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngubs pa dang 'byung ba bgags pas phyag gi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/shin tu rgyas par gyur to//dper na
31a5('dul ba): 'gar ba'i spyad pa bus na gang bar gyur/shin tu gang bar gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dog la snyoms par zhugs pa na/
31a6('dul ba): phyag gi nang thams cad rgyas par gyur/shin tu rgyas par gyur kyang /de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/
31a7('dul ba): rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yino//byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du
31b1('dul ba): mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong ba yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir/thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnaso//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la bdag gis rnam par
31b2('dul ba): bam pa'i bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam//des lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/de rnam par bam pa'i bsam
31b3('dul ba): gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shongs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bag gso//de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgegs pa dang /de'i tshe
31b4('dul ba): dbu la dbu'i tsher ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyeso//dper na mi stobs dang ldan pas mi stobs shin tu chung ba'i mgo 'brengs pas yang nas yang du dam du bcings na de'i mgo'i char ba shin
31b5('dul ba): tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/dbu la dbu'i tshe srab shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang /de zhu
31b6('dul ba): pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ste/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag
31b7('dul ba): pa yino//byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzod pa rtsub pa che ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba de lta bu nyam su myong yang sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir/thugs yongasu gtu
32a1('dul ba): te mi gnaso//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la bdag gis rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyamo//de lhag
32a2('dul ba): par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan drag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na zhal dang shangs nas dbugs
32a3('dul ba): rngub pa dang 'byung ba bgagaso//de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba bgags pa dang /de'i tshe khong du khong gi tshor ba mi bzad pa skyes//dper na ba lang gi
32a4('dul ba): shun pa mkhas pa 'am/ba lang gi shan pa'i slob ma mkhas pas ba lang bsad pa'i gri rnon pos ba glang gi lto dral na de'i khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin
32a5('dul ba): du de'i tshe/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na//khong du khong gi tshor ba shin tu mi bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum po ma yin gyi
32a6('dul ba): brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par
32a7('dul ba): bzhag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa so sdug bsngal mi bzod pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyamasu myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thu
32b1('dul ba): yongasu gtugs te mi gnaso//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la bdag gis lhag par rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par bya'o snyam//de lhag par
32b2('dul ba): rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug par brtsams te/des rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/zhal dang shangs nas
32b3('dul ba): dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba bgagaso//de'i zhal dang shangs nas dbugs rngub pa dang /'byung ba bgags pa dang /de'i tshe ska la skra'i gdungs pa shani tu mi bzang
32b4('dul ba): pa skye so//dper na mi shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis mi stobs shin tu chung ba zhig phying ka log tu bzung ste/me dong gi nang du sbrengs na de'i lus la lus kyi gdung
32b5('dul ba): ba shin tu mi bzad pa skye ba de bzhin du/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par bam pa'i bsam gtan dag la snyoms par zhugs pa na/sku la sku'i gdung ba shin tu mi
32b6('dul ba): bzad pa skyes kyang de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin rdzi sa yin rdugs pa ma yin gyi bran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems
32b7('dul ba): gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin//byang chub sems dpas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba yad du mi 'ong ba de lta bu'i tshor ba nyamasu myong yang 'di ltar sku
33a1('dul ba): bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnas//de 'di snyam du dgangs te/ma la bdag gi thams cad kyi thams cad du zas mi za bar sgrub par bya/
33a2('dul ba): snya mo//de nas lha rab tu mang po'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nas/byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/byang chub sems dpa' la 'di
33a3('dul ba): skad ces smras//grogs po gal te khyod mi'i kha zas kyis 'dzem par mdzod/nga mtsha ba mdzod/smod par mdzad/rnam par smod par mdzad na/bdag cag gis khyod kyi ba
33a4('dul ba): spyi'i khung buM thams cad nas lha'i mdangs bsgrub par 'gyis te khyad kyi gtor cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te bdag gis mi'i zas mi zo bar dab
33a5('dul ba): la bdag gi bai spu'i khung bu thams cad du lha rnams kyis lha'i mdangs bsgrubs nas de bdag gir byed pa ni/bdag gi brdzun yin la bdag gi brdzun gang yin pa de ni bdag gi log pa yino//
33a6('dul ba): bdag gi log pa gang yin pa de'i rkyen gyis 'di na sems can kha cig lus zhig ste/shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro log par lhung ba sems can dmyal ba rnams skye bar 'gyur gyis
33a7('dul ba): ma la bdag gis lha rnams kyi tshig na thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs la zas nyung ba dang chung ba dang chung zad dang chang chung bze' ba 'am yang na mon sran sde'u gyi khu ba 'am 'on te
33b1('dul ba): rgya sran gyi khu ba 'am/yang na ha re nu ga'i 'bras bu'i khu ba btungo snyamo//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe lha rnams kyi tshig thams cad kyi thams cad du spangs nas zhal zas
33b2('dul ba): nyung ba dang chung ba dang chung zad dang chang chung gsol pa 'am/yang na mon sran sde'u gyi khu ba 'am/'on te rgya sen gyi khu ba 'am/yang na ha re nu ka'i 'bras bu'i khu ba gsolo//
33b3('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang chung ba dang chung zad dang chang chung gsol ba nA/yan lag nying lag thams cad zhum kun tu zhum ste/skem zhing dpal chung bar gyur to//
33b4('dul ba): dper ni ldum bu a si ta'i sdong bu dang /ka li ka'i sdong bu 'dzum kun tu 'dzum pas sha chung zhing skams par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba/
33b5('dul ba): dang cung zad dang /chang chung gsol ba na/yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad kun bzhum ste/skem zhing dpal chung por gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe
33b6('dul ba): zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /chung zad dang /chang chung gsol pa na/dbu la dbu'i bgras pa rnyil kun tu rnyil te/'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur to//dper na ku ba rtsa ba
