33b7('dul ba): nas bcad na rnyis kun tu rnyis pas 'khums la 'bar 'bur du gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /cung zad dang /chang chung gsal ba na/
34a1('dul ba): dbu la dbu'i lpags pa rnyis kun tu rnyis te/'khums shing 'bar 'bur du gyur kyang /de zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma
34a2('dul ba): sbyangs pa ma yin sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe bdag
34a3('dul ba): nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyamasu myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnaso//
34a4('dul ba): do zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /chung zad dang /chang chung gsol pa na/spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song ste/zab pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba
34a5('dul ba): lta bur snangango //dper na khron pa zab mo'i chur skar ma'i gzugs brnyan phug tu song shin tu song ste/zab pa shin tu zla ba par/ring du song ba gtam du byung ba de bzhin du/de'i
34a6('dul ba): tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /cung zad dang /chang chung gsol pa na/spyan gnyis kyi spyan gyi 'bras bu phug tu song shin tu phug tu song ste//zab/
34a7('dul ba): pa shin tu zab par ring du song bas phyung ba lta bur snang yang de zhum par ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yaun+tu/lus mo sbyangs pa ma yin sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin
34b1('dul ba): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par bzhag pa yin no//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du
34b2('dul ba): mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung
34b3('dul ba): ba dang /cung zung dang /chang chung gsol pa na/de'i tshe rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur te/dper na rtsa gang lo gnyis sam lo gsum lon pa'i phya ma dgu pa mtho dman
34b4('dul ba): du gyur pa de bzhin du/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /cung zad dang /chang chung gsol pa na/rtsib ma'i bar mtho dman can du gyur kyang /de
34b5('dul ba): zhum pa ma yin gyi brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmugs pa ma yin dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam
34b6('dul ba): par gzhag pa yin no//byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe bdog nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rngub pa tsha yi du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyamasu myong yang 'di ltar sku bsgoms
34b7('dul ba): pa yin pa'i phyir thugs yongasu gtugs te mi gnaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhal zas nyung ba dang /chung ba dang /chung zad dang /chang chung gsol ba ni/
35a1('dul ba): skal ba'i tshig 'di lta ste/sgra'i lan bu lta bur gyur to//mjug to ni 'di lta ste/rnga mo'i rkang pa lta bur gyur to//de lan 'ga' ldang bar 'dod na kha
35a2('dul ba): sdug tu skyel la/lan 'ga' 'dug par 'dod nu gran rkyal du skyel to//de ro stod la brten nas ro smad 'jog par byed/ro smad la brten nas ro stod 'jog par byed//de
35a3('dul ba): phyophyag gnyis kyi sku la byugs yongasu byugs te/de'i phyag gnyis kyi sku la byugs yongasu byugs pa de'i tshe/ba spu rnams drung rul pas sa la lhag par gyur to//de 'di snyam
35a4('dul ba): du dgongs te/lam 'di yang shes par nus pa ma yin mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin snyamo//de nas lha
35a5('dul ba): gsum zhig byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der lhags te/de nas gcig gis 'di skad ces smraso//dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nag po zhig/gnyis pas 'di skad ces smraso///
35a6('dul ba): 'di nag po ma yin gyi 'on kyang sngo bsangs zhig/gsum pas 'di skad ces smraso//'di nag po yang ma yin sngo bsangs kyang ma yin gyi mdog dmar dmugo/byang chub so de'i
35a7('dul ba): sku mdog bzang por snang ba ni thams cad du nub par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe gsum zhig snang ba 'di lta ste/shing rlon pa chu
35b1('dul ba): can zhig chu nas phyung ste/nye bar skam la gzhag pa dang /de nas me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig der 'ongs nas de de la bcu bstun byas te/gtsubs shing bzhag nas
35b2('dul ba): gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can yin pa'i phyir me dbyung ba dang /'bar su mi gtub pa de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha gcig 'dod pa rnams la lus dang sems kyis
35b3('dul ba): thag srid bar mi gnas kyi/de rnams la 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la chags pa dang /'dod pa la dga' ba dang /'dod pa la zhen pa dang /'dod pa la 'chums
35b4('dul ba): pa dang /'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams kyi sems yongasu gtugs te gnas pa yin pas/lus dang sems kyi thag sring bar mi gnas pa rnams kyi ni
35b5('dul ba): de dang 'dra'o//de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong mod kyi/'on kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa
35b6('dul ba): ma yin/mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/de la 'di ni de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i
35b7('dul ba): dpe snang ba dang po yin no//dper na shing rlon pa chu can zhig chu nas byung ste/nye bar skam la bzhag pa dang /de nas mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de la
36a1('dul ba): gtsub stan byas te/gdub shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de rlon pa chu can rlon pa yin pa'i phyir me 'byung ba dang /'bar du mi btub pa
36a2('dul ba): de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam bram ze kha cig 'dod pa rnams la lus kyi spong bar gnas kyi sems kyis ma yin pa de rnams kyis 'dod pa rnams la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la chags
36a3('dul ba): pa dang /'dod pa la dga' ba dang 'dod pa la zhen pa dang /'dod pa la 'chums pa dang /'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni/de rnams kyi sems
36a4('dul ba): yongasu gtugs te gnas pa yin no//de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa che ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong mod kyi//'on
36a5('dul ba): kyang de rnams kyis shes par nus pa ma yin/mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin te/de la 'di ni de'i tshe
36a6('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gsan pa'i dpe snang ba gnyis pa yin no//'di lta ste/shing skam khong stong chu mod pa zhig chu dang thag por skam la bzhug pa dang /de
36a7('dul ba): nos mi me don du gnyer ba me tshol ba zhig 'ongs nas des de la gtsubastan byas te/gtsubs shing bzhag nas gtsubs na 'di ltar shing de skam zhing khong stong yin pa'i phyir/me
36b1('dul ba): 'byung ba dang /'bar du gdub pa de bzhin dge sbyong d+ham bram ze kha ci 'dod pa rnams la lus dang /sems kyis thag srid par gnas pa de rnams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa
36b2('dul ba): la 'dun pa dang /'dod pa la chags pa dang /'dod pa la dka' ba dang /brjod pa ste zhen pa dang /'dod pa la drums pa dang /'dod pa la lhag par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni de rnams
36b3('dul ba): kyi sems yongasu gtugs te/mi gnas pa yino//de rnams bdag nyid gnod pa'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa gtsubs pa tsha ba yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba de lta bu nyam su myong mod kyi
36b4('dul ba): 'on kyang de rnams kyi shes par nus/mthong bar nus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus te/de la 'dri ni de'i byang chub sems dpa' la sngon ma gson pa'i dpe snang
36b5('dul ba): pa gsum pa yino//'di ltar de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la dpe gsum pa snang nas/ma la bdag gos til 'bru gcig gis zas bza' bar bya'o zhes de til 'bru gcig za ba'i
36b6('dul ba): gsol te/ji srid de'i mdangs de snre la sa yal bar ma gyur gyi bar du til 'bru gnyis pa'i zas mi gsol te/yal nas til 'bru gnyis pa'i zos de gsol bar mdzad//de til
36b7('dul ba): 'bru gcig gis zas gsol bas yan lag dang nying lag rnams shin tu skams par gyur to//til 'bru cig ji ltar 'bras gcig dang /sran ko la 'bru gcig dang rgyas na tsucig
37a1('dul ba): /mon spyan gres 'bru gcig dang /mon spyan sderu 'brug cig dang /rtswa'i gding las mnal bar mdzad//rgyal po rnasu gcang gis dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas sna r+b+bad/
37a2('dul ba): blo nas nyi ma re re zhing bdog pa nyis brgya lnga bcu gtong bar byed//rgyal po legs par rabs sad kyis kyang nyes brgya lnga bcu'o//de dag nyi ma re re zhing de gnyis la myur ba myur bar gti skyel
37a3('dul ba): bar byed de/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di 'dra bar dka' bar spyod de/til 'bru gcig dang /'bras 'bru gcig dang /sran ko la 'bru gcig dang /rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /mon
37a4('dul ba): sran gri'u 'bru gtsog dang /mon sran sde'u 'bru gcig gis zas gsol zhing rtsa gding ba la mnal to zhes smra'o//de rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bu'i mya ngan gyi non pas lhag par
37a5('dul ba): dadeng /khar na zhing mig mchi mas bsrungs te gdungs nas/btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas rtsa'i gding ba la til bar byed//btsun mo grags 'dzin mas khyim thab kyi gnas
37a6('dul ba): skabs de thos nas khyim thabs kyi mya ngan gyi non te gdong mchi mas rlan cing /me tog phreng dang rgyan dang spyad pa rnams bor nas dka' ba spyod par byed/til 'bru gcig dang /'bras 'bru
37a7('dul ba): cig dang /sran kro la 'bru gcig dang /rgya sran 'bru gcig dang /mon sran gre'u 'bru gcig dang /man srin rje'u 'bru gcig gis zas zo zhing rtsa'i gding pa la nyal bar byed//de'i rum
37b1('dul ba): mi bde'o zhes rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas des bsams pa/gal te grags 'dzin mas byang chub sems dpa'i gtam nyi ma re zhing thos nas khyim thabs kyi mya ngan gyis non te dka' ba spyad pa
37b2('dul ba): 'dis/mngal mi 'chags pa 'am/srog chad par 'gyur ba'i gnas 'di yod pas des na grags 'dzin me la byang chub sems dpa'i gtam su yang gleng bar mi 'gyuraro snyam nas/rgyal
37b3('dul ba): po zas gtsang gi btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad la khrimasu bcas pa/sus kyang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam glags 'dzin ma la brjod par mi bya'o//gtam skyil ba la yang
37b4('dul ba): bsgo ba ngam gtogs par su la yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtam brjod par mi bya'o//rang gis thos na yang grags 'dzin mal bsams nas mya ngan mnags te/gang thos na btsun mo
37b5('dul ba): grags 'dzin ma mi 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gtam gzhan gyis btsun mo'i 'khor la 'drid par byed do//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du dgongs te/lam 'di yang shes par nus
37b6('dul ba): pa ma yin/mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par byang chub par nus pa mi yin snya mo//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la bdag gis kha zas shin tu ngan pa bza' bar
37b7('dul ba): byaro snyam ste/de kha zas shin tu ngan pa gsol bar mdzad//de la zas phal pa ni 'di yin te/be'u 'byung nas ring po ma lon pa'i bar pa'i 'o ma 'thung ba gang yin pa de rnams kyi
38a1('dul ba): gcin dang lci ba yin no//ji srid de'i sku las mdas de yal bar ma gyur pa de srid du zas gnyis pa mi gsol te/yal nas kha zas phyi ma gsol bar
38a2('dul ba): mdzad do//dur khrod chen po gshegs nas kyang me ro dbu sten du bcug/zhabs la zhings bzhag ste/snang ba'i 'du shes dang /dran pa dang shes bzhin dang /ldang
38a3('dul ba): ba'i 'du shes yid le mdzad pas/glo g.yas pas mnol bar mdzad//de'i tshe grong khyer gyi gzhon rnams dang /grong khyer gyi gzhonu ma rnams lkugs nas shing bus de
38a4('dul ba): snyan gnyis kyi bu gar 'jugs par byed/rna ba gnyis ka nas 'dren par byed cing 'di skad ces kyi phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos/kye phyag dar khrod kyi sha za la ltos shes smra bar
38a5('dul ba): yang byed do//de'i tshe phyag dar dang brong rdog dang bsog mas kyang 'thor bar byed//'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni grong khyer gyi gzhonu rnams sem/grong khyer gyi gzho nu ma ni
38a6('dul ba): rnams la dran sems bskyed pa 'am sdig pa'i tshig dbyung bar mi dgongaso//byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i dka' ba spyod pa na/'di snyam du dgongs te/gong su dge sdug bsngal
38a7('dul ba): spang bar brtson 'grus brtsoms par gnas pa de thams cad ni 'di tsam du zad//de las lhag pa yang med/de'i grong ni yang med/lam 'di yang shes par nus pa mi yin/
38b1('dul ba): mthong bar nus pa ma yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa ma yin snyam nas/de zhum pa ma yin gyis/brtson 'grus brtsams pa yin/lus ma sbyangs pa
38b2('dul ba): ma yin gyi sbyangs pa yin/rmongs pa ma yin gyi dran pa nye bar gzhog pa yin te/sems rtse gcig tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin no//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/shes par nus pa dang
38b3('dul ba): mthong bar nus pa dang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa'i lam de gang yin snyam na/de 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag yab shAkya zas gtsang gi khyim no gnas/
38b4('dul ba): bA'i tsha zhing blas kyi mtha' drung du song nas/shing 'dzem bu'i gri ba ma la 'dug ste/'dod pa las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas/spyod pa dang bcas shing
38b5('dul ba): dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa de mngon par dran te/de ni lam yin/de ni bskyabs pa yin/shes par nus pa yin//mthong
38b6('dul ba): bA nus pa yin/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par nus pa yin//de bdag gis bskyong du yang 'di ltar rid cing nyam chung la zhan pas bla ba ma yin te/mal bdag
38b7('dul ba): gis ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /ci bder 'bras chen dang /'an den gyi kha zas rigs pa b.ra' dzing lus mang sar deng til mar gyis byugs la
39a1('dul ba): chu 'jam pos lus bkru bar bya'o snyam ste/ci bder dbugs rngub pa dang /ci bder dbugs 'byung ba dang /ci bder 'bras chan dang /zan dron rgyu
39a2('dul ba): zhal zas rags pa gsol zhing /sku til mar dang mr-ir sar gyis byugs nas chu 'jam pos spu 'khru bar mdzad///'dul ba gzhi//bam po rgya
39a3('dul ba): lnga pa/de nas rim gro pa lnga po de rnams 'di snyam du sems te shes ldan dag/dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di ni sdom pa lhod pa/bya ba mang pos 'tsho ba nyams par gyur pa
39a4('dul ba): yin te/'di da ltar 'bras can dang /zan dron gyi kha zas mang du zal lus zhun mar dang til mar gyis byugs nas/chu 'dzum pos lus khrus byed/'dis du ni
39a5('dul ba): cung zad kyang thob par mi nus snyam du bsams nas/byang chub sems dpa' bor nye dong pa las/rim gyis ba ra na ser phyin nas 'jig rten pa'i dgra bcom pa gang yin pa
39a6('dul ba): la brten nas rab tu byung ste/lnga po de rnams blo 'thun zhing lhan cig 'grogs la kun tu dga' bas rtsod pa med par drang srong smra bA ri dregs kyi nags na gnas pas lnga ste
39a7('dul ba): lnga sde zhes bya bar gyur to//byang chub sems dpa' rim gyi lus kyi stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus yang dag par bskyed nas rim gyi sde can gyi grong khyer du gshegs///
39b1('dul ba): da rgyu n+d+ha na sbyin na spya snA dang / nga dag sa/ m+b+hi shwA btsun// sar+b+ba la ldan sha sgru
39b2('dul ba): drang srong sar sgyu'i bsti ga nas dang ha cang yang mi ring bar byung ba de/mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis 'i khA yi sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhes lung bstan pa de yang gzugs
39b3('dul ba): bye /lta ni sdug pa mdzes pa mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa skye bo thams cad kyi yid 'phrog pa yin pas byed med gang gis lo bcu gnyis 'di lta bur brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs
39b4('dul ba): spyod pa de'i khyim thabs tu 'gyu ro zhes thos//thos nas kyang bud medo ni skyes pa la mngon par dga' ba yin pas de nyid kyis lo bcu gnyis bka' thub blangs te/de rdzogs par byas nas/de
39b5('dul ba): rdzogs pa dang /lan bcu drug tu nyid kur byas pa'i 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltor mngar bas drang srong dge 'thub kyis yongasu dub pa glo bung du 'ongs pa la dngul bar byed//de gnyis kyis pa stod pa no/
39b6('dul ba): nas/ba stong po de nyid la blud do//dri ba stong po de nyid la gagos nasaM lnga brgyal byung //de nas lnga brgya bo dag be nos nas lta brgya bo de dag nyid la blu do//de nas lnga brgya po de dag nyid bzhos
39b7('dul ba): nas nyis brgya lnga bcu la blud//de nas nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag nyid bzhes nas swa ban+de l-I bcu de dag nyid la blung / nas nyis brgya lnga bcu po de dag nyid bzhos nas/bar+d+ha nyi shu
40a1('dul ba): rtswa rdzu zung //de nas ny+tsi DUN+Da ba dag smyanas nas/ \u0f7flnga dI dag la byung //de nas r+b+ban+ti shUN+DalA pa dag gnas nas
40a2('dul ba): drug cu rtsa gsum drag la blud do//de nas drug cu rtsa gsum po de dgu bzhos nas/drug cu gsum po de dag nyid la byed do//de nas drug cu rtsa gsum po de dag bzhis nas/
40a3('dul ba): sum cu rtsa gnyis la blud do//de nas sum cu rtswa gnyis pa de dge bzhos te/sum cu rtse gnyis pa de dag nyid la blung ngo //de nas sum cu rtse gnyis po de dag nyid bzhos nas/
40a4('dul ba): bcu drug la blad do//de nas bcu drug po de dag nyid bzhos nas bcu drug pa de dag nyid la byud //de nas bcu drug pa de dag nyid bzhos nas brgyad la drud de//de nas brgyad
40a5('dul ba): po de dag nyid bzhes nas/brgyad po de dag nyid la blud//de nas brgyad po de dag nyid la ni bcu drug tu nyid kur byas pa bzhos te/shel las byis pa'i snod kyi nang du blugs nos
40a6('dul ba): bskul tI'i zug snang rje ltar mdor bar byed pa ni/gnas gcing ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byasems pa/'o ma'i thug pa 'di byang chub sems dpa sa gsol nas/de nyid
40a7('dul ba): du bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur gyis de lta bas na 'di la mthu zhig bsgribs par bya'o snyam nas/de rnams kyi mod la mothu skyid pa zhes bya ba'i sman drug so//'o mo
40b1('dul ba): khol pa de la 'khor lo dang /bkra shis dang /g.yu drung 'khyil ba'i mtshan ma dag snang ngo //der yang kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro zhes bya ba 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin nas/des
40b2('dul ba): 'o ma'i thug pa de mthong nas des bsams pa 'o ma'i thug pa 'di sus 'thungs pa des/deng nyid du bla na med pa'i yang ye shes thob par 'gyur gyis ma la bdag gis 'di bslang snyam nas//
40b3('dul ba): re shig ma byung ma byung gi bar du de yud tsam zhig mtha' gcig tu song ste bsdad nas/de song ste smras pa/kho bo bkres pa dang skom pas dub cing nye gyis 'di kho bo la lud cig/de
40b4('dul ba): gnyis kyis smras pa mi sbyin no//de cang mi smra bar song ngo //de nas de gnyis kyis shel las byas pa'i snod kyi nang nas rin po che'i yol go'i nang du blugaso//lha rnams kyi
40b5('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin gyis shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des de'i bram ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas de gnyis kyi mdun du 'dug/tshangs par yang 'ongs nas de dang
40b6('dul ba): nye ba zhig tu 'dug/de gnyis kyis brgya byin la sbyin par brtsams pa dang des smras pa/ci bdag la sbyin ni ma/'on te bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa la
40b7('dul ba): sbyin de gnyis kyis smras pa/khyod pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa gang yin pa de la dbu'o//des smras pa tshangs pa 'di ni bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin
41a1('dul ba): g+h+ri de la phul cig/de gnyis kyis de la sbyin par brtsams pa dang /des smras pa/ci bdag la sbyin nam/'on te bdag pas ches khyad par du 'phags
41a2('dul ba): pa gang yin pa la/de gnyis kyis smras pa/khyod pas ches khyad paro 'phags pa gang yin pa de la dbulo//des smras pa/gaunas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha 'di dag ni bdag pas ches
41a3('dul ba): khyad par 'phags pa yin gyis de dag la phul cig/de gnyis kyis de dag la sbyin par brtsams pa dang /de dag gis kyang smras pa/ci bdag cag la sbyin nam 'on te bdag
41a4('dul ba): cag pas ches khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa la/de gnyis kyis smras pa/khyod pas ches khyad par 'phags pa gang yin pa la'o//de dag gis smras pa/byang chub sede'i
41a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'dri chu klung ne ran dzA nar zhugs nas sku khrus mdzad/nyams chung ba nyid kyis bzhengs mi spyod pa zhig yod de/de bdag cag pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa
41a6('dul ba): yin gyis de la phul cig/de gnyis de'i drung du chas pa na/de'i tshe lha rnams kyis shing a rdzu na'i yal go btud nas btud pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'jus te chu klung ne
41a7('dul ba): ran dza na nas byung nas chos gos bags te/chu klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram na bzhugaso//de nas de gnyis kyis gus pa dang /bsam pa drag pos de la'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar
41b1('dul ba): mngar ba de bya'o//byang chub sems dpas kyang de gnyis rje su bzung ba'i phyir ba nas//bzhes nas gsungs pa ci yol go de 'di yongasu btang ngam/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/brjon
41b2('dul ba): ldan 'das 'dra yang yongasu btang lag so//de nas byang chub sems dpas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol nas yol gro de bkrus te/chu klung ne ran dza nar bor ba klu rnams kyis blangaso//
41b3('dul ba): 'odi ni chos nyid yin te/lha rnams kyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis//nam mkha' lding gi cha byad du sprul te/chu klung ne ran dza na dka
41b4('dul ba): nas klu skrag par byas te/yil go de 'phrogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du khyer te yol go'i mchod pa chen po btsug so//de nas byang chub sems dpas dga' mo dang
41b5('dul ba): dga' stobs ma la gsungs pa/sbyin pa 'dis ci zhig don du gnyer/de gnyis kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das shAkya rnams kyi gzhonu gangs ri'i ngos/chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i
41b6('dul ba): 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dong ha cang yang mi ring bar byung ba de/mtshan mkhan dang lhas mkhan gyi bram ze rnams kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por lung bstan pa zhig
41b7('dul ba): mchis pa de/soms bskyed pa dang /zhal zas phul ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/bdag cag gi khyim thab tu gyur cig/byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/de 'dod pa rnams
42a1('dul ba): la don du mi gnyer bas rab tu byung zin no//de gnyis kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dod pa rnams don du mi gnyer na/bsod pa phul ba
42a2('dul ba): bsod nams ci mchis pas//grags dang ldan pas don rnams kun grub pa//mI mchog gyur blo mchog ldan pa de'i//don kun myur du shin tu grub gyur cig/byang chub sems dpas
42a3('dul ba): de bzhin du gyur cig ces gsungs nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi ltar mngar ba gsol te/dbang po drug tshim zhing stobs dang mthu thob nas/chu klung ne ra na dzA na'i 'gram na pho mtshan du bzhugs pa'i
42a4('dul ba): sa btsal ba dang /ji tsam na ri brag chen po me tog dang 'bras bu sna tshogs dang ldan pa zhig gzigs nas/de de la 'dzegs te/phyogs dben zhing gsal ba'i sa phyogs skyil mo dkrung
42a5('dul ba): bcas te bzhug so//bzhugs ma thag tu ri de nyid rnam to//byang chub sems dbus dgongs pa/nges par bdag gis las skyon can zhig byas te/des na ri 'di oM to snya ma//
42a6('dul ba): lha rnams kyis sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i thugs shes nAs gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis skyon can gyi phrin los ma mdzad//'on kyang 'di ni chos nyid lags
42a7('dul ba): sa thams cad kyis bzung bar rngo mi thogs pa ni gnyis te/dge ba'i rtsa ba myed par gang legs pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa gang lags pa'o//khyod ni dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa lags//
42b1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas ma lags te/'on kyang chu klung ne ran dza na rgol la/phyogs che ge mo zhig na rdo rje'i gdan mchi kyi bzhud cig/der
42b2('dul ba): ni 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bzhugs nas/bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cing thob par 'gyuraro//de nas byang chub
42b3('dul ba): sems dpa' lhas lam bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa na de'i zhabs bzhug par pad+ma dag 'byung bar gyur to//mtsho chen po bzhi las kyang chu babs nas/pad+ma'i rdzing dag byung bar gyur
42b4('dul ba): to/gom pa bor nas mnan pa na sa chen po 'di khar ba'i snod bzhin du sgra 'byin par brtsamaso//bya tsa sha dang ri dgas dag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i la skor ba byedado//
42b5('dul ba): rlung gtong ba'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang dal bus rlung gtong bar byed do//char 'bebs pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang chur ba cung zad 'bebs par byed//byang chub sems dpes rnga nongs
42b6('dul ba): po/nga la 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan ma byung bar gyur pas/deng nyid bdag gis bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur snya mo//chu klung nair na dza nus klu'i rgyal po du ba can sngon gyi las kyi rnam
42b7('dul ba): par smin pa las skyes pa'i gnas shig byung bar gyur te/des byas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung na mig thob par 'gyur ba yin pas/de sa'i sgra glegs pas gnas nas byung ba na/rgyang
43a1('dul ba): rang po kho na nas byang chub sems dpas sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kun nas brgyan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad nus smras pa 'od 'dom gang gis
43a2('dul ba): brgyan pa nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i 'od zer dang /rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' la tshig su bcad pa'i
43a3('dul ba): dbyangs kyis bstod par brtsams pa//dga' ba'i dbyangs kyis kun gang ba'i//sa yi sgra ni thos nas kyang //klu ni gnas nas byung na su//phyogs kun tu yang lta bar
43a4('dul ba): byed/brang gis 'gro ba'i gtso bo ste//klu yi rgyal po mthu chen gyis//ne ran dza na'i ngos ni//'jig rten 'dran pa ga shigs pa mthong //sangs rgyas byung ba'i mthu yis ni//
43a5('dul ba): klu yis mig ni thob gyur te//sems dga' zhing ni yid mgu nas//des ni 'di skad tshig gsol to//bdag gis sngon ni mthong ba yi//sangs rgyas mthu chen de rnams dang //
43a6('dul ba): thub pa khyod ni mthong gyur pa//de dang tha dad dbyer ma mchis//thub pa ji ltar thog mar ni//g.yas pa'i zhabs ni btegs pa las//khyod ni sangs rgyas deng gyur nas//'jig
43a7('dul ba): rten gyis ni yon gnas gyur//ji ltar chos gos bsnabs pa dang //ne ran dza na'i chu bsil la//ji lta bur ni 'jug pa las//de ring khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur//
43b1('dul ba): ji ltar rab brtan 'gro su gshegs pa dang //ba lang khyu mchog 'gying ba ltar gshegs pas//skyes bu'i khyu mchog chos 'dzin rnams kyi mchog/deng 'dir khyod ni sangs
43b2('dul ba): rgyas mchog 'gyuraro//ji ltar mkha' la nAM sha brgya phrag gis//khyod sku rgya chen rgya chen mdzad ldan//lding zhing bskor ba bgyid par gyur pa las//mi mchog dang ni sangs
43b3('dul ba): rgyas mchog 'gyuraro//ji ltar dri zhim rlung ni ldang ba dang //ri dwags bya yi tshogs kyang mi skrag la//ljon shing rlung gis g.yab par ma bgyis pas//mi mchog deng ni sangs
43b4('dul ba): rgyas mchog 'gyur ro//ji ltar btsun po khyod kyi zhal gyi 'od//dri med gser 'od 'bar ba 'dra ba de//snang bar mdzad cing kha dog ldan pas na//mi mchog dag ni sangs rgyas
43b5('dul ba): mchog 'gyur ro//bar sdom la/sgra dang mthong dang sangs rgyas dang //rdzogs dang zhag dang chos gos dang //brtan dang rtsa sha de bzhin rlung //khyod gtogs pa dang de'i bcu yi//
43b6('dul ba): de nas byang chub sems dpa' klu'i rgyal po dus can gyis yang dag par bstod nas//rdo rje'i gdan logasu gshegs te//des dgongs bai rtsa'i gdong ba la 'dug par bya'o snyam pa
43b7('dul ba): dang /de la rtswa dgos pa byung bar/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dgongs pa shes nas/ri spos kyi ngad ldang las shing bol gyi mdab
44a1('dul ba): ma ltar deg na bde ba'i rtswa khur gcig blangs nas rtswa 'tshong bkra shis kyi kha dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/byang chub sems dpa'i spyan mngar bsdad do//
44a2('dul ba): byang chub sems dpas gsungs pa/bzhin bzang rtswa'o ni dag nga la phul cig/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas
44a3('dul ba): gus pa dang bcas pas phulo//de nas byang chub sems dpas bkra shis kyi rtswa 'tshong la rtsu bzhes te/lha rnams kyis bstan pa'i lam nas byang chub kyi snying po gang nu ba der gsher
44a4('dul ba): te byon nas rtswa rnams ma 'khrugs pa dang /stug srab med par dgram par brtsamaso//de nas rtsa de rnams bskor thabasu lhung nas byang chub sems dpas dgongs pa/ji ltar rtswa 'di
44a5('dul ba): rnams bskor thab su lhung ba las bdag gis gdon mi za bar deng bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur ro snyam du dgongs nas rdo rje'i gdan la 'dzegs te/brang gis 'gro'i rgyal po
44a6('dul ba): gnyid log pa'i lus bskyil ba ltar skyil mo krung bcas/sku drang por bsrang dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhug ste bzhugs nas/sems bskyed cing tshig tu yang gsungs pa/
44a7('dul ba): srid zag pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung gzhig par mi bya'o zhes des re shig zad pa zad pa ma thob kyi bar du skyil mo krung ma bshig go//bdud sdig can rgyal mtshan gaN+DI pod m+b+hi/
44b1('dul ba): gan+da dang doHba'i gnas gnyis yod pa las/degs pa'i gnas kyi rgyal mtshan g.yo bar brtsamaso//sdig can gyis bsams pa/ji ltar rgyal mtshan 'di g.yo ba las gdon mi za bar gnod//
44b2('dul ba): par byed pa zhig byung snyam ste/de bsams pa la zhugs pa dang /ji tsam na byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gdan la bzhugs pa mthong //de 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya zas gcer/
44b3('dul ba): gi bu 'di rdo rje gdan la 'dug gis/ji tsam bdag gis yul las ma 'das kyi bar du de la bgegs bya'o snyam du bsams nas phrin yig skyel ba/skra gyen du 'greng la sha na'i smad g.yogs//
44b4('dul ba): bgos pa zhig gi kha dog tu mngon par sprul nas/byang chub sems dpa' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas brtags par smras pa/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi ni lhas byin gyis mnan/
44b5('dul ba): pho brang ni bcom/shAkya rnams ni kha btag na/khyod ci'i phyir gnas btab ste 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' la sdig pa mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum skyes pa/'di
44b6('dul ba): lta ste de 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par 'tshe bo'i rnam par rtog pa dag gi/de la 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni grogs 'dzin
44b7('dul ba): ma dang /ri dgas skyes dang sa 'tsho ma la'o//gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa ni/lhas sbyin la'o//rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa ni de'i rje su 'tsho ba'i shAkya
45a1('dul ba): rnams so///byang chub sems dpal du snyam du dgangs te/za'i phyir bdag la sdig pa ma dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gas mabyung snyam na/thimam bdud drug ca/
45a2('dul ba): 'di lta ste/dkrug pa'i las kyi byed ci bar 'dzes par gzig so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa gsum stes tAM/'di ltar nges par 'byung ba'i rnam par rtog
45a3('dul ba): pa dang /gnod sems med pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par mi 'tsho ba'i rnam par rtog pa'o//yang bdud kyis smras pa/khyod ci'i phyir byang chub kyi snying pa la 'dug/byang
45a4('dul ba): chub sems dpas bka' stsal pa/bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir ro//bdud kyis smras pa/khyod kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes go la thob/byang chub sems dpas
45a5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/sdig can khyod kyis re shig mchod sbyin gcig byas pas kyang 'dod pa'i dbang phyug phun sum tshogs par gyur na/ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod
45a6('dul ba): sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang gag pa dang rung ba dang /mig dang /sha dang khrag dang /bu dang chung me dang /dbyig dang /
45a7('dul ba): goser la sogs pa yongasu btang bas /bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ngas bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba de srid re skan/de
45b1('dul ba): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bdud kyis smras pa/re shig ji ltar bdag gis mchod sbyin gcig gis 'dod pa khams kyi dbang phyug thob par gyur pa'i bdag gi dbang ni khyod nyid yin na/
45b2('dul ba): ltar khyod kyis bla ni med pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing /sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /
45b3('dul ba): lag pa dang /rkang pa dang /mig dang /sha dang khrag dang bu dang /chung ma dang /byig dang /gser la sogs pa yongasu btang por khyod la dbang du yod/de nas byang chub sems
45b4('dul ba): dpa' bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag gi 'khor lo dang /bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'khyil pa dang /dra bas 'brel pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mas bskyed pa skrag pa rnams la dbugs
45b5('dul ba): 'byin par mdzad pas sa la rig par mdzad nas/ngas bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du mchod sbyin bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma byas shing sems can rnams kyi phyir mgo dang /
45b6('dul ba): log pa dang /rkang pa dang /mige dang sha dang khrag dang /bu dang chung ma dang /dbyig dang gsor lo sogs pa yongasu btang ba'i nga'i dbang ni 'di yin no//de nas so'i lhas sa brtol
45b7('dul ba): nas thal mo sbyar te/slad phyung nas sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsol pa de de bzhi no zhes de skad smras pa dang /bdud sdig can cang mi smra bar gyur te/zhum zhum
46a1('dul ba): por gyur/bag la rnams par gyur/skye bo smad nas skyobs pa med la sems khong du rgyud cing 'dug par gyur d+ha/de sdug bsngal zhing yod ma 'de bas
46a2('dul ba): bsams pa/bdag gis shAkya zas gtsang gi bu la de ltar byas kyang grags ma rnyed kyis/me la 'di la bdag gis kyang bgegs shig bya'o zhes smras nas stong ngo //de nas des
46a3('dul ba): bu mo gsum po sred ma dang /drug 'byed ma dang /dga' snod ma mngags te/de rnams gzugs dang /lang 'tsho'i rgyags pas dregos shingalha'i gos dang rgyun gyis glungs
46a4('dul ba): nusabyang chub sems dpa'i mdun du/bud med kyi gopo rnams bstan par brtsam s+ho//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas/ji ra rgyun mor gyur pa de sbyar
46a5('dul ba): byin gyis brlobs nas/bdud gang na bi der dong ba dang /bdud kyi bu mo rnams de lta bu'i rnam par mthong nas yi chad nas lag pa la 'gram pa gtade gang gis na shAkya bris ga
46a6('dul ba): gi bu dka' thub la bgegs byed par 'gyur ba'i thabs legs pa ci yod snyam nas/sems khong du chud cing 'dug/des 'byung po dpung tshogs dang ldan pa/glang po che dang /rta dang /
46a7('dul ba): rnga mo dang /ra dang /ri dgos dang /mahe dang phag dang /khyi dang drug pa dang /ne'u le dang /spre'u dang /wa la sogs pa 'dra ba ral gri dang /mda' bo che dang /mtshan
46b1('dul ba): rje gcig pa dang /'khor lo dang /mdung thung dang /gzhu dang /zhags pa dang /dgra sta dang /lcags kyi bar rgal sogs te mtshon cha can/bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug ded nas rang
46b2('dul ba): nyid gzhun drung du bkang ste/byang chub sems dpa' bskor nas 'dug/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gzugs rnam pa du ma can mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dang /bcas pa de rnams
46b3('dul ba): gzegs nas dgongs pa/ro shig pha phal pa zhig dang lhan cig 'thab par brtson na yang /de'i gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyor ba byed na 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug 'di la lta smos kyang
46b4('dul ba): ci dgos kyis/ma la bdag gis gnyen po'i phyogs la sbyar bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas/de zhi bar 'gyur ba'i thabaso la dgongs par brtsam so//bdud kyang 'byung po bye ba phrag sum
46b5('dul ba): cu rtsa drug dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa'i steng nos 'khor lo dang /mdung dang /mda' ngo che dang /mtshan rtse gcig pa dang /mda' la sogs te mtshon cha rnams dbang dbab par
46b6('dul ba): brtsamaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na/de'i tshe mtshon cha de rnams lha'i me tog ut+pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu ta dang /pad+ma dkar por
46b7('dul ba): gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa'i nye 'khor du 'bab par brtsam so//de nas bdud steng gi bar snang las mngon par 'phags te/phyag dir gyi char dbab par brtsams ni/de
47a1('dul ba): yang lha me tog man+da ra ba rnams gyur nas/byang chub sems dpa' steng nas 'bab par 'arnams//de nas bdud kyis rabya pa'i rlung dang /rdochar
47a2('dul ba): phab pa dang /gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i steng du lo ma las ma yin pa'i spyil po mngon par sprul pas rdo'i char dang gdugs pa'i rlung du bcas pa
47a3('dul ba): des byang chub sems dpa' la cung zad kyang gnod par ma gyur to//bdud kyis bsams pa bdag gis nom du yongasu bskor te 'dug/bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin
47a4('dul ba): gyisabyang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul la song ba dang /de'i lo ma rnams rtag par sgra 'byin pas/de'i sems rtse gcig par mi 'gyu ro snyam du bsams
47a5('dul ba): nas/byang chub kyi shing shel las byas par mngon par sprul te/rna ba gtad nas bsgribs te/bsdad pa na/byang chub kyi shing gi 'o ma la shel las byas pa rnams myur ba
47a6('dul ba): myur bar sgro 'byin par brtsams pas//bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra yin pa/byang chub sems dpas sems rtse gcig pa ma thob bo//gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis
47a7('dul ba): bsams pa/shel las byas pa'i byang chub kyi shing gi li ma rnams kyi sgras byang chub sems dpa' sems rtse gcig pa ma thob kyis thabs shig bsham par bya'o snyam ste/
47b1('dul ba): de nas de rnams kyis lo ma re re bzung na 'on kyang bdud kyi dpung de bzhin du gnas nas/gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis bsams pa/bdud sdig can ni ring mo zhig tu byang
47b2('dul ba): chub sems dpa' la rnam par 'tsho bar 'gyu ro snyam du bsams nas bdud kyi dpung de khor yug gi pha rol tu 'phangaso//de nas byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na/
47b3('dul ba): 'bab chu chen po ne ran dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs te/rtag tu bya ba dang /'grus skyong dang ldan zhing /byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom
47b4('dul ba): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rje su brtson pas bzhugaso//de nam gyi thun dang po la rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/
47b5('dul ba): rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa du ma nyam su myong bar mdzad//'di lta ste/gcig tu gyur cing mang por gyur la/mang por gyur cing gcig tu gyur pa dang /snang bar gyur cing mi spang
47b6('dul ba): bar gyur pa ye shes gzigs pas nyamasu myong bar mdzad//skus rtsig pa dang /rI dang ra ba la yang thad kar gshegs par mdzad de/dper na na mkha' la bya ba bzhi no//sa
47b7('dul ba): la yang steng du 'byung ba dang /byi zul mdzod de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no//chu'i rgyan la yang mi nyams par gshegs te/dper na sa la bya ba bzhi no//na mkha' la yang
48a1('dul ba): skyil mo krung gis gshegs par mdzad de/dper na mdab chags bya bzhi no///nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid
48a2('dul ba): che ba yang phyag gis nom zhing nyug par mdzad cing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sku'i dbang sgyur bar mdzad//yang bdud kyis bsams pa ni/bsam gtan gyi tsher ma ni sgra
48a3('dul ba): yin pas/ma la bdag gis rgyang ring po kho nar 'dug la sgra dbyung bar bya'o snyam nas/des 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug dang /'jigs pa chen po 'jig su rung ba'i
48a4('dul ba): sgra phyung ngo //byang chub sems dpas kyang de sgrib pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi bar du shing ka dam pa'i tshe la sprul pas des na sgra de drug pas ma grag so//byang chub sengs
48a5('dul ba): dgongs pa ma la bdag gis lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la sems mngon du bzhag ni sa/des na lha mi rnams kyi sgra gang dang gang dag thos par
48a6('dul ba): 'dod pa de dag mnyan par bya'o//snyam du dgongs nas/lha'i rna ba shes pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa bzhag pa na/de lha'i snyan rnam par dag pa
48a7('dul ba): mi rnams kyi las 'das bris/sgra gnyis po mi rnams kyi dang /mi ma yin pa rnams kyi dang /gang dag ring ba dang /gang dag nye ba yang gsan to//de nas byang chub songs
48b1('dul ba): dgongs pa/bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug las bdag la su dag ni gnod par sems/su dag na ma yin zhes de dag ji ltar shes par bya snyam pa dang /de 'di snyam du
48b2('dul ba): dgongs te/sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas/de nam gyi gung thun la sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i
48b3('dul ba): mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/de'i thugs kyis sems can gzhan dag dang /gang zag gzhan dag gi rnam par rtog pa dang /rnam par dpyod pa'i yid ji lta
48b4('dul ba): ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems
48b5('dul ba): la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i semaso ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//zhe sdang dang bcas pa dang //zhe sdang dang bral ba dang /gti mug dang bcas pa dang /gti mug dang bral ba dang /
48b6('dul ba): bsdus pa dang /rnam par g.yengs pa dang /zhum pa dang /rab tu 'dzin pa dang /rgod pa dang mi rgod pa dang /nye bar ma zhi ba dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /mnyam par mi bzhag pa dang /
48b7('dul ba): mnyam par bzhag pa dang /ma bsgoms pa dang /bsgom pa dang /sems rnam par ma grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//shin tu rnam par grol
49a1('dul ba): ba'i sems la shin tu rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdud kyi mngag gzhug pa 'di
49a2('dul ba): rnams la su dag bdag dang /tshe rabs gzhan na mar 'brel ba 'am/par 'brel pa'/su dog sa shed ma 'amaphyir rgol ba dang dgrar gyur pa de da/
49a3('dul ba): ji ltar shes par bya snya mo//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no snyam nas/de rnams kyi
49a4('dul ba): gung thun la sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa'i shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du gzhog pa na/des sngon gyi gnas rnam pa dum du ma rje su dgongs
49a5('dul ba): ti/des skye ba gcig dang /gnyis dang /gsum dang /bzhi dang /lnga dang /drug dang /bdun dang /brgyad dang /dgu dang /bcu dang /nyi shu dang /sum
49a6('dul ba): cu dang /bzhi bcu dang /lnga bcu dang /skye ba brgya dang /skye ba stong dang /skye ba brgya phrag du ma dang /skye ba stong phrag du ma dang /skye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /'jig
49a7('dul ba): ba'i skal pa dang /chags pa'i skal ba dang /'jig pa dang /chags po'i skal pa dang /'jig po'i skal pa du ma dang /chags pa'i bskal pa du ma dang /'jig
49b1('dul ba): ba dang /chags pa'i bskal pa du ma rje su dgongs te/bdag ston sems can 'di dag gi rlung na gnas pa n+tu/ming 'dri zhes bya/rigs ni 'di zhes bya/rus ni 'dri zhes bya/kha
49b2('dul ba): zas ni 'di lta bu zhig zlar/bde ba dang /sdug bsngal 'di lta bu zhog nyam su myongache ni 'di srid cig yon/yun ni 'di srid cig 'dug 'dunatshe 'di srid cig son te/
49b3('dul ba): gnas de nas bdag shi 'phos te/che ge mo zhig tu skyeso//de nas kyang shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyeso//de nas kyang shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes zhes rnams dang bcas/yul
49b4('dul ba): phyogs dang bcas pas sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rje su dgong so//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdud kyi mdog gzhug 'di rnams la su dag ni ngan song du 'gro/su dag ni mi 'gro ba de dag
49b5('dul ba): ji ltar shes par bya snyam//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/'chi 'pho dang /skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa yin no//snyam ste de nam gyi bun tha ma la 'chi 'pho
49b6('dul ba): dang skye ba shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na de'i lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyi las 'das pas gzigs na/sems can rnams kyi
49b7('dul ba): 'tsho 'pho dang /skye ba dang kha dog bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa dang /dman pa dang /gya nom pa dang /bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i sems can rnams las ji lta ba bzhin gyi
50a1('dul ba): rjesu 'gro ba/ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/shes ldan sems can 'di zhes bya ba 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes pa spyod pa dang ldan/ngag dang nga
50a2('dul ba): nyes par spyod pa dang ldan te/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta ba ste/log par lta ba'i chos dang las yang dag par bslangs pa'i rgyus/rgyu de dang rkyen
50a3('dul ba): des lus zhog nas shi ba'i 'og tu ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro//shes ldan sems can 'di dag lus kyi legs par spyod
50a4('dul ba): pa dang ldan/ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan te/'phags pa rnams lo skur pa mi 'dobs shing yang dag par lta ba ste/yang dag par lta ba'i chos dang las
50a5('dul ba): yang dag par blangs pa'i rgyus/rgyu de dang rkyen des lus zhig nas shi ba'i 'og tu bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du lha dang /mi rnamasu skye bar 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du dgongs
50a6('dul ba): te/shes ldan sems can 'di dag ni 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /srid pa'i zag pa dang /ma rig pa'i zag pas 'khor ba na 'khor ro//'di rnams kyi 'dod pa'i zag pa dang /
50a7('dul ba): srid pa'i zag pa dang /ma rig pa'i zag pa de ji ltar spang ba ji ltar shes par bya snya mo//de 'di snyam du dgongs te/zag pa zad pa shes pa mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes
50b1('dul ba): pa yin no snyam ste/de rtag tu 'byed pa dang /'grus skyong dang ldan zhing /byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjesu brtson par gnas nas
50b2('dul ba): zag pa med pa'i shes pa/mngon sum du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa la dgongs pa mngon du bzhag pa na/des 'di sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o//zhes ji lta ba bzhin
50b3('dul ba): du rlab tu mkhyen to//'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes ji lta ba bzhin
50b4('dul ba): du rab tu mkhyen to//de de ltar shes shing de ltar mthong na 'dod pa'i zag pa las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing /srid pa'i zag pa dang /ma rig pa'i zag pa las/sems
50b5('dul ba): rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol ba na/bdag gi skye ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa la brten to//bya ba byaso//'di las srid pa gzhan mi sheso zhes rnam par grol
50b6('dul ba): ba'i ye shes nyid mthong bar 'gyuraro//de ltar de na bcom ldan 'das byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/bya ba byas/byed pa byas nas me'i khams la snyoms par
50b7('dul ba): zhug so//gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byams pa'i mtshon gyis mngon po bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa'i tshe bdud
51a1('dul ba): sdig can gyi lag nas gzhu lhung /rgyal mtshan 'gyel gnas kyang g.yo so//de nas bdud sdig can nam 'byung po'i 'khor bye ba brag suM nu rtsa drug sdug bsngal zhing
51a2('dul ba): yid mi bde ba yid la bcags te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//bdud kyi ris lha rnams kyis grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ni dka' bo lo drug
51a3('dul ba): spyad nas/rdo rje'i gdan las 'dzegs te/rtsi'i gding ba la grongs//zhes bsgrags pa gang yin pa des rgyal po zas gtsong btsun mo dang gzhonu dang blon po'i tshogs dang /
51a4('dul ba): grong khyer ser skya na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas pas thos sdug bsngal chen po dang /yid mi bde bas gdungs par gyur to//sa 'tsho ma dang /ri dgas skyes dang gra
51a5('dul ba): 'dzin ma yang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan rje su dran nas brgyal te sa le 'gyel nas chus gtor ba las slar dbugs byung ngo //btsun mo'i spro bsring ba'i skye bo dag ni mig
51a6('dul ba): mchi mas gang la myur ba myur bar dbugs brdzangs shing //dal bu dal bus smre sngags 'dron cing 'dug/de dag sdug bsngal ba sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha dga'
51a7('dul ba): ba skyes pa rnams kyis mthong nas/byang chub sems dpa' shAkya thub pa ma nongs te/'di ltar des bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyeso zhes smras pa gang yin pa rgyal po zas gtsang
51b1('dul ba): ma 'khor dang bcas pa dang //ser skya'i skye do'i tshogs kyis thos nas mchog tu dga' ba skyeso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na grags 'dzin ma la yang
51b2('dul ba): khye'u zhig btsaso//bdud rtsi zas kyi yong khyo'u zhig btsa so//zla ba yang sgra gcan gyis zin to//de nas rgyal po zas gcing gis phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas/dga' ba
51b3('dul ba): dang mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' ba dang /rangs pa rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to//des grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang gyo mo rnams bsal nas tsan
51b4('dul ba): gyi chus chag chag btab shin tu dri zhim po'i pog por nye bar bshams/dar gyi chun 'phyang mang po sbyangs/rgyalo mtshan dong ba ngan bsgrengs/me tog sna tshogs kyis dga' dga' ltar
51b5('dul ba): bkra ma nas grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi dang /sum mdo rnamasu yang sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigaso//de nas grong khyod kyi shar sgor dge sbyong dang bram ze spyod pa pa dang /kun du rgyu dang /ngan pa
51b6('dul ba): dang /mgon med pa dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /slong mo pa rnams la sbyin pa dag gtong ngo //lho dang /nub dang byang dang dbus kyi sum mdo rnamasu yang sbyin pa gtong /
51b7('dul ba): bsod nams dag byed//grags 'dzin ma'i bu ming 'dogs par byed/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi skye bos smras pa/'di btsas pa na zla ba sgra gcan gyis zin pas/de bas na khye'u yi
52a1('dul ba): ming sgra gcan zin zhes gdag so//zhes btagaso//bdud rtsi zas kyi yang de bzhin du sbyin pa dag btang /bsod nams dag byas nas/khye'u yi ming cir bdags
52a2('dul ba): shes bu'i ming 'dogs par byed do//nye du dag gis smras pa/gang gi tshe 'di bcas pa na/grong khyer thams cad dga' bar gyur pas de'i phyir khye'u yi ming kun dga' bor gdag so//
52a3('dul ba): zhes btag so//rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/grags 'dzin ma'i bu gang yin pa 'di ni shAkya thub pa'i bu ma yin zhes smras pa/grags 'dzin mas thos nas yi chad par gyur to//
52a4('dul ba): de nas des byang chub sems dpa'i pang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du 'dug ste/bden pa gsol ba btab pa/gal te 'di byang chub sems dpa' las skyes pa yin na/
52a5('dul ba): bzhin du rdzing 'dir pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar gyur/ci ste ma yin na bying bar gyur cig ces smras nas chur bor ba dang /de shing bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du pha bong dang lhan cig 'phyo bar
52a6('dul ba): brtsams//rgyal po zas gtsang gis ya mtshan du gyur pa de thos nas/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos yongasu bskor te/byang chub sems dpa' rol pa'i rdzing 'gram du song nas/ji tsam na
52a7('dul ba): sgra gcan zin bzang po byang chub sems dpa'i pang tshad kyi pha bong la zhon nas shing bal gyi mdab ma bzhin du chun 'phyo ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu
52b1('dul ba): dga' ba dang /rangs pa rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes te/de ma thag tu rdzing der zhugs nas gzhonu sgra gcan zin bzang po pang du blangs nas langaso//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das
52b2('dul ba): kyis bdud kyi 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug byamos pa'i mtshan gyis mngon du btul nas/bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di shin tu g.yos par gyur to//
52b3('dul ba): 'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal por gyur te/'di ltar 'jig rten dang 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun pa mun nag smag tu gyur pa nyi ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul
52b4('dul ba): zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba'i snang bas snang ba nyam sum myong ba gang yin pa de dag kyang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/dar sems can gang dag skyes pa rnams kyis snang ba
52b5('dul ba): des sems can gcig gis gcig mthong nas/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan dag kyang 'dir skyes pa lta zhig/shes ldan dag sems can gzhan zhog kyang 'dir skyes pa lta ci
52b6('dul ba): zhig ces ngo shes par gyur to//sdom la/'khor bzhi dang ni lang tshe dang //yab dang sras ni 'jol ba dang //shAkya de bzhin rang byung dang //dung skyong khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'o///
52b7('dul ba): de nas tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis shig tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dug pa 'di snyam du sems te//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na chu klung ne ran dza no'i 'bram byang chub kyi shing
53a1('dul ba): drung na bzhugs te mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon par me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs te/skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par
53a2('dul ba): mdzad nas/de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis ma la bdag cog der song la tshigasu bcad pa re res mngon par bstod do snyamo//de nas tshangs ris kyi lha de gnyis kyis 'di lta ste/
53a3('dul ba): skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i dpung pa bskums te/brkyang ba 'am/brkyang ste bskums pa tsam gyis tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis tshangs ris kyi 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur te/bac+doMs
53a4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar phyin nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste tshangs ris kyi lha gnyis las gcig gis tshig su bcad gsol pa/ded dpon g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'o//sdig pa mI
53a5('dul ba): mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs//rin chen chos ni 'tshal bar 'gyur mchis kyis//bde gshegs chos kyi mchog ni bshad du gsol//gcig shos kyis kyang tshigs
53a6('dul ba): su bcad de gsol pa/nga rgyal bcom zhing g.yul las rnam rgyal ba//sdig pa mi mnga' bzhengs shig 'jig rten gzigs//bco lnga lon pa'i dgung zla nya ba ltar//khyod
53a7('dul ba): kyi thugs ni shin tu rnam dag logs//zhes gsol nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad bka' stsol ba
53b1('dul ba): 'jig rten 'dod pa'i bde gang dang /lha yul byung ba de gang yin pa//sred pa zad pa'i bde de la//bcu drug char yang mi bod do//khur khyer ba ni sdug bsngal te//khur bor ba ni bad
53b2('dul ba): ba yin//khur ni lci ba rnams bor nas//gzhan dag byung bar mi bya'o//sred pa thams cad rnam spangs shing //'du shes thams cad zad ni sa ni//dngos po thams cad yongs/
53b3('dul ba): shes na//slar yang sred par mi 'ong ngo //sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang //bde ba sku nyam su btar bas//skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das
53b4('dul ba): par mdzad pa na//de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phulo//de'i tshe tshong pa ga gon dang /bzang po gnyis shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig dong pa no/lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur to//
53b5('dul ba): de nas tshong bag gon dang bzang po'i sngon gyi grogs po dang /blon po dang nye du dang mdza' ba shesu gyur pa'i lha zhig yod pa 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgya
53b6('dul ba): chu klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang bde ba sku nyam su btar nas
53b7('dul ba): skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad par/des kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/de la tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis kyis deng thog mar bsod snyoms 'dul du
54a1('dul ba): bcug na/de ni tshong pa ga gan dang bzang po de gnyis kyi yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag rang gis 'di gnyis 'di lta ste/
54a2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms 'bul du gzhugs pa'i phyir brtson par bya'o snyam nas/de nas lha des shing rta dang /tshong pa thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal ba byas nas/
54a3('dul ba): tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces smras//tshong po tshong pa dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di lteng rgyas na chu klung na rAn dza na'i 'gram ni byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs te/
54a4('dul ba): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring ba ma lon par rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba dang /bde ba su nyam su btA ra bi nA/skyil mo krung gcig gis zhag bdun 'das par mdzad/
54a5('dul ba): de la sus kyang bsod snyoms ma phul gyis/de la khyed kyis der thog mar bsod snyoms phul na/de ni khyed kyi yun ring ba'i don dang /phan pa dang /bde bar 'gyu ro zhes smras
54a6('dul ba): nas/lha de de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin la/chos bshad pa yang
54a7('dul ba): mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir 'di ltar ltas kyang 'di lta ste/bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms 'bul ba'i phyir brtson par byed snyam du bsams nas/sbrang rtsi
54b1('dul ba): dang 'deg gu mang du khyer nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs
54b2('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/tshong pa ga gon dang bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du bdag gis sbrang rtsi dang 'deg gu mang du 'tshal te/
54b3('dul ba): mchis kyis/bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/'di bzhi su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/gal te bdag gi phyag gis bsod
54b4('dul ba): snyoms bzhes na mu stegs can bzhin du 'gyur bas de ni bdag gi cha ma yin gyis/ma la bdag gis sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis srog chags rnams
54b5('dul ba): la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms gang du bzhes pa bsams par bya'o snyam pa na/bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/btsun pa sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
54b6('dul ba): rgyas rnams kyis srog chags la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du lhung bzed du bsod snyoms bzhes legaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs shing ye shes gzigs pa bskyed na//sngon
54b7('dul ba): gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms lhung bzed du bzhes par gyur nas/de na bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyis lhung
55a1('dul ba): bzed kyis dgos pa byung //de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das la lhung bzed kyi lhung bzed kyi dgos pa byung bar rig nas/ri drag can zhig la
55a2('dul ba): rdo las byas pa'i lhung bzed mi ma yin pas byas shing ma yin pas zin par byas la gsal ba gtsang ma dri me med pa bzhi khyer te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong nas phyin pa
55a3('dul ba): dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po chen po bzhis/bcom ldan 'das
55a4('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lo lhung bzed kyis lhung bzed kyi mkhe ba byung bar bdag cag gis 'tshal nas/ri brag can zhig la rdo las rdo'i ltung
55a5('dul ba): bzed mi ma lags pas bgyis shing /mi malags pas legs par bgyis pa gsal ba/gtsang ma dri nga ba ma mchis pa bzhi 'dir 'tshal te/mchis na bcom ldan 'das
55a6('dul ba): shugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste 'di bzhes gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te gal te bdag gis rgyal po chen po gcig las lhung bzed cig bzhis na
55a7('dul ba): gsum gyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyuraro//gal te gnyis las na ni gnyis kyi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur ro//gal to gsum las na ni gcig gi sems mi dga' bar 'gyur
55b1('dul ba): ma la bdag gis rgyal ba chen po bzhi las lhung bzed bzhi las lhung bzed cig tu byin gyis brlabs par bya'o snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po ngan
55b2('dul ba): las lhung bzed bzhi bzhes te/lhung bzed gcig tu byin gyis brlab so////'dul ba gzhi bam po gya drug pa//de nas bcom ldan
55b3('dul ba): 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las srog chags rnams la phan pa'i phyir bsod snyoms bzheso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pag gon dang bzang po la 'di skad ces
55b4('dul ba): bka' stsal pang /tshong pa dag khyed chur sangs rgyas la skyabasu deng shig/chos la skyabasu deng shig/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun zhes bya ba gang yin
55b5('dul ba): pa de la yang skyabasu deng shig/btsun pa bdag cag sangs rgyas la skyabasu mchi'o//chos la skyabasu mchi'o//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i dge 'dun gang la
55b6('dul ba): pa de la yang skyobasu mchi'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshang po ga gron dang bzang po'i sbyin pa de la rje su yi rang bas N+De su yi rang bar mdzad de/gang gi don du sbyin pa btang /
55b7('dul ba): de yi don du 'gyur ba ste/bde ba'i don du sbyin btang na//de nas bde bar 'gyur ba yon//bsod nams rnam smin bde ba dang //bsams pa yang ni 'grub par 'gyur
56a1('dul ba): myur du zhi ba dam pa yi//mya ngan 'das par rtogs par 'gyur//pha rol las byung gnod pa ni//lha dang bdud kyi rigs dag gis//bsod nams
56a2('dul ba): kho na byed pa na/bar chad byi bar mi nuso//gal te 'phags pa'i shes rab phyir//gtong ldan de ni 'bad byed na//sdug bsngal tha mar byed pa dag/rnam par mthong zhing
56a3('dul ba): reg par 'gyur//de nas tshong pa gagon dang bzang po/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste/rjesu yi rangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
56a4('dul ba): zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshong pa ga gon dang bzang po las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/
56a5('dul ba): chu klung ne ra na dza na'i 'gram gong na ba der gshegs te byon nas/chu klung ne ran dza na'i 'gram du bzhugs te/zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad don//de nas sbrang rtsi yang rlung slong la
56a6('dul ba): 'ad gu yang rlung slong bas de na/bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thib so//de nas bdud sdig can gyis/bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas/
56a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lagaso//
56b1('dul ba): bde bar gshegs pa yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dus la bab lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/'di lta ste dkrugs pa'i las kyi phyir bdud sdig can
56b2('dul ba): 'di nye bar 'ongaso snyam du dgongs nas/bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sdig can ji srid nga'i nyan thos mkhas pa gsal ba yid gzhungs pa/pha rol gyi ni rtsod pa
56b3('dul ba): byung zhing byung ba rnams chos bzhin gyis tshar gcod nus pa rang gi smra ba gsal bar byed nus pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams byung ba ma gyur pa dang //
56b4('dul ba): nga'i tshangs par spyod pa rgya chen po/skye bo mang po dang /lha dang mi'i bar la rgya cher yang dag par rdzogs par rab tu ma bstan gyi bar du nga yongasu mya ngan las mi 'da'o//de nas
56b5('dul ba): bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma'o dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni yongasu mya ngan las 'da' mi 'dod snyam du bsams/sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde la 'gyod pas de nyid du me snang
56b6('dul ba): bar gyur to//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das rlung nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par rig nas shing dzam+bu zhes bya bas dzam+bu'i gling du gdags pa gang yin pa de
56b7('dul ba): dang /ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/a ru ra chen po'i tshal yod de/de nas kha dag dang dri dang ro dang ldan pa'i a ru ra blangs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
57a1('dul ba): ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/lha rnams kyi dbang //
57a2('dul ba): po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser ma'i snyun nad kyi snyun gyis thebs par bdag gis 'tshal nas/shing 'dzam bu
57a3('dul ba): zhes bgyi ba 'dzam bu'i gling du btags pa gang lags pa de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba na/a ru r+ya chen po'i tshi la mchis tAM/de nas bdag gis kha dog dang dri dang ror ldan pa'i a
57a4('dul ba): rur 'dir 'tshal te mchis kyis/de bcom ldan 'das gsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /bser ma dang 'thun par 'gyur zhing bser ma'i snyun nye bar zhi
57a5('dul ba): bar 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de gsol pa dang /rlung dang 'thun par gyur nas/rlung nad kyi snyun nye bar zhi bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das shin tu bzod
57a6('dul ba): cing lhag par 'tsho bar gyur te//de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam dgyes kyi bar du byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas/klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas gang na ba der ga
57a7('dul ba): te byon nas/shing zhig gi drung du brten te/skyil mo krung bcas nas sku drang por bsring ste dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag nas bzhugaso//de'i tshe klu'i rgyal po btang bzhung gi/
57b1('dul ba): gnasu zhagu bdun du dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags par gyur to//de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun du dus ma yin pa'i ston chags par rig nas granas nas mngon par
57b2('dul ba): 'phags te/bcom ldan 'das zhag bdun po 'di la bser bar 'gyur du 'ong /tsha ba dang /sbrang ma dang sha sbrang dang /rlung dang nyi ma dang sdig sbrul gyi reg pas sku la gnod par
57b3('dul ba): 'gyur du 'ong zhes lus kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun du dkris te/steng du mgo'i gdengs ka chen po byas nas 'dug/de nas klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gis zhag bdun
57b4('dul ba): gyi dus ma yin pa'i sprin chags pa med par rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis sku las lus phral te/dpung rgyan dang /rna rgyan dang /phreng ba dang /rgyan sna tshogs dang /
57b5('dul ba): byug pas byugs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das dgung bdun po
57b6('dul ba): 'di la bser bur ma gyur tam/che ba dang sbrang ma dang sha sbrang dang /bser mo dang /gdugs dang sdig sbrul gyi gnod pas sku la reg par ma gyur tam/de nas bcom ldan 'das
57b7('dul ba): kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/bden pa'i dga' ba bden pa yin//chos thos pa la lci ba dang //srog tshegs rnams la sdom pa yis//'jig rten 'tshe ba med
58a1('dul ba): pa bde//'jig rten 'dod chags bral ba dang //'dod chags rnams las rgal ba bde//nga 'ong rgyal thul ba gang //de nyid bde ba'i dam pa yin//
58a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du klu'i rgyal po btang bzung gi gnas na bzhugs nas/byang chub kyi snying po gang na ba der gshegs te byon pa dang //rtswa gding ba bash+ma
58a3('dul ba): pa nyid la skyil me krung bcas sku drang por spangs nas/dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhugs te/skyil mo krung gicig gis zhug bdun 'das par mdzad cing /rten cing 'brel par
58a4('dul ba): 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs dang 'thun pa dang /lugs dang mi mthun pa 'di nyid la gzigs par mdzad/'di lta ste/'di yod pas 'dri yod/'di skyes pas
58a5('dul ba): 'di skye ba 'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes paH/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen
58a6('dul ba): gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa//
58a7('dul ba): srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan da /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrugs pa rnams 'byung bar/
58b1('dul ba): 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur//'di lta ste 'di medun 'di med la 'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/'di lta ste ma rig
58b2('dul ba): pa 'grags pas 'du byed 'gags/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gags/rnam par shes pa 'gags byas ming dang gzugs 'gags/ming dang gzugs 'gags
58b3('dul ba): pas skye mched drug 'gags/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gags/reg pa 'grags pas tshor ba 'gags/tsho rab 'grags pas sred pa 'gags/sred pa 'gags
58b4('dul ba): pas len pa 'gags/len po 'gags pas srid pa 'gags/srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gags/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /
58b5('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khyig pa rnams 'gags par 'gyur te/de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'bar zhig po 'grogs par 'gyur ro//de nas bcos
58b6('dul ba): kyis zhage bdun po de nyid 'das par mdzad nas/ting 'dzin de las bzhengs te/de'i tshe tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyed byed pa'o//brtson 'grus ldan pa'i
58b7('dul ba): bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//gang tshe chos rnams rgyu dang bcas shes pas//de nas de'i so ma nye thams cad bral//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyer byed pa'i//brtson 'grus ldan
59a1('dul ba): pa'i bas ma gtan tshangs pa yin//ga n+d+he sdug bsdu spyad+ma bcas shes pa//de nas de'i sgom nyi thams cad bral//gdun chos 'du dag ni spyod byed /
59a2('dul ba): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//gang tshe tshor ba 'de ba thob 'gyur ba//de nas de yi som nyi thams cad 'brel//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni skyod byed pa'i//
59a3('dul ba): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa sbyin//gang tshe rkyen rnams zad bya thob nas ni//de nas de yi som thams cad 'phrus//gang mo chos 'di dag ni spyod spyod pa'i//
59a4('dul ba): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//ga zag pa zad pa 'od gyur nas//de nas de yis so ma nyi thams cad 'brug/gang tshe chos 'di dag ni sbyong byed pa'i//
59a5('dul ba): brtson 'grus ldan pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//'jig rten kun du snang bar 'dug pa ni//ji ltar nyi ma par snang shar ba bzhin//gang tshe chos 'di dag ni spyod byed pa'i//
59a6('dul ba): sngon 'grus sbyin pa'i bsam gtan tshangs pa yin//bdud kyi sde rnams rnam par bcom gnas te//sangs rgyas kun tu sbyor las rnam par grol//de nas bcom ldan 'das
59a7('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/bdag gis chos zang mo phab par snang ba mthong bar dka' zhing khong du chud par dka' ba rtog ga pa rnams kyi rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/zhib mo'i dzangs
59b1('dul ba): ba'i mkhas pa dang /rig pas rnam par shes pa bya ba rtogs te de bdag gis gzhan la smras kyang /gzhan gyis de mi shes pas//des bdag dub par gyur ngal bar 'gyur//sems
59b2('dul ba): la spro ba med par kho nar 'gyur bar zad pas/ma la bdag gcig pu dgon pa'i nag sa stug por mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor la rjesu brtson pas gnas par bya'o//
59b3('dul ba): snyam ste/de nas bcom ldan 'das thugs las chung ngus bzhugs pa la thugs gzhol bar mdzad cing chos 'chad pa la ma yin no//de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po 'di
59b4('dul ba): snyam du sems te/kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ba'o//kye ma'o 'jig rten 'di ma rung ste/gang gi phyir da ltar brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
59b5('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung ba ni/dper na u dum ba ri'i me tog bzhi no//bcom ldan 'das de da ltar thugs las chu ngus bzhugs pa la/thugs gzhol
59b6('dul ba): bar mjed cing chos 'chad par la ni ma yin pas/ma la bdag der sing la de la gsol ba gdab bo snyamo//de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan
59b7('dul ba): pa'i dpung pa bskum nas brkyang ba 'am/brkyang nas bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis
60a1('dul ba): spyan sngar 'dug/de nas tshungs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos dang cha tshogasu bcad de gsol pa/ma ga d+har ni sngon chad chos byung ga/dag pa ma lags
60a2('dul ba): mar bcas pas rtogs//bdud rtsi chos kyi sgo ni phye mdzod la//dri ma med pas rtogs pas bshad pa mdzod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/tshangs pa ngani tshigs
60a3('dul ba): chen gyis//skyon rnams bcom nas rtogs gyur pa//srid dang chags pas dkris rnams kyis//chos 'di legs par rtogs mi 'gyur//rgyun las zlogs phyogs
60a4('dul ba): 'gro ba'i lam//zab cing shin tu mthong dka' ba//mun pa'i phung pos bsgribs pa yi//'dod chags zhen pas mthong mi 'gyur//btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig
60a5('dul ba): rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la/dbang po rnon po dang /dbang po 'bring po dang /dbang po brtul po dang /drang sla ba dang /gdul sla ba dang /nyon mongs chung ba
60a6('dul ba): dang /rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te/de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongasu nyams par 'gyur lagaso//btsun pa dper na/ut+pa la 'am/pad+ma 'am
60a7('dul ba): ku mu ta'am/pad+ma dkar po dag chab nas skyes shing chags nas chen por gyur te/chab nas 'phags te mchis pa la kha cig ni che ba dang mnyam/kha cig ni chab kyi
60b1('dul ba): nang du nub cing mchis pa de bzhin du/btsun pa 'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgas pa'i sems can rnams la yang dbang po rnon po dang /dbang po 'bring po dang /dbang po brtul po dang /
60b2('dul ba): drang sla ba dang /gdul sla ba dang /nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /rdul chung ba'i rigs mchis te/de dag gis dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongasu nyams par gyur pas/chos rin
60b3('dul ba): po che 'tshal bar 'gyur ba mchis kyis/bcom ldan 'das chos bshad du gsol//bde bar gshegs pa chos bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam
60b4('dul ba): du dgongs te/mA la nga nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la blta bar bya'o snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs te/
60b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi skyon gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /'jig rten du skyes shing 'jig rten du rgyas pa'i sems can rnams la dbang po rnon po dang /dbang po
60b6('dul ba): 'bring po dang /dbang po brtul po dang drang sla ba dang gdul sla ba dang nyon mongs pa chung ba dang /rdul chung ba'i rang bzhin yod do//de dag dam pa'i chos ma thos na yongasu nyams par
60b7('dul ba): 'gyur ba gzigaso//gzigs nas kyang sems can rnams la thugs rje chen po gzhol bar gyur par gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcad de bka'
61a1('dul ba): sprul pa/bdud rtsi sgo mo dag ni dbye bar byas//ldan par su 'dod sum nyi sol cig dang //tshangs pa mi rnams la ni gya rlom chos//k+ShAn ka mi btsal mdo tsam
61a2('dul ba): bshad par bya//de nas tshangs pa mi mjeb kyi bdag pa 'di snyam du sems te/kye bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bshad par 'gyur ro//kye bde bar gshegs pas chos bshad
61a3('dul ba): par 'gyu ro snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba rgya chen po dang yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la
61a4('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas su
61a5('dul ba): la thog mar chos bshad snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur de la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/de ni nga'i
61a6('dul ba): thog ma'i slob dpon kho na yin bzhin du rjud pa'i dam pas rjed cing /mchod pa'i dam pas mchod lo//rtogs pa dam pa dag la yang yid rangs shing dad par gyur pa yin no snya mo//
61a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyis gsol pa/btsun pa sgyu rtsal shes kyi bu ring du 'phur gum nas dgung bdun lon lag so//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgongs pa la
61b1('dul ba): rgyu tunan gags pa smo /sa / sa du na// com na snyam du nan tu/smras sa
61b2('dul ba): 'du shrI ba de ni shin gyi bor ma n+ta.e ma'o//rgyul shes kyi yi du lachu shi pa de ni shin gyi te bar ma s+t+raisate/chos 'dril ba 'di mas so//gal te des chos 'dus
61b3('dul ba): 'ad thos nas shes par 'gyur ba zhig spyan//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dges te/ma lu ngas thag mar smra zhig la chos bshud sgra mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
61b4('dul ba): snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas ras byed kyi bu ltag spyod de la thag mer chos ba shad par bya ste/de ni nga'i thog ma'i slob dpon kha na yin bzhin du rjed pa'i dam pas rjed cing mchod
61b5('dul ba): mya pa sa mchod latsug pa mya dag la yod sa mau de par m+b+ha ///ben mo ldan dus sa sgra rnams kyis gsol pabatsun pa skye byed gis bu lkug sbyod mdu gsu
61b6('dul ba): spyod la sum lhags//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang dgang mipas rgyugs/ye shis gamigs pa'i skyed na/su byed kyi s+yu slong da kyi shi bar gyurato//den
61b7('dul ba): di rje ma du ga /e ma mes byed kyi spyag spyang shib de ni te bar ma skyes te/e ma chongs byong gyi sdug nga shi dzin sbyin rgya po mas+t+rai te/'dul ba'i
62a1('dul ba): gal te des chos 'dul ba 'di thos na shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas thog mar su zhig la chos
62a2('dul ba): bshad snya mo//de nas 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma ya ngas lnga sde'i dge slong de rnams la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor gyis
62a3('dul ba): rjesu brtson par gnas pa na/bla ma dang gus pa dang /sdig pa dang bcas pas gnas pa yi no snga mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/lnga sde'i dge
62a4('dul ba): slong rnams da ltar gang na 'dug snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa mi rnams kyis las 'das pas lde sde'i dge slong rnams bA ra na sen drang srong smra bar
62a5('dul ba): dgus kyi nags nu 'khod pa gzig so//gzigs nas kyang ci tsam bzhed kyi bar du byang chub kyi drung du zhugs nas/bA ra na se re ka shi'i grong rdal gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegaso
62a6('dul ba): de'i tshe kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gro lam de nyid du zhugs par gyur te/kun tu 'tsho nyer 'gros bcom ldan 'das lam nas gshegs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol
62a7('dul ba): to/dge sbyong go'u te ma khyod kyi dbang bo rnams ni dngas/bzhin gyi mdog ni yongasu dag/lpags pa'i mdog ni gsal na/tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma khyod kyi ston pa ni
62b1('dul ba): gang /khyod su lus rten te rab tu byung /khyod su'i chos la dga'/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig su bcu de bka' stsal pa/nga dang 'dra ba yod min pas//dul slob dpon
62b2('dul ba): 'ga' med//'jig rten sangs rgyas nga gcig pu/yang dag byang chub dam pa theb//thams cad zil gnon 'jig rten kun mkhyen la//'di ni chos kun gyis ni ngam gros//
62b3('dul ba): thams cad spangs shing sred bral rnam grol te//rang gis mngon par shes na su la rten//de bzhin gshegs pa lha mi'i ston pa bo//thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs ni kun ldan pas//
62b4('dul ba): nyid kyis byang chub rtogs nas rab gsungs pa//mi mnyam mtshungs pa med na su la rten//nga ni 'jig rten dgra bcom ste//'jig rten bla med nga yin pas//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
62b5('dul ba): rten na//ngan rgyal ba bdud zil gnon//tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma//rgyal ba zhes gsung ngam/gang gis zag pa zad thob pa//rgyal ba dang 'dar shes par bya//sdig pa'i chos ni
62b6('dul ba): ngas bcom pas//de bas nyer 'gro nga rgyal ba'o//tshe dang ldan pa go'u to ma gang du bzhud//b+hA ra na ser gshegs nas ni//ngas ni chos kyi rnga brdung zhing //'jig rten ma skor gang
62b7('dul ba): yin pa//chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//'jig rten chags las rgal ba yi//kun mkhyen sangs rgyas zhi gyur pa//'jig rten bsgral ba ma byas par//skyes bu dam pa grags
63a1('dul ba): mi srid//tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma rgyal ba legaso zhes gsol nas/kun tu 'tsho nyer 'grol lam nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das yul ka shi'i ljongs
63a2('dul ba): rgyu zhing gshegs pa nu b+hA ra na ser byon to//de'i tshe lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bla ra na se na drang srong smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na 'khod//lnga sde'i dge slong rnams kyis/thecom ldan 'das
63a3('dul ba): rgyad ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang phan tshun mtha tshod du bsams te legs pa 'dug nas/khrimasu bcas pa shes ldan dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma mi brtan pa/bye ba mngag
63a4('dul ba): mang pos 'tsho ba/spyong ba nyams pa de da 'bras can dang zan dron gyi kha zas la mang du za zhing lus mar sar dang /til mar gyis byugs nas chu 'jom pos/lus khrus byed cing 'ong gis
63a5('dul ba): de bdag cag gi drung du 'ongs pa dang /de la smra bar mi bya/phyag mi bya/gang bar mi bya/langs te stan bstabs par mi bya'o//gzhan du na bstan nar ma kha na bting la tshig 'dri
63a6('dul ba): skad ces/tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma stan yid kyis ji ste 'dod na 'dug shig ces brjod par bya'o zhes bcas so//bcom ldan 'das ji lta ji ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la gzigs
63a7('dul ba): pa'i phyir nye bar gshegs pa de lta de ltar lnga sde'i dge slong rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid dang /dpal dang 'gyur ba sti ma bzod nas stan las langs te/kha cig ni bac+doMs
63b1('dul ba): kyi ched du gdan sho mo//kha cig ni zhabs bkrus pa'i chu dang /zhabs kyi rten drag mtha' gcig tu 'jog par byed//kha cig ni bsu te na bza' chos gos dag blangs nas 'di skad
63b2('dul ba): ces shes ldan go'u tam tshur spyon/shes lhun gro'u ta ma byon pa legaso//shes ldan go'u ta ma snun pa sha mos pa nyid la bzhugs shig ces zer ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das
63b3('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/kye mo skyes bu blun po 'di rnams kyis khrims bcas nas/rang gis bshig snyam du mkhyen nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas lde sde'i
63b4('dul ba): dge slong rnams lhag par myang bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan nas brjod/bdud nas brjod/tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa kun tu brjod par byedado//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lde
63b5('dul ba): sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed lhag par yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nas brjod pa dang /gdung nas brjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pas brjod
63b6('dul ba): pa kun tu marjod cig/khyed la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phyin pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyuraro//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dge slong dag gang la la lhag par de
63b7('dul ba): bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon nas brjod pa dang /gdung nas brjod pa dang /tshe dang ldan pas brjod pa'i kun tu brjod pa de ni skyes bu chen po de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /
64a1('dul ba): phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//tshe dang ldan pa go'u ta ma khyod kyis re shig sngon gyi tshul dang /
64a2('dul ba): spyod pa dang /dka' ba spyod pa des mi'i chos bla ma 'phags pa'i khyad par thob par nub pa 'am/shes pa 'am mthong ba'am/reg par gnas pa cung zad kyang me thos na/de
64a3('dul ba): lhor khyod mi brtan zhing /bya ba mang la mang pos 'tsho zhing spong ba nyams pas/da khyod 'bras chan dang zan dron dang kha zas la mang du za zhing /lus mar sar dang til mar
64a4('dul ba): gyis phyugs nas chu 'jam pos lus khrus byed pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/dge slong dag khyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mdog dang dbang po rnams gsal ba sngon las
64a5('dul ba): tha dad du bya ba gzhan lta mthong ngam/de rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//tshe dang ldan pa gro'u ta ma de de bzhin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong
64a6('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rab tu byung bas ni mtha' 'di gnyis rten par mi bya/bsnyen par mi bya/bsnyen dkur mi bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'dod pa
64a7('dul ba): rnams la 'dod pa'i bsod snyoms kyi rjesu brtson pa dman pa ngan pa tha chad ma rabs gang yin pa dang /bdag nyid dub pa la rjesu brtson pa sdug bsngal ba 'phags pa ma yin
64b1('dul ba): pa gnod pa dang /ldan pa gang yin pa'o//khyod kyis mtha' gnyis la mi rten par dbu ma'i lam mig byed pa/ye shes byed pa/nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba mngon par shes
64b2('dul ba): pa dang /rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba yod de/dbu ma'i lam gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/yang
64b3('dul ba): dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtag pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /
