64b4('dul ba): yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin yino//bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la shes par bya ba 'dis shes par mdzad spyod pas/bcom
64b5('dul ba): ldan 'das lha sde'i dge slong rnams las gnyis la snga dro gdams dag 'bogs pa na/gsum grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/gsum gyis bsgrubs pa gang yin pa des
64b6('dul ba): drug char 'tsho bar bye'o//bcom ldan 'das lnga sde rnams kyi dge slong gsum la phyi do gdams ngag 'bogs na/gnyis grong du bsod snyoms la 'jug ste/gnyis kyis
64b7('dul ba): bsgrengs pa gang yin pa des lnga sde 'tshe bar byedade/de bzhin gshegs pa ni snga dro'i dus kho nar gsol ba yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sngo'i dge slong rnams
65a1('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes so//
65a2('dul ba): ba dang /rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la 'di ni sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba'o//'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'o//
65a3('dul ba): 'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i la mo zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes//shes pa dang /rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dgang sngon ma thos
65a4('dul ba): pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon por shes pas/yongasu shes par bya'o//zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig skyes//shes pa dang
65a5('dul ba): rig pa dang /blo dang /rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag ngas sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas
65a6('dul ba): spang bar bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyes//shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes so//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog
65a7('dul ba): pa 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pos mngon du bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ni mig skeso//shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyeso//dge slong dag
65b1('dul ba): nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa des ngas mngon par shes pas sgom par bya'o zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyeso//
65b2('dul ba): shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas yongasu sheso zhes tshul bzhin
65b3('dul ba): yid la byed pa na mig skyeso//shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtog pa skyes//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams la sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas
65b4('dul ba): mngon par shes pas spangaso zhes tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa na mig skyeso//shes pa dang /rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag nga sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams
65b5('dul ba): la sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byaso//zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyeso//shes pa dang rig pa dang blo dang rtogs pa skyeso///
65b6('dul ba): dge slong dge nga sngon ma thos pa'i tshe rnas la sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa de ngas mngon par shes pas bsgomaso zhes tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na mig skyeso//
65b7('dul ba): shes pa dang rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes//dge slong dag nga ji srid du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la rten/de ltar lan gsum du bzlos te rnam pa bcu gnyisu
66a1('dul ba): bskor ba'i mig skyes//shes pa ma yin rig pa ma yin tho ma yin/rtog pa ma skyes pa srid dung sgra dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang tshangs pa dang bcas/dag
66a2('dul ba): sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mir bcas pa'od las grol ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /mi ldan pa dang rab tu grol ba
66a3('dul ba): dong phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par ma gyur cing /dge slong dag ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso zhes
66a4('dul ba): bya bar ma shiso//dge slong dag ngas gang nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di rnams la de ltar lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyi su bskor ba'i mig skyes shing shes pa dang /
66a5('dul ba): rig pa dang /blo dang rtogs pa skyes pa de nas nga lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten bdud dang bcas tshangs pa dang bcas/dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu dang /lha dang mir bcas pa
66a6('dul ba): 'di las grol ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /mi ldan pa dang rab tu grol ba dang /phyin ci log dang bral ba'i sems kyis mang du gnas par gyur cing /dge slong dag ngas de nas bla na
66a7('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyaso zhes bya bar sheso//chos kyi rnam grangs de bka' stsal pa na/tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+ya dang /
66b1('dul ba): lha brgyad khri chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kro'u di n+ya la bka' stsal pa/ko'u di nA khyod
66b2('dul ba): kyis chos kun shes sam/bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lag so//ko'u dI n+ya khyod kyis kun shes sam/kun shes sam/bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags//
66b3('dul ba): kun 'tshal lagaso//tshe dang ldan pa ko'u n+yas chos kun shes pas/de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa ko'u n+ya shes ko'u di n+ya zhes tshig bla btagaso//tshe dang ldan pa ko'u di n+yas chos
66b4('dul ba): kun sheso//zhes sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams sgra sgrogs par byed do//grogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bA ra na ser drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nagasu lan gsum du bzlas
66b5('dul ba): rnam pa bcu gnyisu chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa/dge sbyong ngam/bram ze 'am/lha 'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang
66b6('dul ba): 'thun par ma skor ba/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /phan pa dang bde ba'i
66b7('dul ba): phyir bskor bas/lha'i ris mngon par 'phel zhing /lha ma yin gyi ris yongasu nyamaso zhes dbyangs skragaso//sa bla'i gnod sbyin rnams kyis sgra thos nas na mkha' la rgyu
67a1('dul ba): /rgyumatshan na /spya na spya / du// spyan du/ smra du/dU
67a2('dul ba): 'phrul nga byed kyi sgyu rnams nas spyod cig dang /bdagacag de dang / med dang /snang shi dang /nga zhibag dung /smad ce dag tshang pa
67a3('dul ba): du spyi bsgrag so//tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis kyang skya sgrogs par byed do//blogs po dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bI ra na ser drang srong skye ba'i ri dgas kyi nagasu lan gsum du
67a4('dul ba): bzlas te/rnam pa bcu gnyis kyi chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong ngam/bram ze'i ste bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang 'thun par
67a5('dul ba): 'phrul yang mthu sbyor ba/skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /smye myed tshul bde bad/'jig rten la snang brdzi ba dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang /bde de'i
67a6('dul ba): bskur bas lha'i ras mngon par 'phel zhing /l+h+wa ma yin gyi ris yongs nyam sa zhes dbyangs bsgrags//bcom ldan 'das kyi b+hA r+ya na snyid drang srong smra ba dgas kyin no
67a7('dul ba): lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor bas de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la chos kyi 'khor lo//bskor bzhis tshig bla ngas su
67b1('dul ba): so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyi sa yang lnga sde'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi ni 'di dag yin te/bzhi gang zhe na
67b2('dul ba): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba dang /sdug bsngal ba 'gog pa dang /sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa'o//
67b3('dul ba): sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/skye ba sdug bsngal ba dang /rga ba sdug bsngal ba dang /na ba sdug bsngal ba dang /'chi ba sdug bsngal ba dang /sdug pa dang bral
67b4('dul ba): bo sdug bsngal ba dang /mi sdug pa dang phrad pa sdug bsngal ba dang /gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed pa yang sdug bsngal ba dang /mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba ste/
67b5('dul ba): de yongasu shes par bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa bsgom par bya'o//sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/yang srid pa'i sred pa dag
67b6('dul ba): ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa/de dang de la mngon par 'dod pa ste/de spangs pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//sdug bsngal 'gog pa 'phags
67b7('dul ba): pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/yang srid pa'i sred pa dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa de dong de la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa de nyid ma lus par spangs pa dang /bor ba dang /bsal
68a1('dul ba): ba dang /zad pa dang /'dod chags dang bral ba dang /'gag pa dang /nye bar zhi ba dang /nub pa ste/de mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam
68a2('dul ba): yan lag brgyad pa bsgom par bya'o//sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa gang zhe na/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa 'di lta ste/yang
68a3('dul ba): dag pa'i lta ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang /yang dag pa'i ngag dang /yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang /yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang /yang
68a4('dul ba): dge pa'i dran pa dang /yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te de yang bsgom par bya'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u de n+ya len pa med par zag pa
68a5('dul ba): rnams las sems rnam par grolo//lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma la ni chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyes//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa gcig dang /gnyis
68a6('dul ba): pa ni bcom ldan 'daso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong lnga sde lhag ma rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gzugs ni bdag ma yin no//dge slong dag gral
68a7('dul ba): te gzugs bdag yin no//gzugs la gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal por mi 'gyur zhing /gzugs la bdag gi gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig/'di lta bur ma gyur cig
68b1('dul ba): snyam du yang 'thob par yang 'gyuraro//dge slong dag gang gi phyir gzugs bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir gzugs la gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /gzugs la bdag gi//
68b2('dul ba): gzugs 'di lta bur gyur cig 'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam du yang 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//dge slong dag char ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed rnams dang /rnam par shes
68b3('dul ba): pa la rnam par shes pa ni bdag ma yin no//dge slong dag gal te rnam par shes pa bdag yin na rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhing rnam par shes pa
68b4('dul ba): la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig/'di lta bur ma gyur cig snyam na yang 'thob par 'gyur ro//dge slong drug gang gis phyir rnam par shes pa bdag ma yin pa de'i phyir
68b5('dul ba): rnam par shes pa la gnod pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur zhing /rnam par shes pa la bdag gi rnam par shes pa 'di lta bur gyur cig/'di lta bur ma gyur cig/snyam ni yang
68b6('dul ba): thob par mi 'gyur ro//dge slong ji snyam du sems/gzugs rtag gam/mi rtag/btsun pa mi rtag lagaso//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam sdug bsngal ma yin//
68b7('dul ba): btsun pa sdug bsngal lags//mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag go//bdag ni 'di yin//
69a1('dul ba): 'di ni bdag gi bdag po zhes bdag tu khas len tam/btsun pa ma lag s+ho//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang //'du shes dang /'du byed
69a2('dul ba): dang rnam par shes pa rtag gam mi rtag/btsun pa mi rtag lag so//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/sdug bsngal ma yin/btsun pa sdug bsngal lags /
69a3('dul ba): mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ni bdag go/bdag ni 'di yin no//'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes
69a4('dul ba): bdag tu khas len te ma/btsun pa ma lag so//dge slong dag de lta bas na/gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung ste/'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/
69a5('dul ba): nang gi 'am/phyi'i 'am/rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/ngan pa 'am/gya nom pa'am/gang dag thag ring ba 'am/gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin
69a6('dul ba): bdag ni de ma yin de ni bdag gi bdag ma yin//zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis blta bar bya'o//dge slong dag de blta bas na tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /
69a7('dul ba): 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa ji snyed pa gang ci yang rung 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi'am/phyi'i 'am/rags pa'am/phra ba'am ngan pa'i
69b1('dul ba): gya nom pa 'am/gang dag thag ring ba 'am/gang dag thag nye ba de dag thams cad ni bdag ma yin bdag ni de ma yin/de ni bdag gi bdag ma yino//zhes ji lta ba de bzhin du yang dag pa'i/
69b2('dul ba): shes bab kyis blta bar bya'o//dge slong dag 'di ltar 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa ni/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga 'dir dag yin/bdag gis ma yin par lta ba ste/
69b3('dul ba): de de ltar lta ba na/'jig rten ci yang len pa med do//len pa med na yongasu gdung ba medo//yongasu gdung ba med na bdag nyid yongasu mya ngan 'da' skye bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par
69b4('dul ba): spyod pa la brten to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shiso/zhes bya bar 'gyuraro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na lnga sde'i dge slong lhag ma rnams kyis len pa
69b5('dul ba): mod par zag pa las sems rnam par grol//de'i tshe dgra bcom pa lnga dang drug po ni bcom ldan 'daso//dri nas bcom ldan 'das bAr na se'i 'beb chu gnod pa can gyis dgram
69b6('dul ba): na bzhugaso//de'i tshe bA ri na sen rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba'i bu grags pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/de nyi ma re re zhing bud med kyis byis pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/dga' bar
69b7('dul ba): byed/dga' mgur spyod par byed pas lus snyom/lus du ba lus rgud pas myur du gnyid kyis log par gyur to//bud med de rnams kyang lus snyom/lus dub lus rgud pas
70a1('dul ba): myur du gnyid log par gyur to//rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa mtshan mo gnyid snad pa na/bud med de dag thams cad rdal zhing sgren mor byung ba la sra
70a2('dul ba): zhig lag pa brkyang ste/byung rgyal du zla ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de rang gi chung ma la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes par gyur te//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa
70a3('dul ba): mal chen po las babs te/rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung shig gon nas nyal khang gi sgo gang na ba dar song ste phyin nas grogs po bdag ni gtseso//grogs po bdag ni
70a4('dul ba): nyam so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /de'i sgro mi ma yin po rnams kyis phye nas skud kyang mi grags par byas//de nas rigros kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khyim gyi sgo gang na ba der so
70a5('dul ba): ste phyin nas/grogs po bdag ni gtseso//grogs po bdag ni nyam so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /de'i sgo mi ma yin rnams kyis phyi nas skad kyang mi grags par byaso//de
70a6('dul ba): nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa grong khyer gyi sgo gdun pa der song ste phyin nas/grogs pa bdag ni gtseso//grogs po bdag ni nyam so zhes skad ngan phyung ba dang /de'i sgo mi
70a7('dul ba): ma yin rnams kyis phye bas skad kyang me grag par byaso//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba der song ba dang /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
70b1('dul ba): 'brab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram nA/gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol blag pa med pa na/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa 'ong ba la yang dang yang du ba nas shung 'chug pas 'cha'o//rigs//
70b2('dul ba): kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pas bcom ldan 'das 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na 'chag pa rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dge sbyong bdag ni gtsoso//dge sbyong bdag ni
70b3('dul ba): nyam so zhes skrad ngan phyung ngo //dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gzhon chur shog gnas 'di ni khyod la 'tsho ba med
70b4('dul ba): pa yin/'di ni nyams pa med pa yin no//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig po 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram du phud nas/'bab chu
70b5('dul ba): glanod pa can rgal te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas bcus
70b6('dul ba): kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa khrid de/nyid kyi gtsug lag khang gang na ba de logasu gshegs nas byon pa dang /gang na gshams pa nyid la bzhug so//bzhugs nas bca
70b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa la chos dang ldan pa'i gtams kyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng spyod/ya
71a1('dul ba): pU rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thos pa'i dus su rgyas kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i ga
71a2('dul ba): dang tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang
71a3('dul ba): dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa rje su bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do//gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i
71a4('dul ba): sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /'gu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal pa dang ldan pa dang /yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na/shes par nus
71a5('dul ba): par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba
71a6('dul ba): dang 'gog pa dang /lam de rgya chen bsha do//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na/chen rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub
71a7('dul ba): pa de bzhin du rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags bstan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi lha 'di lte ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa
71b1('dul ba): dang /lam rtog so//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu glags pa chos mthong ba dang /chos thos pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las rgal
71b2('dul ba): ba dang /the tshom las rgal ba dang /gzhan gyis dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyi mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las lang
71b3('dul ba): te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni
71b4('dul ba): 'phags//mngon par 'phag so//bdag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis/bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol
71b5('dul ba): deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang /yang bsngos te/skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lagaso///'dul ba gzhi//bam po rgya
71b6('dul ba): bdun pa//dran mo zhig de nyid kyi mtshan mo zhig gnyid log pa las sad na/gzhonu grags pa mal chen po na mi snang bar mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khyim bdag gi
71b7('dul ba): gtso bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces//rdzi bo mkhyen par mdzad cig/gzhin nu grags pa rang gi mal chen po na mo gda' lag so//
72a1('dul ba): de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/gzhonu nor gyi phyir chom rkun nam/g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu khrid par ma gyur grang snyam
72a2('dul ba): du sems shing phyogs bzhir pho nyo rtag pa dag bkye nas/rang nyid mi lag na/sgron ma thogs pa rnams dang lhan cig tu 'bab chu gnod pa can gang na ba de logasu song ba dang
72a3('dul ba): khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung cig phud pa mthong ngo //mngon nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/gzho nu ni nor
72a4('dul ba): gyi phyir chom rkun nam g.yon can rnams kyis phyi rol tu ma khrid kyi/'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri bzung cig phud pa las na/gzho nu 'bab
72a5('dul ba): chu banod pa can gyi dogs 'di nyid nas rgal bar ma gyur grad 'di ltar 'bab chu gnod pa can gyi 'gram na rin po che'i lham brgya stong ri ba zung cig bor ro snyam du bsams nas 'bab
72a6('dul ba): chu gnod pa can gyi dogs de nyid nas rgal te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo rgyang ring po nas gzig so//gzigs
72a7('dul ba): nas kyang 'di snyam du dgongs te/ci nas kyang ngas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya bas/khyim bdag rigs kyis gtso bos gzhonu grags pa stan 'di
72b1('dul ba): nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu zhig bya'o snyam nus/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pas/khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos
72b2('dul ba): gzhonu grags pa stan 'di nyid la 'dug bzhin du mi mthong ba de lta bu mdzad//de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo bcom ldan 'das gang na bA der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la
72b3('dul ba): 'di skad ces gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das cig gzhonu grags pa gzigs sam/khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /stan 'di kho na la gzhi nu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar
72b4('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do//de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo 'di snyam du sems te/gdon mi za bar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhonu grags pa gzigs par gyur to///
72b5('dul ba): 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces/khyim bdag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang /stan 'di kho na la gzhonu grags pa 'dug pa mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do//zhes
72b6('dul ba): bka' stsal to snyam du rig nas dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba dang /dga' ba rgya chen po dang /yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
72b7('dul ba): pos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /khyim bdog rigs kyi gtso bo la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan//yang dag
73a1('dul ba): bAr 'dzin du bcug/yang drug par gzeng stong/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos
73a2('dul ba): kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs
73a3('dul ba): dang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i rjesu bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad///
73a4('dul ba): gang gi tshe de bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal pa dang ldan pa dang /yang/
73a5('dul ba): dag phul gyi chos bshad na shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi ches bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste//'phags
73a6('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam rgya cher ba sha do//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa chen rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug
73a7('dul ba): na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung /
73b1('dul ba): dang /'gog pa dang /lam rtogs te/chos kyi rnam grangs de bshad pa na khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral bar skyeso//tshe dang
73b2('dul ba): ldan pa grags pa yang rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul
73b3('dul ba): mngon par 'du mdzad po de slar bsdus nas de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pas bka' stsal pa/rgyan gyis brgyan bzhin du ni chos spyod de/dul zhing yang dag sdom po tshungs spyod la//
73b4('dul ba): 'byung po kun la chad pa spang ba ni//de ni bram ze dge sbyong dge slong yin//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa drug dang bdun pa ni bcom ldan 'das//khyim bdag rigs kyi
73b5('dul ba): gtso bos gzhonu grags pa spyan de la 'dug pa mthong //mthong nas kyang gzho nu grags pa la 'di skad ces smraso//gzhonu tshur shog/khyod kyis ma lus ngal zhing lus
73b6('dul ba): dub pas skye sngags 'don gyis khyim du 'dod/dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/khyim badrag rigs kyi gtso bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyim bdag ji snyam du sems/
73b7('dul ba): gang gis mi slob pa'i shis pa dang /mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon
74a1('dul ba): par rtogs pa de cig khyim pa khyim na gnas pa 'am/sogs 'jog gi longs spyod kyis 'dod pa longs spyod par 'gyur ram/btsun pa ma lag so//
74a2('dul ba): khyim bdag ji ltar khyod kyis slob pa'i shes pa dang /slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /
74a3('dul ba): lam mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin du gzhonu grags pas mi slob pa'i shes pa dang /mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /
74a4('dul ba): kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lamo mngon par rtog so//btsun pa gzhonu grags pas gang gis na/mi slob pa'i shes pa dang /mi slob pa'i lta bas 'phags
74a5('dul ba): pipa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtogs pa ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed lagaso//bcom ldan
74a6('dul ba): 'dus slad bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong glags pa dang /thugs brtse ba nye bar bzung ste/rigs kyi gtso bo gang na ba der gshegs na leg so//bcom ldan 'das kyis
74a7('dul ba): khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo la cing mi gsung bas gnang //de nas khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan
74b1('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snyan song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas/snga dron bza' sham thangs
74b2('dul ba): mnabs lhung bzed dang chos gos bsgoms te/phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong tshe dang ldan pa grags pa dang /khyim bdag rigs kyi gtse ba'i khyim ga nA ba der gsheg so//dra'i tshe
74b3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis bcom ldan 'das la yang dang yang du bsre ba'i phyir bsgron sdod do//tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i mya dang /chung ma gnyis
74b4('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshur sbyin
74b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das byon pa leg so//bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugasu gsol zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//
74b6('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan po grags pa'i ma drang chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod
74b7('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan pa'i gtamo gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag
75a1('dul ba): par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa
75a2('dul ba): de 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams mdog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /kunas nyon mongs pa dang
75a3('dul ba): rnam par byang ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i rjesu bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad do//gang gi tshe de gnyis bco
75a4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis dga' ba'i sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal ba dang ldan pa dang /yang dag phul
75a5('dul ba): gyis chos bshad na/shes par nus pa gzigs pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/'phags
75a6('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal ba dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam de rgya cher bshad//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa chen rtsi 'os pa'i nang
75a7('dul ba): du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du/tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa
75b1('dul ba): bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtog so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis kyis chos mthong
75b2('dul ba): ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting sleb pa dang /som nyi las rgal ba dang /the tshom las rgol ba dang /gzhan gyi dang mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan
75b3('dul ba): gyis mi dkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom
75b4('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phag so//bdag cag ni mngon par 'phags lags te/bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge sbyong gi dge 'dun la
75b5('dul ba): skye bsu mchi lags kyis/dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/deng sran chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lags//btsun pa de'i
75b6('dul ba): slodu zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa glags pa'i ma dang /chung ma ge nyes la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i
75b7('dul ba): ma dang /chung ma gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das cing mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das gdan la bde bar bzhugs pa dang /gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
76a1('dul ba): bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas snangs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi'i gnas bstabs shing
76a2('dul ba): tshim par byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin cing phyag bcabs te lhung bzed rgyu bar rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar chos
76a3('dul ba): mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa grags pa'i ma dang chung ma gnyis la chos dang ldan rdzig gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par
76a4('dul ba): 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par
76a5('dul ba): bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas/gdan las bzhengs nas gshegs so///
76a6('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa grags pas las ci zhig bgyis na/
76a7('dul ba): las de'i rnam par smin pos mchis brang gi 'khor na mchis na//rang gi mtshos brang la dur khrod kyi 'du shes skyes shing /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bzhin du btsas
76b1('dul ba): kyis spyan sngar dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag grags pa 'di nyid las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba 'os pa bzhin
76b2('dul ba): du nye bar gnas pas gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis myong bar 'gyur/dge slong
76b3('dul ba): dag las byas shing bsngags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi
76b4('dul ba): khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/
76b5('dul ba): las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur po nyid//dge slong dag sngon sbya ra na so'i grong
76b6('dul ba): khyer dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems can thams cad la phan par sems pa zhig gnas pa de bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na mi ro zhig mthong
76b7('dul ba): nas de de la zhen pa'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la zhugs te bsod snyoms spyad nas slar log pa dang /ji tsam na mi ri de rnam par sngos shing rnam par bam par 'gyur ba
77a1('dul ba): bltas pa dang /de nyid kyi mdun du zhigs nas/des de nyid du 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed//dge sbyong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong
77a2('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni gzho nu glags pa 'di nyid yin te/'odis des na 'dod chags dang bral ba skyed//des na de ltar chung ma'i nang nu 'dug pa na rkyen rnyed pa yin no//dge slong
77a3('dul ba): dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag po yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkor ba dang /'dren ma rnams kyi
77a4('dul ba): ni 'dren ma yin pas/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong
77a5('dul ba): dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /dge slong de dag yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
77a6('dul ba): mngon par bstod do////b+hA ra nA se nA khyim bdag rigs kyi gtso bo'i dru gnyis dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang /lnga pa gang po dang /dri
77a7('dul ba): med dang /ba lang bdag dang lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dag gis rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags pa skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag
77b1('dul ba): kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhes thos so//thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye mad+mo sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang
77b2('dul ba): mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu grags par shig shin tu gzhon pa/shin tu bod ba 'dod pa yang sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
77b3('dul ba): dgos nas dad pa yang dag pa ngo nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis me la bdag gis kyang sgra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dang po yang dag pa kho nas khyim
77b4('dul ba): nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar bya'o//snyam mo//de nas rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang /lnga pa glang po dang /dri med dang /ba lang bdag
77b5('dul ba): dang lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams bA ra na sa nas byung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo
77b6('dul ba): bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang lnga pa gang po dang /dri med
77b7('dul ba): dang ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa legs par gsungs par
78a1('dul ba): chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par
78a2('dul ba): spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa de dag gis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba las rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gis dngos po thob ste/
78a3('dul ba): de ltar rab tu byung nas/tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnaso//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pas rtun pa dang ldan pa
78a4('dul ba): bdag nyid gting bar gnas pa na/gang gi phyir rigs kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab
78a5('dul ba): tu 'byung bar byed pa tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag cag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod
78a6('dul ba): pa bston to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi shes/zhes go bar byed cing /tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par gol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra
78a7('dul ba): bcom par gyur to//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom pa bcu pa dang bcu gcig po ni bcom ldan 'das//bA ra na se'i grong mi gtso bo rnams kyis khye'u lnga bcus rigs kyi gtso nga
78b1('dul ba): bu dang po pa dang /gnyis pa dang /gsum pa dang /bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste/grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri med dang /ba lang bdag dang /lag bzangs te/rigs kyi gtso
78b2('dul ba): ba'i bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med par rab tu byung zhes thoso//thos nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma
78b3('dul ba): sangs rgyas ni mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing chos bstan pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir da ltar rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu dang po dang /gnyis pa dang gsum pa dang /
78b4('dul ba): bzhi pa dang lnga pa ste/grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri med dang ba lang bdag dang lag bzangs te rigs kyi gtso bo'i bu rnams ni re shig shin tu gzhon po shin tu bde ba 'dod
78b5('dul ba): pa yang skra dang kha spu brags te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung gis/ma la bdag cag kyang skra dang kha spu bregs nas
78b6('dul ba): gos ngur smrig bgos te/ngad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung snyamo//de nas grong mi gtso bo gtso bo rnams kyi khye'u lnga bcu po dag bla ra na se nas byung nas/
78b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/
79a1('dul ba): grong mi gtso bo gtso bo khye'u lnga bcu po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
79a2('dul ba): ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po gnang na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa de dag
79a3('dul ba): legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po thob ste/de ltar rab tu byung nas tshe dang ldan pa de dag gcig pu dben
79a4('dul ba): pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnaso//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang /ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na/gang gi phyir rigs
79a5('dul ba): kyi bu dag skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar byed pa/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med
79a6('dul ba): pa de'i tshe de nyid la reng gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas bdag gi skye ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi
79a7('dul ba): sheso zhes go bar byed cing /tshe dang ldan pa de dag sems shin tu rnam par grol ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom par gyur to//de'i tshe 'jig rten na dgra bcom
79b1('dul ba): pa drug cu dang /drug cu gcig pa ni bcom ldan 'das//de nas bcom ldan 'das b+hA ra na se'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyis nags na bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das
79b2('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag la ni lha dang /mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yino//dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi rnams
79b3('dul ba): kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /
79b4('dul ba): lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i ched du rgyu zhing deng la khyed gnyis shing ni gcig tu ma 'gro shig/nga yong lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing gsheg so///
79b5('dul ba): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma 'di bA ra na se'i drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na 'dug nas de nyan thos rnams la 'di skad du chos ston
79b6('dul ba): dzadage slong dag nga ni lha dang mi'i 'ching ba thams cad las grol ba yi no//dge slong dag khyed kyang lha dang mi'i 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis
79b7('dul ba): dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /zhes bya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar du stong yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can gang na ba der rgyu zhing 'gro'o//zhes zer
80a1('dul ba): gyis ma la bdag gis de la 'di lta ste/dkrub pa'i las shes bya ba'i phyir nye bar 'dra'o snyamo//de nas bdud sdig can bram ze'i khyo'u yi
80a2('dul ba): dog tu bdag nyid mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar 'dug ste/tshigasu bcad pas gsol pa/
80a3('dul ba): ma grol grol bar 'du shes na//ji ltar bdag nyid grol bar sems//bdag gis dge sbyong ma bkrol bas//'ching ba chen pos bcings pa yin//de nas bac+doMs
80a4('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/e ma'o 'di ni bdud sdig can yin te/'di lta ste/dkrug pa'i las kyi phyir nye bar 'ongaso snyam du thug su chud nas tshig su bcad bka' stsal pa//
80a5('dul ba): nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi//'ching bar gang yin kun las grol//bar tshad byed par khyod bcom par//sdig can de ltar shes par gyis//de nas bdud sdig can 'di
80a6('dul ba): snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i sems kyis radrag gis sems sheso//snyam du rig nasasdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba yid la bcags nas de nyid du mi
80a7('dul ba): snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lan gnyi su yang dge slong rnam la bka' stsal pa/dge slong nga ni lha dang mi rnams kyi 'ching ba gang yin pa thams cad
80b1('dul ba): las grol ba yin no//dge slong dag khyad kyang lha dang mi rnams kyi 'chang ba gang yin pa thams cad las grol ba yin gyis/dge slong dag skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /zhes
80b2('dul ba): byAbya ba nas rgyu zhing deng shig ces bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//nga yang lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can grang nA ba der gshegs//btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong rnams
80b3('dul ba): kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas ljongs rgyu zhing dring ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis b+hai ra na ser dzi tsam bzhid kyi bar du bzhugs nas/lteng rgyas kyi grong khyer sde can
80b4('dul ba): gang na ba der rgyu zheng gshegs te/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang //grong khyer sde can du byon to//de nas bcom ldan 'das ras bal can gyi nags tshang tshing gang na
80b5('dul ba): der gashregs te byon nas shing zhig gi drung du brten te nyin bar gyis gnas pas bzhugaso//de'i tshe drug cu sde bzang po'i tshigs grong khyer sde can gyi phyi rol tu nyi ma re re zhing
80b6('dul ba): bud med kyis byas pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa ni/de rnams las bud med gcig dam ba ces pa drol te dros//de nas
80b7('dul ba): drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs bud med de tshol zhing ras bal can gyi nags tshong tshong gong na bdor song ba dang /drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa dang /
81a1('dul ba): bar 'os pa/dbang pozhi ba/thugs na pa/thugs mchog tu dul ba/zhe 'dul ba dang ldan pa/gser gyi mchod sdong lta bur dpal gyis 'bar zhing
81a2('dul ba): shing zhig gis drung na brten te bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
81a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das cig bud med cig gzigs sam/gzhonu bud med de khyed cag gi cir 'ong /btsun pa 'di ni bdag cag drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs grong khyer gyi slad rol
81a4('dul ba): tu bud med kyis bgyis pa'i rol mos rtse bar bgyis/dga' bar bgyid/dga' mgur spyod par bgyid de/de rnams dang bdag cag rtse bar bgyid/dga' bar bgyid
81a5('dul ba): dga' mgur spyod par bgyid pa na/bud med cig dam bcas pa dral te bros nas bdag cag tshal lagaso//gzhonu dag ji snyam du sems/bud med tshol ba gang yin pa
81a6('dul ba): dang dang ga nyid tshol ba gang yin pa gang 'dam/btsun pa bdag cig la bud med kyi cibagyi/bdag cag ni bdag nyid tshol ba gang lags pa de 'dam lag so//gzhon
81a7('dul ba): dag de'i phyir 'dug shig dang khyed la chos bshad//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khong //
81b1('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag
81b2('dul ba): por gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam
81b3('dul ba): dang tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing /nya dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par
81b4('dul ba): byang ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i rjesu bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rnams rgya cher bshad//gang gi tshe de dag bcom ldan
81b5('dul ba): 'odas kyis dpa' ba'i sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral po'i sems dang /skal ba ldan pa dang /yang dag phul gyi chos bshad
81b6('dul ba): pa shes par nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyis chos bshad pa gang yin pa/'phabres pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug
81b7('dul ba): bsdu ba dang /kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam de rgya cher bshadado//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa chen rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin
82a1('dul ba): du btub pa de bzhin du drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /
82a2('dul ba): kun 'byung dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtog so//de nas drug cu sde bzang po'i tshogs kyis chos mthong ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos
82a3('dul ba): kyi gting slobs pa dang /som nyi mas rgal ba dang /the tshom las rgal ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi dkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams
82a4('dul ba): la ma 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal me sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di
82a5('dul ba): skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cag 'phags legaso//mngon par 'phagaso//bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi
82a6('dul ba): legs kyis/bdag cag dge bsnyen du gzung du gsol/dang slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dang lagaso//de nas drag
82a7('dul ba): cu sde bzang po tshogs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ste rje su yi rangs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcwas
82b1('dul ba): kyi spyan snga nas dong ngo //de'i tshe ser skya'i gzhin bram ze lha zhes bya ba phyug pa nir mang ba longs spyod che ba/bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi thugs reg por gyur pa zhig gnas pa de dus
82b2('dul ba): gzhon zhig na gnyen zad nor zad 'byor pa zod par 'gyur ro//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bdud 'khor 'byung po bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug bcom nas bla na med pa'i ye shes
82b3('dul ba): brnyes pa de'i tshe/bram ze lha chung ma dang lhan cig grong khyer sde can du 'ongaso//bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnye so zhes thos nas/des chung ma la
82b4('dul ba): smras pa/bzang mo bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa'i ye shes brnyes te/'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rigasu 'khrungs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de da ni grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms
82b5('dul ba): lnga gshegs nas/bdag cig gis bcom ldan 'das de la bsod snyoms dbul du gang gi phyir bdag gi khyim na nyi ma gcig gi kha zas kyang med kyi/nges khyod gtar bcug
82b6('dul ba): ste/kar sha pa ni lnga zhig sbyin par blangaso//des smras pa/rje'i sras de bzhin du mdzod cig/bram ze lhas chung ma bram ze zhig la gtar bcug nas kar sha pa ni lnga
82b7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das bshis gsol ba'i phyir sbyin pa'i tshul du blangaso//de'i chung mas smras pa/rje'i sras dag ni byang chub sems dpas lan 'ga' yang dri ma can dang /gos ngan
83a1('dul ba): pa gyon pa ma gzigs//bram ze lhas khyim bdag cig las rgyan rnams brnyan nas chung ma la bskon no//de nas bram ze lha chung ma dang lhan cag gtsang
83a2('dul ba): zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bdag sta gron byas nas/bcom ldan 'das gong ni ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bac+doMs
83a3('dul ba): bdag gi ldum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lha la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas bcom ldan 'das
83a4('dul ba): bram ze lha'i bkad sa gang na ba de ro gshegs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas bram ze lhas bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs pa rigs nas chung
83a5('dul ba): me dang lhan cig tu gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' bo dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed//rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca
83a6('dul ba): bdag rang gi lag nas dastangs shing tshim par byas//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas phyag bcobs te lhung bzed gyur par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te
83a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze lha la yon sngo ba mdzad nas gshegs//de'i chung mas rgyan rnams
83b1('dul ba): phral te bzhag pa de ma byin par lon pas bdus zhes bram ze las thos nas sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar gyur te/'brog dgon pa zhig tu song nas de la rgyan sbyin du ga la
83b2('dul ba): yod gzhan byar med kyis bdag mchi'o snyam pa dang /ji tsam na me zhig gis dong bskos nas song ngo //bram ze lha ngo mtshar skyes nas de na ci yod re shig blta'o snyam pa
83b3('dul ba): las/ji tsam nu rgyan de mthong nas des rgyan de blangs te khyim du 'ong ngo //ji tsam na lha'i chung ma yang sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas gdungs nas khyim phyag dar byed pa na/'di
83b4('dul ba): lhar sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ji tsam nu gser gyi bum pa 'tsher bag can zhig mthong ngo //lhas de mA dris pa bzang mo 'o na ci yin/des smras
83b5('dul ba): pa/rjes spos bdag gis gser gyi bum pa zhig mthong ngo //des kyang sbas pa/bzang mo kho bos kyang rgyan de mthong ngo //de gnyis kyis lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das
83b6('dul ba): la dad pa bskyed do//de ltar mngon par dad pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de gnyis kyis ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad
83b7('dul ba): pa mdzad pas bram ze lha chung ma dang bcas te/'jigs tshogs le lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs po'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
84a1('dul ba): byaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i nub mo 'das nas snga dro na bza' sham thabs bsnams/lhung bzed dang chas gas bsnams te
84a2('dul ba): grong khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das grang khyer sde can du bsod snyoms la zhugs pa na/'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas
84a3('dul ba): grong khyer sde can der thog mar su zhig la chos bshad snyam pa las/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs
84a4('dul ba): me la thog mar chos bshad par bya ste/de dag gis nga sngon sdug bsngal spong ba'i rnal 'byor la rje suM brtson pas gnas pa na/'dis mar sar dang 'o thug sbrang rtsi
84a5('dul ba): ltar mngar bas bsnyen bkur byaso snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs ma'i khyim gang na ba der gshegaso//grong pa'i bu mo dga'
84a6('dul ba): mo dang /dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ched du gdan bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to//
84a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das tshur spyon/bcom ldan 'das byon pa lag so//bcom ldan 'das gdan+ma ba shams pa 'di nyid la bzhugasu gsol zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan
84b1('dul ba): 'dus gdanu ba shams pa de nyid la bzhugs//do nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang dgar stobs mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'du//
84b2('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag paro stan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug
84b3('dul ba): yang dag par gzeng bstodayang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi theg ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sbyin
84b4('dul ba): pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims kyi gtam dang /mtho ris kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung zhing nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang
84b5('dul ba): dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i rje su bsngags pa dang /rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi chos rgya cher bshad//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag dga'
84b6('dul ba): nga'i sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa'i dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal ba dang ldan pa dang yang dag phul gyi chos bshad na/shes par
84b7('dul ba): nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis yang dag phul gyi chos bshad pa gang yin pa 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /
85a1('dul ba): /zhu na/ na// du/ rdzudz+nyAnananan na na tu su smo na//
85a2('dul ba): tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin du btub pa de bzhin du//grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas stan de nyid la 'khod bzhin du/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi pa 'di
85a3('dul ba): sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byu dang /'gog pa dang /lam mngon par rtog so//de nas grong ba'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs mas chos mthong ba dang /chos thob paM dang
85a4('dul ba): chos rig pa dngachos kyi gti sbrengs pa dang /the tsam las rgal ba dang /su ma nyi las rgol ba dang /gzhan mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi dkri ba dang /
85a5('dul ba): pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di sa
85a6('dul ba): ces gsil to//btsun pa padag cag 'phag s+ho//myingon par 'dzugs//bdag rdeg bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skye su mchi lcags kyis/
85a7('dul ba): dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol//deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar dang srog dang yang bsngos te skyab su mchi bar mngon par dad lag so//de nas grong po'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga'
85b1('dul ba): stobs mas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa de'i slad du 'dir zhal zas kyi mdzad pa mdzad du gsol//bcom ldan 'das kyis phrong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga'
85b2('dul ba): stobs ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang dga' stobs mas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig cing /bcom ldan 'das bde
85b3('dul ba): bar bzhugs par rig nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba
85b4('dul ba): drag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin te phyag bcabs shing lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te/bac+doMs
85b5('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khod//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grong pa'i bu mo dga' mo dang /dga' stobs ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang
85b6('dul ba): dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par dga' bar mdzad nas gdan lngas bzhengs te gshegaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das grong khyer sde can nas
85b7('dul ba): gshegs pa na 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas yul ma ga d+ha 'dir ngang tshul bzang por bkur ba'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze gang zhig dang du byas na/de dbang du gyur par tshigs rdungs
86a1('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs chen po dbang du 'gyur ba su zhig yod snya mo//de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srungs ral bya can bcas nas lo bad+ma nyi shu lon bA rgas la/
86a2('dul ba): gtugs pa zhig yod pa de ma go d+ha'i mi rnams kyis bkur stir bya ba dang /bla mar bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mchod par bya bas dgra bcom par bekur cing /
86a3('dul ba): 'khar lnga brgya dang /ner na dza na'i chu klung gi 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub spyod do//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
86a4('dul ba): bcas nas l-i brgya nyi shu len pa rgas 'khogs gzugs pa 'di ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyis zhes bya ba nas dka' thub spyod do//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ni/ma la ngas
86a5('dul ba): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can dbang du byas te 'di dbang du gyur na tshogs chung ngus skye bo'i tshegs chen po dbang du 'gyur snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
86a6('dul ba): can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegaso//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyad ring po nas mthong //mthong na kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi che du gdan
86a7('dul ba): bshams nas 'di skad ces kyang gsal to//dge sbyong chen po chung spyon/dge sbyong chen po byon pa lag so//dge sbyong chen po yun ring po zhig lags na/gang nas
86b1('dul ba): 'khor te 'dir dbyon/dge sbyong chen po gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs shog ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//de nas
86b2('dul ba): lteng tshul 'od srung ral pa can dang /bcom ldan 'das lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' bar 'gyur ba dang /mgu bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs mdzad nas phyogs
86b3('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/'od srung gal te khyod la mi bde ba
86b4('dul ba): med na khyod kyi me khang du bzhag gcig cig 'dug/dge sbyong chen po bdag la mi bde ba ma mchis na 'on kyang de na klu gdug pa can zhig gnas te/des khyod tho btsams par
86b5('dul ba): 'gyur du mchi'o//'od srung khyod kyis re shig gnang bor gyis shig dang tho btsams par mi 'gyur//dge sbyong chen po gal te khyod la tho mi btsam na/dge sbyong chen po ci
86b6('dul ba): bde ba kho nar bzhugs shing //de nas bcom ldan 'das ltang rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas me khang gi phyi rol tu zhabs bsil nas me
86b7('dul ba): khang gi nang du zhugs te/nyid kyis rtswa gding ba bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/skyil mo dkrung bcas nas/dran pa mngon du phyogs par bzhag ste bzhug so//
87a1('dul ba): klu gdug pas bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang khras pa'i mthus dud pa phyung //bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi
87a2('dul ba): mthus dud pa phyung //klu gdug pas khro bo'i mthus 'bar bar byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang me'i khams la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas klu gdug pa khros pa'i mthu
87a3('dul ba): dang bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus me khang thams cad 'bar/rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur pas sreg par byed//steng
87a4('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung ral po can mtshan mo rgyu skar la lta ban me khang thams cad 'bar/rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar ste/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par mthong ngo //
87a5('dul ba): mthong na kya 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma chen po 'di ltar mdzes pa/klu gdug pas thal bar byas par ma gyur grang /kyi hud nyon mongs bdag gi tshig
87a6('dul ba): mnyan to/snyam mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/nga lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pacan 'khor dang bcas pas chas bcad kyis/ma lA ngas rdzu
87a7('dul ba): 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba la sems mnyam par gzhag na/mes klu gdugs pa'i mi zil gyis mnan 'das kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed cing de dul bar
87b1('dul ba): mkhyen nas/lhung bzed du bcug ste/ltang rgyas 'di spyang ral pa can de la sbyin pa de lta bu zhig bya'i snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon
87b2('dul ba): par 'du mdzad pa la thugs mnyam par gzhag na/mes klu gdug pa'i mes zil gyis mnan la des kyang de'i lus la gnod pa mi byed pa de lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad do de dul bar
87b3('dul ba): mkhyen nas lhung bzed du bcug ste/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der bsnams te gshegaso//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po
87b4('dul ba): nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gson pa lta zhig/'od spyad gson no//dge sbyong chen po khyod kyis lhung
87b5('dul ba): bzed nas bsnams te byon pa ci/'od srung klu gdugs pa gang gi mthus khyod kyi me khang du mir gyur pa rdzu 'phrul dang ma ldan pa gnasu mi ster ba dengs btul nos lhung bzed du bcug nas
87b6('dul ba): khyer te 'ongs//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan tsha mod kyi bdag kyang
87b7('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yino snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bsti gnas kyi nags tshong tshing na bzhug so//de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
88a1('dul ba): pa can gyi bsti gnas na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya nam me la yongasu spyod par re'i ma thabs gsum gsum ste ma thab stong lnga brgya yod do//de nas bram ze'i khye
88a2('dul ba): dernams me la yongasu spyod par 'dod na me de sbar bar ma nus//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/lteng rgyas 'od
88a3('dul ba): srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smraso//mkhan po mkhyen par mdzod cig/'dir bdag cag zhugs la yongasu spyod par 'tshal na zhugs de s+pharA rngo ma thogs lag so//de nas
88a4('dul ba): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas na de'i mthu zhig ma byung grang snya mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan
88a5('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen pa mkhyen par mdzad cig/'dir bdog gi bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam
88a6('dul ba): me la yongasu spyad par 'tshal na me de sbar bar rngo ma theg nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na de'i mthu zhig ma byung glang snyam bgyid//
88a7('dul ba): 'od srung me de spar bar 'dod dam/dge slong chen po spar du gsol//de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthu dang /lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus
88b1('dul ba): mI de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to//de nas stong rgyas 'od srung ram pa can 'di snyam du soms te//'di ltar dge sbyong chen pordzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba stan te/yu mtshan tshe mad
88b2('dul ba): badrug kyang dgu btsam pa sa na snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na/stong rgyas 'di sgyud ma pa can b+h+r-iH sgra gnas kyi nags chang tshing na bzhug so//de nas
88b3('dul ba): bram pa'i khye rnams mal yo su sma nas mngang da bar 'a'ad me sad par mdzus//de nas dam pa'i khye de rnams steng rgyus 'di sa la pa can gang na ba der dang ste ldas
88b4('dul ba): nas lteng rgyas 'di skyeng ral pa can pa 'di skad ces smras//mkhan po mkhyen par mdzad cig/'dir bdag ci gzugs la yongasu spyad nas/zhugs dgum par 'tshal na
88b5('dul ba): dgram po'i rngo ma thogs lagaso//de nas steng rgyas 'di srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/dge slong chen po bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa de'i mthu zhig mi byung grang snyam/
88b6('dul ba): de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rdul pa can bcom ldan zangs gang na bder song ste byin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mjed du
88b7('dul ba): 'dir bdag gi bram ze'i khye'u rnams zhugs la yongasu spyad nas/zhugs dgum par 'tshal na//dgum pa'i rngo ma thogs nas//bdag 'di snyam du sa mos te/bdags
89a1('dul ba): nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/de'i mthu zhig ma byung phrad snyam du bskyed do//'odi spyad med bsad dam/dge sbyo chen po dgum du gsol
89a2('dul ba): de nas 'di ltar sang+yas rnams kyi/sas rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus me de rang nyid zhi'o//de nas lhung rgyus 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems
89a3('dul ba): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu rgyu ba yin te/ye mtshan tshe mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snya mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das snying rgyus
89a4('dul ba): stong rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyib sti gnas kyi nags tshar tshing na 'azhugs//de nas dus gzhan zhig na/nga rgyas 'di srung ral bachen da nyid ma la yongasu spyod
89a5('dul ba): bar 'dod na spar bar ma nus//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du semasate/bdag gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyu
89a6('dul ba): brang snyam mo//de nas ltung rgyus 'di srung mam ban+dan/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong
89a7('dul ba): chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongasu spyod par 'tshal na spar bar rngo ma thogs nas/bdag nyid 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi nyil khar
89b1('dul ba): na/dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang snyam bgyid//'od srung mede sbar bar 'dod dam/dge sbyong chen po spar du gsol/de nas 'di ltar
89b2('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyis mthu dang /lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus me de rang nyid 'bar bar gyur to//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/
89b3('dul ba): 'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yi no snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyus na
89b4('dul ba): s+yAng rgyus 'o'adadi srung ras pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags rgyang tshing na bzhugaso//de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyas 'od snang ram pas ni rang nyid me le yongasu spya na ming dgas
89b5('dul ba): par 'dod na gsad par ma nuso//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral ba can 'di snyam du sems te/bad shi gnyi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na/de'i mtho zhig byung bar ma
89b6('dul ba): gyur grang snga mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral po can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to//dge sbyong chen po
89b7('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/'dir bdag nyid zhugs la yongasu spyad nas zhugs dgum par 'tshal na/dgum par rngo ma thog lags/bdag 'di snyam du sems te/
90a1('dul ba): bdag gi nyi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur glang sgyum babyed//drang srong ma de gas nga ma dge sbyong chen po dgul du
90a2('dul ba): gsol/de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyi lha'i mthus ma de rang nyid shi'o//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du
90a3('dul ba): sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/yo mtshan che mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin snya mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng
90a4('dul ba): rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral po can gyi bsti gnas kyi nag tshang tshing na bzhug so//de nas dus gzhan zhig na lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can gyi me khang thams cad 'bar rab tu
90a5('dul ba): 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas/sreg par byed pa de la lteng rgyas 'od srung ral can 'khor dang bcas pa dang /gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen
90a6('dul ba): rnams kyis bsgrims kyang gsang ma nus//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rol pa can 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi nyi 'khor na dge sbyong chen po gnas na//de'i mthu
90a7('dul ba): zhi byung bar ma gyur grang snya mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
90b1('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/dge sbyong chen po 'dir bdag gis mo khang thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar to mo lho gcig tu gyur nas sreg
90b2('dul ba): bair+ya bgying ba de la byedag 'khor dang bcas pa dang smozhan yang skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bsgrims na zhugs dgum par rngom thogs nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag
90b3('dul ba): gi nye 'khor na dge sbyong chen po bzhugs na/de'i mthu zhig byung bar ma gyur grang sgyu ma bgyid do//'od srung me khang zhi bar bya 'am/dge sbyong chen po zhi bar mdzad du gsol
90b4('dul ba): de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /lha rnams kyis lha'i mthus me khang de rang nyid zhi bar gyur to//de nas lteng rgyus 'od srung ral pa can 'di
90b5('dul ba): snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che ni mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshon che ba yin mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin ste mo//
90b6('dul ba): 'dul bya gzhi/bam pa gyi brgyad pa/denas bcom ldan 'das steng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags chang tshing na bzhug so//de nas rgyal po
90b7('dul ba): chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan ma la bab ba na/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste/lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/
91a1('dul ba): de rnams dper na mo'i phung po'i'abar bcu 'bar/kun du cu 'bar te me gcig tu gyur nas srog par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i sus rgyags cag tu na
91a2('dul ba): lteng rgyas 'od srung ral patsan de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyuskar rnams la ltas na/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan stan/me'i phung po 'barab tu 'byur /kun tu rab tu 'drar/rmi
91a3('dul ba): tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongasu spyod/'di ltar de'i sprin sngun me'i phung po 'bar/rab
91a4('dul ba): tsu'i bir/kun tu ba tu 'dur te ma lce gcig tu gyur nas/sgeg par byed pa can yang mam//de nas sted rgyas 'di sbyang sa btsun nung par ste la te/bcom
91a5('dul ba): ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol 'dir mdang sum bdag rgyu skar rnams
91a6('dul ba): le lnga ba na dge sbyong chen pa'i smon snga nas thugs kyi phung po'i bar NA makun tu rab tu 'bar te mi lce gcig tu gyur te/sreg par byed pa bzhi mthong //mthong nas kyang bdag 'di sa du
91a7('dul ba): sems te/dge sbyong chen po yeng me la yongasu spyod de/'di ltar de'i spyan snga nas mo'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg
91b1('dul ba): bgyid pa bzhi mchis snyamo//'od srung cing me la yongasu spyod dam/nga me la yongasu mi spyod de/de lta mod kyi 'dir ma dang sum rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag kha dog 'phags pas mtshan/
91b2('dul ba): mo la bab pa ni gang na baM der 'ongs te lhags nas/nga'o zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/de rnams dper na mo'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun du rab tu 'bar te
91b3('dul ba): me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa bzhi lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin no//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge
91b4('dul ba): sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mchen cha mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yino snyamo//de nas bcas lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas
91b5('dul ba): kyi nags tshang tshong na bzhugaso//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/btsam
91b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/de dper nu me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur pa bzhi po de dag pas kyang
91b7('dul ba): ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches 'azang ba lta bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'dug steng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/bcom ldan
92a1('dul ba): 'das kyi spyan sngun me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me skye gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas
92a2('dul ba): kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongasu spyod/'di ltar de'i mdun na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig
92a3('dul ba): tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhig yod snyamo//de nas lteng rgyas 'ad srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan
92a4('dul ba): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/'dir bdag ma dang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na dge sbyong chen po'i spyan snga na zhugs kyi phung
92a5('dul ba): po 'bar rab tu 'bar kun tu rab tu 'bor te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mthong //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen
92a6('dul ba): po yang me la yongasu spyod de 'di ltar de'i spyan snga na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchis//snyam
92a7('dul ba): 'od srung cing me la yongasu spyod dom/nga mi la yongasu mi spyod de/de lta mod kyi 'dir ma dang sum lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bcwa
92b1('dul ba): pa na gang na ba der 'ongs te/phyin nas nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg
92b2('dul ba): par byed pa bzhi po de dag pas chos kyang lhag cing ches 'phags la ches bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyi phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa yin//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du
92b3('dul ba): sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mchen tsho mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yino snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas
92b4('dul ba): na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhug so//de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab pa na bcom ldan 'das
92b5('dul ba): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/de dper na me'i phung po bzhi po de dag nyid snga ma bzhin du sreg pa zhes bya ba nas/
92b6('dul ba): me'i phung po chen po lnga pa de me lce gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed//zhes bya ba'i bor de dag pas kyang tshes lhag cing ches 'phags la chos bzang ba lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs gcig
92b7('dul ba): tu 'du'o//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can de nyid kyi mtshan mo rgyu skar rnams la lta ba ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na me'i phung po chen po 'bar rab tu 'bar zhes bya ba nas
93a1('dul ba): sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i da zhig mdzong ngo //mdzad nas kyang de 'di samya du sams te/dge sbyong chen po yang me la yongasu spyod de/'di ltar du
93a2('dul ba): mdun du me'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa'i bar zhig yod snya mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nang par sngar langs nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
93a3('dul ba): so ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzod gso 'dir bdag ma dang sum rgyu skar rnams la lta ba na/dge sbyong chen po'i spyan
93a4('dul ba): snun zhugs kyi phung po 'ber ba zhes bya ba nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'o bar zhig mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po yong me la mongasu
93a5('dul ba): spyod de/'di ltar de'i spyan sngan mo'i phung po chen po 'bong rab tu 'bor/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me gcig tu gyur nas sreg par bgyid pa zhig mchi so sta mo//'od srung
93a6('dul ba): tsid me la yongasu spyod domi/dA me la yongasu mi spyod de/de lta mod kyi 'dor mngang sum mi mjed kyi bdag po chings pa kha dog 'phags pas mtshan mo la bab ban dag na
93a7('dul ba): bder 'ongs te phyin nas/nga'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/de dper na me'i phung po 'bar rab tu 'bar ba bzhi po de dag nas snga ma bzhin du me'i phung po chen po lnga pa
93b1('dul ba): de 'bar ba nas me lho gcig tu gyur nas sreg par byed pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de dag pas kyang ches lhag cing ches 'phags la ches blta pa lta bu'i lus kyis phyogs
93b2('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug pa yin no//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung rol pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po go'u t+ya ma ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/
93b3('dul ba): mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nag tshang tshing na bzhug so//
93b4('dul ba): de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas ni mchod sbyin zhag bdun pa byed pa la thob bo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pacun 'di snyam du sems te/gal te ma ga
93b5('dul ba): d+ha'i mi rnams kyi dge sbyong chen po 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che 'di ltar mthu che ba yin por shes na de nyid la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de ltar ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod kyis/
93b6('dul ba): kye ma dge sbyong chen po zhog bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang ci ma rung snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen pas zhag
93b7('dul ba): bdun gzhon du gzhung//de'i tshe zhag bdun du lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la rnyed pa dang /bkur sti chen po byung bas/bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan skye bo'i
94a1('dul ba): tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur to//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin de zhag bdun du byas zin nas 'di snyam du sems
94a2('dul ba): 'dir bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po dang yang ldan te/skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/
94a3('dul ba): kye ma da ni dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung /bdag gis de yang de la longs spyad du gzhugo snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyi lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems
94a4('dul ba): mkhyen nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na ba der gsheg so//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bac+doMs//
94a5('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po byon tam/'od srung 'ongs//dge sbyong chen po khyod ci'i slad du zhig bdun 'di nas gzhan du gzhung lags/'od srung khyod
94a6('dul ba): kyi 'dug gnas na mchod sbyin zhag bdun du byed pa la bcu nas 'dri snyam du gal te ma ga d+ha'i mo rnams kyis dge sbyong chen po ni 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba/'di ltar mthu che ba yin par
94a7('dul ba): shes na de kho na la bya ba byed par sems kyi bdag la ni de lta ma yin pa'i gnas 'di yod par 'gyur gyisakye ma dge sbyong chen po zhag bdun zhig 'di nas gzhan du song yang
94b1('dul ba): tsom rung snyam du sems pa ma yin nam/nga'i thugs kyi khyod kyi sems shes nas zhag bdun 'di nas gzhan du song ngo //'o na ci'i sla 'dir byon lags/'od srung khyod kyi mchod sbyin zhag
94b2('dul ba): bdun du byas zin nas/'di snyam du bdag la zhag bdun du rnyed pa dang /bkur sti chen po byung zhing bza' ba dang bca' ba rab tu mang po ldan/skye bo'i tshogs chen po yang dbang du gyur gyis/
94b3('dul ba): kye ma dge sbyong chen po 'ongs kyang ci ma rung bdag gis de yang de la yongasu longs spyod du gzhug snyam sems pa ma yin nam/dge sbyong chen po de lta lagaso//dri'i thugs kyis khyod kyi sems
94b4('dul ba): shes na song 'ongs pa yin no//dge sbyong chen po ci bde kho nar longs spyad du gsol/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu
94b5('dul ba): 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyis bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no//snya mo de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas
94b6('dul ba): kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhugaso//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po de'i slad du bdag gi nye 'khor du bzhugs
94b7('dul ba): shig dang bdag gis/khyod la chos dang 'thun pa'i 'tsho ba sbyararo//bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa zla tsang mi gsung pos gnang ngo //de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
95a1('dul ba): can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi ched du rang kho nas g.yos byas nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na bdar skyong ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'did ces
95a2('dul ba): gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gdugs tshod lags shing mchis na/dge sbyong chen po da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol//'od srung de'i phyir seng shig/nga yang
95a3('dul ba): 'ong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen nas/ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag ni shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis
95a4('dul ba): dzamagu'i gling du gdags pa de las kha dog dang /dri dang /ro dang ldan pa'i dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis
95a5('dul ba): bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa
95a6('dul ba): can 'ongs nas ldeng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bsti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad ces gsol
95a7('dul ba): to/dge sbyong chen po byon tam/'od srung 'ongs//dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis/'dir ngas 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen
95b1('dul ba): nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/shing 'dzam bu zhes bya ba gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du bdags pa de las kha dog dang /dri dang /ro dang ldan pa'i 'dzam bu'i snye ma rnams kyis
95b2('dul ba): lhung bzed bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/dge slong chen po ci bde kho nar 'tshal yag so//de nas lteng rgyas
95b3('dul ba): 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin to/ya mtshan cho mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yino snyam mo//
95b4('dul ba): 'dzam bu'i snye ma ji lta bar skyu ru ra'i snye ma rnams kyang de bzhi no//byang gi sgro ma snyan gyi gling du gshegs nas/marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'brus lhung bzed bkang ste
95b5('dul ba): bsnams nas/lteng rgyas 'od srang ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na pa der gshegs te byon nas gang na bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas de'i 'og tu lteng rgyas 'od srung
95b6('dul ba): ral par na 'ongs nas/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa tsan gyis bcom ldan 'das ba sti gnas kyi gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di skad
