95b7('dul ba): ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po byon tam/'od srungs 'ongs//dge sbyong chen po khyod kyi lhung bzed na ci mchis 'dirangs 'od srung khyod song nas ring po ma lon par mkhyen
96a1('dul ba): nas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling drug shegs nas/marmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa la'i 'dus lhung bzed
96a2('dul ba): bkang nas 'dir phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kyis//gal te 'dod na longs spyod cig/dge sbyong chen po ci bde khyi nar 'tshal lags//de
96a3('dul ba): nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra bcom pa
96a4('dul ba): yiyon snyam//de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gan sugashegs nas lha'i bdud rtsis lhung bzed bkang nas bsnams te zhes brjod par bya'o//
96a5('dul ba): denas bcom ldan 'das ltung rgyus na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags cheng tshing na bzhugaso//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pi can gyis bcom ldan 'das
96a6('dul ba): kyis ched du rang nyid kyis g.yos byas nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gdugs
96a7('dul ba): tshad lags shing mchis ni/dge sbyong chen po de de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsal/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dran bza' sham thabs mnabs skyong bzed dang
96b1('dul ba): chos gos bsnams te/ltung rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugasaso//de nas lteng rgyus 'od smyung
96b2('dul ba): ral pa can gyis bcom ldan 'das bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' bosra lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lteng rgyas 'di
96b3('dul ba): srung ral pa can las bsod snyoms bzhes nas/phyogs gzhan zhig tu bzhugs nas zhal zas kyi bya ba mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo //
96b4('dul ba): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
96b5('dul ba): sngar lag pas sa la bsnun pa dang /de nas bkod ma chen po zhig byung ste chu 'bab pa de la bcom ldan 'das kyis chus chu'i bya ba mdzad//lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi
96b6('dul ba): bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/bkod ma chen po byung ste/chu 'bab pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/chu 'di sngon ni med na chu 'di da lta gang nas bab
96b7('dul ba): snyam/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par
97a1('dul ba): mdzad du gsol/bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na bkod ma chen po'i chab cig mthong //mthong nas kyang bdag 'di snyam du sems/chu
97a2('dul ba): 'di sngon ni ma mchis na/da ltar chu 'di gang nas bab snyam du bgyid do//'od srung 'dir khyod las nges bsod snyoms bzhes nas phyogs 'drir bzhugs te/zhal zas
97a3('dul ba): kyi bya ba mdzad pa na/nga la chus chu'i dgos pa zhig byung ngo //de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis nga la chus chu'i dgos pa byung bar shes nas phyogs 'dir lag
97a4('dul ba): pas la bsnun pa las/de ltar bkod ma chen po byung ba de la ngas chus chu'i bya ba mdzad de/'od srung rdzing 'di lag pas brkos pa zhes bya'o//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung
97a5('dul ba): ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/ya mtshan che mod kyi bdag kyang dgra btsom pa yi no snya mo//de nas btsam
97a6('dul ba): ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das phye ma reng nang du yang dag 'dzeg las bzhengs nas/
97a7('dul ba): rdzing lag pas bskos pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig tu na bza' chos gos rnams bzhag ste/rdzing lag pas
97b1('dul ba): brkos par bzhugs nas sku khrus mdzad nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa nas 'byung bar bzhed pa nA/shing ar+d+ha na gang na ba de logs phyug btung //de nas ardzu na'i yal ga chen po dung
97b2('dul ba): bar gyur te/de la bcom ldan 'das kyis brgyung nas hU~Mng lag pas brkos pa nas byung //lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas na 'chag pa na/rdzing lag pas brkos
97b3('dul ba): pa'i 'gram na ar+dz+nyA na'i yal ga chen po 'dud bzhog mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ar+dz+nyA na'i yal gi 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur na/a d+h+yA na'i yul
97b4('dul ba): ga chen po 'ang su zhog gis btung snya mo//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
97b5('dul ba): to//dge sbyong chen po mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/bdag 'dir bsti gnas na 'chag pa na rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram na a b+h+yA na'i yal ga chen po 'dud pa mthong ngo //
97b6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ar+t+ti ne'i yal ga chen po 'di sngon ni 'dud par ma gyur nA/de 'di su zhig gis btud snyam bgyid do//'od srung nga 'dir phye ma reng nang du
97b7('dul ba): yang dag 'jog la bzhengs nas rdzing lag pas brkos pa gang na bder gshegs te byin nas /rdzing lag pas brkos pa'i 'gram gyi mtha' gcig nan bze'i chos gos rnams bzhan
98a1('dul ba): !/rdzing lagAbs brkos par zhugs te/lus khrus byas nas rdzing lag byas brkos pa nas 'byung bar spyod nas shi sa rdzun di na nga can du/
98a2('dul ba): lag pa babyung ba dang /de nas ar+d+ha nA'i yal gyi chen po 'di 'dud par rgyu /de ltang 'jus nas rdzing lag byas brkos pa nas byung ngo //'od srung shing 'di ni a rdzun la ni
98a3('dul ba): bas bzung bar dbya zhes bya'o//de nas snying rgyas 'od snang ral btsun 'di snyam du sems te/'di sbyar dge slong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/yu mchin
98a4('dul ba): myod kyi/'dog kyang dag bcom pa yinan ma//de nas bcom ldan 'das snyed rgyas na skyed rgyusgra 'di skye ma pa can gyi pos ga nas kyi nags tshang cheng na bzhug so//
98a5('dul ba): ma ldan 'das kyis d+h+ya zla dang ShU d+h+ri shAn+da'i drug brgyas nas/de nas ma ldan 'das nyid m+b+ha du dag /d+ha dang smod pa'i shin sa ga du
98a6('dul ba): de nas skye rnams kyis dbang po bad+ma byin gyis sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs bya shes nas ri drug cig lus rdo lob che lha ring po zhig blangs nas bcom ldan 'das gan
98a7('dul ba): ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ras dag 'di le bkru bar gsol/de la brjod
98b1('dul ba): /d+hA sa nusas sa//donas sa snan sa da sgyum du tshus rgyun rnams gang dang gas sgyum pad/don
98b2('dul ba): sbyi sa ba tu phyin gyi snyoms kyi mam ldan das su kyis pa shes /ga sa tsug byed ldan sa ga na
98b3('dul ba): dor t+ta sbyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//com ldan 'as 'di la phyag da khyod pani shan 'i sa rnams dgam d+ma gsol/de la bcom ldan
98b4('dul ba): du sems 'di ga napa snyeng sa 'a tshul chen bcom ldan 'das gdun bder song su phyin dus/ma
98b5('dul ba): 'das kyi 'di spyad ces gso to/dge sbyong chen po mkhyen pa 'dun //'di ba sh-ib sta glan sa na 'jug ste rdol la nga ba dag tsog mang
98b6('dul ba): nga nas kyang 'di snyam dus / sa 'di den tsunan nas mchis
99a1('dul ba): 'dir ngas phyug dar khrod paTI shanaSh+Ti ras dag gcig brnyeso//de nas nga 'di snyam du go swA te/phyug dar khrod pa'i shan+da'i sa gad du bkyu snyam pa dang /
99a2('dul ba): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa shes nas brag cig las rdo le'i che la ring ba zhig blangs te/nga gad na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas ngal 'di
99a3('dul ba): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ris rnams bkru bar gsol/ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i shwa na'i ras rnams bkru so//
99a4('dul ba): 'di snyam du dgongs te/ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha nu'i ras rnams gang du dgram snyam pa dang /de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis sems kyis nga'i dgongs pa
99a5('dul ba): shes nas/brag cig las rdo le bo che la ring ba gzhan zhig blangs te/nga gang na ba der 'ongs te phyin nas/nga la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
99a6('dul ba): 'dir phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i ris rnams dgram du gsol//ngas de la phyag dar khrod pa'i sha na'i rAsra rnams pak+ka/mo//'od srung rdo leb tshe zhing rnying ba 'di dag ni gnod
99a7('dul ba): sprin gyis blangs pa zhes bya ba/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin te/yi
99b1('dul ba): mtshun che mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom pa yin no snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das lteng rgyas na lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi bsti gnas kyi nags tshang tshing na bzhug so//
99b2('dul ba): de'i tshe ne ran dza na chu cher brug nas be'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das chu klung mi gang pas lhag pas khengs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa la 'chag pas 'chag
99b3('dul ba): par mdzad//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/dge sbyong chen po de ltar mdzes pa chu chen po drug pas khyer bar ma gyur grang /ma la bdag gis
99b4('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po btsalo snyam du bsams nas/shing gcig pa'i gru'i nang du zhugs to/bcom ldan 'das btsal ba na/lteng rgyas na 'od srung ral pa can gyis bcom ldan
99b5('dul ba): 'daso chu klung mi gang bas lhag par khengs pa'i steng nas rdul gyis yog pa bla gab med pa na/'chag pas 'chag par mthong /mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
99b6('dul ba): ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po gson nam/'od srung gson no//dge sbyong chen po zhugs shing gcig pa'i grur 'jug gam/'od srung 'jug/de nas bcom
99b7('dul ba): ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/ma la ngas ji ltar thugs mnyam par bzhag na shing gcig po'i gru ji lta bar chu la 'jug pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'du bya'o//
100a1('dul ba): snyas nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis desgra thugs mnyam par gzhagan shing gtsug pa'i d+hU sgyu bar rdul 'dun da t+ta d+d+ha dru
100a2('dul ba): mngon par 'du badzad//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar dge sbyong chen po rdzu 'phrul tshwa zhing mthu che ba yin teya mir+g+han
100a3('dul ba): mod kyi/bdag kyang dgra bcom po yi no snya mo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi sems mkhyen nas/lteng rgyas 'od srung
100a4('dul ba): ral pa can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'od srung khyod ni dgra bcom pa ma yin/drugra bcomo pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa mi yin to//
100a5('dul ba): gla com pa'i 'i mig yin pade yang ma shes/denas spyod rnaMs 'od byung smras can 'dusnyam du semasadagen pag gyi'i thugs kyis bdag
100a6('dul ba): sems mkhyen to snyam du rigs nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po bdag legs pa gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu'i
100a7('dul ba): ba dang /bosten par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngor bdag tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//'od srung khyod kyis 'khor
100b1('dul ba): bltas sam/dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lag so//'od srung de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltas shig/'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi grags pa dang ldan pa shes nyen can rnams
100b2('dul ba): kyis ni 'khor la bltas po legs pa yin no//de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ril pa can rang gi bsti gnas gang yin pa der song ste phyin nas/bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa/
100b3('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u dag shis par gyis shig/bram ze'i khye'u dgo kho bo ni dge slong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/shes ldan dag ci byed mkhan pa bdag cag gis cung
100b4('dul ba): zo ci 'tshul bde thams cad ni mkhan po lta brten nas lags dus/ga ti mkhan pa don skyong chen po'i spyan su tshangs par spyad pe spyod na/bdag cag kyang mkhan por
100b5('dul ba): byung ba'i rjesu rab tu 'byu //bram b+he 'i rlung gi khyod kyis de'i phyir gsung na na na shun dang /kha re ba dang /rima'i spyi blugs dang /krugs gzar 'di dag chu
100b6('dul ba): klung ne ran dze na'i nang du'or cig mkhan po bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis g.yang gzhi dang /shing shun dang /khor ba dang /ril ba spyi blugs dang /
100b7('dul ba): kluglags gzar rnams chu klung ne ran dza na'i nang du bor nas/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gang na der song ste phyin nas/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so//
101a1('dul ba): mkhan po 'di ltar bdag cag gis bgyi ba gang la bde ba kyi la'o/de nas lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can 'khor lnga brgya dang /bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song
101a2('dul ba): ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po bdag gis 'khor la bltas lags te//bdag legs par gsungs pa'i ches 'dul ba
101a3('dul ba): la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//'od srung tshur shog tshangs
101a4('dul ba): par spyad pa spyod cig/de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de dag rab tu byung ba dang /des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to//de'i tshe lteng rgyas 'od srung ral
101a5('dul ba): pa can gyi spun chu klung 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung gnyis 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /chu klung ne ran dza na'i 'jug go 'gram gyi bsti gnas na dka' thub smod do//chu
101a6('dul ba): klung 'od srung dang /ga yaM 'od srung spun gyis g.yeng gzhi dang /shing shun dang khar ba dang /rol pa spyi blugs dang /klugs gzar de dag chu klung na ra na dzi na nas khyer bar
101a7('dul ba): mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de dag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams rgyal po'am/chom du ni nam/me 'am/chus nyes
101b1('dul ba): dmigs 'ga' zhig byung bar ma gyur grang /ma la bdag cag gis tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams btsa lo snya mo//de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung spun dag lteng
101b2('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung ral pa can tshol zhing /lteng rgyas 'od srung ngal pa can gyi bsti gnas gang na ba der dong ba dang /de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'di srung ral pa can sgra byi snam sbyar bgos
101b3('dul ba): nas 'khor lnga brgya dang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dir 'khodado//chu klung 'od srung dang ga ya 'od srung spun gyis lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can ske byi snum sbyar 'gos
101b4('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos mnyen pa'i phyir 'dug pa mthong //mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras//'od srung ral
101b5('dul ba): pa can 'di ni mchog yin la/de mchog ma yin nam/'od srung dag 'di ni mchog yin te de ni ma yin no//de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung spun dag 'di snyam
101b6('dul ba): du sems te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin zhing chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/gang gi phyir da ltar lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
101b7('dul ba): btsas nas lo brgya nyi shu lhag lon pa rgas 'khogs gtugs pa/ma ga d+ha'i mi rnams kyi bkur sti byas/bla mar byas rjod par byas mchod par byas shing /dgra bcom par
102a1('dul ba): bkur ba de yang lan gnyis kyi bar du dag sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar rab tu 'byung bar las byungs kyis/ma la bdag cag kyang dge sbyong chen po'i smra
102a2('dul ba): sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bya'o snyam du bsam nas/bcom ldan 'ongs la 'di skad ces gsal to//dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul
102a3('dul ba): bal rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na/bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//khyed
102a4('dul ba): kyis 'khor la bltas sam/dge sbyong chen po ma bltas lag so//'od srung dag de'i phyir re shig 'khor la ltos shog/'di ltar khyod lta bu'i mi glags pa dang ldan
102a5('dul ba): pashes nyon can dag gis ni 'khor la lta ba legs pa yino//de nas chu klung 'od srung dang /gA ya 'od srung spyan rang hrI bsti gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
102a6('dul ba): bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//bram ze'i khye'u rnams la 'di skad ces smras//bram ze'i khye'u dag shes par gyis shig/kho bo cag ni dge sbyong chen
102a7('dul ba): po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod na/shes ldan dag ji byed mkhan po dag bdag cung zad ci 'tshal ba de thams cad ni mkhan po dag la brten nas lags kyis//gal
102b1('dul ba): mkhan po dag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/bdag cag kyang mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i rjesu rab tu 'byung //bram ze'i khye'u dag de'i dus de yin par shes
102b2('dul ba): par gyis shig/de nas chu klung 'od srung dang go ya 'od srung spun gnyis 'khor gnyis brgya lnga bcu dag/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhags nas/bac+doMs
102b3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol to//dge sbyong chen po bdag cag gis 'khor la bltas lags te/dge sbyong chen po bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
102b4('dul ba): tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob pa lta na bdag cag dge sbyong chen po'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//'od srung dag tshur
102b5('dul ba): shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig/de nyid kyis tshe dang ldan pa de rnams rab tu byung ba dang des bsnyen par rdzogs pa dang /des dge slong gi dngos por gyur to//de nas bco
102b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis ral pa can stong po de rab tu byung //bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad nas lteng rgya su ji tsam bzhed kyi bar du bzhugs nas/ga ya gang na ba der rgyu zhing gshegs
102b7('dul ba): te/rim gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ga yar byon nas/ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten na sngon gyi ril pa can thams cad rab tu byung ba'i dge slong ste nga dang thabs
103a1('dul ba): gcig tu bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong stong po de la/rdzu 'phrul rnam pa gsum gyis 'doms par mdzad de/rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
103a2('dul ba): dang /kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul dang /rje su bsten pa'i cho 'dre'o//de la bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul 'di yin te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
103a3('dul ba): ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/nyid kyis gdan gyi nang du mi snang bar gyur cing /sher phyogs kyi stong gi bar snang la ston par 'phags nas/spyod lam rnam pa bzhi mdzad/
103a4('dul ba): 'di lta ste/'chag pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal bar mdzad do//me'i ting 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzod/me'i ting 'dzin
103a5('dul ba): la snyoms par zhugs pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad/'di lta ste sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar
103a6('dul ba): bo dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog slo/cho 'phrul zung dri yang ston par mdzodzad/sku'i smad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/sgra'i stong nas chu grang mo'i
103a7('dul ba): rgyun 'bebs par mdzad//sku'i stong na 'bar bar mdzad la sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs//shar phyogs ji ste
103b1('dul ba): babazhin du lho dang /nub dang /byung phyogasu 'dad bzhin//phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa rnams bsdus te/dge slong ga dran/
103b2('dul ba): 'dun gyi grong la gdan po shams pa ny-id la bzhugs te/do la 'di ni bcom sbyin 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul yin ni//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i tshe 'phrul ni 'di
103b3('dul ba): yinatAM/dge slong dag khyod kyi sems ni 'di lta bu'o//khyed kyis yid ni 'di lta bu'o//rnam par shes pa ni 'di lta bu'o//'di ni rtogs shig/'di ni ma rtogs shig
103b4('dul ba): 'dri ni yid la byos shig/'di ni yid la ma pyod cig/'di ni spyos shig/'di ni ma spangs shig/'di ni lus kyis mngon sum du byas la rdzogs par gyis te gnas shig/
103b5('dul ba): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi kun brjod pa'i tshe phyul yin//de la bcom ldan 'das kyi rjesu bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul ni 'di yin te/dge slong dag 'di thams cad ni kun tu 'bar ba yin/
103b6('dul ba): dge slong dag thams cad kun tu 'bar ba de ci yin zhenadage slong dag mig dang gzugs dang /mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /mig gi 'dus te reg pa kun tu 'bar ba yin ning
103b7('dul ba): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang mi tshor ba bde ba'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar
104a1('dul ba): ba yin no//dge slong dag rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus dang /yid dang /chos dang /yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /yid
104a2('dul ba): kyi 'dus te reg pa ni kun tu 'bar ba yin zhing /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis nang gi tshor ba bde ba'am/sdug bsngal ba'am/bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal
104a3('dul ba): pab yang ma yin pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de yang kun tu 'bar ba yin no//gang gis kun tu 'bar zhe na/'dod chags kyi mi dang /zhe sdang gi me dang /gti mugi mis kun tu
104a4('dul ba): 'bar/skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'brug pa ste/
104a5('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyi kun tu 'bar ba'o zhes smra'o//de la 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rjesu bstan pa'i cho 'phrul yin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/sngon thams cad
104a6('dul ba): ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong de rnams len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//de nas bcom ldan 'das ga ya na ga ya'i mgo'i mchod rten lha sngon thaMd
104a7('dul ba): ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor pa/rang gi don rje su thob pa/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba
104b1('dul ba): yongasu zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso//rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba'i
104b2('dul ba): mi rnams ljongs rgyu ba na/shAkya rnams kyi gzhonu grangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing D+ha'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang ma ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze
104b3('dul ba): mtshan mkhan de ltas mkhanan kyis gal te khyim par gyur te/khyim nu gnas ni 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba'i
104b4('dul ba): rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur te//de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di lta bu dag yin par 'gyur//'di lta ste/'khor lo rin po che dang /glang po rin po che
104b5('dul ba): dang /rta rin po che dang /nor bu rin po che dang /bud med rin po che de khyim bdag rin po che dang /bdun pa blon po rin po che yin no//de la bu stong yang ched
104b6('dul ba): bar 'byung bar 'gyur te/dpa' bo brtul phod pa/yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/pha rol gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa/de rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa chen po
104b7('dul ba): ma lus par gnod par sngo ba med cing 'tshe ba med pa 'di nyid chad pa med cing mtshon gyis mda' ba med la chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms las legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyuraro//
105a1('dul ba): gal te sgra dang kha spu bregs te/gos drur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur na de bzhin gshegs
105a2('dul ba): ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan to zhes thos//thos nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs
105a3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/mo bA d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ce smraso//lha mkhyen par mdzad gsol/bdag cag 'dor lha'i yul ni rgyu
105a4('dul ba): na shAkya rnams kyi gzhonu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skra ldan shing rta 'gram drang srong ser skyo'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang ltas mkhan rnams kyis gi
105a5('dul ba): te khyim par gyur te khyim na gnas na/'khor la bsgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' bzhir rnor rgyal ba zhes bya ba nas bdun pa blon po rin po cher 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//de la bu stong yang tshang bar
105a6('dul ba): 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba nas chos dang mthun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas por 'gyuraro//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//gul te sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur
105a7('dul ba): smig bgos nas zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur bar lung bstan pa zhig thos zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du//ste de 'u shig lte bus gci bis chos gtso bor
105b1('dul ba): du mchi'o//grong pa dag shAkya rnams kyi gzhonu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram drang srong ser skya'i bsti gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i gong ma bzhin du
105b2('dul ba): ste/gal te khyim par gyur te/khyim na gnas na/'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ni chos dang 'thun zhing snyoms par legs par phab ste gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar
105b3('dul ba): gong ma bzhin du'o//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur nas/de bzhin gshegs pa
105b4('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasu 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyur ba de lha khum shig/lha bas gtso bo bas ches gtso bor gyur du mchi'o zhes khyed cag
105b5('dul ba): de skad ma smra shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/grong po dag shAkya rnams kyi gzho nu zhes bya ba nas byung ba zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/gal te 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na
105b6('dul ba): de'i g.yog bya'o//gal te skra dang kha spu bregs te/ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar gyur te/dri bzhin gshegs pa
105b7('dul ba): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya su 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par gyur na/de'i nyan thos khas blang bar bya'o//de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can
106a1('dul ba): can snying po steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/smon pa'i gzhi lnga smyon par byed de/kye ma bdag gis yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin ga
106a2('dul ba): bapa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi
106a3('dul ba): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang /de la yang blta ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /nye bar song ba na ngas kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang
106a4('dul ba): bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa na/bdag gis chos shes nas bslab pa bcas shing /bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te bcas kyang ci ma rung snyamo//de nas bac+doMs
106a5('dul ba): kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po de/steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/smon pa'i gzhi lnga
106a6('dul ba): smon par byed de/kye ma'o bdag gi yul du 'jig rten gyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde
106a7('dul ba): bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung ba dang /de la yang blta
106b1('dul ba): ba'i phyir bdag nye bar 'gro ba dang /nye bar song ba na/des kyang bdag la chos bshad pa dang /bdag gis kyang chos bshad pa de shes pa dang /bdag gis chos shes nas bslab/
106b2('dul ba): pabacos shing /bslab pa de yang bdag gis blangs te gnas kyang ci ma rung sa mo//ma g+ha ta rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po'i zho shas 'tsho ba dag cig ljongs rgyu ba na
106b3('dul ba): shAkya rnams kyi gzho nu gangs ri'i ngos chu bo skal ldan shing rta'i 'gram grong khyer ser skya'i/ste gnas dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu byung ba gang yin pa de bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /
106b4('dul ba): ltas mkhan zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags par 'gyu ro zhes lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//de skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas
106b5('dul ba): rad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nA khyim med pa rab tu byung ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas da~M ga ya na ga ya'i 'gro'i mchod rten
106b6('dul ba): la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stang thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/bdag gi don rje su thob
106b7('dul ba): ba/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol kho sho stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugaso zhes tho so//thos nas kyang ma
107a1('dul ba): ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces smra'o//
107a2('dul ba): lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/bdag cag 'di na lha'i yul na rgyu ba nA/shAkya rnams kyi gzhon nu gang lags pa de zhes bya ba nas 'jig rten du sgra rnam par grags pa
107a3('dul ba): 'gyu ro zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste/de sgra dang kha spu bregs te gros ngur smrig bgros nas dad pa yang dag par kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu rnyeng ba de bla na
107a4('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas nas/de ga ya na ga yA'i mgo'i mchod rten la sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong thams cad
107a5('dul ba): kyang dgra bcom pa zag pazad po zhes bya ba'i bar nas yang dge ba'i shes byas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba she stag dang thabs cig tu bzhug so zhes bya dri'i bar du ste/
107a6('dul ba): lha de la bkur bsti mdzod cig dang /de lta na lha gtso bo byas ches gtso bor 'gyuraro//de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mo zhig la bskri ba
107a7('dul ba): kI'i nang rje tshur khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song la song nas kho bo'i tshig 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhab so gnyis la mgo bos phyag byos la//gnod
107b1('dul ba): ba chung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngu ma/'tsho 'am/bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde ba dang /sku nyams dang ldan nam/reg par spyod dam zhes zhus la 'di skad ces
107b2('dul ba): kyang gsol cig/bdag bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bzang chos gis dang bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /spyan
107b3('dul ba): dbyung kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegasu gsol zhes gsol cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes ma
107b4('dul ba): des ma go d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po las mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag/
107b5('dul ba): byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das la mi des 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la ma ga d+hi'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs
107b6('dul ba): can stong de'i mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gnod pa nyung ngam/nyam nga ba nyung ngam zhes bya ba nas rig par spyod dam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du ste spyan gsol lags//kyi
107b7('dul ba): khyod dI /ma ga d+hA'i rgyal pog ci sbyangs gzugs can snying po bde bar gyur cig/btsun pa mag d+ha'i rgyal po gzo spyangs gzugs can snying po'i mchod nas 'di skad ces bdag pa rjes
108a1('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du nu bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /spyan
108a2('dul ba): dbyung kyi rkyen sman dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyid na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gsheg su gsol zhes mchi lags/bac+doMs kyis mi de la cang mi gsung drug na
108a3('dul ba): donas mdzes bac+doMs cang mi gsung bas gnang ba rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan
108a4('dul ba): 'das sngon thams cad ral pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba nas yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par
108a5('dul ba): grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar shra stag dang thabs gcig tu ma ga d+ha'i ljongs rgya zhing gshegs pa na yul ma ga d+ha pa rnas kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas ltang bral gyi tshal na yod pa gang
108a6('dul ba): noni bder gshegs//de nas bcom ldan 'das legs par rab gnasu byon nas/ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten logs pa dang bya gnas ltar brang gi tshul na yod pa na bzhugs//
108a7('dul ba): ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das sngon thams cad ram pa can du gyur pa'i dge slong stong gi dge slong gi dge /'dun chen po zhes bya ba nas
108b1('dul ba): sesoms shin tu rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du s+ye ma gu d+hA'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/ma ga d+hA pa rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnas lhung drang gi tshol na yod pa gang na
108b2('dul ba): bder gshegs te/mag d+ha po rnams kyi mchod rten legs par rab gnA ljang brang gi tshil na yod pa ni bzhug so//zhes thos thos nas kyang shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/'khor
108b3('dul ba): brgya phrag dum rgyal du'i khab nas byung nas/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bstan bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ban de'i shing rje'i 'khor lo sa'i
108b4('dul ba): nang du byung bar gyur to//des bsams pa/bdag gis las skyon can cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snya mo//lha rnams kyis de la smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
108b5('dul ba): las skyon can ma byas mod kyis khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyod pa gang yin pa de dag btson ra na 'dug gis de dag thun cig/rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de wA na
108b6('dul ba): gzhon no zhes rgyal pos btson rnams 'don du bcugo/yang rgyal po phyir 'byung bar brtsams pan/de'i dgur+N+Na nA sgo la thug//des yang bsams pa bdag gis ni gdon
108b7('dul ba): mi za bar las skyon can zhig byas te/des bdag la lhas ngan po gnon sgrol dbu rgyun thug pa 'di byung sgyu mo//lha de rnams kyis yang smras pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis
109a1('dul ba): las skyon nan ma byas mod kyis khyod dang lhan cig las mtshungs par spyad pa gang yin pa de dag kha cig ni 'as/kha zhig na yul sa gzhan ga na
109a2('dul ba): mo zhes bya ba dag na las kyi mtha' byed cing 'dug pa de dag sbron cig/rgyal bas yul de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad bkug//de nas rgyal po gzugs can
109a3('dul ba): snying po shing rta khri nyis stong dang zhabs 'bring ba rta pa'i chags khri brgyad stong dang /ma ga d+he'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag brgyad stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i
109a4('dul ba): khakha nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ngo //de ji tsam gzhon pa'i sa'i bar du bzhon pas
109a5('dul ba): song ste/bzhon pa las bab nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bar zhugs//mya ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos thag gi tsam nas/bcom ldan 'das
109a6('dul ba): mthong ba'i bar de nas rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga po za'u kha dang gdugs dang ral gri dang nor bu'i rnga yob dang /lham khra bo rnams phud do///
109a7('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi/bam pa gya dgu pa//nganas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzugs can snying pos rgyal po'i mtshan ma lnga bzhag nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba
109b1('dul ba): der song ste phyin pa dang /bla gas phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud/rang gi ming nas phyung ste lan gsum
109b2('dul ba): du gsol pa/btsun pa bdag ni mag N+DI rgyal po go sbyangs gzugs can snying po lagaso//rgyal po lags//rgyal po chen po de de bzhin te/de de bzhin no//
109b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po grang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po yin no//rgyal po
109b4('dul ba): yin no//rgyal po chen po khyod rang gi ston ji lta ba la 'dug shig/de nas ma gau d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo
109b5('dul ba): bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs
109b6('dul ba): gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mag par 'gyur ba'i gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te
109b7('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar te 'khod de//kha cig ni bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po nas mthong nas cang mi smra bar
110a1('dul ba): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung 'khor de nyid du 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to///de nas ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang
110a2('dul ba): khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ci dge sbyong chen po lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyi tshangs par spyod pa la spyod dam/'on te lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can
110a3('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa spyod snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/tshe dang
110a4('dul ba): ldan po lteng rgyas 'od srung la tshig su btsod pa'i dbyangs kyis dri ba rmas pa/lteng rgyas gnas pa khyod 'dir ci mthong na//me spangs nas ni brtul zhugs 'di dag spyod//
110a5('dul ba): khyod kyis ci ltar me yi mchod spangs pa//don de 'od srung nga la smra bar gyis//lteng rgyas 'od srung gis gsol pa/'di na kha cig zas skom de bzhin ro//'dod
110a6('dul ba): pa dag dang bud med kho nu smra//de dag thabs kyis dri mar rab mthong ste//des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg glugs min//khyod ni 'dod dang bza' dang btung ba dang //
110a7('dul ba): de bzhin rol yid ni mi dga' na//lha mi 'jig rten la ci khyod kyi yid//dga' ba yin nom 'od srung dri yis smros//phung po ma mchis zhi ba ci ma mchis//'dod srid
110b1('dul ba): ma chags gzhan du 'gyur ma mchis//gzhan gyis mi bkri ba'i go 'phang mchog mthong ste//des bdag mchod sbyin mi dga' bsreg glugs min//go 'phang mi nyams mchog ni
110b2('dul ba): ma mthong bas//mchod sbyin brtul zhugs dang ni zhugs dag gis//grol snyam bdag gi yid ni rmongs gyur te//dmus long gyur nas skye shi rjes bzhin 'thom//skyob pa gtso bo
110b3('dul ba): mchog gis legs bshad po//go 'phangs 'dus ma byas de bzod mthong na//thub pa go'u ta ma rnam par 'dren khyod ni//skye bo phal chen don brtson bden la bzhugs//bcom
110b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod kyis rtogs pa logs rtogs te//khyod kyis nyes par bsams ma yin//rab tu phye bo'i chos rnams la//gtso bo gang yin de blangaso//
110b5('dul ba): 'od srung 'khor skyo ba skyed cig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye nas/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na//rang gi stan gyi nang du mi snang bar
110b6('dul ba): gyur cing /shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed 'di b+ha ste/'chag pa dang /'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal
110b7('dul ba): bar byed do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed de/me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas rjod srung gi lus yas 'od zer rnam pa
111a1('dul ba): sna tshogs 'byin par byed de/'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog
111a2('dul ba): dag go/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par byed de/lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/lus kyi stong nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed//lus kyi stod nas 'bar
111a3('dul ba): bar byed la/lus kyi smad nas chu grang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang /nub dang
111a4('dul ba): byang phyogasu yang de bzhin no//phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas/rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba dag bsdus te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
111a5('dul ba): gzar nas/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/becom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
111a6('dul ba): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa lagaso//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lagaso//bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gis ston pa lags so//
111a7('dul ba): ston pa lag so//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos lagaso//nyan thos lagaso//'od srung de de bzhino//de de bzhin te/'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yi no//
111b1('dul ba): khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no//'od srung nga ni khyod kyi ston pa yin no//khyod ni nga'i nyan thos yin no//'od srung khyod rang gi stan ji lta ba la 'dug shig/de nas tshe dang ldan pa ltung
111b2('dul ba): rgyas 'od srung gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/de nas ma gra d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/
111b3('dul ba): dge sbyong chen po ni lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can gyis tshangs par spyod pa la mi spyod kyi/lteng rgyas 'od srung ral pa can nyid dge sbyong chen po'i tshangs par spyod pa la spyod snyam//de nas
111b4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po gzugs la skye ba yang yod/'dzegs pa yang yod de/de'i
111b5('dul ba): skye ba dang /'jig pa yang rig par bya'o//rgyal po chen po tshar ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la skye ba yang yod/'jigs
111b6('dul ba): po yang yod de/de'i skye ba dang /'jig pa yang rig par bya'o//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus//gzugs kyi skye ba dang /'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas/gzugs
111b7('dul ba): de yongasu shes//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang /'jig pa'i chos nyid rig nas//
112a1('dul ba): rnam par shes pa de yongasu shas//rgyal po chen batshogs kyi bus gzugs yongasu shes na//gzugs la bdag gam bdag gir khas mi len/
112a2('dul ba): mi 'dzin/lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed do//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par
112a3('dul ba): shes pa yongasu shes na bdag gam/bdag gir khas mi len mi 'dzin lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed do//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bus
112a4('dul ba): gzugs la bdag gam/bdag gir khas mi len/mi 'dzin/lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed na/tshad mod cing grangs med pa'i mya ngan las
112a5('dul ba): 'das pa yin no//zhes smra'o//rgyal po chen po rigs kyi bu tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la bdag gam/bdog gir
112a6('dul ba): khas me len/mi 'dzin/lhag par mi gnas/mngon par zhen par mi byed na/tshad med rnying grangs med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yin no//zhes smra'o//
112a7('dul ba): de nas ma ga d+hA'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams 'di snyam du sems te/gal te gzugs bdag ma yin/tsherab dang //'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam
112b1('dul ba): par shes pa bdag ma yin na/'o na bdag sems can nam/srog gam/skye ba po 'am/gso ba po 'am/gang zag gam/shed las skyes sam/shed bu la
112b2('dul ba): byed pa po 'am/byed du 'jug pa po 'am/shes pa po 'am/kun nas shes bya po 'am/slong ba po 'am/kun nas slong ba po 'am/smra ba po 'am/tshor ba po 'am/
112b3('dul ba): kun nas tshor ba po gang yin pa nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /da lta yang yod pa ma yin na/gang gis de dang der dge ba dang /sdig pa'i las byas pa rnams kyi
112b4('dul ba): rnam par smin pa so sor nyam su myong zhing /gang gis phung po 'di bor te phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de su zhig yin par 'gyur snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
112b5('dul ba): kyi thugs kyis/ma ga d+ha'i bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag bdag bdag ces bya ba ni byis pa so so'i
112b6('dul ba): skye bo thos pa dang /mi ldan pas btags pa'i rje su lhung ba yin te/'di la bdag ce'am bdag gi med kyi/dge slong dag skye ba na sdug bsngal 'di skye zhing 'gog pa na yang
112b7('dul ba): sdug bsngal 'gag go//skye ba na 'du byed rnams skye zhing 'gag pa na 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/rgyu dang rkyen de la brten nas sems can rnams kyi 'du byed kyi rgyud
113a1('dul ba): 'jugro//dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pas 'du byed kyi rgyud nying mtshams sbyor ba thugasu chud nas sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang ste ba 'dod par mdzad de/
113a2('dul ba): dge slong dag ngas lha'i spyan rnam par dag pa shi'i las 'das pas sems can rnams kyi chi 'pho dang /skye ba dang /kha dge bzang po dang /kha dog ngan pa dang /dman pa
113a3('dul ba): dgya nam po dang /bde 'gro dang /ngan 'gror 'gro ba yang gzig so//las ji lta ba bzhin nye bar 'gro ba'i sems can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
113a4('dul ba): rab tu mkhyen te/sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/ngag dang yid kyi nyes par spyod pa dang ldan/'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs
113a5('dul ba): ba dang /log par lta ba yin te/log par lta ba'i las da chus byung ba'i rgyus rgyu de dang /rgyun des luse zhig nas shi zla'i 'og tu ngan song ngan 'gro log
113a6('dul ba): bar ltung ba sems can dmyal ba rnamasu skye bar 'gyuraro//sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs par spyod po dang ldan/ngag dang yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan/
113a7('dul ba): 'phags pa rnams la skur pa mi 'dengs pa dang /yang dag par lta ba yin te/yang dag par lta ba'i las da chos blangs pa'i rgyus rgyu de dang rkyen des//lus
113b1('dul ba): zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi lha rnams skye bar 'gyuraro zhes bya bar mkhyen to//dge slong dag ngas de ltar mkhyen cing //de ltar gzigs pas/nga 'di skad ces
113b2('dul ba): bdag gam/sems can nam/srog gam/skye bo bo 'am/gsob po 'am/gang zag gam/shing las skyes samaM/shed bu 'am/byed pa po 'am/
113b3('dul ba): byed du 'jug pa po 'am shes pa po'am/kun nas shes pa po 'am/slong ba po 'am/kun nas slong ba po 'am/smra ba po 'am/tshor ba po'am/kun nas tshor ba po
113b4('dul ba): gang yin pa ni nam yang ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing /da ltar yang yod pa ma yin pas/gang gis de dang der dge ba /sdig pa'i las byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa
113b5('dul ba): so sor nyam su myong zhing gang gis phung po 'di bor te/phung po gzhan dang nying mtshams sbyor ba de cho su brdar btags pa ma gtogs pa 'di yin no//zhes mi gsung ngo //
113b6('dul ba): la chos kyi badz+rar btags pa ni 'di yin te/'di lta ste/'di yod pas 'di yoda'adi skyes pas 'dir skye ba ste/'di lta ste/ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/'du
113b7('dul ba): byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/
114a1('dul ba): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyi skye ba
114a2('dul ba): skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrugs pa rnams 'byung ba/de ltar na sdug
114a3('dul ba): sngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' shig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/'di med pas 'di med la/'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur te/'di lta ste/
114a4('dul ba): mi rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang
114a5('dul ba): gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag
114a6('dul ba): spyod pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /
114a7('dul ba): s+m+R+YuM sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mo bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag ste/de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'o zhig pa 'di 'gag
114b1('dul ba): par 'gyuraro//dge slong dag 'du byed rnams ni sdug bsngal lo//mya ngan las 'das pa na zhi ba'o//rgyu kun 'byung gis sdug bsngal kun 'byung zhing rgyu 'gags pas sdug
114b2('dul ba): bsngal 'gags te/rgyun bcad pas mi 'byung zhing nying mtshams sbyor ba med par 'gags pa 'di nyid ni sdug bsngal gyi mtha' yino//dge slong dag de la yongasu mya ngani las
114b3('dul ba): 'das pa gang zhe na/gzhan med kyi sdug bsngal 'gags pa gang yin pa de ni nye bar zhi ba/de ni bsil bar gyur pa/de ni nub pa ste/dge slong dag zhi ba'i gnas 'di yin
114b4('dul ba): te 'di lta ste/phung po thams cad spangs pa/sred pa zad pa//'dod chags dang bral ba/'gags pa/mya ngan las 'das pa yino//de nas bcos
114b5('dul ba): yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la lan gnyisu bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/gzugs rtag gam/mi rtag//btsun pa 'di
114b6('dul ba): mi rtag lagaso//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngaya ba yin nam/sdug bsngal mI yin/btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lugaso//mi rtag pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
114b7('dul ba): ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yin no//bdag ni 'di yin no//'di ni bdag gi bdag go zhes bdag tu khas len par
115a1('dul ba): byed dam/btsun pa ma lagasaso//rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes
115a2('dul ba): brtag gam//mi rtag btsun pa 'di ni mi rtogs lagaso//mi rtag pa gang yin pa de sdug bsngal yin nam/sdug bsngal ma yin/btsun pa 'di ni sdug bsngal lag so///
115a3('dul ba): mi rtag pa sdug bsngal ba 'gyur ba'i chos can gang yin pa de la cig 'phags pa'i nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa 'di ni bdag yino//bdag ni 'di yin na//'di ni bdag
115a4('dul ba): gi bdag gi zhes bdag tu khas len par byed dam/btsun pa ma lagaso//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis gzugs gang yin pa ci yang rung /'das pa 'am/
115a5('dul ba): ma 'ongs pa 'am/da ltar byung ba 'am/nang gi 'am/phyi'i 'am/rags pa 'am/phra ba 'am/ngan pa'am/bya nom pa'am/gang dag thag ring ba 'am/
115a6('dul ba): gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/de thams cad la 'di ni bdagra mo yin no//bdag ni 'di ma yin no//'di ni bdag gi bdag ma yin no zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes
115a7('dul ba): rab kyis ji ltar bzhin du blta bar bya'o//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod kyis tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed gang ci yang rung ba dang /rnam par shes pa
115b1('dul ba): dang yang ru 'das pa 'am/ma 'ongs pa 'am/dultar byung ba 'am/rlung gi 'am/phyi'i 'am/rAgs bya'am/prA byA 'am/ngan pa 'am/rgyunan
115b2('dul ba): pa'am/gang dag thag ring ba 'am/gang dag thag nye bar yang rung ste/de dag thams cad la ni bdag ma yin no//bdag ni 'di ma yin no//'di ni bdag
115b3('dul ba): gi bdag ma yin no//zhes de bzhin du yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis ji lta ba bzhin du blta bar bya'o//rgyal po chen po 'phags pa nyan thos thos pa dang ldan pa de ltar mthong
115b4('dul ba): ba ni gzugs la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la yang yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro//yid byung na
115b5('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bra'o//'dod chags dang bral na rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro//rnam par grol na bdag gi skye ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byas//
115b6('dul ba): snyisrid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar 'gyur ro//chos kyi rnam grangs 'ad bshud pa na/ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gza sbyangs gzugs can
115b7('dul ba): snying po dang /lha brgyad khri dang /me ga d+ha'i bram ze dang /khyim bdag 'bum phrag du ma la chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba skyeso//de nas ma gA d+ha'i
116a1('dul ba): rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can sing pos chos mthong ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos reg pa dang /chos kyi gting sleb pa dang sem nyi las rga/
116a2('dul ba): ba dang the tshom las rgal ba dang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyi mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas/stan las langs te/
116a3('dul ba): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag ni
116a4('dul ba): 'phags//mngon par 'phag so//bdag btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabasu mchi lags kyis dge bsnyen du bzung du
116a5('dul ba): gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lags//bcom ldan 'das bdag bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi
116a6('dul ba): dge 'dun du bcas pa la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur
116a7('dul ba): babyed lags na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu gshegasu gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la cang mi gsung bas
116b1('dul ba): gnang ngo //de nas ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
116b2('dul ba): byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
116b3('dul ba): pa ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas/las ci zhig bgyis na las de'i rnam par smin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bar bgyid
116b4('dul ba): lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas
116b5('dul ba): pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pa ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas/las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig
116b6('dul ba): gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams
116b7('dul ba): la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba dag byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang skye mched rnams la rnam
117a1('dul ba): par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za bar 'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu
117a2('dul ba): 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa na//'jig rten du ston pa rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa'i/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba
117a3('dul ba): kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsibs kyi lte ba zhes bya ba byung nas/des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag mdzad/
117a4('dul ba): phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'daso//skye bo'i tshogs chen pos de'i sku gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas nas sa phyogs dben
117a5('dul ba): zhing yangs pa zhig tu mchod rten chen po brtsig so//de'i tshe 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kri zhes bya ba khrom gyi ru ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang /steng gi na mkha' las
117a6('dul ba): yul rgyu ba na/mchod rten de dang nye ba zhig tu phyin pa dang /sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa'i lha rnams kyis de'i 'khor lo rin po che thogs par bya'o//rgyal po
117a7('dul ba): kri kris bsams pa/'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che 'di thogs pa las na/bdag gi bsod nams zad par ma gyur grang snyamo//de la lha rnams kyis smras pa/
117b1('dul ba): rgyal po chen po khyod kyis bsod nams ma zang mod kyi/phyogs 'di la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i mchod rten bzhugs pas/des na 'khor lo rin po che 'di de'i steng
117b2('dul ba): dumi 'gro zhing bags par gyur to//de nas rgyal po kri kres khrom gyi rub bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang lhan cig babs na ji tsam na mchod rten byi dor ma byas pa de mthong nas/'khor dang
117b3('dul ba): bcas pa des byi dor byas te/dri dang /byug pa dang /bdug pa dang /phye ma dang /rol mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas 'khor dang bcas pas/drung dub tu de smon lam
117b4('dul ba): btab pa/bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la bya ba byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis yon tan 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /ston pa 'di lta
117b5('dul ba): bu mnyes par byed rnying mnyes par mi byed par ma gyur cig ces bta'o//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po kri kI zhes bya ba 'khor
117b6('dul ba): dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni/de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/'khor dang bcas pa des yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte ba'i
117b7('dul ba): mchod rten la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de'i las kyi rnam par smin pas/'dis bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag mang por lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba khyad pa du 'phags pa nyam su
118a1('dul ba): myong bar gyur to//'di lta bu'i yon tan dag thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni nga'i spyan sngar 'khor dang bcas pa bden
118a2('dul ba): ba mthong bar byas//ston pa 'di lta bu mnyes par byed cing mi mnyes par mi byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa gang yin pas ni/dge slong dang nga nyid dang yang
118a3('dul ba): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsibs kyi lte bar lhan cig mnyam pas mnyam ste/stobs mnyam pa dang /shugs mnyam pa dang /brtson 'grus mnyam pa dang //
118a4('dul ba): thob pa mnyam pa yin te/'dis ston pa nga mnyes par byas kyi/mi mnyes par ma byas pa yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas na/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams
118a5('dul ba): kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni dkar ba yin/'dres ma rnams kyi ni 'dres ma yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas
118a6('dul ba): na las gcig tu gnag pa dang /'dres ma rnams ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar ba la btsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//
118a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung gis las ci zhig
118b1('dul ba): bgyis na/des na cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul bar gyur lags/chu klung 'od srung dang /ga ya 'od srung dag ni tshogs chung ngus btul bar gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das
118b2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nyid kyis las tshegs rnyed pa/rkyen yongasu sgyur ba zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong me bzhin
118b3('dul ba): du'o//ra dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu'i tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
118b4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i khaM lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs
118b5('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung nas bA ra na se'i grong khyer dang nye ba zhig tu brten te/drang srong smra ba'i ri dgaso na bzhugaso//des sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag
118b6('dul ba): mdzad nas/shing zad pa'i me bzhin du phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongasu mya ngan las 'das//de'i sku gdung rgyal po kr-i kris spos kyi shing tha~Md
118b7('dul ba): spungs te/spungs pas sregs nas/me 'o mas pas de/sku gdung de dag rin po che sna bzhi las byas pa'i bum pa'i nang du blugs nas/sa phyogs dben zhing yangs par
119a1('dul ba): sku gdung gi mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig la rgyur dpag tshad phyed pa zhig bcig tu bcug/de'i tshe de'i dus na bA ra na se na khyim bdag phyug
119a2('dul ba): pa nor mang ba longs spyod che ba yongasu bzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan pa/rnam thos kyi bu la nor gyis 'gran pa zhig gnas pa des rigs mnyam
119a3('dul ba): pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur dpyod par byed//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod
119a4('dul ba): par byed pa na rim gyis khye'u gsum bcaso//ci tsam na khyim bdag de nad kyis thebs nas/de rtse ba dang /sdong po dang /lo ma dang /mdab ma dang /'bras bu'i
119a5('dul ba): sman rnams kyis bsnyen bkur byas kyang de'i nad zhi bar ma gyur nas/de 'chi ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur to//de nas de bu rnams kyis ras sngon po dang /ser po dang dmar po dang /
119a6('dul ba): dkar pos khyogs brgyan nas dur khrod du khyer te bsregaso//de nas pha la pha'i bya ba byas nas mya ngan sangs te/de nas nor so sor bgo bar gros bya bar brtsams
119a7('dul ba): nas phu bo shos kyis smras pa/nor bgo'o//nu bo spun gnyis ma dad do//des gal gyis bcus pa dang /de gnyis kyis smras pa/gal te de ltar nar
119b1('dul ba): shig 'jig rten pha rol gyi lam brgyags blangs la phyis bgo bar bya'o//des smras pa ci dag byas/de gnyis kyis smras pa/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung 'di la
119b2('dul ba): mchod do//de dad pa chung ba zhig pas des dka' 'khor du khas blangaso//de nas de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la mchod nas smon lam gdab par
119b3('dul ba): brtsams te/gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smraso//dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag gnyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes
119b4('dul ba): bya ba la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyu ro zhes lung
119b5('dul ba): bstan pa gang yin pa de'i bstan pa la bdag cag rab tu byung nas khyad par thob par gyur cig ces btab bo//de gnyis kyis smon lam btab pa/phu bo des thos nas drung du btud de/
119b6('dul ba): smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/bdag ni dad pa chung la dmu rgod yin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis na bdag kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul nas rab
119b7('dul ba): tu phyung ste/rab tu byung nas yang khyad par rtogs par gyur cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/phu bo shos dmu rgod dad pa chung ba gang yin pa de ni/lhang rgyas
120a1('dul ba): 'ad srung 'di nyid yin no//nu bo gnyis po gang dag yin pa de dag ni chu klung 'od srung dang /ga yo 'od srung 'di dag nyid yin no//smon lam//
120a2('dul ba): gyi dbang des na lteng rgyas 'od srung cho 'phrul lnga brgyas btul ba yin no//chu klung 'od srung dang /ga yi 'od srung ni tshegs chung ngus btul ba yin no//gang gi tshe rgyal po
120a3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po gzho nur gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig yod pa de la/kun dga'i ra ba me tog dang /'bras bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa
120a4('dul ba): zhig yod de/de de la lhag par chags par gyur to//ji tsam na gzugs can snying po phyi rol tu byung bas bskyed mos tshal de mthong ba dang /de yang lhag par chags
120a5('dul ba): pabar gyur nas smras pa/khyim bdag bskyed mos tshal ni nga la byin cig des ma byin//lan gnyis lan gsumo du yang smras na yang ma byin nas/yang smras pa/
120a6('dul ba): rin sbyin no//des smras pa/gzho nu nyis na kho bo yul nas skyugs kyang bla'i bskyed mos tshal ni mi 'bu'o//gzhonu gzugs can snying pos smras pa/phyi ma bdag
120a7('dul ba): khyod kyis smras pa dran par byos shig/nam nga rgyal por gyu ra pa de'i tshe nga nyid kyis bkuro//des smras pa/nam khyod rgyal por gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo yang rgyal
120b1('dul ba): bopo'i khab nas 'gro'o//gzhonu gzugs can snying pos mjal to zhes byas nas song ngo //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po pad+ma chen po shi nas/gzhonu gzugs can snying
120b2('dul ba): poboporgyal srid la gzhag pa dang /des bskyed mos tshul de mthus phrog so//khyim bdag de snying na zhing bskyed mos tshal de la lhag par chags pas shi nas de nyid kyi sbrul gdug
120b3('dul ba): pab zhig tu skyes te/de rgyal po la rgyun tu blugs tshol ba lhur lin cer cing gnaso//ji tsam na rgyal po gzugs can snying po so ga'i dus la bab sde/me tog go shIng rnams
120b4('dul ba): kha 'bus po na btsun mo dang lhan cig bskyed mos tshal der zhugs nas/de de na skyes pa med par rol mos btsun mo'i bud med dang lhan cig dga' ba'i rtsed mo nyamasu myong bar
120b5('dul ba): byas nas gnyid log go/bud med ni me tog dang /'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas/kun tu 'khyam du dong ngo //bud med gcig gi ral gyi bskur te/rgyal po srung
120b6('dul ba): du bcu go/de nas sbrul gdug pa des rgyal po'i drung na sgra mi grags par rig nas rgyal po la gzung ba'i phyir tshing nas byung ste chaso//rgyal po'i bsod nams kyi mthus bya ka
120b7('dul ba): lan dau ka zhes bya ba de rnams kyis sbrul gdug de kun nas bskor nas tsa tsi'i sgra phyung ngo //bud med ral gyi thogs pas thos nas/bsdongs te sgra chen po phyung nas ral gyis
121a1('dul ba): bsad do//de nas rgyal po yang sngangs te sad nas smras pa/'di ni du/bud med des smras pa/lha sbrul gdug pa 'di lta la bzung ba'i phyir
121a2('dul ba): chas ban+d+ha/byA ka lan dA ka rnams kyisaci'i sgra byung nas/bdeg gis bkum legs//rgyal po'i gnas skabs de gzhon dang /blon po dang /hriMma~M gyi ru bdang
121a3('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyis thos nas/bskyed mos tshal de'i nang du ku co'i sgra chen pos gang bar gyur te/rgyal po de skye dgu pa byams pa zhig
121a4('dul ba): pas/phyir zhing btsun mo skye bo'i tshogs dang bcas te mig mchi mas gang zhing 'khod //de nas rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dang rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas
121a5('dul ba): dbang bskur ba la srog sgrub pa de la mchog ci sbyin skye bo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/lha rgyal srid kyi phyed do//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag byi ka lan da kau rnams
121a6('dul ba): kyis de'i srog byin pas rgyal srid phyed 'di dag la byon no//blon po rnams kyis smyos pa/lho bya 'di dag ni dud 'gro/'i skye gan su song ba lags pas/rgyal srid phyed
121a7('dul ba): kyis 'di dag la ci bgyi/'di dag 'od ma'i tshol gang du gnas pa der 'di dag gi gnas btsa'o//rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhin du gyis shig/bskyed mos
121b1('dul ba): tshul de 'od ma'i tshal gyis yangasu bskor te/blon po rnams kyis de rnams kyis gnas 'od ma'i tshal gyi nye 'khor du bcas pas/de 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan du ka gnas pa
121b2('dul ba): zhes bya bar gyur to//rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i zhang po kun tu 'tsho rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung nas/des bskyed mos tshal de de'i gnas kyi phyir byi no//ji tsam nu
121b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ma ga d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang /rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung na bzhugs//ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyongs gzugs can snying
121b4('dul ba): po bcom ldan 'das ma ga~M d+ha nas ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na/rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas shing zhig gi drung du bzhugaso zhes thos//thos nas kyang rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen
121b5('dul ba): pa dang /rgyal po'i mthu chen pos rgyal po'i khab nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mig bos
121b6('dul ba): phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i
121b7('dul ba): gautam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de/
122a1('dul ba): rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang
122a2('dul ba): dag par rab tu dga' ba mdzad nas cang mi gsung //de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar
122a3('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud do//bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi sngam
122a4('dul ba): par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzu
122a5('dul ba): can snying po la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/
122a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las longs te song ngo //de nas ma gra d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/de nyid kyi
122a7('dul ba): mtshan mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' ba dag sta gon byas nas nang par sngar langs te/gdan bshoms nor bu'i chu snod bzhag nas bcom
122b1('dul ba): ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyi dus tshod gsol pa/btsun pa gdugs tshod lags na/da de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' sham
122b2('dul ba): thabs mnabs/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du bdar te/ma ga d+ha'i rgyal
122b3('dul ba): po gzo spangs gzugs can snying po'i bkad sa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas ma ga d+ha'i
122b4('dul ba): rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas//gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba ngag rang gi
122b5('dul ba): lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag rang gi lag nas bstabs shing tshim par byas te/bcom ldan
122b6('dul ba): 'das gsol zin nas phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te/btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa 'dir bcom ldan 'das
122b7('dul ba): ci bde bar bzhugs shig ces bcom ldan 'das la bskyed mos tshal de phulo//de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde rnams kyi nang du/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i
123a1('dul ba): khab 'od ma'i tshol bya ka lan dra ka gnas pa na bzhugs zhes gdags par byas//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od pa'i tshal bya ka land
123a2('dul ba): ka'i gnas na bzhug so//rgyal po'i khab na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu rang gi khyim du spyan dang so/yod de'i
123a3('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin dgos pa 'ga' zhig gis phyir rgyal po'i khab tu phyin nas de khyim bdag de'i khyim du nub mo brang brgya'o//de nas khyim bdog de de nyid kyi mtshan mo
123a4('dul ba): langs te/nang mi rnams la bsgo ba/nang rje dag longs shig/bzhin bzang dag longs shig shing rnams gi shogs shig/me dag bus shig/'bras can
123a5('dul ba): chos shig/sran ched chos shig/bca' ba dag bzang du gyis shig/bkang sa'i zhal ta dag kyis shig/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/
123a6('dul ba): ci khyim bdag 'di dag ma len tam/bag ma gtong ngam/yul mi 'am/tshong pa 'am/tshogs sam/'khor tam/'dis ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs
123a7('dul ba): can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshad la spyan drangs sam snyam du bsams nas/khyim bdag de la 'di skad ces smra so//khyim bdag khyod ci bag ma len tam/ngag ma gting ngam/
123b1('dul ba): yul mi 'am/tshang ba 'am/tshogs sam/'khor tam/khyod kyi ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo stangs gzugs can snying po sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs sam/khyid
123b2('dul ba): bdag kho bo bag ma len tam/bag ma gtong ba yang ma yin/yul mi ma yin/tshang ba ma yin/tshogs pa ma yin/'khor ma yin/ma gau d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs
123b3('dul ba): gzugs can snying po yang gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa ma yin te/'on kyang kho bos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod la sman drang so//khyim bdag mgon
123b4('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis/sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra mngon ma thos pa thos pa dang /ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nAs spu zing zhes byas nas/de spu zing zhes byed pas khyim bdag de la
123b5('dul ba): 'di skad ces smra so//khyim bdag sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'di su yin/khyim bdag dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las skra dang khi spu brags te gos ngur smrig 'gos
123b6('dul ba): nas/dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yod do/khyim
123b7('dul ba): bdag de ni sangs rgyas zhes bya'o//khyim bdag dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'di su yin/khyim bdag rgyal rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu sku gris kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bshos
124a1('dul ba): nas da pa yang dag par po nas byim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das de kho na rab tu byung nas rjesu byung ba dag yod do//bram nas dang /
124a2('dul ba): rje'u rigs dang /dmang rigs las kyang rigs kyi bu dag sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par bcom ldan 'das
124a3('dul ba): de kho na rab tu byung ba'i rjesu rab tu byung ba dag yod de/khyim bdag de ni dge 'dun zhes bya ba yin te/sang kho bo'i khyim du sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun de
124a4('dul ba): gdugs tshod la spyan drangaso//khyim bdag bcom ldan 'das de da ltar gang na bzhugs/rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi dur khrod kyi bsil ba'i tshal na bzhugaso//khyim
124a5('dul ba): bdag bcom ldan 'das de bdag cag gis ltar rung ngam/khyim bdag de'i phyir khyed re shig stod cig dang /gal te bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid du gshegs dang
124a6('dul ba): sang khyod kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do//de nas khyim bdag mgon med sbyin sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i dran pas nyalo//de nam ma langs par
124a7('dul ba): nam langs pa'i 'du shes kyis lho sgo gang na ba der song ba dang /de'i tshe lho sgo thun gnyis la sgo phyo nas 'jog ste thun dang po la ni pho nya glo bur du 'ongs pa rnams mi thogs pa
124b1('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go//thun tha mu la ni pho nya 'gro bar chas pa rnams mi thogs par bya ba'i phyir phye ste 'jog go/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te
124b2('dul ba): 'di ltar lho sgo phye ste 'dug pas gdon mi za bar nam lang so snyam du rig nas/snang ba de nyid du grong khyer nas byung ba dang de byung ma thag tu snang ba gang yin pa de med nas skur
124b3('dul ba): mun nag por gyur to//de 'jigs par gyur bag tsha bar gyur cing spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/bdog mi 'am//mi ma yin pa 'am/ge yin can 'ga' zhig gis gtses
124b4('dul ba): par mi 'gyur grang snyam du bsams nas/slar ldog par 'dod pa dang /de nas lho phyogs kyi sgon gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/ci tsam lho phyogs kyi sgo nus bsil ba'i tshal
124b5('dul ba): gyi dur khrod kyi byer thams cad snang ba chen pos gsal bar byas nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smraso/khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/slar ma ldog
124b6('dul ba): shigakhyod spyan sngar song ni legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rta brgya dang ni gser brgyan brgya//dre'u yi shing rta brgya dang ni//sna tshogs
124b7('dul ba): nor gyis sbur ba yi//rta rgod ma yi shing rta brgya//gom pa gcig gcig sor ba yi//bcu drug char yang mi bod do//khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/slar ma ldon
125a1('dul ba): shig/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/gangs can+da ri yi glang chen brgya//gser dang
125a2('dul ba): nor bus brgyan byas la//lus cho ga shol mda'i mche bar ldan//ma tang ga skyes stong po che//gom pa gcig gcig bor ba yi//bcu drug char yang mi phod do//
125a3('dul ba): khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/slar ma ldog shig/khyed spyan sngar srong na logs par 'gyur gyi/slar log na ni ma yin no//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tho gar yul
125a4('dul ba): gyi bu mo brgya//nor bu'i rna cha gdub kor thogs//gser gyi dpung rkyen thogs pa yi//mgrin pa rgyan gyis legs brgyan pa//gom pa gcig cig bor ba yi//
125a5('dul ba): bcu drug char yang mi phod do//khyim bdag spyan sngar song shig/slar ma ldog shig/khyod spun sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi slar log na ni ma yin no//de nas
125a6('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lha'i bu do la 'di skad ces smraso//bzhin bzang khyod su zhig/khyim bdag kho bo ni khyod nyid kyi grogs po snying pa bram ze'i khye'u sbrang
125a7('dul ba): rtsi'i phung po yin te/kho bos dge slong shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis la sems dad pa bskyed nas/shi ba dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes te/
125b1('dul ba): lho sgo 'di nyidri na gnyug mar gnaso//de'i phyir khyod la kho bo 'di skad ces khyim bdag spyan sngar song shis/slar ma ldog cig/khyod spyan sngar song na legs par 'gyur gyi/
125b2('dul ba): slar ldog na ni ma sbyin//zhes smra'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/kye me'o sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni mchog ma yin pa ma
125b3('dul ba): yin zhing /chos bshad pa yang mchog ma yin pa ma yin te/da ltar bcom ldan 'das de la blta bar lha yang brtson par byed snyam du bsams nas/bsil ba'i
125b4('dul ba): tshal gyi dur khrod du song ba dang /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol bla gab med pa na/'chag cing lhag par yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
125b5('dul ba): 'ongs pa gzhes so//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la khyim bdag mgon ming
125b6('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis yang dag par dgyes par 'gyur bas yang dag par dgyes par byed de/bcom ldan 'das cige bde bar mnal ta me/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
125b7('dul ba): de'i tshe tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/gang zhig 'dod pas ma gos la//bag med rab tu rnam grol ba//mya ngan yongs 'das bram ze ni//thams cad
126a1('dul ba): du ni bde bar mnal//'dir ni re ba kun bcas nas//thugs kyi rims nad rnams bsal cing //zhi ba thob pa'i thugs kyis na//nye bar zhi ba bde
126a2('dul ba): bar mnal//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin khrid nas gtsug lag khang du zhugs te/gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs pa dang /khyim bdag
126a3('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
126a4('dul ba): bdag mgon med zos sbyin la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzengs bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga'
126a5('dul ba): bar mdzad/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thog ma'i dus su chos kyi gtam gleng ba gang yin pa de 'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i gtam dang /tshul khrims kyi gtam
126a6('dul ba): dang ma phongs kyi gtam dang /'dod pa rnams la mnog chung ba dang /nyes dmigs dang /kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /rnam par byang ba dang /nges par
126a7('dul ba): 'byung ba dang /rab tu dben pa'i phan yon gyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos kyi gtam rgyas par yang dag par bstan to//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de dga' ba'i
126b1('dul ba): sems dang /dge ba'i sems dang /mgu ba'i sems dang /sgrib pa dang bral ba'i sems dang /skal ba dang ldan pa'i yang dag phul gyi chos bshud pa kun shes par
126b2('dul ba): nus par gzigs pa de'i tshe/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyis chos bshad pa/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po gang yin pa 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal
126b3('dul ba): dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /lam rgyas par rab tu bstan to//dper na gos gtsang ma nag nog med pa tshon rtsi 'os pa'i nang du bcug na tshon rtsi legs par 'dzin
126b4('dul ba): btub pa de bzhin du khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ston de nyid la 'dug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/sdug bsngal dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog pa dang /
126b5('dul ba): lam mngon par rtogaso//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis chos mthong ba dang /chos thob pa dang /chos rig pa dang /chos kyi gting slebs pa dang /som nyi las
126b6('dul ba): rgal ba dang /the tshom las rgal ba dang /gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang /gzhan gyis mi bkri ba dang /ston pas bstan pa'i chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas
126b7('dul ba): stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btu de/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
127a1('dul ba): btsun pa ga dgas//mngon myur nas/dag samaldan padas /sa dang /dge slong shid rdzun pa sgyu su mchilags
127a2('dul ba): kyis/bdag dge bsnyen du go rlung du gsol/deng slan chad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang bsngos te skyab su mchi bar mngon par dad lags//de nas bcom ldan 'das
127a3('dul ba): kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te//khyim bdag khyod kyi me btsun pa bdug gi ming bzang sbyin lags mod kyi/bdag mgon
127a4('dul ba): ma mchis pa rnams la 'tshal ma stsol pas/des na bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bgyi bar skye bos 'tshal to//khyim bdag khyod kyi gnas gang yin/btsun pa yul
127a5('dul ba): bra tsin zhes bgyi ba na ko sa la rnams kyi grong khyer mnyan yod ces bgyi ba mchis to//de na bdag mchis lag so//bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod gshegs shig dang
127a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la/bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /garnams cha dngasbyin dpyang
127a7('dul ba): kyi rkyen smin dang /yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi lag so//khyim bdag mnyan yod na gtsug lag khang yod dam/btsun pa ma mchis lags//khyim dzag
127b1('dul ba): gang na gtsug lag khang yod pa der dge slong rnams 'ong ba dang /'gro ba dang /gnas par semaso//bcom ldan 'das gshegs shig dang /bdag gis ci nas kyang mnyan
127b2('dul ba): yod du dge slong rnams mchis pa dang /gzhan du mchi ba dang /mchi bar sems par 'gyur ba de ltar gtsug lag khang brtsigs lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag
127b3('dul ba): mgon med zas sprin la cang mi gsung bas gnang //de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis/bcom ldan 'das cang me gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das
127b4('dul ba): kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song //de nas rgyal po'i khab tu bya ba bsgrub pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad byas shing bsgrub nas/
