127b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyog sa gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
127b6('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag gi grogs dge slong gcig stsal du gsol/de dang lhan cig bcos
127b7('dul ba): kyi sla du gtsug lag khang brtsigs lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/dge slong su zhig khyim bdag mgon med sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang /mnyan yod na gnas/
128a1('dul ba): ba'i skye ba'i tshogs 'dul bar 'gyur snyam na/dge slong shA ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du
128a2('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i gru
128a3('dul ba): cad mi smra bar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi
128a4('dul ba): spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'dis nas/sde dro sham thabs bgos/lhung bzed dang /chos gos thogs te/rgyal
128a5('dul ba): po'i kheb rgyu bsod snyoms la zhugs nas/rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de zas kyi bya ba byas nas/zas phyi ma'i bsod snyoms spangs te/gnas mal ji ltar
128a6('dul ba): spyad pa mkho su bab nas/de lhung bzed dang /chos gos blangs te/mnyon yod gang na ba dor rgyu zhing song ngo //de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin lam brgyags
128a7('dul ba): mang po khyer nas/nub mo nub mo zhing mnyan yod du song ste phyin nas/de mnyan yod du ma zhugs pa nyid du kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra ba dang /bskyed mos tshal
128b1('dul ba): dang /nags tshal nas nags tshal du 'chags nas 'chags sar dpyod cing 'di skad ces smraso//mnyan yong dang ha cang yang mi ring la/ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /nyin
128b2('dul ba): bAr lang long nyung zhing ku tsa nyung ba dang /mtshan mo gcom chung ba dang /sgra chung ba da/sbrang bu dang /sha sbrang dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang /sdig sprul
128b3('dul ba): gyi reg pa chung ba'i sa phyogs gang na yod pa der/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsigs ni/sa phyogs de gang na yod snyam pa las
128b4('dul ba): khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin gyis gzhonu rgyal byed kyi kun dga' ra ba ni mnyan mod dang ha cang mi ring la ha cang yang mi nye ba dang /nyin par yang lang lang ltung zhing su
128b5('dul ba): nyung ba dang /mtshan mo gtsom chung ba dang /sgra chung ba dang /sbrang bu dang /sha sbrang dang /rlung dang /nyi ma dang /sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo //
128b6('dul ba): mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/'dir bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang bi rtsig snyam nas/de reng gi khyim du ma song ba nyid du/
128b7('dul ba): gzhon nu rgyal byed gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/gzhon rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras//gzhonu kun dga' ra ba bdag la stsol cig/dar bdag gis bcom ldan
129a1('dul ba): 'das kyis phyir gtsug lag khung du rtsig lag s+ho//des smras pa//khyim bdag de ni dang klan da/'a rab ni ma yin te/bskyed mos tshal yin mod kya/
129a2('dul ba): de nga'i yin no//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lan gnyis lan gsum du yang gzho nu rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras//gzho nu bdag la kun dga' ra ba stsol
129a3('dul ba): cig bdag gis der bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig lags//khyim bdag kun dga' ra ba de gser byi ba bshibs kyang mi gtongango ///
129a4('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhibam po dgu bcu pa/yang khyim bdag mgon med zas skyon gyis gzhon rgyal byed la 'di skad ces smras//grazho nus kun dga' ra ba'i rin
129a5('dul ba): thang bkum lags kyis/dbyig dang gser bzhes shig/kun dga' ra ba ni bdag gis las so//rin thang sus bcadakhyod kyis rin thang bkum mod/de
129a6('dul ba): gnyis rin thang bcad do//ri na thang ma bca do zhes brtsod par gyur nas/zhal che gcod pa'i mig nga na ba der dong pa dang /bar skabs der 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi
129a7('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems te/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtson gyis/de'i grogs bya'o snyam nas de nas
129b1('dul ba): ma cho gcod pa'i mir bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/dgos pa'i phyir 'dug//khyim bdag mgod med zas sbyin dang /gnon rgyal byed gnyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen
129b2('dul ba): po la gtogs pa'i drung du song nas de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhal che gcod pa sna chen po la gtu gros pa rnams la don de rgyas par smras pa dang /de rnams kyis
129b3('dul ba): smras pa gzho nus kun dga' ra ba ni rin thang bcang zin gyis gser long shig/kun dga' ra ba ni khyim bdag gi yino//de cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas khyim bdag mgon
129b4('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyis shing rta dang /rgya dang gzeb dang rnga mo dang /glang dang /bong bu rnams la gser mang po bkal te 'ongs nas/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshol thams cad
129b5('dul ba): gshib par brtsams pa dang /sa phyogs 'ga' zhig ma yog pas ma bkram pa nyid du 'dug/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin don de sems shing yud tsam zhig
129b6('dul ba): cang mi smra bar 'dug ste/gang gis ma bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkram nas slar yang sba bar bye mi dge sa pa'i gter ha cang nyung ngu yang mi yin/ha cang mang po yang ma yin
129b7('dul ba): ba de gang yin snyam pa dang //gzho nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni gdon mi za bar ci'i phyir kun dga' ra ba'i tshod du nor gyi phung po chen po
130a1('dul ba): 'di skyed du ngas su btang zhes 'gyod pa skyeso snyam du bsams na/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras//khyim bdag gal te khyod 'gyod
130a2('dul ba): ba skyes na gser slar longs shig/kun dga' ra ba ni nga nyid kyi yin no//gzhonu bdag ni 'gyod pa ma skyes te 'on kyang don 'di sems shing yud tsam zhig cang mi smra bar 'dug
130a3('dul ba): pi nau/bdag gisam bkram pa'i sa phyogs 'di bkab nas slar yang sba bar bya mi dgos pa'i gter ha cang nyung ba yang ma yin/ha cang mang po yang ma yin pa de gang yin snyamo//
130a4('dul ba): de nas gzhon rgyal byed 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog ma yin pa ma yin zhing /chos bshad pa yang mchog ma min pa ma yin te/
130a5('dul ba): de la da ltar khyim bdag 'di kun dga' ra ba'i ched du nor gyi phung po 'di snyed yongasu btong ngo snyam du bsams nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la 'di skad ces smra so//khyim
130a6('dul ba): bdag mo bkram pa'i sa phyogs kho bo la sbyin cig/der kho bo bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig par bya'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis gzho nu rgyal byed
130a7('dul ba): lam bkram pa'i sa phyogs byin nas/der gzhonu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir sgo khang brtsig tu bcugo/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zos sbyin gyis bcom
130b1('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang brtsig par brtsams pa dang /mu stegs can zhe sdang drag pos kun nas slong ba'i yid can rnams 'dus nas/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gang na
130b2('dul ba): bder dong ste lhogs pa dang /smras pa khyim bdag khyod dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i phyir gtsug lag khang ma brtsig shig/ci'i phyir kho bo cag gis grong khyer bgos te dge sbyong go'u
130b3('dul ba): ma'i ni rgyal po'i khab yin no//kho bo cag gi ni mnyan yod yino//des smras pa/khyed cag gis grong khyer rnams bgros kyi/bdag gi nor ma bgos pas gang la
130b4('dul ba): mngon par dga' ba de'i chos kyi phung po brtsig/de rnams rgyal po'i drung du dong ba dang /der yang khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis pham par byas pa dang /mu stegs spyi rdol
130b5('dul ba): can mu cor smra ba rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag dga' dgur byed du mi gzhug ste/dge sbyong gro'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog gcig 'ongs nas/gal te do'i shugs kyis
130b6('dul ba): kho bo cag pham par gyur na/gtsug lag khang brtsigs shig/des smras pa/rung gi sor shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag/de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin
130b7('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang na bder song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa shrI ri'i dri'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dun na po khyer
131a1('dul ba): mgon med zas sbyin gyis/tshe dang ldan pA shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa shA ri'i bu mu stegs can rnams 'di skad ces khyim dudrug khyad dga' dgung
131a2('dul ba): byedu mi gzhugs te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog 'ongs nas gal te de'i shugs kyis kho bo cag pham par gyur na/gtsug lag khang brtsigs shig ces
131a3('dul ba): mtshan/de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/ji 'di rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba chung zad yod dam/'on te med ces bsams pa las
131a4('dul ba): yod par mthong ngo //su zhig la rag las par 'gyur snyam na bdag kho na la'o//yang bsnams pa ji 'di snyed cig kho na bdag la rag las pa'i tshig gis 'dul bar 'gyur//
131a5('dul ba): 'on te gzhan yang tshig gis 'dul ba yod snyam pa las yod par mthong ngo //dus ji srid kyi tshogs par 'gyur snyam na/zhag bdun lon naso//bsams nas smras
131a6('dul ba): pa/khyim bdag de bzhin du bya ste/'on kyang zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon mod zas sbyin dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/mu steg cu
131a7('dul ba): can rnams gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/mu stegs can rnams la 'di skad ces smraso//shes ldan dag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu na re de bzhin du bya ste/'on kyang
131b1('dul ba): zhag bdun pa'i nyin par bya'o zhes zer ro//de rnams kyis bsams pa/'di la rgyu gnyis yod par 'gyur te/yang na ni de 'bros 'dod do//yang na ni de phyogs
131b2('dul ba): che lo//de ma yin na dus der gdab ci dgos/bdag cag kyang phyogs btsa lo zhes de rnams phyogs btsal bar brtsams te/de rnams kyis phyogs btsal ba dang /kun
131b3('dul ba): tu rgyu mig dmyur mthong nas/de la de rnams kyis smras pa/khyod dang bdag cag ni tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa yin gyis/dge sbyong go'u ta ma'i nyan thos kyi mchog
131b4('dul ba): bdag cag gis brtsad pa'i phyir bkug na de phyogs tshol gyis/khyod kyang bdag cag gris grogs gyis shig/dus ji tsam zhig na/'di nas zhag bdun gyi bar ro//
131b5('dul ba): rung gis de bzhin du bya ste/gang gi tshe khyod cag 'dus par gyur pa de'i tshe kho bo la sbron cig/mu stegs can rnams bag tsha ba dang /sems khral skyes nas/nyin re zhing
131b6('dul ba): phyogs tshol ba dang /nyi ma 'grang bar byed do//ji tsam na zhag bdun lon pa dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bla gab med pa'i sa phyogs yangs par stan shom
131b7('dul ba): du bcugo/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i tshod du yang seng+ge'i khri ba shams//yul sna tshogs na gnas pa'i mu stegs can rnams dang /mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs
132a1('dul ba): dang /de'i nye 'khor na gnas pa'i srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ngo mtshar skyes/kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bskul nas
132a2('dul ba): 'duso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi 'khor dang bcas pas mdun du bdar to//rtsod pa'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas gdul ba'i
132a3('dul ba): skye bo rnams la bltas te/'dzum pa sngon du btang nas spyod lam zho bas seng ge'i khri la 'dzegs nas 'dug/'khor thams cad sems mi g.yeng bar tshe dang ldan pa
132a4('dul ba): shA ri'i bu la rtogs cing 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shau rI'i bus mu stegs can rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag ci re shig byed dam/'on te 'jig/de rnams
132a5('dul ba): kyis smras pa/kho bo cag gis byas/khyod kyis shig cig/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa/gal te badrag gis byas na 'jig rten lha dang bcas pas
132a6('dul ba): kyang 'jig par mi nus na/kun tu rgyu mig dmar gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du rig nas/kun tu rgyu mig dmar la 'di skad ces smraso//khyod kyis byos shig ngas
132a7('dul ba): gzhig go/de mig 'phrul byang ba yin pas/des shing sa ha ka ra shin tu me tog gis rgyas pa zhig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus rlung dang char drag po
132b1('dul ba): pab ste/des de rtsa ba nas phyung nas phan tshun du rnam par gtor te/rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi yul du yang ma gyur to//de nas des pad+ma'i rdzing zhig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan
132b2('dul ba): pa shA ri'i bus glang po che bzang po zhig sprul nas/des kun tu rnal nas ming gi lhag ma tsam zhig bzhag/des sbrul mgo bdun pa zhig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
132b3('dul ba): na mkha' lding zhig sprul te/des de blangaso//des ro langs shig sprul pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa btab pa las nyes par dpyad pa'i ro langs ni bdag nyid
132b4('dul ba): la bsod par byed pas des de nyid bsnyags pa dang /de nas de 'jigs skrag phongs shing spu zing zhes nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te/'phags pa shA
132b5('dul ba): ri'i bu skyabasu mchi lags kyis/yongasu bskyabs tu gsol/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus sngags kyi phur pa phyung ba dang /ro langs de zhi bar gyur to//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
132b6('dul ba): bus de la chos bshad de de dad pa skyes nas/smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi
132b7('dul ba): dngos po gnang na/bdag 'phags pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas gdams ngag byin te/
133a1('dul ba): des brtson pa dang /'bad pa dang /brgyal ba byas pas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom par
133a2('dul ba): gyur nas/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong pa dang /gser du mnyam pa/na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/n+dan dang
133a3('dul ba): stesto'ur mnyam pa/rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral cing rig pa dang /mngon par shes pa dang /so sor yang dag par rig pa/thob pa
133a4('dul ba): srid pa dang rnyed pa 'i chags pa dang /bkur sti la rgyub kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /
133a5('dul ba): rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to//de nas de'i 'khor rnams ngo mtshar gyi mig bgrang nas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la mngon par dad par gyur te/smras
133a6('dul ba): bab 'phags pa shA ri'i bus ni/smra ba'i khyu mchog chen po cher bcad do snyam du rig nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i gdong du lta bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
133a7('dul ba): 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin shes nas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so so yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad
133b1('dul ba): par byas so//de thos pas sems can brgya phrag du mas khyad par chen po thob ste/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed/kha cig gis ni rangs rgyas kyi byung
133b2('dul ba): chub tu/kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu/kha cig gis ni skyabasu 'gro ba dang bsgrub pa'i gzhi rnams blangs/kha cig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
133b3('dul ba): 'bras bu mngon sum du byas/kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /kha cig gos ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams
133b4('dul ba): cad spangs te//dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso//'khor de phal cher yang sangs rgyas la gzhol ba chos la 'bab pa/dge 'dun la bab pa la bkod do//mu stegs can rnams
133b5('dul ba): kyis bsams pa/bdag cag gis 'di shags kyis tshar bcad par mi nus kyis lha yang dag bsham par byas la//de nas glags rnyed nas/'di bsgrags te bsad par bya'o snyam
133b6('dul ba): nas/thams cad 'dus te/khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi drung du dong ste smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad ni bcad pas/de bas snying
133b7('dul ba): brtse bar gyis shig dang /khyod kyis gtsug lag khang du gla mi'i las bya'o//kho bo cag 'di ni ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung ngo //khyim bdag mgon med
134a1('dul ba): zas sbyin gyis smras pa/re shig 'phags pa shA ri'i bu la brtag zhes de tshe dang ldan pa shU ri'i bu gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa
134a2('dul ba): shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso//'phags pa mu stegs can rnams kyi mchod nas/khyod kyis kho bo cag gi 'tsho ba'i gzhi thams cad bcad pas na snying brtse bar gyis shig/
134a3('dul ba): dang /khyod kyi gtsug lagi khang du gla mi'i las bya'o//kho bo cag 'di na ring zhig tu gnas gnas pas yul bor na mi rung zhes mchi'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bsam
134a4('dul ba): pa la zhugs te/ci 'di dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad yod dam/'on te med snyam na des yod par mthong ngo //su zhig la rag lus snyam nu/bdag kho na la'o snyam
134a5('dul ba): nas/des bsams te smras pa/khyim bdag de la 'gal ba ci yod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/de rnams gtsug lag khang der gla mI'i las byed par brtsams
134a6('dul ba): pa na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus lcags thogs kyi mi gtum po zhig sprul nas/des de rnams las byed du bzhug par brtsams//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
134a7('dul ba): de rnams kyi gdul ba'i dus shes nas/de dang nye ba'i shing drung zhig na//'chag cing 'dug pa de/de rnams kyis mthong nas/de rnams kyis bsams pa/
134b1('dul ba): dben pa na 'dug pas/'di bsad pa'i dus ni 'di yin no//snyam nas de rnams kyis de'i drung du dong ste/bskor nas 'dun/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bsams pa
134b2('dul ba): 'di rnams bsam pa ci 'dra bas bdag gi drung du 'ongs snyam nA/ci tsam na bsad pa'i sems kyis yin par shes nas/des lcags thogs sprul pa de sprad nas/des de
134b3('dul ba): rnams las byos deng zhes thag bcug pa dang /de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu yongasu bskyab tu gsol/des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa re shig song la ngal
134b4('dul ba): sor chug cig/de rnams kyis bsam pa/'dri ni 'di lta bu re bdag nyid che ba yin te/bdag cag gis ni 'di bsad par bsams na/'di ni bdag cag la byams par
134b5('dul ba): sems snyam du rig nas/dad par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus de rnams kyis bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin shes nas/'phags
134b6('dul ba): pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par byas te de thos nas de rnams kyi 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba yi shes kyi rdo rjes bcom
134b7('dul ba): nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de rnams kyis bden pa mthong nas smras pa/btsun pa bdag cag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab
135a1('dul ba): tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i dge slong gi dngos po gnang na/bdag cag btsun pa shA ri'i bu'i spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o///
135a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/de rnams rab tu phyung bsnyen par rdzogs par byas te/gdams ngag byin te/de rnams kyis brtan pa dang /'bad pa dang /brtsal bar
135a3('dul ba): byas pas/'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang /mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste/'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad nyams pa dang /lhung ba dang /rnam par 'thor
135a4('dul ba): bo dang /rnam par 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi zil gyis mnan nas/nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas te/dgra bcom par gyur
135a5('dul ba): nas/khams gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba/bong ba dang gser du mnyam pa na mkha' dang lag mthil du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/tsan den dang ste'ur ma nye
135a6('dul ba): pa/rig pas ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dral zhing /rig pa dang mngon par shes pa dang /so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/srid pa dang rnyed pa la chags pa dang /
135a7('dul ba): bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/dbang po dang nye ba'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /rjed par bya ba dang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to///
135b1('dul ba): dri nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus btsug lag khang gi thig skud kyi mtha' gcig nas bzung /mtha' gcig nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis bzung ba dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA
135b2('dul ba): ri'i bus 'dzum dbyung bar brtsam so//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan
135b3('dul ba): thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum po mi mdzad nas/'phagaso pa shA ri'i bu ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum pa mdzad/khyim bdag de de bzhin no//de de bzhin te/de bzhin
135b4('dul ba): gshegs pa rnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni rgyu med rkyen med por 'dzum pa mi mdzad/khyod kyis 'dir thig skud bzung ba na/dga' ldan gyi
135b5('dul ba): lha'i risu yang gser gyi khang pa grub par gyur to//de nas khyim bdag mgo ni med zas sbyin ngo mtshar skyes pa'i mig bgrad smras pa/'phags pa shA ri'i bu gal te de lte nu de
135b6('dul ba): slad du yang thig skud brkyang dang lhag par sems mngon par dad par bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus yang thig sku de bzung ba dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis
135b7('dul ba): lhag par dad pa drig pa'i shugs kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/dad pa de'i 'jug thogs kho nar gser gyi khang pa rin po tsho sna bzhi las byas par gyur nas
136a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus kyang de la go bar byas//de nas khyim bdag mgon med spyan gong nas gong du bsod nams rab tu 'phel ba'i rgyud kyis gtsug lag khang
136a2('dul ba): chen po bcu drug dang /khang phrin drug cu rtsig tu bcug ste/de gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang phran drug cu brtsigs nas/yo byad thams cad kyis rgyas par byas te/
136a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang ni ba der song ste phyin pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras//'phags pa shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das gau shogs na/shul
136a4('dul ba): sadz+r-iHme du byin par 'gyur/khyim bdag dper na 'khyen mo bsgyur po'i rgya la ba tsamo//'khor mi sgyur ba'i rgyal po mchi ba'i tshad ji tsam/khyim bdag 'khor la sbyang
136a5('dul ba): ba'i rgyal po ni nyin gcig gis rgyang grags bcu'i lam du 'gro'o//de nas khyim bdag mgon med sbyin gyis gang yang mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab do'i bar gyi gshegs
136a6('dul ba): dgongs brtsigs nas gzhes sa dag byed du bcug/sbyin gtong gi khang pa dag byed du bcug/dus tshad gsol ba'i mi dag bkod/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
136a7('dul ba): kha dan gyis brgyan tsan dan gyi chus chag chag bta'o/shin tu dri zhim po'o pog par dag nye bar bkod/rta babs dag byed du bcug dus kyi dang thun tshad kyi sman dag
136b1('dul ba): klung 'jog tu bcug/de ltar tshogs bsags nas mi zhig la bsgob/kye nang rje chur spyon/khyod bcom ldan 'das gang na dang song la son pa dang kho bo'i tshig gis/bcom ldan 'das
136b2('dul ba): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha'o//gnod pa chung ngam/nyam ngab chung ngam/'tshe 'am bskyod pa yang ngam/stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/zhes zhus
136b3('dul ba): la 'di skad ces/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegasu gsol/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza'
136b4('dul ba): chos gros dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yi byad rnams kyis bstan bkur bgyid zhes kyang gsol cig/jo bo bka' bzhin 'tshal
136b5('dul ba): zhes mi des khyim bdag mgon med sbyin gyi ltar mnyan nas/rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der chas te/rim gyis rgyal po'i khab tu phyin te//de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/
136b6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug
136b7('dul ba): nas mi des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis lo//khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
137a1('dul ba): zhes bya ba nas reg par gnas sam zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//kye mi khyod dang khyim bdag mgon med zas skyon bde bar gyur cag/brdzun//
137a2('dul ba): khyim bdug mgon med zas sbyin gyis mched nas/bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod du gshegasu gsol/bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thubs cig la
137a3('dul ba): bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzim cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bkur stir bgyid do/zhes
137a4('dul ba): mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis mi de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas mi de bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan
137a5('dul ba): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngan song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba zhi ba 'khor zhi ba
137a6('dul ba): grol ba 'khor grol ba/dbugs phyin pa/'khor dbugs phyin pa/rnam par dul ba/'khor rnam par dul ba/dgra bcom pa/'khor dgra bcom pa
137a7('dul ba): 'dod chags dang bral ba/'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba mdzes pa/'khor mdzes pa/khyu mchog ba lang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/glang po che'i mchog
137b1('dul ba): glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/seng ge mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/na mkha' lding bya'i
137b2('dul ba): tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/bram ze slob ma'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu 'khor lo bsgyur ba bu stong gis bskor ba lta bu/zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/
137b3('dul ba): nyi ma 'od zer stong gis skor ba lta bu yul 'khor srung dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/'phags skyes po grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyis
137b4('dul ba): bskor ba lta bu/rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/thag bzangs ris lho ma yin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum gyi tshogs
137b5('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi tsho Da kyis bskor ba lta bu rgya mtsho g.yo ba med pa lta bu sprin chu dang bcas pa lta bu glang po dam pa dregs pa dang bral ba ltar dbang po rnams shin tu dul bas
137b6('dul ba): spyod lam gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi kunas rgyan pa/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rnam par mdzes par byas pa/'od 'dom gang
137b7('dul ba): gis brgyan pa'i sku/nyi ma'i 'od zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes pa/stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /ma 'dris pa'i
138a1('dul ba): dran pa bar gzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rgyan po du ldan pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /khyim bdag pag me mas sbyin 'a nga
138a2('dul ba): bcas pa dang /mnyan yod na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /lte brgya sbyang phrag du mas zham 'bridi byas nas/mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du gshegs//ga ga
138a3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das mnyan yang kyi gleng khyer drug shegs nas mngon par 'du mdzod pa d+ma bcas sus b+h+r-i gyi sgo'i them pa la gnas g.yos pas mnan pa da'i rgyas rnam
138a4('dul ba): drug tu g.yos par gyur te/so chen po 'di g.yos rab tu ga yos/kun du rab tu g.yas/ldeg bye tu ldog kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/shar phyogs mthon nub phyogs dmal
138a5('dul ba): nIb phyogs mthon shar phyogs dmyur/s+ho phyogs mtshan byang phyogs dma'/byang phyogs mthon b+h+rUM phyogs dma'/metha'i mthon/dngos dma'/dngos mthodun
138a6('dul ba): mai'o dam bar gyu/'jig rten 'dathams cad 'dog rten gyi 'du t+ta/snang rgya chen pos khyab par gyur//bar snang la yang m+b+hi dza 'i
138a7('dul ba): namakha'i dkyis na gnas pa'i lhas/bcom ldan 'das kyi ste nas lce'i me tog ut+pa la dang /badz+ra dang /gum ta dang /pad+ma kar po dang /aka ts+tsha khyim de
138b1('dul ba): rgya smyos kyi phye ma dang /tsan dan gyi phye ma dang /gur gum gyi phye ma dang /tA ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang /lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba rnams 'thor zhing lha'i gos rnams kyang 'thor ro//
138b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na/'di dag dang gzhan yang ngo mtshar de lta bu dog byung bar gyur to//gzhan yang dog pa rnams ni yangs par gyur to//dma' ba
138b3('dul ba): rnams ni mthon por gyur to//mthon po rnams ni mnyam par gyur to//glang po che yang skad 'byin/rta yang skad 'byin/khyu mchog rnams kyang skad 'byin to//khyim na
138b4('dul ba): yod pa'i rol mo cha byad sna tshogs pa rnams kyang rang sgra 'byin to//long ba rnams kyis ni mig gis mthong ngo //'on pa rnams kyis ni rna bas thos//lkugs pa rnams kyis ni
138b5('dul ba): sgra nus par gyur to//dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po rnams yongasu tshang bar gyur to//chang gis myos pa rnams ni myos pa dang bral bar gyur to//dug 'thungs pa rnams ni
138b6('dul ba): dug zhi bar gyur to//phan tshun 'khon byung ba rnams ni byang bar gyur to//sgyum ma rnams ni bde bar btsas por gyur to//btsan du bcings pa rnams ni bcings pa thams cad las
138b7('dul ba): thar ro//nor med pa rnams ni nor rnyed par gyur to//de dag dang gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das grong khyer du gshegs pa na ngo mtshar brgya stong dag byung bar gyur to//de nas bcos
139a1('dul ba): bkur sti chen po de lta bus mnyan yod du gshegaso//gshegs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugaso//de nas khyim
139a2('dul ba): bdag mgon med zas sbyin mdza' bshes dang /nye du dang /gnyen gyi skye bos yongasu bskor nas gser gyi bya ma bum blangs te chu'i rgyun sbreng bar brtsams pa las
139a3('dul ba): 'dzag tu ma btub pas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yid mi bde ste bsams pa bdag gis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad byas par ma gyur grang snyam pa dang /bcom ldan
139a4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyod kyis las nyes pa dang bcas pa cung zad kyang byas pa med//'on kyang khyod kyis phyogs 'dir 'dug nas sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs
139a5('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la phyogs 'di nyid phul ba yin gyis phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug lo sbrengs shig/des phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas sbrengs pa dang //bcom ldan
139a6('dul ba): 'das nyid kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis rgyal byed kyis tshal brjod par mdzad/rgyal byed kyi tshal brjod par mdzad pa na/gzhi nu rgyal byed kyis bsams pa/
139a7('dul ba): kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming thog mor smos kyang ci ma rung snyam pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis gzhonu rgyal byed kyi sems mkhyen nas dge slong dag 'di
139b1('dul ba): ni rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba yin no//zhes der ming thog mar smos pa mdzad//gzhonu rgyal byed kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis der bdag gi ming theg
139b2('dul ba): mar smos pa mdzad pa thos nas/shin tu dga' bar gyur te/dga' ba dang /mgu ba skyes pa des nor gyi rigs las bcom ldan 'das kyis phyir rin po che sna bzhi'i sgo khang byed bcugo/
139b3('dul ba): de bzhin du gnas brtan bsdugs byed pa rnams kyis kyang /mdo sde'i nang du bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra be na bzhugaso zhes gdags
139b4('dul ba): pa byaso//ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge sbyong go'u ta ma ko sA la'i ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa ni/mnyan yod du byon nas/mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshil mgon
139b5('dul ba): med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/shes ldan go'u ta ma de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhol gyis 'che'o/
139b6('dul ba): zhes thos//thos nas kyang bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig mngon du yang dag par dga' ba dang /yang dag par mgu bar 'gyur ba'i
139b7('dul ba): gtam rnam pa sna tshogs byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//kye
140a1('dul ba): go'u ta ma bdag gis shes ldan go'u tu ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid zhal gyis 'che'o//
140a2('dul ba): zhes thos legs na/go'u ta ma gang dag de skad ces lung ston pa de dag cig dge sbyong go'u ta ma la skur pa 'debs pa ma logs sam/thal bar smra ba ma lags sam/
140a3('dul ba): shes ldan go'u ta mas gsungs bzhin smra ba lags sam/chos smra ba lags sa mo/chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa lags sam/cig de dgi drung du pha rol po chos
140a4('dul ba): dang 'thun par rtsod pa'i rjesu spyod pa mchis ni/smod pa'i chos kyi gnas su mi 'gyur lags sam/rgyal po chen po gang dag de skad du smra ba de dag ni de skad du lung ston pa bden
140a5('dul ba): deng la skur pa 'debs pa ma yin thal bar smra ba ma yin/doni gsungs pa bzhin smra ba yin/chos smra ba yin/chos dang 'thun pa'i chos lung ston pa yin te/de dag gi
140a6('dul ba): drung du pha rol po chos dang 'thun pa'i rtsod pa'i rje su rtsod pa 'ongs na smod pa'i chos kyi gnasu mi 'gyuraro//rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhe na/ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
140a7('dul ba): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas//shes ldan go'u ta ma de skad gsung mod kyi/shes ldan dgo'u ta mo la bdag yid mi chis lag so//de ci'i sladu zhe na/
140b1('dul ba): kye go'u ta ma re shig rgan zhing rgan pa'i dge sbyong dang /bram ze ni 'di dag lags te/'di lta ste 'od srung rdzogs byed dang /kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /sgra 'dod kyi bu
140b2('dul ba): mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can dang /mi 'pham skra'i la ba can dang /kar+ya'i bu nog can dang /gcer bu gnyen gyi bu gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung bla na med pa yang dag par
140b3('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par bdag nyid g.yar gyis mi mchi lags na/shes ldan go'u ta ma 'khrungs nas ring po ma lags pa/gsar du
140b4('dul ba): rab tu byung bas lta smos kyang ci 'chel/rgyal po chen po gzho nu bzhi po 'dri dag la khyad du gsad par mi bya/gzhan la zil gyis mnan par mi bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/
140b5('dul ba): rgyal po chen po rgyal rigs gzhonu khyad du gsad par mi bya/gzhanu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o//rgyal po chen po sbrul gzhonu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/gzho nu la
140b6('dul ba): zil gyis gnan par mi bya'o//rgyal po chen po me chung ngu la khyad du gsad par mi bya/chung ngul zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o//rgyal po chen po dge slong gzho nu la byeng
140b7('dul ba): gsad par mi bya/gzhi nu la zil gyis mnan par mi bya'o//rgyal po chen po de ci'i phyir zhu na/dge slong gzho nur gyur kyang /do rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba'i dgra bcom
141a1('dul ba): par 'gyuraro//bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas na/bde bar gshegs kyis de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas/ston pas
141a2('dul ba): gzhan yang 'di skad gsungs//rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang //rigs btsun grags par ldan pa la//blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes//khyad du mi gsad zil mi
141a3('dul ba): mAnan//rgyal po rgyal rigs mkhas pa yis//rgyal srid dag ni thob gyur nas//chad pas gcod pa'i gnas de yod//de bas de la shin tu gdung //de ltar rang
141a4('dul ba): gi skyog srung zhing //rang gi don la lta bas ni//de ni khyad du mi gsad cing //de la legs par bag kyang bya//gal te grong ngam dgon pa'ang rung //gang du sbrul ni
141a5('dul ba): mthong gyur na//blo dang ldan pas de gzhon zhes//de khyad mi gsad zil mi munan//'di ltar sbrul ni rgyu byin//rigs ni rnam pa sna tshogs la//glags rnyed nas ni
141a6('dul ba): gzhon nus kyang //skyes pa bud med du ma zin//de ltas rang gi srog bsrung zhing //rang gi don lo lta bas ni//de ni khyad du mi gsad cing //de la legs par bag kyang
141a7('dul ba): bya/mang po sreg cing 'bar byed la//lam gnag sreg bya ze ba'i mi//blo dang ldan pas de chung zhes//khyad du mi gsad zil mi man na//me ni chung ngur gyur pa yang
141b1('dul ba): rkyen la chen por gyur pa yin//mes ni ring po mi thogs par//grong khyer dang ni grong khyer sreg/de ltar rang ga srog srung zhing //rang gi don la lta bas ni//de ni khyad du mi
141b2('dul ba): gsad cing //de la legs par byug kyang bya//lam nag sreg bya za ba'i mes//nags tshal bsregs pa gang yin de//zhag 'das nas ni 'ga' zhig tu//mdog
141b3('dul ba): ma rnams ni skye 'gyur gyi//dge slong tshul khrims ldan pa la//brten nas gang zhig tshig gyur pa//de la zla rgya yod min paste//bgro sbrul spyod pa 'thob mi 'gyur//
141b4('dul ba): tA la'i mgo ni bcad pa bzhin//ring por mi thogs ribs kyang 'chang //de bas rang gi srog srung zhing //rang gi don la lta bas ni//de ni khyed du mi gsad cing //de la
141b5('dul ba): legs par bag kyang bya//rgyal rigs dpe byad ldan pa dang //de bzhin brang 'gro me dang ni//dge slong tshul khrims ldan de la//blo dang ldan pas brnyas mi bya//
141b6('dul ba): bas rang gi srog srung zhing //rang gi ngan la lta bas ni//de la khyud du mi gsad cing //de la legs par brag kyang bya//de nas ko si la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal bac+doMs
141b7('dul ba): kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/rje su yi rangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngo nas dong ngo //
142a1('dul ba): de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba na bzhugaso//ko sa lnga'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis rgyal
142a2('dul ba): po zas gtsang la spring yig skur ba/lha dgyes pa bskyed du gsol/khyod kyi sras kyis bdud rtsi thob nas/bdud rtsis 'gro ba tshim par byedado zhes sprid pa/rgyal po zas gtsang
142a3('dul ba): gis thos nas pho nya btang ba las de de nyid du rab tu byung //gnyis pa btang ba dang /de yang de nyid du rab tu byung ste/pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par
142a4('dul ba): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung bar gyur to//rgyal po zas gtsang lag pa la 'gram pa btad nas pho nya gang dang gang btang ba de dang de dag nyid du legs par gsungs pa'i chos
142a5('dul ba): 'dul ba nyid la rab tu byung snyam nas/sems khongasu chud cing 'dug pa/'char kas mthong nas smras pa/lha ci'i slad du khyod phyag la zhal gtad nas thugs mi dgyes shing
142a6('dul ba): bzhugs/des smras pa/'char ka gang gi tshe gzho nu don thams cad grub pa dka' ba spyod pa de'i tshe/kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang ba las de dag kho'i gan du 'ongs
142a7('dul ba): nas/gzhonu don thams cad grub pa bzhugs pa 'di dang 'dir bzhugaso zhes smra'o//da ni kho bos 'phrin yig skyel ba'i mi btang na 'ga' yang 'phrin khyer te mi 'ong na ji ltar sems
142b1('dul ba): khongasu chud par mi 'gyuraro//char kas smras pa/lha bdag mchi ste bka' bzhin 'tshal nas slar mchi'o//rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/'char ka gang dang gang song
142b2('dul ba): ba de de'i ston pa phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas/de nyid du 'dug pas khyod kyang song na de nyid du 'dug par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod//'char kas smras pa/lha slar
142b3('dul ba): mchi lagaso//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang rang nyid kyis 'phyon yig bris pa/lhum su zhugs pa bzung na su//khyod ni bdag gis cher bskrun te//nyon mongs me rab 'bar
142b4('dul ba): bzhin du//rgyal po ljon shing la bsdad na//da ni khyod kyi slob ma yi//yal ga lcug ma 'phel gyur pas//gzhan ni bde bas dga' bar gyur//bdag ni sdug bsngal skal ba ldan//
142b5('dul ba): gzhan yang gang gis khyod ni ljon shing lcug phran mtshungs tsam na//bdag gi bu ni 'di yin snyam nas chung nas bskrun bskrun te//bu gcig yul mis 'bras bu yongasu spyad thob
142b6('dul ba): na//de la yon tan 'bras bu mi ster khyod la snying rje med//gang tshe thog ma bltam pa na//nyid don bsgrubs nas gnyen rnams ni//shin tu che thang phan gdags zhes//
142b7('dul ba): khyod kyi dam bca' mdzad nas ni//khyod kyis zhi gnas de rnyed na//bdag dang gnyen gyi tshogs rnams le//thugs brtse rje su zung mdzod de//gshegs par dgongs pa mdzad
143a1('dul ba): du gsol//zhes spring pa'i yi ge 'char kas khyer nas rgyus te rim gyis mnyan yod du phyin pa dang /lam gyis du pa ngal sos nas/bcom ldan
143a2('dul ba): 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa'i yi ge lagaso zhes bcom ldan 'das la yi ge phul ba dang /bcom ldan
143a3('dul ba): 'das nyid kyis bzhes nas bklag so//bklags nas yi go mtha' gcig tu gzhag pa dang /'char kas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ser skya'i gzhir
143a4('dul ba): mi gzhud dam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'char ka 'dong ngo //'char ka sngon bcom ldan 'das dang lhag par 'dris pa yin pas/de sngon gyi 'dris
143a5('dul ba): pa kho nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te mi bzhud dang bdag de mthus bkri bar bgyi lag so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di la tshig su bcad bka'
143a6('dul ba): stsal pa/gang zhig yul gyi rgyal por ma chags shing //sred 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i//sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de//gzhi med na ni gang
143a7('dul ba): gi gzhi yis bkri//gang zhig yul gyi rgyal mor ma chags shing //srod 'gas bkri ba yod pa ma yin pa'i//sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsa'i mnga' de//gzhi med
143b1('dul ba): na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri//gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa mod gyur cing //'jig rten ma btsom cung zad yod min pas//sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas mnga' ba de//
143b2('dul ba): gzhi med na ni glang gi gzhi yis bkri/gang zhig bcom nas brtsegs pa med gyur cing //'jig rten ma bcom cung zad yod min pa//sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa yi rtsal mangs
143b3('dul ba): de/gzhi med na ni gang gi gzhi yis bkri//lan la spobs pa med nas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchi lags te/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zlas gtsang la rig
143b4('dul ba): par bya'o//'char ka sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yin no//'char kas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das ci 'dra ba zhig lags/rab tu byung ba yin gyis khyod kyang
143b5('dul ba): rab tu byung shig/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyalo zas gtsang la slar mchi bar dam bcas lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'char ka rab tu byung ba
143b6('dul ba): ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du gyis shig/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na yab dang yum dang mkhan po dang /slob dpon dang /bla ma dang bla ma'i
143b7('dul ba): gnas lta bu rnams kyi chos dang 'thun pa'i tshig len 'ga' yang slar ma bzlog go/'char kas gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te de lta na rab tu 'byung lagaso//
144a1('dul ba): nas sa na du rgyu du na hUM rgya gas ga dun kun 'dun dang /smA/
144a2('dul ba): phyir rab tu phyung shig/btsun pa bge' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dung ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas 'char ka ra tu phyung bsten par rdzogs par byas te/
144a3('dul ba): skyon tu na po'i chos dag de la rgyas pa smras nas 'cha klu 'ad ni myed sbyin te/de ni ched bye dang stan cig tu 'ad cig hU~Mnyal ze mi nas nga
144a4('dul ba): rdo btsun pa bka' ban na 'tshal zhes 'char kas tshe dang ljon pa shA ri'i dro'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo zas phyug byas tAM/song nas bcom ldan 'das gang na bud
144a5('dul ba): dz+nyAn+da pa dang/com ldan 'das kyis nangs gnyis la mgo bos phyag d+hIsad+d+he/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das skyer
144a6('dul ba): nis/ma ldan 'das kyis paka' stsal pa/'tsha ga song la khyed dmang la ni rgyu 'i bu'i khyASh+mad+hAm 'jug par sman du la sh+tsakya'i dge slong 'as
144a7('dul ba): zhes brjod par byar//gar tanang du sman cig ces gleng ni 'jug par bya'o//thugs nas gal te shAkya'i dge slong gzhan yang yid dem zhes 'dzin/'dadi donas
144b1('dul ba): brjod par bya'o//gal te gzhonu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am zhes 'dri na/'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o zhes brjod par bya'o//khyod kyis rgyal
144b2('dul ba): pa'i khab tu yang gnas par mi bya'o//gal te gzho nu don thams cad grub pa yang rgyal po'i khab tu gnas par mi byed dam zhes glong na mi bzhug so zhes brjod por bya'o//gal te gang
144b3('dul ba): du gnas par byed ces 'dri na dgon pa 'am gtsug lag khang du'o zhes brjod par bya'o//gal te gtsug lag khang ci 'dra zhes 'dri na/rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyis rnam pa bris
144b4('dul ba): tI bstan par bya'o//gal te gzho nu don thams cad grub pa byon nam zhes 'dri na/byi no zhes brjod par bya'o//ji srid ci sra na byon zhes 'dri na zhog bdun lon na'o//
144b5('dul ba): zhes brjod par bya'o//des gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mchi lagaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa song shig/sa bdag rnams ni tshig gis te/
144b6('dul ba): lha rnams bsams pas grub 'gyur zhing //de bzhin bsam gtan pa rnams kyis//sems bskyed pas ni thams cad 'grub//bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
144b7('dul ba): de ji ltar skad cig de nyid la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir son pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs pa dang /tshe dong ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la dad pa mi bzad pa skyes pa de rgyal po'i khab
145a1('dul ba): kyi sgor bsdad nas smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po la shAkya'i dge slong mchis hUM gsol cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/ci shAkya'o dge slong
145a2('dul ba): gzhan dag kyang yod dam/shes ldan dag yod do//de rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/shAkya'i dge slong mchiso//rgyal pos smras pa/nang du thong shig/de nang
145a3('dul ba): du zhugs pa rgyal po zas gtsang gis mthong nas smras pa/'char kA rab tu byung ngam/des smras pa lha rab tu byung ngo //khyod slar 'ong zhes smra ba ma yin nam/'di ci yin
145a4('dul ba): 'char kas smras pa/lha bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi pho nya ni 'di lta bu ma yino bka' stsal nas/chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i phyir bdag rab tu byung
145a5('dul ba): mod kyi/bdag rang gi dad pas kyang rab tu byung //rgyal pos yan lag thams cad kyis 'khyud bstan bshams pa nyid la 'dug du bcug ste/de'i don du chu brtags pa
145a6('dul ba): gtsang ma dang /'bras bu brtags pa gtsang sbra byas te zar bcu'o/tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka mchog tu nye bar zhi ba dang /dul bar gnas pa dang ldan zhing ji skad rjesu
145a7('dul ba): bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin yongasu longs spyod//rgyal pos de la brtags nas ngo mtsher skyes te smras pa 'char ka ci gzhonu don thams cad grub pa yang 'di 'dra bar nye bar zhi ba
145b1('dul ba): yin namA/'char klas smras pa/lha bdag gi dul ba dang /nye bar zhi ba ni chung zad tsam lagaso//dpen+da d+hi ste bu/ri rab dang yungs 'bru bzhin no//rgya mtsho dang rmig
145b2('dul ba): rjes bzhin no//nyi ma dang sprin du me khyer bzhin no//na mkha' dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i bu gu bzhin no//rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/'char ka gzho nu don thams cad
145b3('dul ba): grub pa yang 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra 'am/lha 'di 'dra zhing cha byad 'di 'dra'o//rgyal po zas gtsang rgyal nas sa la 'gyel ba dang /chu mang du btab nas dbugs slar
145b4('dul ba): byung ste smras pa/'char ka gzhonu don thams cad grub pa byon nam/'cha ra kas smras pa byon no//dus ji srid cig na dgung bdun lon na'o//rgyal po zas gtsang gi blon po
145b5('dul ba): rnams la bsgob/shes ldan dag gzhonu don thams cad grub pa byon par 'gyur gyis/rgyal po'i khab dang pho breng byi dor gyis shig/'char kas smras pa/lha
145b6('dul ba): ldan 'das ni pho brang du bzhugs par mi mdzad//rgyal pos smras pa gang du bzhugs/'char kas smras pa/dgon pa 'am/gtsug lag khang du'o//rgyal po zas gtsang
145b7('dul ba): gis smras pa/'char ka gtsug lag khang ci 'dra ba yin/tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa ri mor bris te bstan to//de nas rgyal pos blon
146a1('dul ba): po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang
146a2('dul ba): phran drug cu brtsig tu chug shig/lho dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes blon pa rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang lo mnyan nas/n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi
146a3('dul ba): tshal gyi rnam pa gtsug lag khang chen po bcu drug dang /khang phran drug nu brtsig tu bcu go/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'od skad
146a4('dul ba): ces bka' stsal tote//mo'u dgal gyi bu song la dge slong rnams la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/yab sras gdan 'dzom na/khyed cag
146a5('dul ba): las su zhig lta bar spro ba de chos gos long shig/ces bsgo shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa ma'u dgal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das
146a6('dul ba): la mnyan nas/dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhir gshegs te/yab sras gdan 'dzem na/khyed cag la su lta
146a7('dul ba): bar spro ba de chos gos dge long shig ces bka' stsal to//de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul bzhi pa 'khor zhi ba/grol ba 'khor grol ba/dbugs
146b1('dul ba): phyin pa/'khor dbugs phyin pa/rnam par dul ba 'khor rnam par dul ba/dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa/'dod chags dang bral ba/'khor ba 'dod chags
146b2('dul ba): dang bral ba/mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa/khyu mchog pa glang gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu glang po che glang po che phru gu'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/seng+ge mche ba
146b3('dul ba): can gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/ngang pa'i rgyal po ngang pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/na mkha' lding byi'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/bram ze slob ma'i tshogs
146b4('dul ba): kyis bskor ba lta bu/sman pa mkhas pa nad pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/dpa' bo ru ba'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/lam mkhan 'dren po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba
146b5('dul ba): lha bu deng dpon tshong pa'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/khams kyi rgyal phran blon po'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/'khor lo sgyur ba bu stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/
146b6('dul ba): zla ba rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/nyi ma 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/yul 'khor skyong dri za'i tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/'phags skyes pa
146b7('dul ba): grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/mig mi bzang klu'i tshogs kyi bskor ba lta bu/rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lte bu/thag bzang so ris lha
147a1('dul ba): /l+h+wa ma yin gyi chags kyis bskor ba lta bu/brgya byon sum cun gsum gyi tshogs kyis bskor ba lta bu/tshangs pa chongs ris kyis tshogs kyis
147a2('dul ba): m+WAr ba stu hA/rgya mchogs pa myed du m+mA m+b+ha/na rlu d+ha swA pa r+dz+dza hU~M/byung ba dam pa dregs pa da bul byek+Sha hU~M/dbyung ba rnams shin tu dus byas snod ma
147a3('dul ba): gyi tshul ma 'khrugs pa/sgra g+has bu chen po'i mnan sum tsun gnyis kyi kun nas brtan pa/dang byang bang ba d+hAd+h+waM ngaM nus rnam pa sa pa'adi 'doms ga gis
147a4('dul ba): bad+h+wan pa'i sgra/nyi ma'i 'di zer stong pas lhag pa'i 'od can/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ra kun nas mdzes pa/stobs bcu dang/mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /mya 'dres
147a5('dul ba): pa'i na pa bar gzhag pa gsum dang /thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang bangs gcig tu 'brib n+d+ha ro hi kar byin+d+haH//rgyal pa zas
147a6('dul ba): gtsung su gzhan dun thams cod rna/d+d+ha ///sa sa glu/ nas kyang rgyul pa das gcing gis snying myongs d+mo gan dang /
147a7('dul ba): mdang gamig sa rnams pas la nas/ban+dan gyi chus tshig / shin tu nam pa nab shams gyi tshun 'byungs ma ba sa
147b1('dul ba): gang yang 'bab tshu ra ti ka nas/gang yad n+ta pro d+hA'i kun dga' ba de'i bar gyi lam shin tu mdzes par byas te/sa phyogs yangs shing rgya che bar gdan rnam par bak+Sha
147b2('dul ba): dag shom du bcugo/de nas 'bab chu ro ho/sa dge slong kha cig ni lag pa 'khru bar byed/kha cig ni so shing 'dor bar byed//kha cig ni khrus byed do//sder skya'i gzhin
147b3('dul ba): gnas pa'i shAkya rnams kyis gzhon don thams cad grub pa gshegs zhes thos so//thos nas kyang kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas bsgra'o/kha cig ni ya mtshan skyes
147b4('dul ba): nas thams cad n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba nas byung ste/ci yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed dam 'on te sras yab kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa lta'i sku mo//
147b5('dul ba): 'dul bzhi//bim pa po gcig pa/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'od snyam du dgongs te/gal te zhabs kyis ser sti'i gzhir gshegs na/shA
147b6('dul ba): rgyal can rnams/kye ma'o gzhon nu don thams cad grub pas dka' thub kyi nagasu gshegs nas lhong po zhig grub pa lta zhig ste/de lha brgya stong phrag du mas zhabs 'bring byas
147b7('dul ba): nas steng gi na mkha' las gshegs te dus de srid du dka' ba brgya stong spyad pas/bdud rtsi thob nas de zhabs kyis gshegs pa lta zhes ma dad pa skyed par 'gyuraro snyam nas/
148a1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar thugs mnyam par gzhag na/shar phyogs kyi snying gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas naspyod lam rnam pa bzhi
148a2('dul ba): mdzad de/'di lta ste/'chag pa dang /bzhengs pa dang /bzhugs pa dang /mnal bar mdzad do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par mdzad do//me'i
148a3('dul ba): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par mdzad/'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /
148a4('dul ba): dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog dag go/cho 'phrul zung du yang ston par mdzad de/sku'i slad nas 'bar bar mdzad la/sku'i stong
148a5('dul ba): nas chu grang me'i rgyan 'bebs par mdza //sku'i stod nas 'bar bar mdzad la/sku'i smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par mdzad pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
148a6('dul ba): so//shar phyogs la ji lta bar lho dang nub dang byang phyogasu yang de bzhin no//phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bstan nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du
148a7('dul ba): mdzad pa bsdus te/ta la bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhug so//dge slong rnams ni ta la drug gi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam ni ni/dge slong rnams
148b1('dul ba): lnga'i srid nam na'o//bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid rlom na'o//bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam na ni/dge slong rnam gsum gyi sred
148b2('dul ba): tsam ne'o//bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam na ni/dge slong rnam gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/dge slong rnams ta la gcig/
148b3('dul ba): gi srid na'o//bcom ldan 'das mi bdun gyi srid tsam na bzhugs na nAM/dge slong rnams mi drug gi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das drug gi srid tsam na ni/dge slong
148b4('dul ba): rnam lnga'i srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das lnga'i srid tsam na ni/dge slong rnams bzhi'i srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das bzhi'i srid tsam nA ni/dge slong rnams gsum
148b5('dul ba): gyi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das gsum gyi srid tsam nA ne//dge slong rnams gnyis kyi srid tsam na'o//bcom ldan 'das gnyis kyi srid tsam na ni/dge slong rnams
148b6('dul ba): mi gang lhag tsam nA'o//bcom ldan 'das mi gang lhag tsa ma na ni/dge slong rnams sa la'o//rgyal po zas gtsang gis cho 'phrul de lta bu de lta bu de dang /dge slong mang po
148b7('dul ba): mthong nas/de la bcom ldan 'das gang yin pa ma shes te rmongs par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/'char ka 'di ni ngur smrig gyon pa'i rab tu byung
149a1('dul ba): bamang po zhig yod na/de la gzhon nu gang yin tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bcom ldan 'das bstan nas smras pa/'di ni bcom ldan 'das lags
149a2('dul ba): srid pa'i mthar byed sems kyi dbang phyug 'dren pa lags//'di ni nyon mongs sel mdzad nyin byed de nyid don ni kun tu ston mdzad lags/'di ni dgongs pa bzhin brnyes stobs
149a3('dul ba): bcu mnga' bas kun gyi pha rol gshegs pa lags/dri med gsal ba chos kyi dbang phyug khyod kyi sras lags mi dbang de gzigs shig/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis lus
149a4('dul ba): btud nas zhabs la phyag byas te/tshig su bcad pas gsol pa/blo glos yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni//kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te/bltam pa'i
149a5('dul ba): tshe nas ni g.yos pa dang /'dzam bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o//de nas shAkya dang /shAkya mo rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs
149a6('dul ba): ba mthong nas/de ltar yab sras kyi zhabs la phyag byed pa ci tha tshig ces ma dad pa bskyed //rgyal po zas gtsang gis shAkya dang shAkya mo rnams la go bar bya ba'i phyir 'di skad
149a7('dul ba): ces smras//shes ldan dag dag dang kho bos gzhon ngan thams cad grub pa'i zhabs la phyag byas pa ma yin te/gang gi tshe gzhi nu don thams cad grub pa bltam pa na
149b1('dul ba): sa chen po g.yos par gyur cing /'jig rten 'di thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur te/'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi bar gyi mun gnag smag tu gyur pa/
149b2('dul ba): ma dang zla ba 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba'i 'od kyi snang ba nyam su ma myong ba gang yin pa de yang de'i tshe snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar gyur nas/der sen
149b3('dul ba): gang dag skyes pa de dag snang ba des sems can gang dag gcig gis gcig mthong nas shes ldan dang 'dir sems can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta/shes ldan dag 'dir sems
149b4('dul ba): can gzhan dag kyang skyes pa lta zhes do shes par gyur pa de'i tshe yang kho bos byang chub sems dpe'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byaso//gang gi tshe gzho nu dan thams cad grub pa/zhing
149b5('dul ba): las kyi mtha' la gzigs pa na/shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma la bzhugs pas/'dod pa rnams las dben pa/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa/rtog pa dang
149b6('dul ba): bcas pa/dpyod pa dang bcas pa/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba zag pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'i bras ma gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te bzhugs pa na/
149b7('dul ba): shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni shar phyogasu gzhol shar phyogasu 'bab/shar phyogasu bab kyang shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni byang chub sems dpa'i sku las ma 'das par gyur pa
150a1('dul ba): de'i tshe yang ngo mtshor rmad du byung ba'i chos des kho bo'i yid bsdus pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la yang phyag byas te/'di dang 'acom
150a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis zhabs la lan gsum phyag byas//de bas na 'di skad ces /blo gros yangs pa khyod la 'di dang ni//kun spyan zhabs la lan gsum phyag bgyis te//
150a3('dul ba): bltam pa'i tshe na sa ni g.yos pa dang /'dzom bu'i grib ma sku las ma 'das pa'o zhes smraso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzod pa de brtul
150a4('dul ba): nasa'akhor brgya stong phrag du ma zil gyis mnan nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang skad
150a5('dul ba): 'dzar cing snying dang mig mchi mas gang bas/bcom ldan 'das la tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/gzhal med khang gi gnas rnams las//yab kyi
150a6('dul ba): khab na bzhugs pa lngas/dgon pa'i 'jigs dang bcas rnamasu//ji lta bur ni 'ba' zhig bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/mi yi bdag po
150a7('dul ba): gang du ni//khyim gyi 'ching ba las grol ba//'phags pa yi ni gnas pa bcu//thub pa rnams ni gnas par mdzad/rgyal pos gsol pa/ba so gsar gyi
150b1('dul ba): rtsa bcan//shin tu bde ba bting ba yi//khro la mnal bar mdzad pa las//gdang ba la ni ji ltar mnul//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal
150b2('dul ba): rnam grol gnas mal ni//dga' ba byang chub yan lag gi/me tog bkram par chags med cing //yongasu gdung brnam sangs mnal//rgyal po zas gtsang gis
150b3('dul ba): gsol pa/dpa' bo nyid kyi khaban ni//gser bum pas khrus mdzad na//rnyog pa can la dra ba me//tshab kyis ji ltar khrus mdzad lags//bcom ldan
150b4('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//go'u ta ma dad pa'i 'bab chu rnyog pa med//bsod nams 'jug ngogs dam pas bsngags pa ste//dri la rig pa'i yon tan rmed bklas nas//
150b5('dul ba): lus mi gsher bar pha rol rab tu rgal//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/dpa' bo khyod sngon ser skya yi//tsan don gyis ni sku bskyas shing //ka ni'i
150b6('dul ba): mchog gnas mdzes pa lags//de dang bral nas mdzes ma lags//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//tshul khrims po yi rgyan yin te//tshul
150b7('dul ba): khrims nyid ni byug pa yin//gser dang nor bu rna cha dag/rmongs bskyed ngal ci zhig bya//rgyal pos gsal pa/dpa' bo nyid kyi pho brang no//glang
151a1('dul ba): shA d+haHsa bzhud //tshor mar bcas pa'i sa gzhis//zhabs kyis ji ltar gshegs par mdzad//bcom ldan 'das kyis
151a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/nga yi shing rta rdzu 'phrul rkang //yang drag rdol ba'i gzhon pa yis//sa kun rnam par rgyun yang //nyon mongs tsher mas gnod pa med//
151a3('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/dpa' bo sngon ni ka shi ka'i//na bza' ba nabs na mdzes pa las//ngur smrig rtsub po'i gos banabs pa//ji ltar khyod
151a4('dul ba): kyi sku yis brjod//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//rgyal po nga'i gos ngo tsha shes//nga yI bgo ba rnam sbyar te//de bgos thub pa zhi pa rnams//
151a5('dul ba): nags khrod na ni mdzes par 'gyur//rgyal po zlas gtsang gis gsol pa/'di ltar khyod sngon gser gyi gzhong pa nas/du ma'i ro ldan 'bras can gsol ba
151a6('dul ba): las/'di ltar gtso bo de lta'i bsod snyoms ni//phal pa gsol ba ji ltar mgur du mchi//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//zas kyi sred pa
151a7('dul ba): thams cad spangs nas ni//nges par byung dang mnyam par bzhag ldan pa'i//nga ni chos kyi ro mchog gsol mod kyi//'jig rten kun la brtse phyir de spyod///
151b1('dul ba): rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa//mgur du bde ba mang bgyid pa'i//dgun skyems kha ra'i chab gsol na//rnyog pa can la dro ba yi//cha ba ni ji ltar zhig tu gsol
151b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//mi yi bdag po glang 'thungs na//brang po la btung ba thams cad ni//dug dang 'dra bar snang gyur pa//chos kyi ro mchog pa
151b3('dul ba): btung ngo //rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa 'di ltar khyod sngon bsil khang gzhal med khang //khang bzangs steng na ji lta'i dus bzhin bzhugs//da ltar
151b4('dul ba): gcig pu nags khrod khyod bzhugs pa//blo bzangs ji ltar bsnyengs pa med par bzhugs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//go'u tam 'jigs pa'i rtsa ba gang yin de//
151b5('dul ba): dri ma bag chags bcas par ngas spangs pas//nga la mya ngan 'jigs pa med gnas te//nga la 'di na 'jigs pa chung zad med//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/khyod
151b6('dul ba): sngon khrus khang shin tu yid 'ong bar//khrus mchog khyad par 'phags pas rtag bsnyil na//gcig pu khyod ni nags khrod gnas ston par//thub dbang da ltar su yis khri
151b7('dul ba): mdzod 'gyur//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//go'u te chos kyi mtsho bran dri med pa//tshul khrims 'jug dogs dam pas bsngags pa ste//de la rig pa'i stan
152a1('dul ba): m-i bkrus na//lus mig shar bar pha rol rab tu rga la//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol p+ta/gang gis khyod ni khyad du gsod//gang las
152a2('dul ba): 'jig su rung ba ste//yid 'byung ba yang gang las skye//zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//gang gis nga ni khyad gsod dang //
152a3('dul ba): gang zhig las ni 'jigs pa dang //gang las yid byeng skyes pa dag/nyon cig khyod la bshad par bya//rga dang na dang 'chi ba ste//gal te 'di gsum yod min na//
152a4('dul ba): nga yang shin tu yid 'ong ba'i//yul rnams len dga'o bar 'gyur//rgyal po zas gtsang gis gsol pa/shAkya rnams kyi rigs dga' ba//legs par 'khrungs
152a5('dul ba): ba'i dpa' bo legs//khyod ni 'jig rten chos brgyad kyis//ji lta bur yang mgo so//de nas rab dga' dad pa rgyas byas nas//drang srong dge 'dun bskor ba byis
152a6('dul ba): nas ni//thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te//bde bar gshegs la kun nas rtog cing 'dug/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/gang
152a7('dul ba): bdag gis bus ston gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par brjodo snyam//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar 'khor de'i bsam pa
152b1('dul ba): la /khams pang bzhinas rgyu da/dang na bya shA mad du/dam smras /ma tshogs pa shA/dun rdzunas
152b2('dul ba): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/rgyal po zas gtsang nim gtogaso//lhas byin da N+Dal can las kyang du rgyal can sdig pa 'dod pa des bden pa mthong bar ma
152b3('dul ba): sakhro ba de kun nas dkris pa d+ma bcos pas m+b+ham+b+ha /gas te bdag gis di da ngaM sgyums dang du byed par shes nA/bdag gis kyang 'jig rten thams cad da
152b4('dul ba): bya ba zhig/de le shAkya rnams kyis bshes de'i tshig gis smras pa/spu byin bcom ldan 'das ni rdzu 'brel che ba mthu che ba yin gyis de skad ma stu shig/ces bzlag nas
152b5('dul ba): cing mi smra bar 'dug//tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa mejed de/dkris pas rgyal po zas gtsang mya gtogs par bre ba zas la sogs pa
152b6('dul ba): shAkya drug khri drug sbyong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zeraro//ra hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du 'di lta bu'i chos bshad pa
152b7('dul ba): mdzad de/de thos pas rgyal ba zas gtsang ma gtogs par/bdud rtsi zas la sogs pa shAkya bdun khri lnga stong gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas pa na yang
153a1('dul ba): lha sbyin de kho na bzhin du kha zer ro//'khor lhag ma rnams las kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed//kha cig gis ni
153a2('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi byung chub tu sems bskyed do//kha cig gis ni blan med pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ts+tsha/bcig gis ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du
153a3('dul ba): byasakha cig gis ni lan cig bIr 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras tho/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/
153a4('dul ba): dogra bcom par gyur/kha cig gis ni sangs rgyas la sbyangasu song /kha cig gis ni chos la/kha cig gis ni dge 'dun la ste/'khor de dag kyang phal cher
153a5('dul ba): spangs rgyas la gzhol/chos la 'bab/dge 'dun lo bab par bkod//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/sngon ni bcom ldan 'das lha dang lha ma
153a6('dul ba): smin gyi 'gro bar bcas pas/mchod pa dang rjed padang /mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur na/dastanI pas mchod kyi lhas ni ma yin sna mo//de nas shAkya gzhon nu
153a7('dul ba): zhig gis tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/drang srong chen po sgra mchog dem chos kyis//char bas 'gro ba 'di na tshom mdzad de//mi bzad lam du ltung ba'i 'jig rten
153b1('dul ba): /dros te thar pa'i lam la sbyar bar mdzod//rgyal po zas gtsang ni 'di snyam du bdag gis bla 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul tshe zhing 'di ltar mthu che ba yin sgyum s+thA/d+han
153b2('dul ba): bar dga' bas bden pa ma mthong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/rgyal ba zas gtsang gis ci'i phyir bden pa mi mthong snyam pa lngas de 'di snyam du bdag gi bu 'ab
153b3('dul ba): zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba yin no snyam ste/lhag par dga' ba las gyur gyis mdor na de'i dregs pa stong du bzhug/rgyu gnyis kyis bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur
153b4('dul ba): haM cang zhum pa dang /shin tu dga' ba'o//de la zhum pa'i sems dang //shin tu dga' ba yid kyis ma la ngas de'i zhum pa dang /shin tu dga' ba gnyis
153b5('dul ba): dubazhug snyam nas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi thu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu rgyal po zas gtsang la soms shig
153b6('dul ba): btsun pA dka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi dri chen pos/bcom ldan 'das las mi nyan nas rgyal po zas gtsang gdon pa der song ba dang /rgyal po rnas
153b7('dul ba): gtsang gis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras//btsun pa mo'u
154a1('dul ba): dgal gyi bu chen po tshur spyon/mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po khyod byon pa legaso//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gdan gshams pa nyid la
154a2('dul ba): bzhugs shig/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po stan pa shams pa nyid la 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos sems ji ltar mnyam par gzhag
154a3('dul ba): na rang gi stan las mi snang bar gyur te/shar phyogs kyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags nas/spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed de 'di lta ste/'chag pa dang
154a4('dul ba): 'greng ba dang /'dug pa dang /nyal bar byed do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed do//me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na//
154a5('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lus los 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs dag 'byin par byed de/'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po
154a6('dul ba): dang dkar po dang /lebA rgan dang /shel gyi kha dog dag go/cho 'phrol zung du yang ston par byed de/lus kyi smad nas 'bar bar byed la/lus
154a7('dul ba): kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bebs par byed do//lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed la/lus kyi smod nas chu grang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par byed pa de lta bu'i
154b1('dul ba): ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//shar phyogs la ji lta ba bzhin du dang /nub dang /byang phyogasu yang de bzhin no//phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam
154b2('dul ba): pa bzhi bstan nas/rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba bsdus te/bdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug/de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal
154b3('dul ba): gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smraso//btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba gzhan yang mchis lags
154b4('dul ba): snam/rgyal po chen po mchi so zhes tshig su bcad de smras pa/mthu che ba dang gsum rig dang /sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang //zag zad dgra bcom gang
154b5('dul ba): yin pa//thub pa'i nyan thos mang du mchis//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis bu 'ba' zhig 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che bar ma zad de//
154b6('dul ba): 'di ltar rgyu 'phrul che zhing chu ba'i rab tu byung ba gzhan yang yod do snyam nas/de shin tu dga' ba gang yin pa de dang bral bar gyur to//skabs der bcom ldan 'das kyis
154b7('dul ba): 'jig rten pa'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad/kye ma brgya byin dang /tshangs pa la sogs pa lha rnams 'ongs na/lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos bshad snyam pa dang /chos nyid
155a1('dul ba): kyis gang gis tshe/sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis 'jig rten pa thugs bstod pa mdzad dud /srog chags srog rdzang rnams kyi/
155a2('dul ba): sems kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa shes par 'gyur na brgya byin dang /tshangam pa la sogs pa lha rnams kyis lha smos kyang ci dgasadang
155a3('dul ba): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thugs bskyed pa de'i rgyu nyan thos chen pa rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi snang gongs pa mi shes na brgya byin dang tshangs pa la stsog+saswA te lha rnams
155a4('dul ba): sa/srog chags srog sbyor rnams kyis lta ga la shes/de nas lha rnams kyi dbang pa brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir 'dzi/
155a5('dul ba): rnon po'i thugs bskyed pa mdzad snyam pa las/de 'di snyam du sems te/lha'i 'khor dag pa rnams la chos 'tshod par banod snyam nas/de nas lha'i bu bran thams
155a6('dul ba): nga ba la bskyob pas thams cad pa bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'khor dag sbrul chos 'chad par bzhing kyis/n+yA krod+hA kun dga' ra dar/rin po che sna bzhi'o/rangs
155a7('dul ba): brtsegs ma gang na sna chags pa shams pazhig sbrul cig/ko'u shi ka/khyod kyi mchog tu ba nga zhes spyi'i bu ba'i thams cad pas lharnam
155b1('dul ba): dbang po brgya byin las mnyan te/n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtseg ma gdan sna tshogs bshams pa zhig sprul to//de la rgyal po chen po bzhi
155b2('dul ba): sgo bzhin 'khod pa ni yul 'khor skyong dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /lus ngan po dang /shar sgo na ni yul 'khor skyong dpung rgyan dang /rna
155b3('dul ba): cha gdub 'khor dang /phreng ba dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o//lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po lha'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//nub phyogs na ni
155b4('dul ba): mig mi bzang rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o//byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po rgyan thams cad kyis ngargyan pa'o//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis n+ya gro d+ha'i
155b5('dul ba): kun dga' ra ba che thang du brgyan du bcug ste/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das la don de rgyas par gsol to//de nas bcom ldan
155b6('dul ba): 'das brgya byin dang /chongs pa la sogs pa lha brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor nas khang pa brtsegs par bzhugs te/lha'i 'khor thal po che'i gud la rin po che sna tshogs
155b7('dul ba): kyis brgyan pa'i seng ge'i khri la bzhug so//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/rgyal po zas gtsang khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
156a1('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa mo 'u dgal gyi bu chen po dang nang du zhugs pa dang rgyal po zas gtsang la rgyal po chen po yul 'khor skyong gis rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'gro
156a2('dul ba): bar sdod cig ces bzlog go//ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lce'i 'khor dag pa lo chos 'chad de/der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dab //bzhin bzangs khyod su
156a3('dul ba): zhig/rgyal po chen po bdag ni yul 'khor skyong ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang lho sgor song ba dang /rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos mthong nas smras pa/rgyal
156a4('dul ba): po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/rgyal po zas gtsang gi smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/'phags skyes pos smos pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni
156a5('dul ba): 'phags skyes po'o//ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad de/der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi deng ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang nub sgrar
156a6('dul ba): song ba dang //rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis mthong nas smras pa/rgyal po chen po nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag
156a7('dul ba): pa la chos 'chad de/der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dngango //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang byang sgor song ba dang //rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/rgyal po chen po
156b1('dul ba): nang du ma 'jug par sdod cig/rgyal po zas gtsang gis smras pa/bzhin bzangs khyod su zhig/rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/rgyal po chen po bdag ni rnam thos kyi bu'o//
156b2('dul ba): ci'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das lha'i 'khor dag pa la 'chos 'chad de/der mir gyur pa 'jug tu mi dang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsad kye ma'o//bcom ldan 'das
156b3('dul ba): lha'i 'khor dag pa la chos 'chad pa de/bdag gis lta'o snyam pa'i 'dod pa skyeso//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis zhum pa'i rgyud gang yin pa de bral bar gyur te//bac+doMs
156b4('dul ba): kyis dgongs pa/rgyal po zas gtsang gis gal te nga ma mthong na/khrag dron mo skyugs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de yod kyis/de la thabs shig/
156b5('dul ba): bshams par bya'o snyam nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis rin po che sna bzhi'i khang pa brtsegs pa gang yin pa de shel las byas par sprul pa dang /de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis
156b6('dul ba): sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs
156b7('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang gi bsam po dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas/'phags pa'i bden
157a1('dul ba): ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/de bden pa mthong nas/lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa/btsun
157a2('dul ba): pa bdag la bla me bgyis mas ma lags/rgyal pos ma lags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/sngon gyi 'dres pa rnams kyis ma leg sa/dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams
157a3('dul ba): kyis ma lags/sdug pa dang /rang gi skye ba dang /gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags pa gang la zhes pa do ni/bcom ldan 'dus kyis bdag yo mdzad d+he/d+hAg
157a4('dul ba): dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/rus po ra po las ni rgalangan song gi sgo rnams ni bsnum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni hUM/bdag lha dang mi rnams kyi
157a5('dul ba): nang du ni bzhag/yang gsal pa/pha la len du phan gdags pa//dam pa'i bus ni bgyi bgrang //khyod kyis bdag la mdzad la ste//sems ni grol bar gzhol
157a6('dul ba): bar bgyes//khyod kyis bdag ni ngan 'gro las//drangs te mtho rim thar pa lo//bsgrim mi 'tshal bar gzhag lags te//khyod kyis dka' ba mdzad pa legs
157b1('dul ba): mgon po'i byams khyod kyis ni//bdag ni tshong pa rnyed ldan ltar//mtho ris rnyed pas skyid pa yis//longs spyod dag ni rnyed par mdzad//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bstan las
157b2('dul ba): langs te/bla gos phyug pa gcig tu gzar nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba deng log su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to//
157b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig tu sbyang bdag gi sdum par gdugs tshod sbyor zhing mchis na gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po zas
157b4('dul ba): gtsang ma la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //de nas rgyal po zas gtsang bcom ldan 'das cang mo gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la
157b5('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/zas dkar gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/zas dkar la 'di skad ces smraso//gzhon nu khong rgyal srid
157b6('dul ba): thob kyis rgyal sred khyer cig/ci'i slad du ngas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bden pa mthong bas so//gang gi gdugs la lags/de ring kho na'o//bdag gis
157b7('dul ba): kyang bcom ldan 'das gang gi nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' re bar chos bshad pa/de'i nyi ma la shAkya bdun khri bdun stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lag so//de bzhin du
158a1('dul ba): bre bo zas lu rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /des smras pa/bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi tshe tshangs pas bskor ba'i bskyed
158a2('dul ba): mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe shAkya drug khri drug stong dang bden pa mthong lags so//de bzhin du bdud rtsi zas la rgyal srid khyer cig ces smras pa dang /des smras pa/
158a3('dul ba): bdag gis kyang gang gis che bcom ldan 'das ro hi ta ka'i bskyed mos tshal du chos bshad pa de'i tshe/shAkya bdun khri lnga stong dang lhan cig bden pa mthong lagaso//gal te
158a4('dul ba): de ltar gyur na/da su zhig rgyal srid la bzhag/de rnams kyis smras pa/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ljin gyis bgyi'o zhes/de rnams 'dus nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang
158a5('dul ba): ldan rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang bskur ro//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis de nyid kyi mtshan mo nas/gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bci' ba dag sta gon
158a6('dul ba): byas nas nang par sngar langs te gdan bshams shing dor bu'i chu'i snod bzhag nas/bcom ldan 'das la spyan 'dren gyis dus tshod gsol pa btsun pa bco ldan 'das gdugs tshod
158a7('dul ba): logs na/de de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro na bza' sham thobs banabs/lhung bzed dang /chos gos bsnams te/dge
158b1('dul ba): sbyo gi tshogs kyis yongasu bskor cing /dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas/rgyal po zas gtsang gi bka s+ya gang na ba dar gshegs te byon nas/dge slong
158b2('dul ba): gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhug so//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar bzhugs par rig nas/
158b3('dul ba): gtsang zhing gsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' bas rang gi lag nas stobs shing tshim par byed de/rnam grangs du mar gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas rang gi
158b4('dul ba): lag nas bstangs shing tshim par byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsol zin nas/phyag bcabs te/lhung bzed gyu bar rig nas/gser gyi bya ma bum
158b5('dul ba): blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba phu lo//bcom ldan 'das kyis yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung dbyangs kyis yon bsngo bar mdzad pa/sbyin
158b6('dul ba): pa'i bsod nams gang yin 'dis//shAkya rnams kyis bsams pa yi//yid la ri ba rdzogs nas ni//rtag pa'i gnas ni thob par shog/de nas bcom ldan 'das so
158b7('dul ba): sgyu'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//de bzhin du gnas brtan rnams kyis kyang mdo sde la bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na
159a1('dul ba): bzhugaso zhes gdags pa byaso//bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gzhi de nyid nu bzhug so//nyi ma gcig ni rgyal po'i pho brang du gdugs tshod gsol/
159a2('dul ba): nyi ma gcig ni btsun mo'i nang du gsol//rgyal po zas gtsang gis rul pa can las rab tu byung ba'i dge slong rnams spyod lam zhi zhing sems dang ba yin na/dka' thub drag po'i
159a3('dul ba): brtul zhugs kyi khyad par dag gis lus gdungs pas/lus mi mdzes par mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/'di ltar ral pa can 'di dag spyod lam
159a4('dul ba): zhi zhing sems dang ba yin mod kyi/lus mdzes pa ma yin 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig gis/bcom ldan 'das mdzes par 'gyur snyam pa las/des bsams pa shAkya'i
159a5('dul ba): 'khor gyis yin no snyam nas/de nas shAkya thams cad bsags te smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te gzhonu don thams cad grub pa rab tu ma byung bar gyur na cir 'gyur/'khor
159a6('dul ba): lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro//khyed cig ci zhig byed par 'gyur/g.yog bgyid par 'gyu ro//da ltar gzhonu don thams cad grub pa bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal por gyur
159a7('dul ba): na khyed cag ci'i phyir g.yog mi byed/lha ci rab tu 'thung ngam/rab tu byung shig/ci thams cad dam/khyim re nas ro re'o//bka' bzhin 'tshal
159b1('dul ba): d+hA la dzA//bas gtsang gas/bung grong snor seM sgyu gzhir dris hU~M/sa bcugapa/rnal ba'i nal na du la na gnas pa'i shUHrnams kyis khyim nas derab tu/
159b2('dul ba): zung shig ces de skad bka' stsal to//bre bo zis la bu gnyis yod bam 'gags pa dang ming chen no//ming chen ni zhing las kyi mtha' la lhag par brtson no//mu 'gags pa
159b3('dul ba): ni steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhi la 'dug nas/skyes pa med pa'i rol mos rtse bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//ming chen la mas smras pa/bu rgyal pos dril sgrog su
159b4('dul ba): btsug pa shAkya rnams las khyim nas re re rab tu byung shig ni spos khyod dbang byung shig sgri pa bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung gis khyod kyi bu sdug pa bde ba dang ldan par gnas pa gang yin pa de rab tu
159b5('dul ba): thung shig/bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can gyi sems canA da la khyod mgran ma tshol cig/yum khyod gang la dgyes pa de bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po can lags
159b6('dul ba): mod/de ring de la chung zad kyang ma bskur dang /ci bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po lags sam/ma lags mngon par 'gyuraro//bu de bzhin du byas te/yid ches
159b7('dul ba): par bya'o//des gzeb stong pa rje'u gyis bkang nas kha ras dkar pos dkris te/rgyu skegs la rgyas btab nas/bu mo mngag gzhug me'i lag tu bskor nas bsgo ba
160a1('dul ba): gal te den ci yod ces 'dri dang /ci yang ma mchiso zhes smros shig/des de khyer nas song ba dang /lha rnams kyi dpung po brgya byin gyis shes/
