160a2('dul ba): pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas des bsams pa/rang sbyangs rgyas kun shes la bsod snyoms phul ba grang yin pa de deng ci'i phyir zas kyis phongs par bya//de'i
160a3('dul ba): zan sbyar bar bya'o zhes des rje'u de rnamasu sran tshod dang /tshad ma sna tshogs ro dang ldan pa dang zas kyis bkang //ji tsam na mngag bzhug ma des khyer nas ma 'gags pa'i
160a4('dul ba): drung du phyin po dang /des smras pa/bu mo 'o na nI n+di yod/des smras pa/gzhi nu tsi yang ma mchiso//ma 'gags pasu bsams pa/bdag la ma byams na/
160a5('dul ba): 'di stong par ci ste bskur/gdon mi za bar 'di ni ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i zas shig bskur gyis re shig blta'o zhes ci tsam na kha phye ba dang /bskyed mos tshal de
160a6('dul ba): thams cad zas kyi dri zhim pos gang bar gyur to//de bsdums nas mA 'gogs pa mchog tu ya mtshan skyes//da mA la gus pa yin pas/des ma la zos kyi phud bskur
160a7('dul ba): nas spring ba/yum gdugs re re zhing zas ci yang ma yin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di lta bu she dag bskur ba'i rigaso//des kyang mthong nas mchog tu ye mtshan skyes te/des
160b1('dul ba): ming chen la bstan nas/bu mthong ngam yum mthong lagaso//khyod la kho mos sbyar bsod nams kyi dbang zang chen po'i sems can mo'i bsgral pa brnang po dang ldan pa la khyod
160b2('dul ba): mgran ma tshol cig ces ma smras sam/des smras pa yum bsod nams kyi dbang thang chen po dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bdag ni rab tu mi 'byung zhes de ltar ming chen
160b3('dul ba): gnas skabs thams cad du rab tu byung bar khas yin tum btog/de nas des me 'gags pa la smras pa/bu rgyal pos dril sgrog su bcug pa shAkya rnams la s+t+wa~M/khyim
160b4('dul ba): rero nAs re ri rab tu byung shig rjes bskon/khyod ci rab tu 'byung ngam/don te khyim par 'dug/des smras pa/yum rab tu byung ba la bon yon ci mchis/nyes
160b5('dul ba): dmyigs ci mtsho ste/khyim par mchis pa la phan ldanaHmchis/nyes dmigs kyi/bur tu byung bas legs par bsgrubs nA/mya ngan las 'das
160b6('dul ba): pabathob par 'gyuraro//legs pa ma bsgrubs na lha dang mi thob pur 'gyuraro//khyim par 'dug par legs par bskyangs na/lha dang /mi thob bo//ma bskyung na
160b7('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /ya~M dgas thob bo//yum rab tu byung ba'i nyes dmigs gang lags pa doni//khyim na gnas pa'i phan yon lags pas/
161a1('dul ba): bas na khyim na gnas pa mi 'tshal gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang rab tu 'byung //des smras pa/bu legs kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/ma 'gag/
161a2('dul ba): pa'i ne'u zla shAkya'i rgyal po bzod ldan yin pas de'i drung du song ngo //de'i tshe shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan pa wang len te/de bi wang len pa na/rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du
161a3('dul ba): gyur to//mi 'gags pa/pi wang len pa la byang ba yin pas//des sgra ci 'dre bar gyur pa'i rtags bzung nas de skor bsdad de/sgo srungs kyi mi ya~M smras pa/kye nang rje
161a4('dul ba): song la rgyal po bzang ldan la ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas sgro na sdod cing mchi so zhes gsol cig/sgo srungs song nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan la
161a5('dul ba): smras pa/lha ma 'gags pa lha'i zhal mthong bar 'tshal nas ma sgo na sdod cing mchiso//des smras pa//shes ldan ma 'gags pa la su 'gog/shes ldan ma
161a6('dul ba): 'gags pa nang du thong shig/de nang du zhugs pa dang /rgyal pos 'khyud nas 'dug tu bcug ste/smras pa/khyed 'ongs nas ji srid lon/des smras pa/
161a7('dul ba): gang gi tshe khyod pi wang len pa na rgyud chad nas sgra gzhan du gyur pa nas so//de mchog tu ya mtshan skyes nas/des smras pa/khyed pi wang len pa la byang ba yin no//
161b1('dul ba): shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/gzhonu don ci zhig la 'ongs/ma 'gags pas smras pa/lha rgyal po zas gtsang gis dril sgrogasu bcug pa shAkya rnams la khyim re nas
161b2('dul ba): re rab tu byung shig par bsgo bas/de khyod kyis mkhyen par mdzod cig/rab tu 'byung ngo //rgyal pos smras pa/gal te de ltar ni kho bo yang rab tu 'byung ste gros bya ba yod
161b3('dul ba): kyis khyod de ring 'di nyid du gnas thob shig/des de nyid du gnas btab bo//mal cha bas rims bag gi dri can gyi gos kyis bting zhing me tog gi sil mas bkram po'i mal
161b4('dul ba): du ma 'ogags pa nyal ba dang /de'i 'og na me tog gi rtsa ba yod pa'i reg pa de'i nyam su myong nas smras pa/ci 'di'i 'og na rdo phre'u yod dam/de rnams kyis brtag par brtsams
161b5('dul ba): ba na/me tog gi rtsa ba zhig mthong nas de rnams mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes//ma 'gogs pas mtshan mo mi bde bzhin nyal nas nam nangaso//rgyal pos smras pa/ma
161b6('dul ba): 'gags pa cig bde bar gnyid log gramades smras pa/lha bde bar gnyid ma logo/rgyal pos smras pa/ci'i phyir/ma 'gags pas smras pa/lha rims drag
161b7('dul ba): gi dri can gyi gos bting bar me tog gi sil ma bkram po'i me tog gi rtsa bras lus snad lag so//rgyal pos mal 'cha' ba bkug nas/khyod kyis rims bag gi dri can gyi
162a1('dul ba): gos bting ste ci bya/mal 'cha' bas smras pa/lha bdag la dkor bas btang pa lagaso//rgyal pos dkor ba bkug nas smras pa/khyod kyis
162a2('dul ba): rims bag gi dri can gyi gos phog ste ci bya/des smras pa/lha bdag la thag pas btad pa lagaso//rgyal pos thag pa bkug nas smras pa/khyod kyis ci'i phyir rim
162a3('dul ba): bag gi dri can gyi gos dbul/tha gau pas smras pa/lha snam bu 'thag pa'i 'phro cung zhig lus pa na/bdag rim gyis thebs bzhin gyis pa lagaso//rgyal pos smras
162a4('dul ba): pagazhonu khyod kyis ci ltar shes/des smras pa/tsha ba'i reg pa nyamasu myong bas rims bag gi dri lagaso//rgyal po mchog tu ya mtshan skyes te smras pa/shos
162a5('dul ba): ldan ma 'gags pa ni shAkya'i bskal pa bzang po dang ldan pa yin no//de nas shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/gzho nu gal te kho bo rab tu byung nas lhas sbyin shAkya
162a6('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal por gyur te/de shAkya rnams kyi gnod pa byed par 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag cag thams cad 'dus la//
162a7('dul ba): lha sbyin spro ba bskyed par bya'o zhes shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis de bkug ste/de nas thams cad 'dus nas smras pa/lha sbyin kho bo cag thams cad rab tu 'byung na/khyod kyi
162b1('dul ba): byed lhas sbyin gyis bsams pa/gal te rab tu mi 'byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur gyis/dri la thabs shig bshams
162b2('dul ba): phyir bya ste bslu'o//gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gis nyi ma la n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba sgyu ma'i tshe 'phrul bstan pa de'i tshe bdag blo skyes pa ji ltar 'di'i sgyu mas skye bo'i
162b3('dul ba): tshogs chen po dbang du byed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang dbang du bya'o zhes bsams snyam nas smras pa/khyed cag rab tu 'byung na bdag ci ste 'dug/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ljon gyis
162b4('dul ba): bsams pa 'di ni/brdzun du smra ba yin gyis/dam 'tshor bcug la 'gro ba mang po so sor rig par bya'o snya mo//de nas rgyal pos tshig de glegs bu la bris nas/grong khyer
162b5('dul ba): sder skya'i gzhir dril sgrogasu bcug pa/grong khyer ser skya'i gzhin gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/bzang ldan dang/nam gru dang /ma 'gags pa dang lhas
162b6('dul ba): sbyin lo sogs te/shAkya lnga brgya rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur gyis/thob par gyis le/rab tu dga' ba bskyed cig/ces bsgo'o//lha sbyin gyis de thos nas sdug bsngal
162b7('dul ba): chen po dang /yid mi bde ba skyes nas/gal te bdag gis shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan nges par rab tu 'byung bar shes par gyur dang /bdag khas len par mi 'gyur ba zhig na//
163a1('dul ba): don gal to ba tu ma byung nu ban du sgru ba yin na nas/rgyal sprod kyang thob par mi 'gyur bas/thams cad kya mas cad du dus 'dir byed dam cas
163a2('dul ba): rab tu byung la baidag rab tu 'byung bzhin du rgyal srid bye'i snyam//de nas rgyal po zas gtsang 'di snyam du sems te/shAkya rnams kyi tha ma'i 'byor bi la blta'o snyam nas/
163a3('dul ba): des grong khyer de bsreg ma dang sgo mobs pa//tsan+da dan gyi chus chag chag btab/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan bskrong /dar gyi chun 'byangs mang po spyangs
163a4('dul ba): shin dri nam pani dag par nye bar bzhan/mai rtag sna tshogs kyi si lams dga' dga'i ltung byed du bzlog/de nas shAkya brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor nas
163a5('dul ba): grong khyer gyi sgo na sa ng+ge'i khril 'dugashAk+Sha ma dang shAk+ka/gzhon ma ngo mtshar skyes bya rnams dang /snyir khring khol ma can dngong //skyer khrod dang /sngags bu dag
163a6('dul ba): 'ashA rnams kyi 'byor ba la lci bar 'dod pa'i smra ba'i tshogs yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa dag kyang lam pa che dang /tshong 'dus dang /bani mdo da
163a7('dul ba): sum mi rnamasu dug go/shAkya la su dag gis ni mnyes par 'gyur/suM dag gi thugs byung bar 'gyur ba brtag pa ni phyir/bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /
163b1('dul ba): man dag bdun/shAk+Sha rnams do shal dang /gdu dang /dbang rgyun dang /rgyun gyis brgyan pa rnams kyis pa dang /ma dag las bltas nas sa sa shr-I d+ha zhugs/
163b2('dul ba): te/phyir 'byung bar brtsams pa nu/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan sna la byung ba/mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas/de dag gis smras pa/re shig 'dis ni
163b3('dul ba): mnyes par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du nam gru dang /ma 'gags pa la stsogs pa phyir byung ba dang /de rnams kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan to//de nas
163b4('dul ba): lhas sbyin phyir byung ste/de phyir byung ba na/bya khrus gtsug gi nor bu phrogs pa mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mthong nas de rnams kyis smras pa/'di'i rtags dang /sbyar
163b5('dul ba): na gdon mo za bair sbyin pa la 'khros nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ro//ko ka li ka dang /len du drub b+hA dang /ka ta mo ra ka ti shi dang /rgyu mtshos sbyin rnams phyir
163b6('dul ba): 'byung ba na/bong bu'i skad phrag nas/de dag kyang mtshan mkhan rnams kyis lung bstan pa/'di dag gis kyang nyan thos chen po rnams la chog ngan po smras nas dmyal
163b7('dul ba): bar gzhol bar 'gyuraro//nye dga' glang po che la zhon pas phan tshun du lta bar byed pa ni/mu tig gi do shal lhung ba dang /de glang po che las babs te blangaso//
164a1('dul ba): gluyang rnams sa lung kun du/ d+hanang dunaHsabs sums can byas sas na//donas sa spyan dang /rnam/
164a2('dul ba): rlu dang /sa g+sags pa dang /sbyin la gas pa sh+tsa lnga pa rnams paskyed mas che sa dus sbyin 'gro pa na du ga mas mthun cing ba sa
164a3('dul ba): 'di sa gangan ba der dang //bcoMs 'dus kyis dgongs pa/gal t+ne des shAk+Shu rnams la dge slong tshur shigs bya bas rab tu rdzunan/dbyig gis
164a4('dul ba): nims par byed pa 'gyur/khacig gis ni mnyes par byed par mi 'gyur te/sa byed pa mi 'gyur ba gang dag /yin po dag gzhan du sems sa dan slong
164a5('dul ba): shog ces bya ba ni thams cad srid pa tha ma yin pa/ma langs thams cad dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba dang /bzhi las kyis re tu byung bdang /
164a6('dul ba): rjeg su bzlog snyam du dgangs nis/dge sbyong rnams la bka' stsal padage slong dag ser sna g+sa ga rnams gsol ba dang sa
164a7('dul ba): 'byung ba da/bsnyen par rdzogs par gyis shig/'atsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes dge slong de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das las mnyan to//
164b1('dul ba): ba zas gtsang gis shAkya rnams kyi 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor zhes bya ba de rnams rab tu 'byin pa na/sgyu 'dreg par btang nas/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyi sgyu 'dreg pa na/
164b2('dul ba): de ngom zug nag cing mi tshi ma 'dzag le skad 'dzer cing dbugs brdzangs por sgra 'dreg par byed//shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/nye bar 'khor ci'i phyir du
164b3('dul ba): de snying rje rje skad du gcom chung ngur dal bus tshig re nas smras pa/lha bdag 'dzam bu'i gling gi skyes bu gtso bo rnams la bsnyen bkur bgyid bgyid pa mi 'phel pa rnams la
164b4('dul ba): yang bsnyen bkur bgyid pa 'gyur ba lta zhig/khyed kyis spangs te gson pas ni gum mi bsngo'o//shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis smras pa/nye bar 'khor khyod kyis
164b5('dul ba): jo bo la snying nye ba'i mnyes par bya ba bstan zin te/chog gis mya ngan ma byed cig/ngas ci lta mi phal po rnams la bsnyen bkur byed par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes
164b6('dul ba): smras nas/des phyogs gcig tu ras shig bting nas shAkya gzhonu rnams la smras pa/shes ldan gzhonu dag nyon cig/'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'dis
164b7('dul ba): bdag cag la bkur sti byas la bdag cag kyang slar khyim du mi gnas kyis/rgyan rnams de'i 'tsho ba'i rkyen du ras kyi steng du zhog cig/de rnams kyi se mo do dang do shal dang mgul
165a1('dul ba): rgyun dang /gdu bu dang /dpung rgyun dang /rnam la sogs pa rin pa che sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa/rgyun khyad par can rnams kyis ras kyi spyang du phung po chen por
165a2('dul ba): spungaso//nye bar 'khor gyis de rnams mthar gyis skra phrogs te/de rnams khrus la dong ba dang /des bsamos pa re shig gzhonu 'di dag rigs kyi/'byor pa dang /lang
165a3('dul ba): tshal bab cing chung ma dang ldan la mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu 'byung na/bdag rgyan 'di tsam la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//
165a4('dul ba): gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na/bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung zhing chu bo las rgal ba dang /sbyor ba las yang dge bar 'da' bar
165a5('dul ba): bya ba'i phyir brtsal ba dang /'bad pa la brtson par bya ba zhig sgyum mo//'di ni chos nyid yin te/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan
165a6('dul ba): lan gsum du sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la gzigs pa de bzhin du nyan thos chen po rnams kyang byed pas/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor lhag
165a7('dul ba): pabapar skyo ba skyes pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor la 'di skad ces smraso//nye ba
165b1('dul ba): 'khor khyod ci'i phyir shin tu mi dga' bas lag pa 'gram pa la gtad nas sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/btsun pa shA ri'i bu/gang gi phyir da ltar
165b2('dul ba): gzhon 'di dag rigs dang /'byor pa dang /yang tshol bab cing chung ma dang ldan la/mdzod dang bang mdzod kyis rgyas pa yang spangs nas rab tu byung na/bdag rgyan 'di tsam
165b3('dul ba): la chags pa ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//gal te bdag rigs ngan du ma skyes na bdag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing chu bo las
165b4('dul ba): rgal ba dang /sbyor ba las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir brtul ba dang 'bad pa la brtson por bgyi ba zhig na/bdag ci'i phyir sems khong du chud par mi 'gyur/
165b5('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/bzhin bzangs thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni rigs snying por byed pa ma yin/rus snying por byed pa ma yin/rgyud snying por byed
165b6('dul ba): pa ma yin/thos pa snying por byed pa ma yin te/'di ltar thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung rab 'di la ni sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no//de bzhin gshegs rnams rigs
165b7('dul ba): dang ni//rgyud dang rus la rtog mi mdzad//'das nas yun ring lon pa yi//las rnams la ni rtog par mdzod//gal te legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
166a1('dul ba): la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po 'dod na chur/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dod dang /khyod bac+doMs
166a2('dul ba): kyis rab tu 'byin par 'gyur ro///'dul ba gzhi//bam po go gnyis pa//des khas blangs//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
166a3('dul ba): bus 'dreg mkhan nye bar 'khor 'khrid de/bcom ldan 'das gad na bder dong nas phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom
166a4('dul ba): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te//btsun pa nye bar 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa/dge slong
166a5('dul ba): gidangos po 'tshal lags na/thugs brtse bar nye bar bzung ste/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di rab tu dbyung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs par mdzad du gsol
166a6('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal pa/dge slong tshur shog tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i mod kho nar skra byi ba dang /
166a7('dul ba): snam sbyar gyon pa dang /lag paM lhung bzed dang /bye ma bum gyis 'brel pa dang /skra dang kha spu skyes nas zhag bdun lon pa tsam dang /dge slong bsnyon par rdza
166b1('dul ba): nas/la brgya lan pa'i spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to//smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas chur shog bka' stsal pas/swA byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan
166b2('dul ba): zhing mod la dbang po rabazhir gnas gyur te/sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/shAkya rab tu byung ba rnams ni rgun rabs ji lta ba bzhin
166b3('dul ba): du 'dud pa byed pas/shAkya'i rgyal po bzang ldan 'dud pa byed pa na/nye bar 'khor gyi rkang pa yin par shes//de nas des gdong btig ste gsol pa/bcom
166b4('dul ba): ldan 'das 'di ni nye bar 'khor legs na/ci bdag gis 'di'i rkang pa gnyis la yang btud pa bgyi 'am/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i
166b5('dul ba): phyir rab tu byung ba yin te/'di rgan gyis khyod kyis nga rgyal gyi dregs pa cho ga la thung cig/des de'i rkang pa la btugs pa na/sa chen po lan drug tu g.yos par gyur te/
166b6('dul ba): so chen po 'di g.yos rab tu g.yos/kun tu g.yos/kun tu rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu ldeg/kun tu rab tu ldeg ste/shar phyogs mtho na nub phyogs dma'/
166b7('dul ba): nub phyogs mthon shar phyogs dma'/lho phyogs mtho ni byang phyogs dma'/byed phyogs mtho na lho phyogs dma'/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/mtha' mthon
167a1('dul ba): bas dam ba gyu te/de ltu thams cad stos mas bshin dugatugs//skyes sgron gyis ma ba ts+tsha/m+b+ha ldan sa
167a2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/bu nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba yin gyis thung cig/des gsol pa/bdag gis de'i dang pa la ma gtugs na khyod la gnod pa ci mchis shes
167a3('dul ba): 'dud du mi btub ste/do thog mar bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lhas sbyin gyis bcag//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas
167a4('dul ba): bco ma ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa shwek+Shu'i rgyal po bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor la phyag bgyis pa dang /so chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa log na
167a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni chos nyid yin te/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'odi 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis nga'i rkang pa la
167a6('dul ba): gtugs pa na/sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA ra na sa na/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba/'byor pa dang /rgyas
167a7('dul ba): ba dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /ma mang pos rab tu gad ba ni/rgyal srid byed du 'jug/de'i tshe bA ra na so'i grong khyer na smad tshos bzang mo zhes bya ba
167b1('dul ba): zhog gnas pa dU d+hA du sa na khyom sbya ga la nas byub spyod nas smras b+hA/ yad sto dga' dU sna sa chur shog/des smras du/khyud la kA shA gan sgrub cu
167b2('dul ba): yod dam/des smras pa med do//song la ka sha pa ni lnga brgya khyer te shog cig/de la 'byor pa mod kyang /de de la lhag pas chags pas/dus dus su me tog
167b3('dul ba): dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyel bar byed pa dang /de de la sdug pa skyes//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/b+hu ra na ser dus ston byung nas bud med thams cad gos
167b4('dul ba): dang phreng ba dang /rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas/rang gi khyim na rtse zhing dga' ba mang pos gnas pa de/bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dgas thos nas yi chud par gyur to//
167b5('dul ba): spyad 'tshong ma bzang mos bsams pa/de ring bA ra na so'i mi rnams gos dang /phreng ba dang /rgyan rnams kyis klubs nas rang rang gi chung ma rnams dang lhan cig dga' dgu
167b6('dul ba): spyod par gyur na/bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga'i su zhig dang /dga' dgur spyod par 'gyur nas de de snyam du sems shing /bram ze'i khye'u mdzes dga' gang na yod pa'i
167b7('dul ba): phyogs der 'ongs nas/des de mthong ba dang /sngon gyi byas pa drin du gzo bos yid bde ba skyed nas smras pa/bram ze'i khyo'u song la shin tu dri zhim pa'i me tog dag khyer
168a1('dul ba): shog cig/bdag cag lhan cig dga' dgung spyad par bya'o//de shi ba las sos pa bzhin du dga' bas sems kyi rgyud ngo mtshar gyis bsdus
168a2('dul ba): nas song ngo //de'i gzugs dang /lang tshwa dang /g.yer ba'i yon tA ni la brtags nas myos shing zhen pas mtshan thig thag gnyid ma log pas/nam nangs
168a3('dul ba): pa dang /mtshan mo gnyid kyis shin tu lci bar gyur nas/ji tsam nyi ma shar gyi bar du go nyid log nas gang gi tshe badzin gyi dus ston gyi tshe du me tog thaMd btus zin pa de'i tshe sadunas ma
168a4('dul ba): tog gi ched du phan tshun song ba na/ma rnyed nas des shing shi ri shu zhes bya ba'i me tog dag khyer nas/de'i drung du song ste/tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/g.yang gzhi
168a5('dul ba): thogs pa bri bo mdzes dga' ni/mai shaM phyed med rgyud zhan snyoms las kyis de ring shing rnams me tog rgyas dus na'ang //sbyin pa'i me tog shir shA 'di
168a6('dul ba): yin do//des smras pa/sod la me tog gzhan drug khyer lA shog ciga'adod pa rnams la sor rten por byed poni/kun d+he sbyor bsags hU~M/de'i 'dod /
168a7('dul ba): chags rab tu 'phel bas/sos ki'i zla ba tha me'i nyen par sprin med cing rlung mi ldang bar 'dug pa'i nyi ma phyi'i dus dang grong khyer nas shin tu thag ring ba'i yul dgon
168b1('dul ba): padag tu mgo 'dren pa dang dkyus ma dag dbyang su len cing me tog thu'o//rgyal po tshangs sbyin yang ri dgas shor du chas pa na/de nyi ma'i 'od zer rnon pos gdungs nas/grib
168b2('dul ba): ma'i tshad du phyogs der son pa nA de'i glu'i sgra thos nas tshig su bcad nas/smras pa/steng nas nyi mas gdungs byed cing //'og nas byoms gdungs pa la//glu len khyod
168b3('dul ba): kyi lus la ni//ci'i phyir nyi ma'i gdungs pa med//mdzes dgas kyang tshigasu bcad smras pa//bdag ni nyi mas ma gdungs te//rtog pa yis ni bdag gdungs legs//
168b4('dul ba): bya ba bya ba ma yin pas//'jig rten 'dir gdungs nyi ma min//rgyal pos bsams pa/bram ze'i khye'u 'di ni gdon mi za bar gsil bar byed byed pa'i gtam la
168b5('dul ba): mkhas pa zhig yin te/des na nyi ma phye'i tshe 'dug nas me tog thu'o snyam nas/des de bkug ste/smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u re shig bsil bar byed pa'i gtam
168b6('dul ba): dag byos shig/mnyan to//des bsams pa/rgyal po de ni gdon mi za bar lus gdungs pa yin te//des na 'di skad ces smra'o snyam nas/des bsil bar byed
168b7('dul ba): pi'i gau ta ma rnam pa sna tshogs de la smras pa thos nas/rgyal po lus kyi gdung ba dang bral bar gyur to//rgyal po mngon+d+ra par dka' bar gyur nas/blon po rnams la smras pa/
169a1('dul ba): shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bsgyur ba'i srog sbyin pa gang yin pa de la lan du phan cig dgas/lha rgyal srid phyed kyis//de nas
169a2('dul ba): rgyal po des smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u ring rgyal po'i pa blang du gnas thab cig dang /ngas rgyal sbrid kyi byed sbyin no//de rgyal ba'i pho byang du ma la bzang ba byin nas du de la
169a3('dul ba): nyol ban/bzang mo rje su dran par sems shing rgyal srid phyed pa de yang smad 'tsheng ma par kyi gyi gling snyam//yong bsems pa/rgyal srid byed po de la longs spyod pa'i rgyal
169a4('dul ba): bo de ci 'dra ba zhig/me la bdag gis de srog dang bral bar bya'o snyam//yang bsams pa/rgyal po bsad pa'i rgyal srid gang yin pa des ci zhig bya sbrum nos tshig su bcad
169a5('dul ba): smras pa/don ma gru na 'dod 'gyur la//don grub 'dod pa ldog mi 'gyur//ma grub na ni phongs gyur pas//de bas don ni don ma yin//ji tsam nam nangs nye ba
169a6('dul ba): ni//de 'gyod pa skyes nas mal nas babs te g.yang gzhi sa le bting nas nyal lo//nam nangs pa na rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag bram ze'i khye'u de khrid cig/
169a7('dul ba): del rgyal srid phyed sbyin no//rgyal po'i pho nya dag 'ongs pa na mal chen po nas babs te/gAyang gzhi sa la bting nas nyal bas thong ngo //mthong nas kyang me dang pa
169b1('dul ba): skyed do//rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/lha 'di ni rgyal srid kyi 'os ma lags//rgyal pos smras pa/ci'i phyir de rnams kyis smras pa/lha nyon mongs
169b2('dul ba): ma'o chen po gya nom pa spangs te/g.yang gzhis la bting nas mchis/nyal ba'i dman pa lo mos pa gang lags pa de la rgyal srid sprul te tsirI rung /rgyal pos smras pa/
169b3('dul ba): shes ldan dag shes rab can de de la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur gyis khug cig/de rnams kyis de bkug pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/kyi bram ze'i khye'u khyod ci'i phyir mal
169b4('dul ba): chen po las babs te/g.yang gnyis la gting nas nyal/des ji ltar gyur pa rnams rgyal ba la rig par byas nas des smras pa/lha gnang bar mdzad cig dang
169b5('dul ba): rab tu 'byung //rgyal pos smras pa/dam zhig bca' ste/gala~M ti khyod rab tu byung nas/khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad rtogs/ngal brjod pa lta
169b6('dul ba): na gnang //des de bzhin du 'gyi'o zhes khas blang so//de nas des zhi ba'i phyogasu song nas mkhan po dang /slob dpon med par rang byang chub rtogs par byas nas
169b7('dul ba): rang sangs rgyas des bsams pa/bdag gis rgyal po de la sngon khas blangs pas sing la/khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o zhes de rgyal ba'i drung du song nas steng gi na mkha'
170a1('dul ba): la mngon par 'phags te/'bar ba dang gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsam so//rgyal
170a2('dul ba): pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te tshig su bcad pas smras pa/dge ba ci zhig btsal byir rab tu byung ba yi//bram ze'i khye'u yis rnyed pa legs parnyed/chung zad
170a3('dul ba): las kyis rnam smin bskyed pa yi//nyer 'gros khyad par chen po 'dir rtogs ltos//rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyi sgra mkhan gang //gang ga spyong zhes bya ba zhig yod
170a4('dul ba): pa de des mdzes dgas tshigasasu bcad pas smras pa/'dzin du bcug nas smras pa/gu ge sbyong la tshig su bcad pa de yang dang yang du dran par gyis shIg/sgra mkhan
170a5('dul ba): gang ba skyong rang gi gzo la shin tu byang ba yin pas/de gang gis tshe rgyal po tshangasra sbyin gyi kha spu 'chos pa de'i tshe gnyid log par 'gyur zhing se gol gyi sred par byas
170a6('dul ba): tesad nas kyang gang ga skyong de la mchog gang 'dod pa gsol cig ces mchog sbyin par byed pa ni des smras pa/lha gsol ba zhig mchiso//gang gi tshe gang gi
170a7('dul ba): skyong gis rgyal po la tshigasu btsod pa dran par byed pa de'i tshe/rgyal po 'dod pa'i gtom la sems kyang mi 'gro na/'dod pa zhen cing smod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/
170b1('dul ba): btsun ma lo lta bar yang mi byed do//btsun mo rnams nyon mongs pas myos shing zhen nas gang ga skyong la smras pa/nang po gang de cha/khyod la lhas mchog sbyin par mdzad pa dang
170b2('dul ba): tshalha gal te bdag la dgyes na/tshigasu bcad pa 'di'i don rgyas par bshad du gsol zhes gsol cig/rgyal pos tshigasu bcad pa de'i don rgyas par rnam par
170b3('dul ba): bkrol ba dang /de skyo ba skyes nas rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/lho bdag gis bstan bkur dgyis lags kyis/khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung ngo //
170b4('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gal te rab tu byung nas yon tan gyi tshigs cung zad thob na nga la rig par byos shig/des smras pa/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/snyan du gsol
170b5('dul ba): par bgyi'o//de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung ste/des mngon par shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas//de 'dri snye du sems te/bdag gis rgyal po
170b6('dul ba): tshangs sbyin la sngon khas blangs kyis song la khas blangs pa de rig par bya'o snyam nas/de rgyal po tshangs sman gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/steng gi namakha' la mngon
170b7('dul ba): par 'phags te/'bar ba dang /gsal ba dang char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul dag bya bar brtsomaso//so so skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du
171a1('dul ba): sems gtod pa yin pas/des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/'phags pa khyod kyis yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu'i rtogs sam/rtogs
171a2('dul ba): so//rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis drang srong gang ga skyong gi rkang pa la gtugs pa ni/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//yang de'i mas tshigasu bcadade smras pa
171a3('dul ba): tshangs sbyin blo dang ldan pa po//'di ru 'drig mkhan lag ca dag/bzhag nas rab tu byung 'di la//lha khyod gtug pa'i tshul ma yin//rgyal po tshangs
171a4('dul ba): sbyin gyi sems khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/'di ltar thub pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi rnams la//des ni dka' spyad 'di dag spyad lags te/
171a5('dul ba): blo rgya chen por gyur pa gang lags pa//gang ga skyong la cung zad ma gsung shig/dka' thub zil gyis sdig pa thams cad mnan//dka' thu bo zil gyis 'jig
171a6('dul ba): rten thams cad mnan//dka' thub zil gyis 'drog mkhan snod bcom ste//dka' thub 'bar la cung zad ma gsung shig/dge slong dngag ji sbyi du sems/de'i tshe
171a7('dul ba): de'i dus kyi rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang yin pa de bzang ldan 'di nyid yin no//drang srong gang ga skyong zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni/nye bar 'khor 'di nyid
171b1('dul ba): yin te/de na yang shAkya'i rgyal po bzung ldan tshangs sbyin du gyur pa na/nyo bar 'khor drang srong gang ga sbyong zhes bya bar gyur pa la phyag byas pa na/sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/
171b2('dul ba): par gyur to//da ltar ying bzang ldan gyis nye bar 'khor rab tu byung ba la phyag byas pa na sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//sdom la/ko'u di n+ya dang ril po'i dbyings
171b3('dul ba): phams cad sgrol nor shing rta dang //gdugs dang srin bu ki ta tra//byams pa'i dril sgrogs bcug pa dang //dga' skyong la hu btung ba dang //snum kur gnas 'jog sbrang rtsi
171b4('dul ba): can/'dul ba 'dzin mchog bgrangs pa'o//gang gi tshe/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas nyon mongs po thams cad spyongs te//dgra bcom pa mngon sum
171b5('dul ba): du byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa de'i tshedage slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gtsad
171b6('dul ba): pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes to'u di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/des na bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan thogs
171b7('dul ba): pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa dge slong dag/dge slong kun shes ke'u di n+ya 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen
172a1('dul ba): yong su bsgyur ba/'dra ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi zla bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las drug byas shing bsngags pas/dge slong ka'u rgya
172a2('dul ba): 'di nyid kyi las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin
172a3('dul ba): par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar las dge ba dang /mi dge ba byas shing bas
172a4('dul ba): pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs
172a5('dul ba): dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la ske dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na//
172a6('dul ba): 'jig rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na
172a7('dul ba): med pa lha dang /mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/de grong khyer ba ra na ser nye bar brten nas/ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs zhes
172b1('dul ba): bya ba la bzhugs//ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung snga dro na bza' sham thabs mnabs/chos gos dang lhung bzed
172b2('dul ba): bsnams te/b+hA ra na ser bsod snyoms la zhugs pa dang /dga' 'dun lnga brgya tsamo dong ba'i dge 'dun de rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i
172b3('dul ba): mchin sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kun nas brgyan pa/sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus mdzes par byas pa 'od 'dom gang gis brgyan pa/'od zer nyi ma stong pas lhag pa'i
172b4('dul ba): 'od can/rin po che'i ri bo 'gro ba ltar kun nas mdzes par mthong ngo //mthong ma thag tu dang po skyes nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di las
172b5('dul ba): rab tu byung bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis de ltar gros byas pa las/kha cig ni rgya mtsho chen por zhugaso//kha cig ni yul gyi mthar dong ngo //kha cig ni shi ba'i chos
172b6('dul ba): dang ldan par gyur te/skye bo bcu drug cig lus pa de rnams ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs la dong nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung las rab tu byung ste/de
172b7('dul ba): rnams de na bsam gtan dang /klog pa dang /rnal 'byor gyis gon so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung gis sangs
173a1('dul ba): rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' dag ma nas shing zad pa'i ma bzhin du drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nag pu phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyes
173a2('dul ba): yongasu mya ngan las 'das//de rnams la lha rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yongasu mya ngan las 'das te/de
173a3('dul ba): yongasu mya ngan las 'das nas de ring du zhag bdun lon te/de'i bstan pa ying nub na khyed cag 'bras bu med pa'i slu ba 'dra zhing 'dug ste/ci rung nas byas pa thos nas/bya
173a4('dul ba): ba ma byas pa'i sdug bsngal chen pos gdu so//de nas lnga ni thos maM thag tu ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs las babs nas/bI ra na sir zhug so//drug gis ni de nyid yid byung
173a5('dul ba): byar brtson 'grus brtsams nas rang byang chub mngon sum du bye'o//phyi nas lnga yang babs nas b+hA ra na sa nyid du 'dug par brtsams pa na/ji tsam na shing rtas 'tsho ba'i
173a6('dul ba): tshong pa dag 'gro ba na/shing rtas 'tshe ba gcig gis gling dag nyam chung bzhin de dag lA/des lcag gzer bu can gyis yang nas yang du zhus te/de rnams nyam chung
173a7('dul ba): bas shis thug cing 'gro mi nus bzhin du shing rtas 'tsho ba de/shing rtas 'tsho tshong ba'i sna la 'gro ba dang /de la dge slong de rnams kyis smras pa/kye shing rtas
173b1('dul ba): khyod kyi glang nyam chung ba 'di rnams la//lcags gzur ba can gyis yang nas yang du bzhus te cir rung /gal te 'gro mi nus na dral bus 'gror chug la/phyi nas song
173b2('dul ba): cog/des smras pa/dedag sna la shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa dang lhan cig mchi mi nus shes gal te bdag phyi nas chag na gdon mi za bar shing rtas 'tsho ba'i tshong pa 'dis
173b3('dul ba): bdag bor nas dang bar 'gyur ro//de rnams kyis shing rtas 'tshe ba de las zung bzung nas mi dga' ste/gcig la gcig smras pa/shes ldan dag yang dag par rdzogs
173b4('dul ba): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung yi su mya ngan las 'das te/bdag cag lus na/'dis kyang bdag cag la bskul ma btub kyis/ma la bdag cag gis brtson 'grus brnam
173b5('dul ba): bar bya ro zhes smras nas/dergyagasu bcad de smras pa/thub pa chen po 'od srung ki/gal te chos ni nub gyur kyang d+ha//yang dag sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i//brtson
173b6('dul ba): 'grus 'dor bar mi bya'o//bdag cag go ni zag pa yang //gal te zang por ma gyur na//shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi//nyan thos mchog tu 'gyur bar bya//de rnams
173b7('dul ba): bA ri na ser zhugs nas/bsod snyoms spyad/slar yang ri bo ril pa'i dbyibs la dor nas/bsam gtan dang /klog pa dang /rnal 'byor gyis gnas pa na de rnams las
174a1('dul ba): bcu shal//gcigacig lus pa de mi dga' ba rgyus shing maud byung bas chud du brjod pas tshod du brjod pa/ri ba ril ba'i dbyibs gang yin pa 'di nyid la bdug
174a2('dul ba): gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la bsnyed bkur byas la/de'i dge slo ny+dzi khri yang mdzo na de bdag 'da' shig 'jam phung klong mtha' dkan snam sku
174a3('dul ba): rgya mtshan 'dzin pa lta zhig snyam na des smon lam gdab por brtsams pa/'di ltar bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan rangs 'di
174a4('dul ba): skyong las 'di srid du tshangs par spyod pa spyad na/yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma rtogs kyis/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
174a5('dul ba): 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla mi zhes bya ba gang yin pa de la bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa nA/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
174a6('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub por 'gyur ro zhes lung bsten pa de'i bstan po las bd-i ga rab tu byung nas der thog mar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon
174a7('dul ba): sum du byas nas/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des bdag snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo//dge slong
174b1('dul ba): dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa'i dge slong nyi khro yod pa las dge slong
174b2('dul ba): gcig lus pas 'dzam bu'i gling mtha' dag na snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan bzung ste ri bo ril ba'i dbyibs gang na bi der song nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong kun
174b3('dul ba): shes ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/de'i smon lam gyi dbang gis de ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyis snam sbyar gyi rgyal mtshan badzin pa'i mchog tu bstan te//dge slong dag de lta
174b4('dul ba): bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag po yin la/gcig tu dkar po rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar
174b5('dul ba): yin/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/dge slong dag de lte bas na lus gcig tu gnag pa dang /'dren ma rnams ni spangs la
174b6('dul ba): las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//ga gi tshe/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan ba ko'u de skyil chos
174b7('dul ba): bshad nas/yang dang yang du rmed par mdzod de/ko'u ste khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal leg so//ko'u n+ya khyod kyis chos kun
175a1('dul ba): shes sam/bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lag so zhes gsol pa de'i/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams
175a2('dul ba): cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas las ci zhig bgyis na/des na bcom ldan 'das
175a3('dul ba): kyis chos bshad nas yang dang yang du rmed pa mdzad de/ko'u di n+ya khyod kyis chos kun shes sam/bcom ldan 'das kun 'tshal lag so//ko'u dIn+ya khyod kyis chos
175a4('dul ba): kun shes sam/bde bar gshegs pa kun 'tshal lags/zhes gsol lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong ko'u di n+ya
175a5('dul ba): 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa/tshogs rnyed pa zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon
175a6('dul ba): byung ba grong khyer bA ra na ser rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na/rgyal
175a7('dul ba): srid byed du 'jug/de dus gzhan zhig na/btsun mo dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dka' dgur spyod par byed de/de rtse bar byed/dga'
175b1('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na khye'u gzugs bzang zhing /mdzes pa blta na sdug
175b2('dul ba): pa yan lag gi mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhig bcaso//btsas nas de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes ming 'dogs par byed do//
175b3('dul ba): blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha yul dbus kyi yul chos kyis ni gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa dang /blta na sdug pa lags na/des mdzes dga' zhes 'dogs lags la/
175b4('dul ba): khye'u 'di yang gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la blta na sdug cing yul ka shi'i rgyal po'i sras kyang lags pas khye'u yi ming ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bgyi bar gdag so zhes/de'i ming
175b5('dul ba): ka shi mdzes dga' zhes bya bar btag so//khye'u ka shi mdzes dga' ma ma brgyad po pang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma bsnun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ma'i ma ma
175b6('dul ba): gnyis dang /rtsed grogs kyi mu ma gnyis te/ma ma brgyad la rjesu gtad nas/de ma ma brgyad kyis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying
175b7('dul ba): po dang /gzhan yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyes par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skyed par byedado//yang rgyal po rtse bar byed/dga'
176a1('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/btsun mo sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon pa na/khye'u zhig bcas te/
176a2('dul ba): glang gi nyi ma la btsas pa de nyid kyi nyi ma la bA ra na ser yul mi dang grong mi 'thab mo chen po byung ngo //de btsos pa'i btsas ston rgyo cher byas na/khye'u yi ming cir gdags
176a3('dul ba): shes ming 'dogs par byed do//btsun mo'i tshogs kyis smras pa/lha 'di bcas pa na bA rA na ser grong mi dang yul mi rnams 'thab mo chen po byung bas/de'i slad
176a4('dul ba): khye'u yi ming 'thab mo skye su gdag so zhes btag so//rgyal po tshangs sbyin ni chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste/gzhon nu ka shi mdzes dgas pa ches
176a5('dul ba): dang chos ma yin pas /rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/bdog kyang yab 'das na rgyal por 'gyur zhing bdag gis kyang
176a6('dul ba): chos dang chos ma yin pas//rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol gyis/ma la bdag khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam nus/de'i
176a7('dul ba): pa'i drung du song ste/rkang pa la gtugs te skyes pa/yab gnang bar mdzad du gsol/bdag khyim nas khyim ma mchis par rab tu 'byung lagaso//des smras pa//
176b1('dul ba): bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed sbyin sreg sreg par byed/dka' thub kyi gdung bar byed pa'i rgyal srid khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs na ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te rab tu 'byung /
176b2('dul ba): des tshig su bcad pas smras pa/nags na shing shun rtswa gyon zhing //rtsa ba 'bras bu 'cha' ba dang //ri dgas gdugs pa rnams dang ni//lhan cig gnas pa mchog
176b3('dul ba): lags kyi//'jig rten pha rol 'jig byed pa'i//mkhas pas rgyal srid slad du ni//gsod dang bcings dang brdeg pa dang //bgyid pa de ltar ma lagaso//
176b4('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/gzhonu shes par gyis shig/khyod ni nga'i bu gcig pa sdug pa yid du 'ong ba/bzod pa mi mthun pa med pa yin te/nga shi bar gyur na mi 'dod
176b5('dul ba): bzhin du khyod dang 'bral grang /gson bzhin du lta ga la btang /gzhonu ka shi mdzes dgas smras pa/yab gal te gnang na de lta na lags/gal te mi gnang na
176b6('dul ba): 'tshal mo yang mi 'tshal/phyag kyang mi 'tshalo//de nas gzho nu ka shaM mdzes dgus nyi ma gcig kyang zan bcad par byas pa nas/gnyis dang gsum dang drug
176b7('dul ba): gi bar du zan bcad par byas//de nas rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis gzhonu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras//bu gzhonu shes par gyis shig/chings
177a1('dul ba): par spyod pa spyad pa/'o//rab tu dben par byed/'o//gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' bar bye //'o//gnasu mAl dgon
177a2('dul ba): nags khrod ri drung dang /bas mtha' dag tu gnas pa mnags dka'o//gcig pu dgon par gnas pa yang sdug bsnga'o//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du rid
177a3('dul ba): gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par bya dgos so//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bya dgo so//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar
177a4('dul ba): du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bya dgoso//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba dang /rtsed mo dag las dben par bya dgos//bu gzhon khyod tshur shog/
177a5('dul ba): 'di nyid du 'dug la rgyal tshab byos te/'dod pa dag la yang spyod cig/sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig/bsod nams kyang byos shig/de skad ces smras kyang
177a6('dul ba): gno nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smras/de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyisabatsun mo dang blon po dang /mdun na 'don la bsgob/shes ldan dag re zhig
177a7('dul ba): gzho nu slong zhig/lha bki ba bzhin 'tshalo zhes btsun mo dang /blon po dang /mdun na 'don rnams gzhonu ka shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der dong ste
177b1('dul ba): nas gzhon nu kA shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smras//smras gzhon mkhyen par mdzod cig/khyod ni shin tu gzhon pa bde ba bzhed pas sdug bsngal mi mkhyen te/
177b2('dul ba): tshangs par spyod pa spyad de//'o//rab tu dben par bgyid dka'o//gcig pu nyid la mngon par dga' byer bgyi dka'o//gnas mal dgon pa nag ste khrod ri drung dang /
177b3('dul ba): bas mtha' dag tu ma nogs par da///gcig pu dgyen par gnas pa yang sdug bsngal lo//khyod kyi dri sgyid 'tsho'i bar du ri dgas gdug pa dag dang lhan cig gnas par
177b4('dul ba): 'tshalo//khyod kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho bar bgyi 'chi lo//khyod kyi ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i 'dod pa dag las dben par bgyi 'tshalo//khyod kyis
177b5('dul ba): jisrid 'tsho'i bar du mi'i dga' ba'i rtsed mo rnams las dben par bgyi 'tshalo//sras gzhon nu khyod tshur spyon 'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal tshab mdzod de/'dod pa rnams la yang
177b6('dul ba): yongasu spyod cig/sbyin pa dag kyang stsol cig/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ces de skad smras pa na/gzhi nu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas
177b7('dul ba): rgyal po tshangs sbyin gyis/gzho nu ka shi mdzes dga' dang /stan cig rdul khrod ni rtse rtse ba'i blon po'i bu rnams dang /mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /gzhan yang gzhon
178a1('dul ba): na sman shA myu na du na na du rgyu /das rdzunan na /na smra sa dang/
178a2('dul ba): ga tsha'i byud mi 'du pa mi na kyi / rgyu 'a dun rdzo /
178a3('dul ba): sa dga' bo ben par nga kyi 'tshag//sras rgan du khyod chung spyan 'di nyid du bzhugs la rgyal chab med dang /'dod ba dag la yang ma da kyig/sbyin pa/
178b1('dul ba): /kyang stsol cig/bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig/ces de skad smras na/gzhanu ka shi mdzes dga' cang mi smra bar 'dug/de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /
178b2('dul ba): gzhonu rnams rgyal po tshangs sbyin gang na ba der song ste phyin pa rgyal po tshangs sbyin la 'di skad ces smras//lha mkhyen par mdzod cig/gzhon nges pa ka shr-i mdzes dga' gum
178b3('dul ba): na ci rung /'di ltar rab tu byung ba ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa legs te/gal te de la mngon par dga' bar gyur na/gson par de la gzigs par 'gyur ro//
178b4('dul ba): gal te mngon par dga' bar ma gyur te/slar yang drang srong rnams las log par gyur na/bu'i gnas ni pha dang mam stsogs pa gzhan gang du mchi bar 'gyur/rgyal
178b5('dul ba): po tshangs sbyin gyis smras pa/gno nu dag gal te de lta na gnang bar bya'o//de nas blon po'i bu rnams dang /mdun na 'don gyi bu rnams dang /gzhonu rnams gzhon ka
178b6('dul ba): shi mdzes dga' gang na ba der song ste phyin nas gzho nu ka shi mdzes dga' la 'di skad ces smraso//gzhonu nges pa mkhyen par mdzod cig/rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste/gzhon
178b7('dul ba): nus da ni de'i dus mkhyen par mdzod cig/de nas gzhonu ka shi mdzes dga' bcud kyi khu ba'i rim gyis lus kyi mthu dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus bskyed de/bAr+ya
179a1('dul ba): se nas byung nas drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ngo //des brtson pa dang 'bad pa dang /brtsal ba byas pas 'dod pa rnams las 'dod chags dang
179a2('dul ba): bral bar byas nas/byams pa'i ting 'dzin thob ste/de shin tu sems can rnams la brtse ba dang ldan par gyur nas/de'i byams pa des na ri dgas gdug pa rnams kyang
179a3('dul ba): bsti gnasu 'dris par gyur te/gnod par mi byed pas de'i ming bzod pa smra ba bzod pa smra ba zhes bya bar gyur te//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin shi nas
179a4('dul ba): thab mo skyes rgyal srid la bzhag ste/de chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid bye 'jug/drang srong bzod pa smra bra smras pa/mkhan po bdag gis lus ni kha zas dang
179a5('dul ba): btung bas skyes pas/dgon pa'i sman gyis 'tsho bar rngo mi thog gis grong mthar gnasu mchi legaso//des smras pa/bu grong ngam dgon par gnas kyang rung ste/
179a6('dul ba): drang srong rnams ni dbang po rnams srung bar byed kyis song la bA ra na se'i nye 'khor du song nas lo ma dang /'dab ma'i spyil po byos la gnas par gyis shig/de mkhan
179a7('dul ba): pa las lung thob nas bA ra na ser song ste zhi ba'i gnas btsal ba'i phyir phan tshun du rgyu zhing rim gyis pha'i skyed mos tshal du son te/des der btsal ba las zhi ba'i phyogs
179b1('dul ba): shig mthong nas/de don gnaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po 'thab mo skye so ga'i dus la bab pa na nags tshang tshing me tog gi shing rnams kha 'bus shing ngang pa dang
179b2('dul ba): khrung khrung dang rma bya dang /ne tso dang /ri skegs dang /khu byug dang /shang shang te'u rnams kyang skad 'byin pa'i skyed mos tshal gyi sa gzhir btsun mo dang /lhan
179b3('dul ba): cig dang nas des bskyed mos tshal der bde ba nyam su myong bas dub par gyur te/gnyid log pa dang /bud med ni me tog dang /'bras bu la dga' ba yin pas//skyed
179b4('dul ba): mos tshul de nyid nas phan tshun du rgyu bar brtsams pa las/ci tsam na drang srong bzod pa smra bar spyod lam zhi bas mtha' cig na 'dug pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bla mar
179b5('dul ba): bya ba'i sems bskyed nas/drang srong de la phyag byas te bskor nas 'khod do//drang srong bzod pa smra bas bud med rnams mthong nas lhag par spyod lam zhi bas chos bshad par
179b6('dul ba): brtsamaso//ji tsam na rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gnyid kyi snyoms pas dub pa las sangs pa na/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med ma mthong nas/des ral gyi blangs te btsun
179b7('dul ba): mo'i bud med rnams btsal bar brtsams pa dang /ci tsam na/drang srong bzod pa smra ba bskor nas 'khod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang phrag dog bskyed de/bdag
180a1('dul ba): nyid khros pa'i kun nas dkris pa'i rang bzhin gyis drang srong po'i byu ru song ba dang /btsun mo'i tshogs kyis de khros pa'i gnas skabs mthong nas
180a2('dul ba): smag ste khyer ro//rgyal po bsnyems pa can gyis bzod pa sgru ba la smras pa/kye nang rje khyud su zhig/des smras pa/bzod pa smra ba'o//rgyal po 'thab mo skyes kyis smras
180a3('dul ba): kho bo 'khrugs pa la yang bzod pa smra bar bdag nyid khas 'che ba yin nam/da ni khyod bzad pa smra ba yin nam ma yin shes par bya'o zhes des de'i lag po gnyis bcid
180a4('dul ba): nus yang dris pa khyod su yin/des smras pa/bzod pa smra ba'o//des de'i rkang pa bcad cing yan lag dang /nying lag rnams kyang bcad pa dang /des
180a5('dul ba): tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/gal te bdag gi lus la ni//ti la 'bru tsam du gdub pa yi//lus ni phye ma brgyar gtubs nas//sa la gtor kyang bzod mi spong //
180a6('dul ba): gang phyir bdag gis byams dge ba'i//sems ni rtag tu goms byas pas//bu sdug lta bu'i skye bo la//bzod pa de gtong spro ba med//ces tshigasu bcad pa'i dbyangs
180a7('dul ba): de lta dus tshor ba bsol nas smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ji ltar rgyal po 'di nyid nyon mongs pa la zhen pa'i blos bdag la yang dang yang du rmas nas yan lag dong
180b1('dul ba): nying lag rnams gtubs pa de bzhin du/bdag bzod pa dang /nges pa dang /lhan cig par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i tshogs rnams bcom nas/
180b2('dul ba): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/de la shes rab kyi ral gyis yang dang yang du rmed cing thog mar de'i nyon mongs pa gcod
180b3('dul ba): par gyur cig ces btab po//de nas bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang yin pas bsams pa/rgyal po sdig can 'das drang srong 'di nyes med cing gnod pa ma
180b4('dul ba): byas par rkang pa dang /lag pa phral te bor gyis ci nas kyang bdag gis 'di la gnod par bya'o snyam du rig nas khro ba drag po'i kun nas dkris pas bzod pa smra ba'i mdun du
180b5('dul ba): 'dug ste/tshigasu bcad pas smras pa/'thab skyes bu dang bu mor bcas//gnyen gyi tshogs bcas grong khyer dang //ljongs bcas 'jig rten 'tsho ba kun//tham
180b6('dul ba): mAr dbyi yis bka' stsol cig/des slar tshig su bcad de smras pa/gang gis bdag lus lag pa rkang pa dang //sna la phral nas ma rung byas gyur pa//de larang
180b7('dul ba): sdig pa cung zad mi 'dod na//nyes med 'gro ba rnams la sme sa ci dgos//de nas bA ra na se'i lta gang yin pa des yams kyi nad dang byi ba dang /bye ba dang /ne tse rnams
181a1('dul ba): bta zhing sgyus char ma pab pas/skye bo'i tshogs shi bar gyur//rnal pos ltas mkhan rnams bkug nas smras pa/shes ldan dag
181a2('dul ba): ci'i phyir lha char mi 'bebs shing /byi ba dang /bye ba dang /ne tso rnams rab tu mang por gyur la skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha
181a3('dul ba): drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa'i lha gang legs pa'i lha de rab tu 'khrugs te/de 'khrugs pas des yams kyi nad 'di btang legaso//rgyal pos smras pa/shes
181a4('dul ba): ljildan dag de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ltas mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/lha gtor ma dang me tog phreng dang /yo byad rnams kyis lha rab tu 'khrugs pa mnyes par 'gyur
181a5('dul ba): bas gtor ma dang /me tog phreng dang /yo byad rnams sbyar la lha dang /drang srong de la yang bzod pa gsol bar bgyi'o//de nas rgyal pos bA ra na ser dril sgrogasu
181a6('dul ba): bcug pa/grong khyer bA ra na ser na gnas pa'i shes ldan dag nyon cig/skyed mos chel na gnas pa'i lha drang srong bzod pa smra ba la mngon par dad pa des yems kyi nad bting
181a7('dul ba): zhing des char mi 'bebs pa dang /byi ba dang /bye ba dang /ne tso rnams rab tu mang por byas te/skye bo'i tshogs kyang shi bar gyur gyis yams kyi nad de nye bar zhi ba'i
181b1('dul ba): phyir khyod cag sang gtor ma dang /me tog phreng dang /yo byad rnams dang chas te/skyes mos tshal der deng la de la mchod pa byos shig/skye bo'i tshogs kyis de nyid kyi nub ma
181b2('dul ba): nos gtor ma dang /me tog phreng dang //yo byad rnams sta gon byas te/skyed mos tshal der rgyal po dang /btsun mo dang lhan cig tu dong ngo //de nas skye bo'i tshogs chen pos
181b3('dul ba): lha de la brten nas/dge sbyong dang /bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phongs pa rnams la sbyin pa dag byin nas/lha'i gan su mchod pa chen po byas te/lha de la yang bzod
181b4('dul ba): par gsol to//de nas rgyal po drang srong bzod pa smra ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa la gtugs te bzod par gsol bar brtsams pa/drang srong chen po bdag gis yul zhig la lhag par
181b5('dul ba): zhen pas khro ba'i kun nas dkris pa'i blo gros kyis khyod la gnod pa bgyis pa bzod pa gsolo//bzod pa smra bas smras pa/rgyal po chen po bzod do//sus 'tshal des tshigasu bcad
181b6('dul ba): bas smras pa/lus la mtshon gyis 'debs pa na'ang /bdag ni sems can kun la byams//gal te khyod yid mi ches na//bdag gis khrag 'dzag pa la ltos//de'i
181b7('dul ba): khrag 'o ma'i thigs par 'dzags pa'i cho 'phrul rgyal po sdig pa'i las byed pa de la bstan na/'on kyang yid ches par ma gyur nas//des yang smras pa/drang srong chen po bzod par
182a1('dul ba): gsol lo//rgyal po chen po bzod do//sus 'tsham+b+ha/de nas byang chub sems dpas yan lag dang /nying lag btubs pa rnams gnas
182a2('dul ba): ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas bden pa gsol ba'i phyir tshigasu bcadade smra ba/rgyal po khyod kyis bdag gi lus//gtungs kyang shin tu phra ba yi//zhe sdang 'di ltar yod min na//
182a3('dul ba): bdag lus ji ltar sngon bzhin shog/des bden pa'i mig gsal bas//lus sngon gyi ji lta ba bzhin du gyur to//de nas rgyal po ya mtshan gyis mig phye nas tshogasu bcad pas
182a4('dul ba): smras pa/b+h+yo ma chos la legs gnas pas//kye ma brtul zhugs 'di grub ste//lus la gtungs par byed pa na//khyod la mi dga' ci yang med//rgyal ba' thub mo
182a5('dul ba): skyes btsun mo dang /blon po dang /glong mi dang /yul mi dang bcas pas drang srong de'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas te dong ngo //dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe
182a6('dul ba): de'i dus kyi drang srong bzod pa smra ba gang yin pa de ni ba nyid yino//rgyal po 'thab mo skyes gang yin pa de ni dge slong ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid yin te/ngas de la byams pa'i sems
182a7('dul ba): bskyed cing smon lam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gis de la yang nas yang du rmed cing nyon mongs pa gcod par gyur cig ces btang ba'i smon lam gang yin pa de'i dbang gis/da
182b1('dul ba): ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pas de la chos bshad nas yang nas yang du rma so//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyis rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag
182b2('dul ba): pa yin la zhes bya ba nas/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bsgrub par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi
182b3('dul ba): ros yang dag par bsdus te/bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa de'i tshe dge slong rnams the tshomo skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
182b4('dul ba): zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lha brgyad khri chos kyi ros yang dag par bsdus te/bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis
182b5('dul ba): bka' stsal pa//dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang ngas 'di rnams tshong ba brgyad khrir gyur pa na zang zing gis yang dag
182b6('dul ba): par bsdus nas/brtul zhugs lnga'i bzhi rnams la rab tu bkod pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na ded dpon gnyis shig byung ste thams cad skyob dang legs grub ces
182b7('dul ba): bya ste/re re la yang tshong pa'i 'khor bzhi khri bzhi khri yod do//de la legs grub nges par 'byung ba la mngon par dga' nas/de drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ste///
183a1('dul ba): des mtha' gcig tu brtson 'grus la gnas nas mkhan po dang slob dpon myed par rang byang chub mngon sum du byaste//de'i tshong pa de rnams dred dponam
183a2('dul ba): mthong nas phan tshun du btsal bar brtsams pa na/gang gi tshe rnam pa thams cad du ma rnyed pa de'i tshe/ded dpon thams cad skyobs kyi drung du dong nas smras pa/ded dpon
183a3('dul ba): des ni bdag cag la ma bltas par mchis te/bdag cag gis btsal na yang ma rnyed na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/des smras pa/yo blong bar ma byed par/'khod
183a4('dul ba): cig dang /ded dpon de btsa lo//de nas ded dpon thams cad skyob tshong pa brgyad khris yongasu bskor nas/ded dpon legs grub skyed mos tshal dang 'dug gnas dang /
183a5('dul ba): dka' thub kyi nagasu btsal bar brtsams pa na/des de mthong nas dris pa/khyod kyis ci'i phyir tshong pa rnams spangs te rab tu byung /bdog nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis
183a6('dul ba): chos 'chad kyi/ngag gis ma yin pas ded dpon 'khor dang bcas pa de la 'gyur ba dang /gsal ba dang /tshar 'bab pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i tshe 'phrul gyis dad
183a7('dul ba): par byas//des tshong pa brgyad khri bo de zang zing gi bsdu bas bsdus nas smras pa/'di'i phyir bya ba byos shig/'di la bya ba byas ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu sbyin
183b1('dul ba): byar 'gyuraro//de rnams kyis de la bya ba rnam pa du ma byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi dad dpon thams cad skyong gang yin pa de ni nganyid yin//
183b2('dul ba): tshong pa brgyad khri bo gang yin pa de ni lha brgyad khri po 'di dag nyid yin te/de na yang ngas zang zing gis nye bar bsdus nas brtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la rab tu dkod do//
183b3('dul ba): 'di la da ltar yang ngas chos kyis ros yang dag par bsdus nas bden pa rnams la rab tu bkod do//dge slong de ga de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam
183b4('dul ba): par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/'dren ma rnams ni 'dren ma yin pas zhes bya ba
183b5('dul ba): nas/dge slong khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gang gi tshebacom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'bro/
183b6('dul ba): dgon pa nas bton te/dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che rnams bgo bsha' mdzad nas/dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa dri'i
183b7('dul ba): tshe/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcad pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i
184a1('dul ba): dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te//dam pa'i chos kyis ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das
184a2('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dgra 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/zhe sdang dang bral/gti mug dang bral zhing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang
184a3('dul ba): 'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu grol nas thams cad mkhyen
184a4('dul ba): cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyenaye shes dang /shes byi thams cad la dbang brnyes nas/lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton
184a5('dul ba): dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas/zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang bcas shing
184a6('dul ba): skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongasu
184a7('dul ba): mo grol te/ded dpon du gyur pa na/lnga po dag 'brog dgon pa'i lam du chu med pas srog dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dog pa nyam nga ba thob pa na/lha rnams la bden
184b1('dul ba): pa gsol nas/dbang phyug chen pos char phab pa'i chus tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba/ded dpon thams cad skyob ces bya ba tshong pa lnga brgya
184b2('dul ba): dang lhan cig tu tshong byed cing /'brog dgon pa'i lam chu chung ba zhig tu zhugs nas rim gyis 'bigs byed ces bya ba'i dgon par phyin pa dang /tshong pa de rnams der chu thams cad kyi 'du
184b3('dul ba): zad nas chu dang bral yang ma nags te dong ba lasatshong pa lnga tsam chu ma rnyed pas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa'i rnam pa de lta bu de dag/ded dpon thams cad skyob kyis mthong nas/
184b4('dul ba): snying rjes sems bskyod pas/kha byen du bltas te/lha rnams la gsol ba bya bar brtsams pa/zhi ba dang /chu lha dang /lus ngan dang /khyab 'jug la sogs
184b5('dul ba): pa lha shes ljon dag gson cig/bdag sems can rnams la mnyam par sems pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig 'dis dbang phyug
184b6('dul ba): chen po'i lhas char 'bebs par gyur cig/byang chub sems dpa'i mthus dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos pa dang /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi shes pa mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug
184b7('dul ba): ba yin pas/des bsams pa su zhig gis dbang phyug chen po'i gnas g.yos par byas snyam na/byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yin par mthong nas/des dbang phyug chen po'i char
185a1('dul ba): gyi rnam pa de lta bu dag phab ste/des tshong pa de rnams tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa'i lam las bsgral to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
185a2('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ded dpon thams cad skyob gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//tshong pa lnga po chu dang bral bas lhag par yi blong bar gyur pa de dag ni lnga sde'i dge slong 'di dag yin te/
185a3('dul ba): de na yang ngas 'di dag chus tshim par byas nas 'brog dgon pa nas bsgral to//da ltar yang ngas 'di dag dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par byas nas/'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las
185a4('dul ba): bsgral to//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas/dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin
185a5('dul ba): po che rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa de'i tshe/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan
185a6('dul ba): 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton nas/dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag gis rin po che rnams kyi bgo bsha'
185a7('dul ba): mdzad pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag 'di ltar da ltar nga 'dod chags dang bral/zhe sdang dang bral/gti mug dang bral zhing
185b1('dul ba): skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /sme sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams las yongs
185b2('dul ba): grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te ye shes dang /shes pa thams cad la dbang ba skye ba dang /rnga sde'i dge slong rnams 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa
185b3('dul ba): nus bton te/dbang po dang /stobs dang /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi bgo bsha' mdzad pa des ngo mtshar ci zhig che/'das pa'i dus nang 'dod chags dang bcas/
185b4('dul ba): zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang btsas shing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang
185b5('dul ba): yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams la yongasu ma grol te/ded dpon du gyur pa na/rang gi srog yongasu btang nas/'di dag rgya mtsho chen po nas bton te/rin po che rnams
185b6('dul ba): kyi bgo bsha' byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ni ded dpon nor gyi shing rta zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/nga tshong pa lnga zhig dang lhan cig rgya mtsho chen por
185b7('dul ba): dong ba na/de rnams dang ded dpon de phan tshun gshes pa'i gte mi smra bar byed pas 'dza' bar gyur to//ji tsam na mthar gyis rgya mtsho'i 'bram du phyin nas/gru so so ste
186a1('dul ba): gon byas nas 'jug pa'i tshe/de rnams kyis ded dpon gyi shing rtu la smras pa/ded dpon bdag cag ni khyod dang bral na dga' bar mi 'gyur lags/
186a2('dul ba): des smras pa/gal te de lta na 'dir zhugs shig dang gru dor ro//de rnams der zhugs pa dang /rlung langs nas skrag par gyur te//nor gyi shing rtas smras pa
186a3('dul ba): shes ldan dag ma 'jigs shig/gang gi tshe/gru zhig par gyur pa de'i tshe bdag gis mgul du 'jus shig dang /bdag gis khyed cag gdon to//byang chub seMdal
186a4('dul ba): rnams ni ban+de'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas dang de dag la mkhas pa yin pas/de'i rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag 'chan khung du btags nas klu zhig pa na/de rnams
186a5('dul ba): did dpon de'i 'gul du 'jus nas/des de rnams lus ngub cing srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/rgya mtsho'i 'gram du byin par byaste//de rnams sgyum la phyin te/
186a6('dul ba): de btang ba dang /de dbugs gtan chad nas shi'o//de rnams kyisri de chu nas skum la phyung ba dang /ji tsam na 'chan khrod nu/rin po che chen po la 'os pa dag mthong
186a7('dul ba): nas de rnams kyis de khyer te dang ngo //dge slong dag ji snyam du sems//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi deng dpo ni nor gyi shing rta gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//tshong pa de rnams ni dge slong
186b1('dul ba): da mad+han+tu/don sa dag natshun pa su d+ha/ na na gyu chug//das sangs 'du ga la ba 'brag sa
186b2('dul ba): nas smyon nas/dbang po dang/ dang /byang chub kyi yin lag gi napa rnams kyi dge ba sha' byas/'dul bkra ni/
186b3('dul ba): gags /nan 'ang sa 'dun/'khor la sa sa sa /dag slong rnam
186b4('dul ba): ma smras skyes ma sa dag dang / sa sa da/sun pa che da na ba sa mis rje dag kyis
186b5('dul ba): rlom par sbyin mas 'a sa ga sa lta / sbyi sa hU~M/stsal pa sa ka dun da kyis las smras shing bas
186b6('dul ba): sa byu /drug bar mang sa langs yongasu 'as che ba rnam thos kyi no pa ldan pa rnam thos kyi tshu lan gyis mkhyen pa thog pa /
187a1('dul ba): dang mgrong khyor ba dun sen rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor da dang /rgyus pa dang /bde gyu/lo legs pa skye bo dang mo mang po snga rab tu gang
187a2('dul ba): ba na/rgyal srid byed du 'jug pa las/ji tsam ni ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyi su char mi 'bab bo zhes bstan to//rgyal po tshang sa sbyin gyis rang gi yul du
187a3('dul ba): dril sgrogasu bcug po/nga'i yul na gnas pa'i shos ldan glong mi dag nyon cig/ltas mkhan rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis tshar mi 'bu zo/zhes bstan gyis
187a4('dul ba): de la khyed cag las lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /btung ba yod pa de dag ni nga'i yul du gnas par gyis shig/gzhan ni phyogs sna tshogasu dengal lo bcu gnyis
187a5('dul ba): 'das nas slar shig cig/de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis mang na la smras pa/kye nang rje bang mdzod na lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' bi dang /btung ba yod dam/
187a6('dul ba): des smras pa/dpon po mchi so//skye bo'i tshogs ni kun tu dong ngo //mu ge chen po nyam nga ba dgon pa slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung ba la/sangs rgyas bcos
187a7('dul ba): rnams 'byung ba med pa na/rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang ngan pa la snying rtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal ston pa 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu dag 'jig rten du 'byung/
187b1('dul ba): byar 'gyur bas/de'i tshe bA ra na se dang ha cang yang mi ring ba'i bsti gnas zhig tu rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gnaso//gang gi tshe mu ge'i dus kyi 'chi de'i 'jig su rung bas/skye bo'i
187b2('dul ba): tshogs skrag nas kun tu dong ba de'i tshe/de rnams kyi bsod snyoms chad nas/de dag thams cad 'dus te/khyim bdapra sngams byed gang nu ba der dong nas smras pa/khyim
187b3('dul ba): bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun tu sbyar ram/des smras pa/mdun la rmas te bgyi'o//zhes des mngangon byed pa'i mi la smras pa/kye nang rje bdag
187b4('dul ba): cag gi bang mdzod na bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba l-I brgya po gang yin pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /btung ba yod dam/des smras pa/dpon po mchi so//
187b5('dul ba): khyim bdag sdums byed kyis rab tu byung ba lnga dargya'i bsod snyoms sbyar to zhes rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya gzhan dag gis thos nas/khyim bdag sdums byed kyi drung du dong ste phyin
187b6('dul ba): nos/khyi mi bdag sdums byed la 'di skad ces smras pa/khyim bdag kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgya la bsod snyoms rgyun tu sbyor ram/des smos pa/'phags pa
187b7('dul ba): dag dul lodas bzhin du yang bslang ci 'tshalakhyim po dag de rnams kyang gzhan yin la/bdag cag kyang gzhon yin no//des smras pa/'phags pa gal te
188a1('dul ba): de ltar na mngan la smra bar babya'o zhes/des mngan byed pa'i mi la smras pa/kye nang rjeng dag gi bang mdzod naH/bdag cag dang rab tu byung ba stong po gang yin
188a2('dul ba): pa 'di rnams kyi lo bcu gnyis kyi bza' ba dang /btung ba yod dam/des smras pa/dpon po mchis//des rang sangs rgyas de rnams la smras pa/'phags pa rnams
188a3('dul ba): bzhugs shig/khyed kyi gdugs tshod kyi dus gang lags/de rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag nyi ma phyed ma yol bar ro//de nas khyim bdag sdums byed kyis sbyin
188a4('dul ba): gtong gi khang pa brtsig tu bcug nas/sbyin gtong gi zhal ta byed pa'i ma dang /dus tshed sbron pa yang bzhag nas de rnams nyi ma re re zhing lhags nas zas kyi bye ba byed do//
188a5('dul ba): dgra bcom pa stong pa de'i dge 'dun gyi gnas gtan gang yin pa de lhag par mdzes la mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pas 'khor de la gdugs ltar byas te gnaso//khyim bdag sdums
188a6('dul ba): byed kyi bu mos/dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan de'i mgo gdugs ltar 'dug cing kha dog rgyas pa/mchog dang ldan par mthong nas kyang lhag par dad pa skyeso//ji tsam dus
188a7('dul ba): gzhan zhig na dro la bab pa dang /lhas char dbab par brtsamaso//de na bu mo des dge 'dun gyi gnas brten gyi spyi bor gdugs bzung nas/zon zos zin pa dang /
188b1('dul ba): rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar 'bags pa 'di yon tan gyi tshogs ci 'dra ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dag thob pas 'di 'khor la gdugs lta
188b2('dul ba): bur byas te/gnas pa de bzhin du bdag kyang 'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te/gnas par gyur cig ces bta'o//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems khyim bdag sdums
188b3('dul ba): byed kyi bu mo gang yin pa de dge slong kun shes ko'u de n+ya 'di nyid yin to/de na 'di gzhonu mar gyur pa na/rang sangs rgyas kyi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gyi gdugs bzung nas
188b4('dul ba): smon lam du yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu thob nas 'khor lo gdugs lta bur byas te gnas par gyur cig ces ba'o//des na da ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dag
188b5('dul ba): bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas kyang /'khor la gdugs lta bur byas te gnaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig
188b6('dul ba): tu gnag pa yin la/zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag de lta bu la khyod kyis bslab par bya zhes pa'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes
188b7('dul ba): ko'u dimya la brten nas/lho brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de'i tshe/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas
189a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la brten nas/lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos
189a2('dul ba): kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag gang gi phyir da ltar nga 'dod tshogs dang bral/zhe sdang dang bral/gti
189a3('dul ba): mug dang bral zhing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /ne ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /
189a4('dul ba): 'khrug pa rnams las yongasu grol nas/thams cad mkhyen cing /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen te/ye shes dang /shes bya thams cad la dbang brnyes nas
189a5('dul ba): kun shes ko'u di n+ya la brten te/lha brgyad khri dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/'das pa'i dus na nga 'dod chags dang bcas
189a6('dul ba): zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang bcas shing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal
189a7('dul ba): ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yongasu ma grol te/dud 'gro byol song gi lus su skyes pa na/ko'u di n+ya srin bu ki ta kar gyur pa la brten nas/
189b1('dul ba): srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khri rang gi shas tshim par byas pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba na/byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas te/rgya
189b2('dul ba): mtsho chen po'i ru sbal rnams kyi nang du skyes nas/de rnams kyis gtso bor gyur to//ji tsam nu tshong pa lnga porgyas rgya mtsho'i gru bo che bsgrubs nas/rgya mtsho chen por
189b3('dul ba): zhugs te/de nas rin po che sna tshogs blangs nas slar log pa las/'di ltar gru bo che de chu srin nya'i rigs kyi so tshan gyis phug ste/de na ku co chen po byung ba'i sgra
189b4('dul ba): /ru sbal gyis thos nas/rgya mtsho chen po nas langs te/de de rnams kyi drung du song nas smras pa/shes ldan dag bag che ba bor la /kho bo'i rgyab tu zhon
189b5('dul ba): cig dang /kho bos bsgral b.raro bya'o//de nas tshong pa de rnams shi ba las sos pa bzhin du thams cad ru sbal gyi rgyab tu zhon te/des de rnams khyer nas
189b6('dul ba): rgya mtsho'i 'gram du phyogs te chas pa no//khur gyis shin tu btsir kyang /brtson 'grus la gnas shing /snyoms las ma bskyed/de lus dub pas de rnams legs
189b7('dul ba): par bsgral te mgrin pa brkyang nas gnyid log/de dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/srin bu ki ta ka rnams kyi tshang yod pas/de nas ki ta ka gcig rgyu zhing song ba na/
190a1('dul ba): dri char te de'i drung du song ba dang /de nas lus chen po de gnyid log par mthong nas/rings pa'i 'gros kyis srin bu ki t+ta ka'i tshong du son tu
190a2('dul ba): rang rang gi brdas ki ta ka rnams la go bar byas nas/srin b+ha ki ti ka brgyad khri ded de ru sbrul gyi drung du dong ngo //de gnyid log ste shi ba bzhin du sems med pa la bza'
190a3('dul ba): bar brtsams te/gang gi tshe de'i sho chen po rnams las zos na/ngal bas dub ste gnyid stug pos non pas mtsho ro//ji tsam na gnad rnams kyi sha za rnams za/
190a4('dul ba): pab de'i tshe sad pa na/srin bu ki ta ka thams cad kyis lus yog par mthong nas des bsams pa/gal te lus bskul lam bsgyur na gdon mi za bar 'di rnams 'chi
190a5('dul ba): pabar 'gyur te/srog chags gzhan la gnod pa byed pa bas ni/srog dang bral yang bla'o snyam du bsams nas/gnang rnam sa phub cing tshigs rnams phral ba na
190a6('dul ba): smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ji ltar srin buM ki ta ka brgyad khri pa 'di rnams la sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa de bzhin du bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa
190a7('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang de rnams la chos kyi ros tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam bta'o//dge slong dag
190b1('dul ba): drisnyam du sems/'cha de'i dus kyi ru sbrul gtso bo gang yin pa de na nga nyid yin no//sbyin bu ki tA ka de rnams la lam ston pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong ko'u di n+ya 'di nyid
190b2('dul ba): yin no//de la brten nas sha dang khrag gis tshim par byas pa'i srin bu ki ta ka brgyad khyi bo gang yin pa de dag ni/lU brgyad khri bo 'di dag nyid yin te/de na
190b3('dul ba): yang ngas rang gi khrag gis tshim par byaso//da ltar yang ngas de rnams la dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad do//dge slong dag de lta bas na//gcig tu gnag pa
190b4('dul ba): rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni zhes bya ba nas/dge slong dag khyod kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//gang gi tshe/bcom ldan
190b5('dul ba): 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshim par mdzad nas/'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa dang /bde
190b6('dul ba): ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de'i tshe/dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun
190b7('dul ba): pa bcom ldan 'das kyis lnga sde'i dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ros tshimo par mdzad nas/'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas bton te/shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub
191a1('dul ba): du/Sh+T+ri mya ngan las 'das pa sa bad pa la gags/bcom ldan 'das kyis pa/'a stsal pa/dge slo sa sa 'dun
191a2('dul ba): dang bram/zhe sdang dang dul/gti mug dang bral zhing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /nab dang /'chi ba dang /mya dan+ma dadu/smre sngags 'don pa dang /
191a3('dul ba): bsngal ba da /yod mo bde ba dang /'jug pa rnams las spyong su grol nas thams cad mkhyen cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen /ye shes dang /shes bya
191a4('dul ba): la dbang brnyes nas/lnga sde dge slong rnams dam pa'i chos kyi ras tshom par mdzad nas/'khor ba'i 'brog dkon pa nas gto nad+d+he/shin tu mthar thug pa'i grub pa
191a5('dul ba): dang bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod pa de la ngo mtshar ci zhig che/'das pa'i dus na du 'dod chags dang bcas/zhe sdang dang bcas/gti mug dang bca
191a6('dul ba): shing /skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa
191a7('dul ba): las yong su ma grol ba na/'di dag la rang gis khrag gis tshim par byas nas bai rtul zhugs lnga'i gzhi rnams la bkod pa gang yin pa de nyon cig/dge slong
191b1('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA ra na sar na/rgyal ba rdo rje'i na ra ba zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bya na rgyal srid byed du 'jug ste zhes bya ba'i bar
191b2('dul ba): du ste/rgyal po de yang dag pa bzang ba dge ba'i bsam pa tsan/bdag l-i phan pa dang /gzhan la ban par zhugs pa snying rje'i bdag nyid chen po ches 'dod pa skyo dgu la
191b3('dul ba): byams pa/thams cad sbyin paH/thams cad yongasu gtong ba/chags pa med par yongasu gtong ba gtong ba chen po la gnas pa ste/de lhag par byams pa la
191b4('dul ba): shin tu goms pas/de nyin gcig la lan gsum byams pa la snyoms par 'jug par byed de/de byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa na/slong po po'i skye bo
191b5('dul ba): 'phongs par gyur nas des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shos ldan dag grong khyer bA ra na sa'i grong khyer gyi sgo bani rnamasu sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsig tu bcug la dge sbyong dang /
191b6('dul ba): bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /'phongs pa dang /lam du 'jug pa'i slong mo ba gang dag ci don du gnyer ba de dag byin cig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal/zas dang skom
191b7('dul ba): dang /gos dang /gnas mal dang /dbyig dang /gser dang /nor bu dang /mu tig dang /bai DUr+ya dang /man shel dang /byi ru dang /sa le sbram dang /dngul
192a1('dul ba): dang rdo'i snying po dang /spug dang /pad+yA rA ga dang /g.ya su 'khyil ba la sogs te/nor mang pos slongs mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya bar
192a2('dul ba): phyir phung por spungaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can nas mdangs 'phrog pa'i gnod sbyin lta spyugs te/phan tshun
192a3('dul ba): 'phyan pa las bA ra na ser phyin nas/de rnams kyis ba lang gi rdzi dang /yug rdzi dang /rtswa thun dang /shing thun dang /lam gyi sa 'tshe ba dang /lam
192a4('dul ba): gol bas 'tsho ba'i mi rnams mthong nas smras pa/shes ldan dag khyed cag kho bo cag gis mi 'jigs sam/shes ldan dag gang gi phyir kho bo cag gi rgyal po
192a5('dul ba): byams pa dang /snying rje'i bdag nyid can sems can la phan pa'i bsam pas/nyin gcig la lan gsum du byas la snyoms par 'jug pa yod na ci'i phyir 'jigs
192a6('dul ba): de nas de rnams bram ze'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/grong khyer bA ra na s+ye'i sgo bzhi rnams sbyin gtong gi khang po rnams la brtags te/rgyal po rdo rje'i dpung ba
192a7('dul ba): byams pa las langs par shos nis dul ba'i cha byed kyis rgyal ba'i drung du song ngo //sing ni saM rgyal ba dang tshe spel bdag rgyal po la byas nas smras pa/
192b1('dul ba): bdag cag bkres lags na g.yar zas kyis rjesu bzung du gsol/rgyal pos blon po rnams bkug ste smras pa/shes ldan dag bram ze 'di rnams kha zas bsod pas tshim par
192b2('dul ba): byos shig/de rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag ni sho dang khrag 'tshal lag so//rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te sha dang /
192b3('dul ba): khrag gi 'byor pa med na/tshong dus nas chos bzhin gyis rnyed pa'i khrag byin cing //de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bdag cag ni mod la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag 'tshal
192b4('dul ba): ni/med la bkum pa'i sha dang khrag gis rje su bzung bar mdzad cig/rgyal pos bsams pa/gzhan la gnod pa ma byas par mod la bsad pa'i sha dang /khrag
192b5('dul ba): ga la rnyed kyis ci nas kyang 'di rnams la bdag gis rang gi khrag sbyin par bya'o snyam ste/de nas dpyad mkhan rnams bkug ste smras pa/shes ldan dag nga'i yan lag gi rtsa
192b6('dul ba): thams cad chod cig dang //slong mo ba'i skye bo tshim par bya'o//dpyad mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/lha mi phal pa rnams kyi phyir bdag cag lce'i sku la mtshon gyis mi
