246a7('dul ba): kyang chos dang chos ma yin pas rgyal srid byed du bcug nas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyu ro snyam nas/de pha'i drung du song nas rkang pa gnyis la gtugs nas smras pa lha
246b1('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/rab tu 'byung lag so//des smras pa bu gang gi don du mchod sbyin mchod par byed/sbyin sreg sreg par byed/dka' thub kyis gdung
246b2('dul ba): bar byed pa'i rgyal srid de khyod kyi lag tu 'ongs nas/ci'i phyir rab tu 'byung zhes de bzlog kyang ma btu'o//rgyal pos gdon mi za bar gol gyis 'chu bar shes nas
246b3('dul ba): gnang ba dang //de drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu byung //rgyal po gzhonu 'od zer ldan rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur to//'od zer can drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu
246b4('dul ba): byung ste/mtha' gcig tu song nas mkhan po med pa dang slob dpon med par rang byang chub mngon sum du byaso//de dus gzhan zhig na nad kyis thebs par gyur nas phan
246b5('dul ba): tshun 'khyams pa na bA ra na ser phyin to//rgyalnga po 'od zer gyis 'od zer can rang byang chub mngon sum du byas te/der 'ongaso zhes thos nas de'i drung du song ste rkang pa gnyis la
246b6('dul ba): btugs nas smras pa/drang srong chen po khyod ni bsod snyoms don du gnyer ba lags la/bdag ni bsod nams 'tshal ba lags kyis/bdag gi bskyed mos 'tshal 'di
246b7('dul ba): nyi du bzhugs shig dang /khyod la bdag gis yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o//des khas blangs pa dang /rgyal pos de'i rim gro por gzhonu 'od zer ldan
247a1('dul ba): gus byin te//des de'i rim gro pa la zhugs pa na rang sangs rgyas kyis de zhag bdun na 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i mtshan smin pa mthong nas/des
247a2('dul ba): de la smras pa nu bo ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /des smras pa/drang srong chen po rab tu 'byung //gal te de ltar gyur na song la rtogs shig/de rgyal po'i drung du song nas lta
247a3('dul ba): mkhyen par mdzodu gsol/bdag rab tu 'byung legs//rgyal pos smras pa khyod kyi phu ba rab tu byung bas/nga 'das nas khyod kho na rgyal po yin na/ci'i phyi rab tu 'byung
247a4('dul ba): zhes de rab tu 'byung ba mthobo//rang sangs rgyas de nyid rgyal po'i drung du song nas tshogasu bcad pas smras pa/'od zer 'od zer ldan mthong dang //'od zer ldan pa
247a5('dul ba): rab tu 'byung //'od zer rab tu 'byung ba logs//'di ltar rgyal ba rnams kyis bsngags//rgyal pos smras pa/drang srong chen po khyod rab tu byung bas de ni bdag 'das
247a6('dul ba): na rgyal por 'gyur te 'di nyid du sbyin pa dag stsol ba dang /bsod nams dgra bgyid par 'gyur na ci'i phyir rab tu dbyung /rang sangs rgyas kyis tshigasu bcu de smras pa/
247a7('dul ba): 'od zer tshe ni cung zad de//re ltar thogs na zhig bdun nyid//don gzhan ched du bsams bsam pa//gzhan nyid ni yongasu 'gyur//drang srong chen po 'di'i tshe zhag
247b1('dul ba): bdun lcags sam/rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa zhag bdun yin//rgyul pos smras pa/drang srong chen po gal te dA wA na gnang bar bgyis rab tu phyung shig/de bdag la chu
247b2('dul ba): cung zhig yod par shes nas dang po drag pos de la bkur bsti bya bar brtsomaso//rang sangs rgyas de rlung nad can zhig pas des lhung bzed lag tu blangs nas za ba na rlung gis
247b3('dul ba): lag pa 'dar bar gyur to//de nas rgyal po gzhonu des gdu bu phyung nas/lhung bzed kyi gzhir bzhag pa dang /da la lhung bze da mi g.yo bar 'dug/des de mthong nas
247b4('dul ba): smon lam gdab par brtsams pa/ji ltar 'di la lhung bzed 'di mi g.yo ba de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi rgyud la chos ci yod pa de dag mi g.yo bar gnas par gyur
247b5('dul ba): cig ces btab//de de la sngon yi ge dang tshig ran par chos 'chad pa yin pas/des smras pa khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na yi ge dang tshig ran pa ran par chos 'chad lags
247b6('dul ba): na/da rang byang chub mngon sum du bgyis na/ci'i phyir chos mi bshad/des smras pa kho bo chos mi'i chud do//'o na su 'chad lags/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
247b7('dul ba): pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams gang yin pa ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ni tshig dang yi ge ran par ran par chos 'chad//des smon lam
248a1('dul ba): btab pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cho ga dang yi ge ran par ran par chos 'chad pa gang yin pa de'i mched dang rim gro par bdag gyur/
248a2('dul ba): cig ces btag/rang sangs rgyas des de rab tu phyung nas smras pa/khyod zhag bdun 'das nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba de kho na khyad kyis yid la byos shig des zhag bdun len
248a3('dul ba): na/cung zad kyang ma rtogs nas/des 'chi ba'i tshe smoni lam btab pa dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
248a4('dul ba): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas thos pa mang ba dang /thos pa 'dzin pa dang /thos pa bsags par gyur cig ces bta'o//dge slong dag ji snyam du
248a5('dul ba): sems/rgyal po gzho nu rang sangs rgyas kyi nu bor gyur pa de ni dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dis rang sangs rgyas phu bo shos kyi rim gro byas nas
248a6('dul ba): smon lam btob pa de'i las kyi rnam par+ya smin pas byi com ldan 'das kyis mched du gyur cing thos pa mang ba/thos pa 'dzin pa/thos po byasags pa'i rim glo par gyur to//
248a7('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nis the tshom thed gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos las ci zhig 'gyis na las da
248b1('dul ba): rnam par smin pas/bcom ldan 'das kyis thos pa mang ba/thos pa 'dzin pa dang /thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis
248b2('dul ba): bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag dge slong kun dga' bo 'di nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dang /tshogs rnyed pa ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes
248b3('dul ba): bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba bskul pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo nyi khri thub pa na/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang
248b4('dul ba): zhibasu ldan pa zhes bya ba nas sangs rgyas bcom ldani 'das 'od srung zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste zhes bya ba'i bar du ste/de grong khyer bA ra na ser nye bar bsten nas drang srong
248b5('dul ba): smra ba ri dgas kyi nags na bzhug so//de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung na don 'dis yon tan gyi tshogs cung zad kyang ma thob//'di la rab tu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni yang drug
248b6('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba dang /thos pa 'dzin pa dang /thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa yin pas/de'i
248b7('dul ba): ba'i tshe smon lam btab pa bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon gnas bla na med pa 'od srung la tshe ji srid tshangs par spyod pa spyad na yon tan gyi tshogs
249a1('dul ba): cung zad kyang ma thob kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis bram ze'i khye'u bla ma zhes//
249a2('dul ba): byabyAbyab gang yin pa de la/bram ze'i khye'u khyod skye dgu rnams kyi tshe lo brgya thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub par 'gyur
249a3('dul ba): ro//zhes lung bsten pa de'i bstan po la bdag reb du byung nus nyon mongs bya thams cad smras te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byas nas ji ltar badrug gi mkhan po yang dag
249a4('dul ba): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gis thos pa mang ba dang thos pa 'dzin pa/thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du bdag kyang shAkya'i
249a5('dul ba): rgyal po'i yang rgyal po bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa des thos pa mang ba thos pa 'dzin pa thos pa bsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan par gyur cig ces btab bo//
249a6('dul ba): smon lam de'i dbad+ma gis da ltar nges zlos pa mang ba/thos pa 'dzin pa/thos pa bstsags pa rnams kyi mchog tu lung bstan to//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu
249a7('dul ba): gaunag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/dge slong dgi khyod kyis de lta bul bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar dun /sdo ma la rdzu 'phrul ston pa gsus smra dang /
249b1('dul ba): gtum byed rig pa gA ya dang //gang gi phyir ni gnod pa dang /sems can rna bats+tsha yin//bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshul bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na bzhug so//
249b2('dul ba): de'i tshe mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba slongs mo bas zas rnyed par dka' ba byung //de na dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling
249b3('dul ba): zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las/shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang dri dang /ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs
249b4('dul ba): spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bal ba'i tshal lam/ka pid ta'i tshal lam/skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin
249b5('dul ba): po de las/skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang /ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste/blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing /lhag ma yang
249b6('dul ba): dge slong rnams la 'ged par byed//byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du dong nas ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod
249b7('dul ba): par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas/lha'i bdud rtsi las
250a1('dul ba): lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes
250a2('dul ba): bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdog nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag
250a3('dul ba): ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/da ltar mu ge'i dgon pa nyams nga ba slongs mo dris zas rnyed por dka' ba byung la/
250a4('dul ba): dge slong rdzu 'phrul thob pa gang yin pa de rnams ni 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las shing 'dzam bu'i snye ma kha dog dang //
250a5('dul ba): dri dang /ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//
250a6('dul ba): gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bil ba'i tshal la mo//ka pri ta'i tshal lam/skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa do las/skyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang dri dang /ro phun sum tshigs
250a7('dul ba): pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed//byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi glu
250b1('dul ba): du dong nas ma rmos mya btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru las lhung brjod gagang s+ho thA sa nAs bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'god par byed do//
250b2('dul ba): rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam sum cu rtsa gsum po'i lha rnams kyi nang du dong nas lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkrong ste/blangs nus bdag nyid longs spyod par byed cing lhag ma yang /
250b3('dul ba): dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed do//zhes bya ba nas yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza
250b4('dul ba): ba dang bca' ba lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdog nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la 'ged par byed kyis/gal te bdag gis kyang rdzu 'phrul thob na bdag
250b5('dul ba): gis kyang 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bor btags pa gang yin pa de las shing 'dzum bu'i snye ma kho dog drung dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams laste lha
250b6('dul ba): bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la byugo bar bya'o//gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na bal ba'i tshal lam/ka pi ti'i tshil
250b7('dul ba): lam sgyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de las sgyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang /dri dang ro phun sum tshogs po rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag
251a1('dul ba): ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o//byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru las lhung bzed bkang
251a2('dul ba): ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgod par bya'o//rgyal chen bzhi'i ris sam/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du
251a3('dul ba): song la/lha'i bdud rtsi las lhung bzed bkang nas blangs te/bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'o//yul ljongs 'byor pa
251a4('dul ba): dang zhes bya ba nas/skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar gang yin pa de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /bca' bas lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas bdag nyid
251a5('dul ba): longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya na/su zhig bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam lung 'bog par nus snyo mo//de nas lhas sbyin bcom ldan
251a6('dul ba): 'das gong na ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyeg+sa byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan
251a7('dul ba): 'das la lhas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas sbyin
251b1('dul ba): sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur pa thugasu chud nas lhas sbyin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//go'u ta ma khyod lhag pa'i tshul khrims la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig
251b2('dul ba): deng khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur ro//gau'u te ma khyod lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /
251b3('dul ba): khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro//de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/bcom ldan 'das bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma pogo snyam du
251b4('dul ba): bsams nas chas te/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya gang na ba dor song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+ya la 'dri skad ces smraso//gnas brtan bdag
251b5('dul ba): la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung dbog tu gsol/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u di n+yas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs drang lhas sbyin gyi la bltas na/sdig pa'i 'dod
251b6('dul ba): ba de lta bu skyes par shes nas lhas sbyin la 'di skad ces smraso//lhas sbyin khyod gzugs la tshul bzhin yid la byas shig dang /khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dge dang yang ldan
251b7('dul ba): par 'gyuraro//lhas sbyin khyod cher ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang yang
252a1('dul ba): ldan par 'gyuraro//de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te gnas brtan kun shes ko'u di n+yas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma
252a2('dul ba): pho go snyam du bsams nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang bzang ldan dang /rlangs pa dang /ming chen dang /grags pa dang /gang po dang /dri ma me dang /ba lang bdag dang lag
252a3('dul ba): bzangs dang /gnas brtan lnga brgya gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/glanas brtan lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras//gnas brtan bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung
252a4('dul ba): dpog tu gsol/de nas gnas brtan lnga brgya pos bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang /dge slong gnas brtan rnams dang lhas sbyin gyi la bltas nas//sdig pa'i 'dod
252a5('dul ba): pa de lta bu skyes par shes nas lhas sbyin la 'di skad ces smras//lhas sbyin khyod gzugs la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig dang /khyod rdzu 'phrul dang gzhan dag dang
252a6('dul ba): yang ldan por 'gyu ro//lhas sbyin khyod tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa la tshul bzhin yid la byos shig/khyod rdzu 'phrul dang
252a7('dul ba): gzhan dag dang yang ldan par 'gyur//de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/gnas brten lnga brgyas kyang bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam rgyu lung mo 'dzin
252b1('dul ba): dang ldan pa 'di dag dang /bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig tu snga nyid nas bgros sam/'di ltar bdag la sus kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi lung ma po go snya mo//de nas lhas sbyin
252b2('dul ba): 'di snyam du sems teH/su zhig bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyis lung dbog par nus snyamo//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan rgyal po'i khab kyi sde tsa ni gyi
252b3('dul ba): phug nu 'dug/de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/gnas brtan 'od srung sto brje ldan 'di ni yun ring po nas g.yo med pa/sgyu can ma yin pa drang por byed pa/drang ba'i
252b4('dul ba): rang bzhin can yin la bdag gis nye mtshams kyi phu bo kun dga' bo'i yang mkhan po yin pas/gnas brtan 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lam gyi
252b5('dul ba): lung 'bog par nus snyam du bsams nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa 'odi srung stobs bcu lnga ni gyis rkang pa gnyis
252b6('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas lces sbyin gyis/tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan la 'di skad ces smeso//gnas brtan
252b7('dul ba): bdag la rdzu 'phrul gyi lami gyi lung dpog tu gsol/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dang /dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan
253a1('dul ba): rnams dang /lhas sbyin gyi la bltas na sdig pa'i 'dod pa de lta bu skyes par gyur par ma rig nas/lhas sbyin la rdzu 'phrul rmyi lam gyi lung ba'o//
253a2('dul ba): de nas lhas sbyin gyis nam gyi cha stod dang nam gyi cha smod la mi nyal bar brtson pa dang ldan pa'i gnas pas bsam gtan dang po la brten te/rdzu 'phrul mngon par bsgrubs nas/
253a3('dul ba): de gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ba dang /ming por gyur cing gcig tu 'gyur ba dang /snang bar gyur cing mi snang bar 'gyur ba shes pa mthing bas nyamasu myong bar
253a4('dul ba): byed do//rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/ri la yang thad kar 'gro/ra ba la yang lus kyis mi thogs par thad kar 'gro'o//'di lta ste nA mkha' dang sa lo yang sted
253a5('dul ba): du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dpar na chu la bya ba bzhin no//chu le yang mi nub par rgyun phyogasu 'gro ste/dper na sa la bye ba bzhin no//skyil mo krung gis na mkha'
253a6('dul ba): 'gro bar byed de/dper ni mdab chags bya bzhi no//zla ba dang nyi ma 'di nyid 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba la yang lag pas nyug cing kun tu nyug par byed do//
253a7('dul ba): de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/ci bdag gis 'dzam bu zhes bya ba'i ming gis 'dzam bu gling zhes bya bar btags pa gang yin pa de las 'dzam bu'i snye mo kha dog de
253b1('dul ba): dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste drungs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya 'am/gzhan yang 'di'i nye 'khor na
253b2('dul ba): bil ba'i tshal dang ka pi the'i tshal lo ma/skyur rtsi'i tshal gang yin pa de la sa sgyur rtsi'i 'bras bu kha dog dang /dri dang ro phun sum tshogs pa rnams las lhung bzed bkang ste
253b3('dul ba): blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bsgo bar bya'am/byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi gling du song la ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras sa lu'i 'bru las lhung
253b4('dul ba): bzad bgang ste blangs nas bdag nyid longs spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya'am//yul ljongs 'byor pa dang zhes bya ba nas skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba'i bar
253b5('dul ba): de nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang btso'i ba lhung bzed bkang ste blangs nas/bdag nyid long sngo spyod cing lhag ma yang dge slong yod pa rnams la bgo bar bya tham sku mo//de nas
253b6('dul ba): lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis yul cha ga d+hA'i myigatso bo gang zhig dbang du byas nA/de dbang du gyur pas skye bo'i tshogs chen po tshegs chung ngus bdag gis dbang du 'gyur
253b7('dul ba): snyam pa dang /de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam du sems te/gzho nu ma skyes dgra 'di la shi nas bya'i rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug yo bzhag par 'gyur gyis//me la bdag gis gzhon ma skyes
254a1('dul ba): dgra dbang du 'gyur bar bya ste/de dbang du gyur na/skye ba'i tshogs chen po chags chung ngus bdag gi dbang du 'gyu ro snyamo//de nas lhas skyon gyis
254a2('dul ba): glang po che cang shes bzang po dang /rta cang shes bzang po dang /dge slong skra bregs shing snam sbyar bgos pa dar la bab pa bdag tu bsgyur nas/gzho nu ma skyes dgra'i sgo nas zhu
254a3('dul ba): shi sge'u chung ngu 'byung ba dang /sge'u chung nas zhugs shing sgor 'byung bar byed//res 'ga' gzhonu gser gyi 'og bgyi bcings par bsgyur nas gzhon ma skyes dkri byung
254a4('dul ba): na 'gro ldog par byed//ma skyes dgra yang gzho nu de la 'dzin cing kha spyad 'khyud par byed//res 'ga' ni khar mchil ma'i thal ba blugs na de yang lhas sbyin med par byed do//
254a5('dul ba): 'di ltar rnyed pa dang/bkur po stis zil gyis ni ni pas sems gtugs pa'i phyiraro//de nas gzho nu ma skyes dgras lhag par yang sdig pa can gyi lci bar song ba thog ste
254a6('dul ba): ma ston pa bas ni 'phags pa lhas sbyin ches mthu che'o zhes dad par gyur to//de la dad par gyur nis ldog par bya ba byed//shing rta lnga brgya nam dang /lhan cig snga dro
254a7('dul ba): dang bye dror rim gro byed du 'dra'o//de la g.yos kyi sna rje'u lnga brgyaHma~M yang bkadas dang bkad sa dag tu stobs por byed//lhas sbyin yod dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang sbyin
254b1('dul ba): ga gagad sa'i gung la 'dug par byed//de nas dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos blangs te rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms la zhugaso//dun
254b2('dul ba): slong rab tu mngang rgyal po'i khab na bsod snyoms spyod pa na/sgras sbyin la rnyed pa dang bkur bsti 'di lta bu dag byung bar gyur te/ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po lus 'phags mi'i bu ma skyes
254b3('dul ba): dgra shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig sde dro dang /phyi dro rim gro byed du 'gro zhing /de la gA yos kyi spyi rje'u lnga brgya tsam+ba yang /bkad s+yo dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par byed//
254b4('dul ba): lhas sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkod sa'i gudon 'dug par byedado zhes thos//zos nas kyang rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyad de/zas kyi bya ba byas
254b5('dul ba): sa phyi ma'i bsod snyoms sbyangs nas/chos gos dang lhung bzod mkho su phab ste/rkang pa bkrus nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste lhog nas/bcom ldan 'das
254b6('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'khod//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das la dge sbyong rab tu mang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
254b7('dul ba): btsun pa 'dir bdag dge slong rab tu mang po snga dro sham thabs 'tshal lhung bzod dang /chos gos blangs te/rgyal po'i khab du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas btsun pa bdag
255a1('dul ba): cag dge slong rab tu mang po rgyal po'i khab tu bsod snyoms spyod pa na/lhas sbyin la rnyed pa dang bkur sti 'di lta bu drug byung bar gyur to//ma ga'i
255a2('dul ba): d+ha'i rgyal po lus 'phags ma'i bu ma skyes dgra shing rta lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig snga dro dang phyi dro rim gro bgyid du mchi zhing /de la g.yos kyi sna rdze'u lnga brgya tsam yang bkang
255a3('dul ba): sa dang bkad sa dag tu stobs par bgyid do//lhas sbyin yang dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig bkra sa'i gung la mchis par bgyi do zhes thos leg so//dge slong
255a4('dul ba): dag khyed lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur bsti la dga' bar mi byed cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni gsod pa yin no//lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang
255a5('dul ba): bku ro bsti ni smod pa yino//dge slong dag dper na chu shing ni 'bras bu phyung nas rnyis par 'gyur zhing /chu shing ni 'bras bu phyung nus skam par 'gyur ba de bzhin du
255a6('dul ba): lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang /bkur sti ni gsod pa yino//lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti ni smad pa yin//dper na sgra dang sdug mA ni 'bras bu phyung nas skum par 'gyur
255a7('dul ba): zhing spa dang stug ma'i 'bras bu phyung nas dung yag tu 'gyur ba de bzhin du/lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur bsti ni gsod pa yin no//lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur
255b1('dul ba): bsti nI smad pa yin no//dper na dre'u mo ni mngal du bzung nas 'chi bar 'gyur zhing /dre'u mo ni mngal du bzung nas ma rung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur
255b2('dul ba): bste ni gsod pa yin no//lhas skyon gyi rnyed pa dang bkurA bsti ni smad pa yin no//dge slong dag lhas sbyin gyi rnyed pa dang bkur bsti de lta bu ji snyed byung ba de dag ni/skyes
255b3('dul ba): gti mug de la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro//dge slong dag de lta bas na 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/rnyed pa dang bku ro bsti
255b4('dul ba): gang yin pa zil gyis mnan par bya'i/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti byung ba la sems gtugs te gnas par mi bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//chu
255b5('dul ba): shing 'bras bu sdug 'bras dang /spa ni 'bras bu skems pa dang //rang gi bu yis dre'u mo ltar//skyes bu tha shal bkur bstis 'joms//ji srid byis pa mngon byed pa//
255b6('dul ba): de srid du ni phung bar 'gyur//byis pa'i dkar ba'i cha 'joms pa//rtse mo las kyang ltung bar 'gyuraro//de nas lhas sbyin rnyed pa dang bkur bstis zil gyis non po/sems
255b7('dul ba): yongasu gtugs pa la sdig pa'i 'dod pa 'di lta bu skyes par gyur te/da ni bcom ldan 'das bgros 'khogs gtugs te/'khor bzhi laM gdams ngag dpog tu mnyel
256a1('dul ba): bar gyur gyis/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spangs te/bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongasu drang zhing bac+doMs
256a2('dul ba): ni thugs las chu ngur mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjesu brtson par bzhugs kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems bskyed ma thag tu lhas sbyin rdzu 'phrul de ltas
256a3('dul ba): yongasu nyams te/yongasu nyams kyang bdag yongasu nyams zhe so mi shes//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos krong de'i blo dge slong nog can zhes bya bas bac+doMs
256a4('dul ba): kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa la spyad tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgoms nas/'dod pa rnams la 'dod pa'i 'dun pa spang ba'i phyi de la mang du gnas pas tshangs pa'i
256a5('dul ba): 'jig rten dang skal ba monyam par skyeso//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ngan spong gi chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ri la 'jigs byed kyi tshal gyi rid kyi nags na
256a6('dul ba): 'dug/de nas tshangs pa nog can+da gyis lhas sbyin rdzu 'phrul de las yongasu nyams par shes nas/dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang pa
256a7('dul ba): 'am brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'o 'jig rten las mi snang bar byas te/ngan spong du 'ongs nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i mdun du 'dug//
256b1('dul ba): de nas tshangs pa nog can+da gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyis bu chen po shes par gyis shig/lhas sbyin rnyed pa
256b2('dul ba): dang bkur bstis zil gyis non pa sems gtugs pa la sdig pa'i 'dod pa 'di lta bu skyes te/da ni bcom ldan 'das bgres 'khogs gtugs te/'khor bzhi la gdams
256b3('dul ba): ngag dpag tu mnyel bar gyur gyis/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spangs te/bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongasu drang zhing /bac+doMs
256b4('dul ba): ni thugs las chung ngur gnas shing mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rje su brtson par bzhugs kyang ci ma rung snyam sems bskyed ma thag tu rdzu 'phrul de las
256b5('dul ba): slar yongasu nyams te/yongasu nyams kyang bdag ni slar yongasu nyamaso zhes mi shes kyis btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu snying pa rtse ba nye bar bzung ste/bcom ldan 'das gang
256b6('dul ba): na ba der song ste phyin nas don 'di rgyas par gsol na legaso//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can la cang mi smra bas khas blangaso//de nas tshangs
256b7('dul ba): pa nog can gyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos cang mi smra bas khas blangs par rig nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag
257a1('dul ba): 'tshal te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can song nas ring por ma ldon
257a2('dul ba): par shes nas ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na dun spyod nas mi smyung bar gyur te/rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin
257a3('dul ba): la snyoms par zhug so//dri nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der sdong ste byon nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos
257a4('dul ba): phyag byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos tshangs pa nog can dang lhan cig bar skabs kyi gti
257a5('dul ba): ji snyed glengs pa de dag thams cad rgyas par gsol to//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka'
257a6('dul ba): stsal to//mo'u dag la gyi bu snga mo zhig tu las sbyin sems la bkra nas rig par ma byas samA/tsi na da gzod tshangs pa nog can gyis sbran/btsun pa mang lagaso//
257a7('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das dang /tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po thabs gcig tu bar skabs kyi gtam 'di gleng bar mdzad pa na/de nas lhas sbyin grogs dge slong bzhi
257b1('dul ba): pro ko kA li ka dang /khan da drab bya dang /ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis lhas sbyin rgyang /
257b2('dul ba): ring po kho na nas gzig so//gzigs nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu lhas sbyin 'o ni de ltar 'ong gis tshig srungs shig dong
257b3('dul ba): de'u re skyes bu gti mug 'o ni bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid lung ston to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos/bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
257b4('dul ba): byas nas/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na 'od ma'i tshal nas mi snang bar gyur te/dran spong gi chu srin byis pa gsod kyi ra la 'jigs byed kyi ri dgas kyi nagasu phyin pa de lta
257b5('dul ba): bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso//de nas lhas sbyin bcom ldan 'dis gang na bu der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig
257b6('dul ba): tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la lhas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//da ni bcom ldan 'das bgres 'khogs gtugs te/'khor bzhi la
257b7('dul ba): gdams ngag dpog tu mnyel bar gyur gyis/e ma'o bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gi dge 'dun bdag la spongs shig dang /bdag gis dge slong gi dge 'dun yongasu drang gis//
258a1('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das ni thugs las chung ngur bde bar gnas pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rjesu brtson par bzhugasu gsol//skyes bu gti mug re shig shA ri'i bu dang
258a2('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa de dag la yang de dge slong gi dge 'dun mi spong na/ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma 'thung ba khyod la lto ga la spong /de nas lhas sbyin 'di snyam
258a3('dul ba): sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bu la ni bsngags pa gsungs la/bdag la ni ro dang 'dra ba mchil ma 'thung po'o zhes smad pa gsungaso snya mo//de nas
258a4('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das lhas sbyin 'khrugs pa dang /zhe sdang dang /nga rgyal dang /'chab pa dang /bgrongs pa dang /mi bzod pa dang ma dad pa bstan no//de nas lhas sbyin gyis 'jal
258a5('dul ba): to zhes byas nas mgo ldan gsum bcogs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //'dul ba gzhi//bam po go bdun pa//de'i tshe tshe dang
258a6('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bo bsil yab thogs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi sna mo logs nas bcom ldan 'das la g.yob cing 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun
258a7('dul ba): dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo song la 'od mel tshal byi ka lan da ka gnas pa na/dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te gnas pa de dge thams cad rim gro'i gnasu
258b1('dul ba): bsdus shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa nA/dge
258b2('dul ba): slong ji snyed nye bar brten te gnas pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnasu bsngags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
258b3('dul ba): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to//
258b4('dul ba): btsun pa 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/dge slong ji snyed nye bar brten te mchis pa de dag thams cad rim gro'i gnasu bsags lags te/bcom ldan 'das da ni
258b5('dul ba): de'i dus la bab par dgongasu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das rim gro'i gnas gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams
258b6('dul ba): pa nyid la bzhugaso//bzhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ston pa lnga po 'di dag 'jig rten na yod cing mngon te/lnga
258b7('dul ba): gang zhe na/'di na ston pa gcig ni tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi tshul khrims yongasu dag ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ste/
259a1('dul ba): de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas/ston pa shes ldan 'di ni tshul khrims yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag
259a2('dul ba): tshul khrims yongasu dag ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yino zhes khas 'che ba yin te/gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na/des na 'di'i yid la ma 'bab par 'gyur
259a3('dul ba): bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te/ci rung /ston pa shes ldan 'di las nyid shes par 'gyur grang /'di dag cag la
259a4('dul ba): 'di lta ste chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang nad gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis semaso snyam ste/de nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims las
259a5('dul ba): rjesu srung bar semaso//ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis tshul khrims kyi sgo nis rjesu bsrung bar re ba yin te/'di ni 'dzi ni ston pa yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa dang po yin
259a6('dul ba): no//gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gi cag ni 'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bde da gi'i tshe ba yong su dag ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yino zhes khwa 'che ba ste/
259a7('dul ba): nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyu so sor shes te/ston pa shes ldan 'di ni 'tsho ba yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi 'tsho ba yongasu dag ste/nyon
259b1('dul ba): mongs pa can ma yin nozhes khas 'che ba yin te/gal te bdag cag yis gzhan la de skad smras na/des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du ma
259b2('dul ba): bar 'gyur gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te ci rung ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /'di dedag cag la 'di lta ste chos gos dang /bsod snyoms
259b3('dul ba): dang gnas mal dang /nad gsos kyi rkyen sran dang yo byad rnams kyis semaso snyam ste/de nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjesu srung bar semaso//ston pa de lta bu ni
259b4('dul ba): nyan thos rnams kyis 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rje su bsrung bar ro ba yin te//'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa gnyis pa yin//gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni
259b5('dul ba): shes pa mthong ba yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag gi shes pa mthong ba yongasu dag ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba ste/de nyid thos rnams dang lhan
259b6('dul ba): cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nus/ston pa shes ldan 'di ni shes pa mthong ba yongasu ma dag pa yin bzhin du bdag ni shes pa mthong ba yongasu dag ste/nyon mongs
259b7('dul ba): pa can ma yin zhes khas 'che ba yin te/gal te bdag cag gis gzhan la 'di skad smras na/des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong
260a1('dul ba): bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag gis glengs te ci rung /ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur glang /'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste
260a2('dul ba): chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang nad gsos kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis semaso snyam ste de nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa mthong ba'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung
260a3('dul ba): bar semaso//ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis shes pa mthong ba'i sgo nas rje su bsrung bar re ba yin te/'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa gsum pa yin///
260a4('dul ba): gzhan yang 'dri na ston pa gcig ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gi lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa yin te/nyon mongs pa can ma yino zhes
260a5('dul ba): khas 'che ba ste/de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas ston pa shes ldan 'di ni lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa ma yin bzhin du bdag gi
260a6('dul ba): lung ston pa ni phun sum tshogs pa yin te/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'chi ba yin te/gal te bdag gis gzhan la de skad ces smras na des dri'i yid la
260a7('dul ba): mi 'bab par 'gyur bas ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba de bdag gis glengs te ci rung //ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang /'di bdag cag/
260b1('dul ba): la 'di lta ste/chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang /nad gsos kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad rnams kyis semaso snyam ste/de nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa phun suM
260b2('dul ba): tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar sdom sngo//ston pa de lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa phun sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar re ba yin te/'di ni 'jig
260b3('dul ba): rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa bzhi pa yin no///gzhan yang 'di na ston pa gcig ni tshes 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du
260b4('dul ba): bdag gis chos 'dul ba ni legs par bshad pa yin te/nyon mongs pa can me yi no zhes khas 'chi ba ste/de nyan thos rnams dang lhan cig gnas pa'i rgyus so sor shes nas
260b5('dul ba): ston pa shes ldan 'di ni chos 'dul ba nyes par 'chad bzhin du bdag gis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa ste nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/gal
260b6('dul ba): te bdag cag gis gzhan la de skad smras na des na 'di'i yid la mi 'bab par 'gyur bas/ston pa de la yid du mi 'ong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de bdag cag gis glengs te
260b7('dul ba): ci rung /ston pa shes ldan 'di rang nyid shes par 'gyur grang //'di bdag cag la 'di lta ste/chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang /nad gsos kyi rkyen sman
261a1('dul ba): dAng yo byad rnams kyis semaso snyam ste/de nyan thos rnams kyis chos 'dul bu legs pur bu shad pa'i sgro nas rjes bskyud ba du sems so//skyon
261a2('dul ba): pade lta bu ni nyan thos rnams kyis chos 'dul ba legs par bshad pa'i sgro nas rje sa bsrung bar re bo yin te/'di ni 'jig rten na yod cing mngon pa'i ston pa lnga ba yin no//
261a3('dul ba): dge slong dag nga ni tshul khrims yongasu dag pa kho na yin pas/nga tshul khrims yongasu dag pa ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no//zhes zhal gyis 'chi ste/nyan thos
261a4('dul ba): rnams kyis nga la tshul khrims kyi sgo nas bsrung bar bsamya yang mi dgos la/nga yang nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi sgo nas rjesu srung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o//dge
261a5('dul ba): slong dag nga ni 'tsho ba yongasu dag pa kho na yin pas nga'i 'tsho ba yongasu dag ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yino zhes zhal gyis 'che ste//nyan thos rnams kyis nga la 'tsho ba'i
261a6('dul ba): sgra nas rjesu bsrung yang mi dgos la/dA yang nyan thos rnams kyis nga la 'tsho ba'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o//dge slong dag nga ni ye shes gzigs pa
261a7('dul ba): yongasu dge ba kho na yin pas/nga ye shes gzigs pa mongasu dag pa ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yino zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/nyan thos rnams kyis nga la ye shes
261b1('dul ba): gzigs pa'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar bsam yang mi dgos la/nga yang nyan thos rnams kyis ye shes gzigs pa'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o//dge slong dag nga ni
261b2('dul ba): lung ston pa dang ldan pa kho na yin pas nga'i lung ston pa phun sum tshogs te/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/nyan thos rnams kyis nga la lung ston pa phun
261b3('dul ba): sum tshogs pa'i sgo nas bsrung bar bsam yang mi dgos la/nga yang nyan thos rnams kyis lung ston pa dang ldan par rjesu bsrung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o//dge slong dag nga'i chos ldan
261b4('dul ba): 'dul ba ni legs par gsung ba kho na yin pas/nga'i chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa ste/nyon mongs pa can ma yin no zhes zhal gyis 'che ste/nyen thos rnams kyis
261b5('dul ba): nga la chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas rjesu bsrung bar bsam yang mi dgos la/nga yang nyan thos rnams kyi chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa'i sgo nas rjesu
261b6('dul ba): bsrung bar 'dod pa mi mnga'o//dge slong dag nga ni khyed la tshar bcad cing tshar bcad cing /thag bcug cing thag bcug cing rab tu smra'i/khyed la ngo ni mi byed/rdza mkhan gyi rdza
261b7('dul ba): mchos pa rnams la bya ba bzhin du gang rung ba de 'jog par zad pas nga'i tshig gi lam rnams bzod par yang gyis shig/de nas lhas sbyin kyis ko ka li ka dang /ban da dang
262a1('dul ba): bya dang /ka ta mor ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin la smras pa/ko ka li ka dang //kha na da drab bya ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya rgya mtshos byin dag chur sheg
262a2('dul ba): dge slong glo'u ta ma 'dug bzhin du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'thun dbye ba dang /'khor lo dbye bar bya'o//des na bdag cag shi ste 'das na yang dge sbyong gau'u tA ma di ltar rdzu 'phrul
262a3('dul ba): che bde ltar mthu che ba 'dug bzhin du lhas spyan dang /ko ka lo ke dang /khan da drab byo dang ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin gyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'thun pa
262a4('dul ba): ba dang /'khor los phye ba byas zhes phyogs dang phyogs mtsham su grags pa dang /sgra dang tshig su bcad pa snyan pa rgya cher 'byung bar 'gyuraro//de rnams kyis smras pa/lhas
262a5('dul ba): sbyin bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba dang 'khor lo dbye bar ma nus//de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa lhas sbyin/bcom ldan
262a6('dul ba): blongs kyi nyan thos rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu che ba lci'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems rig pa dag yod la de dag ni rgyang ring po nus kyang mthong la/drung na 'dug kyang mthong ba dag yin te/de rnams kyi sems
262a7('dul ba): kyis sems khyab par byas nas yid kyis yid rnam par shes te/de rnams kyis bdag cag bskyod pa nyid kyis shes par 'gyur ro//des smras pa k+ta kaM li ka dag tshur thabs yod
262b1('dul ba): kyisabadag cag dge slong gnas brtan rnams kyi drung du song la gnas brtan dag thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig dang /bdag cag gis gnas brtan rnams la yo byad thams cad
262b2('dul ba): kyis mi brel bar bgyi'o zhes yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs par bya zhing dge slong gsar bu rnams la yang lhung bzed dang chos gos dang lhung bzad kyi snod dang /chu tsha gos dang ska rags
262b3('dul ba): dang lung dbog pa dang /klog tu gzhug pa dang 'don du gzhug pa dang /rnal 'byor dang yid la byed pas nye bar bsdu zhing rim gro bya'o//tshe dang ldan pa lhas sbyin thabs de ni bden pa zhig
262b4('dul ba): yod do//de na lhas sbyin gyis dge 'dun 'thun pa dbya ba'i phyir brtul bar bcomos//dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyis lhas sbyin dge 'dun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul
262b5('dul ba): bar skyod pa nyid tshor nas/skabs de dge slong rnams la smras pa dang /dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin ni dge 'dun 'thun pa ngo bya ba'i slad

263a1('dul ba): ba grangs nas rgyus/b+h+ya rlung stem 'dugu shi/sa sbyin kyad dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig/dge 'dun ma b+h+ya ku d+ha dga' nga/

263a3('dul ba): dang dge slong de rnams kyis lhas sbyin la bzhams te bsgo ba dang /de bzhams te bsgo yang bzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden
263a4('dul ba): gyi/gzhan ni brdzun no zhes rje su tha snyad 'dog par byed nas/skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa bdag cag gis lhas sbyin la bzhim

263a7('dul ba): kyis bsgo bar bya'o//bsgo ba yang 'di ltar byas te/gnas mal bshams pa byas nas gaN+DI brdungs te dris pa'i tshig gis dge slong rnams la yang dag par bsgo la/
263b1('dul ba): dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing 'thun par gyur pa dang /dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o//dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol/lhas byin 'di dag
263b2('dul ba): bdun 'thun pa dbye ba'i slad du rtul te dbyen bgyid par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste mchis nas 'di la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgon
263b3('dul ba): bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs par bgyid na gal te dge 'dun gyi

263b5('dul ba): byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig/lhas skyon khyod dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig/dge 'dun 'thun mi phyed/kun
263b6('dul ba): tu dga' mi rtsod mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la ston pa'i bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur zhes
263b7('dul ba): lhas sbyin la gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsgo ba mdzad//'di ni gsol ba'o//las ni 'di ltar bya ste/dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol lhas sbyin 'di dge
264a1('dul ba): 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i ska brtul te dbyen brjid par 'gyur ba'i rjod pa yang dag par blangs nAs rab tu bzung ste mchis nas 'di la dge slong
264a2('dul ba): mang pos bzhams te bsgron/brnams te bahU~M yang po ni de nyid lonan gyis mchog tu brdung zhing mngon par smin nas/'di nyid bdun gyi gzhan ni brtan pa'i zhes thA skyed
264a3('dul ba): 'dogs par bgyid de de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis lhas sbyin la ltas sbyin khyod dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul bar ma byed cig/dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i phying
264a4('dul ba): pa yang drag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste ma 'dug shig/lhas sbyin khyod dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig/dge 'dun 'thun mi phyed kun tu dag mi kyang mchog cig do

264b2('dul ba): gsol pa dang bani las kyis bsgo ba mdzad par bzod pa de dag ni cang ma gsung shig/blang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsus shig/'di ni las brjod pa dang po ste de bzhin
264b3('dul ba): dulas brjod pa gnyis pa dang gsum pa'i bar du b+ha'o//dge slong de rnams kyis lhas sbyin la gsol pa dang bzhi'i las kyisku bsgon/bad+mo yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis

264b5('dul ba): skrospyod bzhi po kau kA li ka dang /khan de drab b+h+ya dang /kA ta mA ra~M ka ti sh+tsi dang /rgya mchis b+h+yon te/de rnams kyis gleng dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan
264b6('dul ba): bi khyed cag dag yang rung sdig kyang /dge slong 'di la ci ya ma s+ho ni/deci'i ra zhe nA/dge sbyong 'di ni cho sa skye ba 'dul bA swA bA/dge slong 'di ni chos de
264b7('dul ba): 'dul ba yang dag par drangs nas rab tu bzung ste su the snyad 'dogs par byed pa/dge slong na shes bzhin du skye'i mo shes pa ma yin pa'i phyir te dge slong 'di gang la

265a3('dul ba): bden pas gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rje suM zla snyad 'dogs par bgyid lagaso//de'i tshe grogs bgyid cing mi mthun par spro ba'i rjes phyogs pa'i dge slong bzhi pa ko ka lI kA
265a4('dul ba): dang kha na dadung bya de/krata mo raka ti sh+tsa dang /rgyu mtshos byin de rnams kyang dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces/tshe dang ljon pa dag khyed cag dge yang nga sdin

265a6('dul ba): nas rA tu babyu ste/rjes thA sbyang 'dugs par byed pa dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du sgra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i b+h+r-i tAM/dge slong 'di gang la ba'od cing 'dod pa de

265b2('dul ba): byin dgu sbyong shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul bar byed cing dben byed par 'gyur ba'i zad pa yang dag par rungs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug

265b5('dul ba): ste R+Sha su ni snang 'dags par byed pa dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du sgra'i mi shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa dri la bdag cag kyang 'dod
265b6('dul ba): cing brjod de zhes ma zer smrig/tshe dang ldan pa khyad cag dge /'dun byed 'dod par ma byed par ched du ston pa khyed cig dge 'dun 'thun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan
265b7('dul ba): dag da ni 'dun 'thun par gyis/shig/dge 'dun mthun mi phyed kun tu dga' mi byed/mchag gcig 'don pa gcig cing chung po'i ma gcig tu 'dres pa lta bur gyur la/
266a1('dul ba): bstan pa gsal bar byed na bde ba la reg par gnas par 'gyur gyis tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjesu phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta
266a2('dul ba): thong cig ces bsgo shig/dge slong de rnams kyis ko ka li kA dang /kha nA da drab bya drang /kra ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin rnams la bzhams te bsgo na bzhams te bsgo
266a3('dul ba): yang gzhi de nyid la nan gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par zhen nas 'di nyid bden gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes rje su tha snyad 'dogs par byed do//

266a6('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed kyis kro ka li ka dang /khan de drab bya dang /ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtsho byin dang gzhun yang de lta bu dang 'thun pa su yang rung ba

266b3('dul ba): mthun par smra ba'i rjesu phyogs par gyur nas/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag/khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'dri la ci yang skra shig/de ci'i

266b6('dul ba): 'di dag la dge slong mang pos bzhams te bsgo na bzhams te bsgo yang gzhi de nyid la non gyis mchog tu bzung zhing mngon par rgan nas 'di nyid badren gyi gzhan ni brdzun pa'o zhes

267a1('dul ba): drab byA dang /ka ta mo ra ka tI sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin rnams la ko ka li ka kha na da dra ba bya ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya rgya mtshos byed khyad cag shes bzhin du dge
267a2('dul ba): slong gang dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye ba'i phyir brtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa dang /de mi mthun par smra ba'i rjesu
267a3('dul ba): phyogs par ma byed cig/dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces che dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung /dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan
267a4('dul ba): po dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba 'dul ba smra ba/dge slong 'di ni ches dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste/rje su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin
267a5('dul ba): du smra'i/mi shes par ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod do//zhes ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa
267a6('dul ba): dag dge slong 'dri ni chos smra bu ma yin 'dul ba smra ba mu yin gyi/dge slong 'di ni chos ma yin pa dang /'dul ba ma yin pa yang drug par blangs nus rab tu bzung ste rje su tha snyad 'ong
267a7('dul ba): par byed pa/dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du sgro'i shes par ni ma yin pa'i phyir te/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed pa'i rjesu phyogs shing mi mthun par smra ba 'di lta bu
267b1('dul ba): 'dri zong cig/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun dang 'thun par gyis shig/dge 'dun 'thun mi phyed kun tu dga' ma rtsod/mchog gcig 'don pa gcig cing chu dang 'o ma gcig tu

267b3('dul ba): ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos byin rnams la/ko kau li ka/khan da dra ba bya ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya/rgya mtshos byin khyed shes bzhin du dge slong gang dge 'dun 'thun pa dbye
267b4('dul ba): ba'i phyir rtul bar byed cing dbyen byed par 'gyur ba'i rtsod pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste 'dug pa dang /de mi mthun par smra ba'i rje su phyogs par ma byed cig/dge
267b5('dul ba): slong rnams la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag dge yang rung sdig kyang rung dge slong 'di la ci yang ma smra shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos
267b6('dul ba): smra ba/'dul ba smra ba/dge slong 'di ni chos dang 'dul ba yang dag par blangs nas bzung ste r+t+ti su tha snyad 'dogs par byed pa/dge slong 'di ni shes bzhin du smra'i mi shes par ma
267b7('dul ba): yin pa'i phyir te/dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing bzod zhes ma zer cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong 'di ni chos smra ba ma
268a1('dul ba): yin 'dul ba smra ba ma yin gyi dge slong 'dzin chos ma yin pa dang 'dul ba ma yin pa yang dag par blangs nas rab tu bzung ste/rjesu tha snyad 'dogs par
268a2('dul ba): byed pa/dge slong 'di ni mi shes bzhin du sgra'i shes par ma yin pa'i phyir te/dge slong 'di gang la 'dod cing bzod pa de la bdag cag kyang 'dod cing brjod do zhes ma zer cig/
268a3('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'byed 'dod par ma byed par/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'thun pa nyid du 'dod par gyis shig/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge 'dun 'thun pa gyis shig/

268b2('dul ba): de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/btsun pa/bdag cag gis ko ka l-i ka dang /khan da dA ba bya dang /kA tA ma rA ka ti sh+yA dang /rgya mtshos byin la
