304b3('dul ba): dang bral bar dogs pa'i snying gis/thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa'o la smras pa/rje'i sas gal te de ltan bdag kyang dka' thub kyi nagasu mchi ste/bdag ni hUM'i sras
304b4('dul ba): da brel na/skad cig nam yang 'cha ra rngo ma thog lags//ci'i sa zhe na/nam mkha' rnabs stong par gyur pa dang /dzI lhor sa na lo tog gis stongs dang //byad+ma rmA yis smos
304b5('dul ba): bar gyur pa dang //bud myed khyim thab kyis stongs de bzhin no//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/bdag cag mthar gdon mi za bar 'bral ba 'gyur te/'di ni 'jig rten gyi
304b6('dul ba): rlung bzhin yin no//khyod ni bza' ba dang btung ba dang mal cha dang /bgo ba mchog la goms pa sna lus shin tu skyid pa yin/dka' thub kyi nags ni rtswa dang lo ma bting bar
304b7('dul ba): ni nyal/rtsa ba dang me tog dang 'bras bu ni rba/rtswa du ra ba dang zug rdo dang d+hA dang /tsherams gang ba'i sa sa ni rgyu yang dang yang du za gcig pa la ni rten/bdag nyid skye bo thams
305a1('dul ba): cad la ni bstan dgos/glo bur du 'ongs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni 'bad dgos la/do na yang nga gdon mi za bar ci nus kyis sbyin pa gtong ste de
305a2('dul ba): la khyod kyis cung zad kyang mi 'gyod par bya dgoso//de bas na re zhig da dung yang legs par som shig/rgyags byin mas smras pa/rje'i sras bdag rdo tsa thog gis rje'i
305a3('dul ba): sras kyi rjesu sgrub lagaso//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/gal te de lta na dam bcas pa de dag khyod kyis dran par byos shig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' pha'i drung du
305a4('dul ba): song nas mgo bos phyag byas te/yab cig bdag gis sbyin par glang chen stsal//nongs par gang lags sa bdag gzod par gsol//bdag ni grong nas dgon par
305a5('dul ba): mchis lags kyi//mi yi dbang po phyag mdzod stongs ma gyur//de nas rgyal po bu dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis dbugs kyis bsnangs te/skad 'dar 'dar por smras
305a6('dul ba): pa bu sbyin pa'i blo bor la 'dug shrI gau/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/sa ni r-i dang bcas par yang //gal te ldog par 'gyur gda' yis//sa bdag bdag ni sbyin pa
305a7('dul ba): las/rdo sems ni ldog par mi bgyid do//zhes smras nas song ngo //de nas bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dang lhan cig shing rta'i nang du zhugs te/grong khyer dam pa de nas byung nas/
305b1('dul ba): da 'khor gyi mi dang /yul ma mya ngan byed pa brgya skyong rje su 'brang bzhin du sadang //de nas mi zhig gis ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa'i sgra de yang zas/smra ba'i tshogs chen
305b2('dul ba): grong khyer gyi sgor byung ba yang mthong nas/mi zhig lo dris pa/kye rlung rje spyi bo'i tshogs chen po 'di tshe nges 'debs po ci lus gyur/des smras pa/shes ljon ci mi shes sam/
305b3('dul ba): 'di ltar mi yi de bang bo nyid kyi sras po mche ba bzang //brtan pa'i ngang tshul rab tu sbyin la dga' ba 'di nas spyugs//de na bu dang chung mar bcas te nags mthar chas pa la/
305b4('dul ba): pho byung 'khor ba rnams 'dus shin tu snying rjes cho nges 'dobs//de nas byang chub snyoms dpas grong khyer dam pa de nas byung ba'i pho brang 'khor ba rnams la ci rigs par mngon
305b5('dul ba): du song nas smras pa/shes ldan dag smrar deng shig/slar deng shig 'di ltar shin tu yun ring po nAs sdug pa dang /'grogs pa yang mjug tu gdon mi za bar 'bral du
305b6('dul ba): mtha' can du 'gyur te/gnyen gyi skye ba dang 'grogs pa ni lam ka'i ngal bso ba'i bisti gnas kyi shing dang 'dra bas gdon mi za bar sdug pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro//ci'i phyir na
305b7('dul ba): na/'jig rten kun na skye bo dbang med de//mdza' ba rnams dang bral bar 'gyur bsams nas//khyed kyis sa steng 'bad pa thams cad kyis//zhi phyir blo gros mi g.yo brtan par
306a1('dul ba): gyis/radri nas dpag tshad sum brgya 'das pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' mthong nus bram ze zhig mngon du 'ongs te smras pa/kye rgyal rigs gzho nu bdag ni
306a2('dul ba): khyod kyi yon tan thos nas 'di nas dpag tshad sum brgya tsam gyi yul nas 'dir mchis lags kyis/khyod kyi shing rta mchog 'dis bdag ngal ba 'bras bu mchis par
306a3('dul ba): bgyi ba'i rigaso//de nas rgyags byin ma mi bzod pa skyes te tshig brlang pos bram ze de la smras pa/e ma'o nags na'ang mi dbang sras la srong ba gang //bram ze 'di ni shin tu/
306a4('dul ba): brtse ba med pa'i blo//mi dbang sras po mi dbang dpal las nyams gyur pa//'di la 'dir ni snying rje cig mi skye 'am//byang chub sems dpas smras pa/khyod kyis bram ze ma spyo shig/
306a5('dul ba): de ci'i phyir zhe na/rgyags sprin gal te nor 'dod len pa 'di med gyur na//kun sbyin med par mi gang zhig gis sa steng byang chub 'thob//sbyin sogs pha rol phyin drag tshul
306a6('dul ba): gyis yon tan mchog can gyi//byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kun mkhyen nyid mchog rtag tu 'thob//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dpa' bas rta dang ldan//
306a7('dul ba): ba'i shing rta de bram ze de la byin nas smras pa//bram ze ser sna dri ma sel byed pa//shing rta rab tu byin pa 'di yis 'dir//bdag ni drang srong che mchog gis bskor ba'i//zag
306b1('dul ba): med chos kyi shing rta che skor shog/de nas thams cad sgrol gyis snying rab tu dga' bas shing rta'i mchog de yang bram ze la byin nas gzhonu mdog gnag phrag pa la khyer/rgyags
306b2('dul ba): byin mAs ni gzhon nu ma dra ba can khyer nas//dka' thub kyi nags log su chas pa dang /rim gyis dka' thub kyi nag su phyin to//de nas thams cad sgrol dka' thub kyi tshal ngom
306b3('dul ba): ring gi snying mgu bar byed pa'i brtul zhugs blangs te gnas//ji tsam na rgyags byin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i phyir dka' thub kyi nags nas song ba dang /bram ze zhig thams cad
306b4('dul ba): sgrol gyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/rgyal rigs gzhonu khyod rgyal bar gyur cig/bdag cag bkol ba ma mchis pas//spa shug lhan cig 'khyam bgyid na//de yi don du bus
306b5('dul ba): pa gnyis//khyod kyis bdag la sbyin pa'i rigs//de skad ces smras pa dang /de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol/bu sdug pa gtong ba la cung zhig sems shing 'dug
306b6('dul ba): pA dang /de nas bram ze des byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgro lnga la smras pa/kye rgyayi rigs gzho nu bdag gis khyod thams cad ster ba'o zhes thos na/'di ltar khyod la bdag
306b7('dul ba): gis bslangs pa de la ci zhig dpyid du yod//khyod ni kun ster snying rje yi//bdag nyid can du sa stengs grags//ji ltar grags pa de bzhin du//khyod kyis rtag tu bya ba'i rigs//de skad
307a1('dul ba): ces smras pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze de la smras pa/kye bram ze chen po//rang gi srog ni gtong ba la'ang //ldan 'ga' dpyod pa
307a2('dul ba): ma myong na//rang gi bu ni btang ba la//bdag blo gzhan du 'gyur ci smos//bram ze chen po de lta mod kyis//bdag gis nagasu sgyid bskyed pa'o//bus pa 'di gnyis yongs spangs
307a3('dul ba): na/ma dang bral ba'i nyon mongs pa//'di dag ji ltar gnas snyam mod//gzhonu shin tu brdzu med pas//bus pa btang la bdog min zhes//kha cig bdag la phyar 'ong gis//
307a4('dul ba): bram ze bdag ni khrid na legs//de nas bram ze des thams cad sgrol la smras paM/kye rgyal rigs gzhon nu rgyal po chen po'i rigasu skyes pa/sa 'di thams cad du yon tan
307a5('dul ba): grags pa/srog chags thams cad la snying brtse bas 'o byams par zhugs pa/sbyin pa dang mchod pa dang /bkur bstis spos kyi glang po lta bu/dge sbyong dang bram ze dang
307a6('dul ba): glo bur ba'i skye bo la mchod pa byed pa/skye bo bkren pa dang /phongs pa dang /mgon med pa dang ltogs pa yongasu sdug pa thams cad kyi yid la re ba yongasu rdzogs par byed
307a7('dul ba): pa mthong ni don yod pa khyod kyis bdag 'ongs pa nom pa med pa 'am/lam gyis dub pa 'bras bu med pa 'am/mthong na don med pa 'am/re ba dang yun ring po nas brnag
307b1('dul ba): brnag pa'i 'dod pa 'bru 'bras med par byu ba gang yon pa den cha ma yon te/khyod kyis med shes byu ba chog kho bo'i yod la ro ba kun tu rtog pa'i rta btab na/myur du ldog par 'gyur
307b2('dul ba): de bas na khyod kyis bdag gi yid la re bo yongasu rdzogs par byas nas btang ba'i rig so//de ci'i phyir zhes/chu gter gosu gyon zhing bza' mig mtshungs med pa//ri bo mchog
307b3('dul ba): rgyas nu mar ldan pa'i ro stod can//grong khyer grong rdal bcas po'i sa la btsal byas kyang //mche bzang khyod dang mtshungs par gtong phod yod ma yin//de nas byang chub sems dpa
307b4('dul ba): thams cad sgrol gyis bram ze'i tshig de thos nas bu la chags pa'i blong bas 'di dag sems par byed/gal te re zhig bu gnyis po//bram ze byin na bu dang ni//bral ba las byung sdug
307b5('dul ba): bsngal dag/bdag dang rgyags sbyin gyis 'thob 'gyur//'on te 'di las byin na//brtul zhugs las kyang nyams gyur cing //bram ze de ni chi bcad//ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du 'gro//
307b6('dul ba): ny+dziste nu bu bral nyam thag pa'i//mya ngan sa steng bdag gi blang //de bzhin ma byas dam bcas pa//zhig cing brtul zhugs nyams par gyur//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
307b7('dul ba): sgrol gyis sdug pa'i bu gnyis nges par btang bar chad nas smras pa/kye kho bos/dka' spyad brgya yis 'jig rten sdug bsngal gi//rgya mtsho chen po so sor 'jigs byed pa//gting mi
308a1('dul ba): dpogs par rab tu byung ba dag/pha rol bsgral phyir lam gyi zam stegs bca'//zla ba dri med nye ba'i bzhinA ras can//mazhum kha nas de skad tshig smras nas/
308a2('dul ba): mchi ma'i rlan chus mig ni gang gyur pa'i//byis pa gnyis po bram ze de la byin//yang smras pa/bu 'di byin pa'i 'bras bu ni//rgya chen bdag gis thob gyur nas//des ni 'khor ba'i
308a3('dul ba): rgya mtsho las//'jig rten rnams ni bsgral bar bya//byis pa gzhon dag byin ma thag tu sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yoso//de nas su g.yos pa des nags de na gnas pa'i dka
308a4('dul ba): thub can rnams bsdangs nas/phan tshuni smras pa/sa ni mi bzad g.yas gyur pa//'di ni su yi mthu ltas yin//gang gi mthu ni 'di 'dra ba//shin tu gsal bar shes pa
308a5('dul ba): bya/de na gnas 'jog dang rus gcig pa rgan po dka' thub can ltas shes pa la mkhas pa gzhan zhig yod pa des/drang srong de rnams la don de go bar byas pa/gdon mi
308a6('dul ba): za bar dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug pa'i bu byis pa 'bras bu dang chu 'thung ba yid du 'ong ba mig tu sdug par byed pa gnyis thams cad sgrol gyis sdug bsngal gyis nyams thag
308a7('dul ba): payongasu thar par bya ba'i phyir btang ste/des nas g.yos par gyur to///'dul ba gzhi//bam po brgya pa//de nas bus pa gzhi nu de gnyis kyis phas snying
308b1('dul ba): nas yongasu btang ba'i blo rig nas/snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing thal mo gnyis sbyar nas/thams cad sgrol gyi rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/yab cig yum ni ma mchis par//
308b2('dul ba): khyod ni bdag cag stsol bzhed pa//re zhig de ni mthong gyur nas//de nas bdag cag stsal du gsol//de nas byang chub sems dpa' yid la gcags pa'i sdug bsngal gyis ngom
308b3('dul ba): zum gnag cing mchi ma 'dzag bzhin dri gnyis la 'khyud nas smras pa/bu dag nga yi snying du mi sdug min//snying brtse snying rje med min te//'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir//
308b4('dul ba): yon tan mthong nas btang ba yin//ci nas nga yi byang chub mchog/zhi ba rang gis thob nas ni//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho la gnas pa'o//rten med 'jig rten rnams bsgral//de
308b5('dul ba): nas byas pa gzhon nu de dag gis pas snying nas yongasu btang ba'i blo rig nas/phi'i rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/thal mo sbyar nas/snying rje rje skad dang sme bab pa'i tshig
308b6('dul ba): gis dal gyis smras pa/gal te khyod kyis thag bkum na//ma la bdag cag gnyis kyis phrin//khyod kyis bzod pa mdzod cigo ces/yab cig khyod kyis gsung du gsol//
308b7('dul ba): yab gzhan yang /byis par gyur pas bla ma khyod la nongs par bgyis pa gang //gal te la ler thugs la mi 'bab tshig 'ga' smras pa 'am//gus par mnyan pas yongasu
309a1('dul ba): mnyes pa nyid du ma bgyis pa//de ni byis pa'i nongs pa lags shes bzod pa mdzad du gastsol/de skad ces smras nas pa la phyag 'tshal te/ldan
309a2('dul ba): gsum du bskor ba byas nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin bla ma la smra bar yid la gcags pas yang dang yang phyir lta zhing bsti gnas de nas byung ste song //de nas byang chub seMl
309a3('dul ba): byis pa gzho nu'i tshog shin tu snying rjer rung ba de dag gis snying blang nas yid kyis byang chub tu smon lam btab stede dka' thub kyi tshal gyi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugaso//byis pa gan+d+ho
309a4('dul ba): nu dag dod ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang rnam pa drug tu g.yoso//lha stong phrag du ma yang bar snang la tsa tsi dang /gzha'i sgro 'byin
309a5('dul ba): cing /e ma'o rab sbyin bdag nyid che//byis pa 'di gnyis btang nas kyang //gang gi yid ni 'gyur med pa//de yi nges pa rmad cig/de nas rgyags byin ma rtsa ba dang 'bras bu rnaMs
309a6('dul ba): khyer te/bsti gnas logasu chas chas pa las/sa che thang du g.yos pa des/myur ba kho nar bsti gnas de nyid du song ba dang /lha gzhan zhig gis rgyags byin mas byang
309a7('dul ba): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad thar par bya bar brtson par byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ongo snyam nas seng ge mo zhig gi gzug
309b1('dul ba): su stArato/lam bkag nas 'dug pa dang /rgyugs byin mas ri dgas kyi rgyal ba'i rlung ma de la smras pa/ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma sgeg sgrog ma//kho mang lam 'di 'ad/
309b2('dul ba): nas ci ste 'dug/ji ltar bdag ni mi 'phyo des gyur naso//lAm las gla zur ti myur du 'gro bar gyis//gzhan yang khyod kyang ri dgas rgyal po'i chung ma la//bdag kyang mi yi/
309b3('dul ba): dbang po seng ge yi//btsun mo yin pas chos kyi spyan gyur gyis//ri dgas rmyil mos bdag gi lam phye zhig/de skad ces smras pa dang /lha snying ge mo'i gzugasu bsgyur
309b4('dul ba): ba de yang lam de nas logs shig tu song ngo //de nas rgyags sbyin mas bkra mo shis pa'i ltas dag mthong nas/yud tsam zhig bsams pa/ji ltar bar snang la dung mo
309b5('dul ba): sgra grags pa dang /ji ltar yang tshul na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams mya ngan byed pa'i sgra glags pa las nA gdon mi za bar bsti gan su mA legs pa zhig byung bar gyur to//
309b6('dul ba): d+himA nas smras pa/ji ltar bdag mig 'gul ba dang //ji ltar bya spyod 'byin pa dang /ji ltar bdag ni dgas pa las//bus pa dri gnyis btang bar nges//ji ltar sa 'di
309b7('dul ba): g.yos pa dang //bdag gi snying ni 'dar ba dang //ji ltar lus kyang rmya ba los//bus pa de gnyis btang bar nges//zhes de lta bu'i mi legs pa brgya stong dag sems shi
310a1('dul ba): bAsti gan su song nas bsti gnasu zhugs te/mi dga' bzhin du bltas na//bude gnyis ma mthong nas/dri nas rmongs shing snying 'dur bsdu/dAsti
310a2('dul ba): gnas kyi gzhi de'i rjes bzhin du sems te/phyogros 'di ni ni gzho nu mdog nag sring mo dang lhan cig ri dgas kyi phru gu dang lhan cig rtag tu rtse rtse/'di ni de gnyis kyis
310a3('dul ba): sa rdul las byas pa'i khyim yin+da/'di ni de gnyis kyi rtsed ma'i cha byad yin na/de gnyis ni mi snang na gal te zhig na bdag gis ma mthong gi lo ma'i spyil bur zhugs nas
310a4('dul ba): !lA lta srid dom snyam du de ltar snying lnga re zhing bu mthong bar 'dod pas rtsa ba dang 'bras bu phyogs gcig tu bzhag nas mig mchi mas gang bzhin du khyim thab kyi rkang pa
310a5('dul ba): gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/rje'i sras khye'u dang bu mo gnyis gang du mchis/thams cad sgrol gyis smras pa/kho bo'i drung du bre za zhig/rla bas yang dag 'ongs par
310a6('dul ba): gyur/dgus pa de gnyis de la byin//de lo rdza su yi rang gyis//de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyags sbyin mi ri dgas mo mnga' dug n+dan gyis phog pa bzhin du su la
310a7('dul ba): skyel nas/nya chu'i gnas nas phyung ba bzhin du 'gre ldog par byed/khrung khring bu stor ba bzhin ni snong rje rje skad du ngu/ba be'u shi ba bzhin du ni 'bab sgra sna tshogs
310b1('dul ba): 'don cing smras pa/pad+ma gzho nu lta bu'i byang bzhin can//lag pa pad+ma'i mdab ltar gzhon sha can//bdag gi bu gnyis sdug bsngal ma myong ba//'gro ba dag tu song nas sdug bsnga
310b2('dul ba): gyur//rI dgasu bu ltar drang zhing ring gas tshig/ri dwags lhan cig bsti gnas dga' dga' na/de ring bdag gis bu gnyis ji lta bur//gzhan gyi dbang gis dong zhing sdug pa
310b3('dul ba): gyur//mig ni mchi mas grang ba'i mig gis ni//snying rjes ngu bas shin tu sdug bsngal ba//de ring bdag gis legs par ma mthong bas//skye bo bkren pa'i nang na sdug pas
310b4('dul ba): 'tshwa//de gnyis bdag gi pang na bskyed bskyed pa//za su rtse ba me tog 'bras bu za//bzod dang gnas pas bla ma rtag dga' ba//bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngalo//de
310b5('dul ba): gnyis ma dang nye du bral ba dang //rtso lag rnams kyis gzu lums spangs pa las//skye bo sdig can ngan dang phrad gyur nas//bdag gi bu gnyis shin tu sdug bsngalo//skom
310b6('dul ba): zhing bkres pas bdag nyid rtag gdungs na//de gnyi su yi dbang gis 'gro bar 'gyur//bran du 'gyur bas gdon mi za bAr ni//de gnyis nyams thag su ba bstel ljongs
310b7('dul ba): gzing //bdag gis nges par cha rabs gzhan dag tu//srog chags sdug pa brgya ga phral ba yi//sdig las shin tu mi bzad pa 'dir byas//des na bo bai'u me bzhin gyi/
311a1('dul ba): ngos 'dobs//bdon chog gang gis bdag ni rtag tu yang //sems can kun la yad ni many+dzum gyur pa//bden tshig dus ni zladag gi bu gnyis pa//
311a2('dul ba): blan du gyur pa las ni thar bar shog/de nas rgya gus sbyin mas bus pa gzhonu de dag gis bskyed cing bsrungs pa'i shing gud yin pa de dag lo ma thib pa 'dug par mthong nas/
311a3('dul ba): snying du sdug pas 'khyud de smras pa/bus pas ril ba chung ngu'i chus bcus hU~M//lo ma rnams las chu thigs 'dzag pa yi//ljon shing rnams ni sems dang bcas pa bzhi
311a4('dul ba): bus pa nu nom blung lta bur du//yang bus pa gzhonu de gnyis dang rtse rtse ba'i ri dgas kyi phru gu bsti gnas na 'dug pa rnams mthong nas mi dga' ste/snying rje rje slad kyi tshig
311a5('dul ba): gis dal bus smras pa/de yi ne'u zla mthong bar 'dod pa gang //gnasu sa tshugs mtshon cing tshal byed pa//ri dgis phru gu rgyu ba 'di dag kyang //bdag gi sdug
311a6('dul ba): bsngal mi chung gizhan yino//de nas bus pa gzhanu de dag lam gang nas dong pa'i lam der rjes bcad pa dang /bus pa gzhinu de gnyis rjes drang por ma byung gi gya gyus
311a7('dul ba): gang bar mthong nas/lhag par yang sdug bsngal gyis gapus nas smras pa/ji ltar zin pa'i rjes byung dang //la lar myur du song ba las//brdegs te khrid par gangan
311b1('dul ba): mI za//kye ma bram ze brtse med mchog/mgul ni dbugs kyis brdungs shing skad kyang 'dzer//ma mchu mdzes pa 'dab zhing bdag gi bya//ri dgras bzhin du mag kyang rig
311b2('dul ba): rig ste//rkang pa 'jam pos ji ltar song zhig/de nas byang chub sems dpas de ltar smre sngags 'don pa'i bdag nyid de mthong nas/mi rtag pa nyid dang ldan pa'i tshi ga de dang
311b3('dul ba): de dag gis rnam grangs mang por go bar byas nas smras pa/kho bos bu gnyis grags pa yis//btang ba ma yin spang ba min//sems can kun la phan don du//btang bar
311b4('dul ba): rab dka' bu de gtang //mchog tu btang dka' bdag nyid dang //bu dang chung ma rnams btang nas//sems dpa' chen pos tshul bzhin du//byang chub mchog ni 'thob par
311b5('dul ba): 'gyur//rgyags sbyin bdag gis gtong ba la brten btang dka' ba'i//bus pa de gnyis 'jig rten thar pa'i don du btang //bdag dang chung ma gzhi nu nong yang gtang bya ste//
311b6('dul ba): kun la thams cad gtang ba'i blo gros da la yod//de nas rgyags sbyin mas sems brten te/byang chub sems dpa' la smos pa/khyod la bar chad mi bgyid kyis//khyod bla
311b7('dul ba): gzhan du ma 'gyur cig/gal te bdag kyang stsol bzhad na//dogs pa ma mdzad bdag stsol cig/gzhan yang dpa' bo gang phyir nyid kyi mi//sdug pas chags pa gtong ba mi
312a1('dul ba): don de myur du thob nas ni//srid las 'gro ba bsgral bar mdzod//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' dang //rgyags byin
312a2('dul ba): ma brtson 'grus shin tu rmad du byung ba dang /shin tu bya dka' bar reg nas/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongasu bskor te/steng gi na mkha' las bsti gnas dror lhags
312a3('dul ba): nas /snang ba rgya chen pos nags de gsal bar byas te/nA mkha' la 'dug bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/'di ltar 'jig rten rmongs pa blo ngan gzhung gis bcings
312a4('dul ba): pa'i blos can//longs spyod la chags snying gi zhags pa bu yis bcings pa'i nang na yang //khyab bdag khyod cig chags pa med pas dga' ba skyed pa'i bu gtong bas//nges par
312a5('dul ba): go 'phang ba de dang zhi ba dri med dka' ba med pa 'thob//de skad ces byang chub sems dpa' spro ba bskyed nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bsams pa/'di gcig pu
312a6('dul ba): g.yog dang bral na nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ma la bdag gi rgyags byin ma blango snyam nas de nas bram ze'i cha byad du bsgyur to/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song nas/
312a7('dul ba): yang byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/yan lag kun bzang khyim thab las/'phyo ba med cing snying nye ba//rigs na bsngags pa'i sring mo 'di//bdag la bran mo'i don
312b1('dul ba): du stsol//de nas rgyags sbyin ma mi bzod pa skyes nas/bram ze la smras pa/ngo tsha med cing brkam pa khyod//'di na bram ze'i tha shal to//khyod lta 'phyon ma mi byed cing //dam chos
312b2('dul ba): dga' gang 'dod dam//de nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad sgrol snying rje dang ldan pa'i snying gis/rgyags byin ma la brtag par brtsams pa dang /de nas rgyags byin mas
312b3('dul ba): byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa/bdag ni bdag la dbyar ngan med//de bzhin bdag la lha ma lags//gcig pu ji ltar bzhugs 'gyur zhes//de ltar khyod slad g.yang
312b4('dul ba): byin bgyid//de nas byang chub sems dpas rgyags byi no ma la smras pa/go 'phang mi bzad mya ngan med pa tshel bdag la//sa steng 'dir ni rgyags sbyin mya ngan bya mi dgos//
312b5('dul ba): khyod ni mya ngan med par bram ze 'di rjes 'brings//bdag ni ri dgas mchi ba bzhin du bsti gnas 'then//de skad ces smras nas dga' ba dang mgu bo dang /yid rab tu dga'
312b6('dul ba): sa? bsgoms pa dang /sbyin po 'di ni nogs tshal 'dir//bdag gi sbyin pa tha ma yin//rgyags sbyin 'di yang yongs pa tang nas//yongasu gzung ba med par 'gyur//snyam
312b7('dul ba): du rig nas rgyags sbyin ma log pa nas bzung ste/bram ze de la smras pa/bdag gis mchis brang sdog pa 'di//snying nas snying nye bsgo ba nyan//ya rabs tshul cen snyan par
313a1('dul ba): smras//bram ze'i mchog khyod bzhi su gsol//de nas mche ba bzang po yis//chung ma byang chub 'dod phyir btang //chu la gru ni ji lta bar//sa ni mthu
313a2('dul ba): dag rnam drug g.yos//de nas rgyags sbyin ma bram ze'i dbang du gyur te/khyo dang bu dang bu mo dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dbugs brdzangs pas mgul sgra
313a3('dul ba): ngar ngar por 'gag bzhin 'di skad ces smos//bdag gis tshe rabs snga ma la//ci 'dra ba yI las ngan byas//des na ba be'u shi ba bzhin//skye bo med pa'i nags na du//
313a4('dul ba): nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas te/rang bzhin gyi cha byad du gnas nas rgyags sbyin ma la smras pa/bskal bzang bdag ni bram ze
313a5('dul ba): ma yin mi yang ma yin gyi//bdag ni lha yi dbang po brgya byin lha min 'joms byed de//khyod kyi 'dul ba mchog tu gyur pa 'di yis bdag mgu yis//bdag las//
313a6('dul ba): dam pa gang zhig 'dod pa de 'dir smra bar gyis//de nas de'i tshig gis rgyags sbyin ma yid bde ba skyes nas/brgya byin la phyag 'tshal nas smras pa/spyan stong ldan pa
313a7('dul ba): bdag gi bu//bran gyur pa las thor mdzad cing //mes po'i drung du phyin par yang //sum cu rtsa gsum bdag pos mdzod//de skad ces smras nas yang dbang po chen po
313b1('dul ba): bsti gan su zhugs nas/byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/rgyags sbyin ma lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas/byang chub sems dpa' lnga smras pa/bdag gis khyod la rgyuDa/
313b2('dul ba): sbyin 'di//g.yog gi phyir ni sbyin par byas//khyod kyi su la 'dom sbyin cig/bzhag pa byin na smad par 'gyur//de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bram ze
313b3('dul ba): khye'u dang bu mo khyer ba de ji ltar grong khyer gzhan yino snyam nas/grong khyer de nyid du song ste/bus pa gzho nu de dag btsong par brtsams pa de lta bu rmongs par byas//
313b4('dul ba): jo tsam na blon po rnams kyis mthong nas rgyal po la smras pa/lnga khyod kyi dpon po mdag gnag dang //dra ba can dang de gnyis ni//bram ze shin tu ma rungs pa//grong khyer
313b5('dul ba): mchog 'dir 'tshong zhing mchis//de skrod thos nas rgyal po de sems mi dga' nas smras pa/gzho nu gnyis myur du ston cig/blon po rnams kyis skad phyung ba dang /grong
313b6('dul ba): khyad ba rnams myur du rgyal po'i mdun du nye bar lhagaso//ji tsamra na blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal pa'i drung du khrid pa dang /mi yi dbang po mngon phyogs khrid pa'i tsha bi gro
313b7('dul ba): med cing //lus thig dri ma can gyi lus de de yis mthong nas ni//mod la seng ge'i khri las sa yi steng du lhung gyur te//pho brang 'khor mi bloni tshigs bud med dag dri
314a1('dul ba): bar gyur//de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa//gang zhig nags na gnas na yang //sbyin pa mngon par dag gi yid//mig bzangs
314a2('dul ba): de ni myur du 'dir//chung ma dang bcas dgug par gyis de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas nas rang gi gnasu song ngo //
314a3('dul ba): phyi zhig na rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen 'das pa dang bram ze dang blon po dang /grong mi rnams dang lhan cig tu bsti gnas der song nas/byang chub sems
314a4('dul ba): dpa' la gsol ba btab ste/rang gi grong khyer du bos nas rgyal por bcugo/de nas rgyal po thams cad sgrol ba thams cad gtong zhes bya bar gyur to//des dge
314a5('dul ba): slong dang bram ze dang /bkren pa dang /phings pa dang /mdza' bo dang /nye du dang /gnyen pa shes dang /zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la sbyin po rnam pa du ma dag byin nas/
314a6('dul ba): tshigasu becadade smras pa/byang chub don du gnyer ba yis//rgyal rigs bram ze rje'u rags//dmangs rigs rdol pa g.yung po la'ang //'jigs pa med par sbyin pa
314a7('dul ba): btang //gser dang dngul dang /ba lang dang /rta dang nor bu'i rna rgyan dang //de bzhin las dag byed pa'i bran//tshul khrims phun sum tshogs la sbyin//chags pa
314b1('dul ba): med pa'i sems kyis ni//bu dang bu mo yongs btang bas//'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu//mi yis dag pa thob par 'gyur//gang gi tshe rgyal po thams cad kyi bshes gnyen
314b2('dul ba): gyis na thams cad sgrol gyi che du bram ze dzu dzu ka la nor mang po byin pa de'i tshe/de 'byor pa rgya chen por gyur pa dang /de la snying du sdug po dang /rtsa lag dang /grogs pa
314b3('dul ba): dug 'ongs nas smras pa/khyod kyi 'byor pa dang dpal dang skal ba phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa ci yang rung de dag thams cad ni gzho nu thams cad sgrol de la brten te yin
314b4('dul ba): des smras pa/gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gyis kho bo la ci zhig byas/rigs mchog gi nang du skyes pas kho bo 'jig rten gyi yon gnasu gyur te/des na kho bo skal pa
314b5('dul ba): dang ldan par gyur to//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gzhon nu thams cad sgrol gang yin pa de ni nga yin no///
314b6('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rdzu rduka grang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dri byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mi tshor ba yino//da ltar yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba
314b7('dul ba): dang /byas pa mo tshor ba yin no//de lta bas na dge slong dag 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/byas pa gzo ba dang byas pa tshor bar bya ste/chung zad byas pa yang chud mi gzan bA
315a1('dul ba): b+h+yan/mang po la lta smos kyang ci dgyes te/dwe/sbyong dag /da sa de ltar bsgrub par b+hu//sa sa r+b+bas ma ldan 'das rnam ga
315a2('dul ba): ma'atshal kA lan dag gnas pan bzhugs yul tsAm bA na khyim ba dge slong 'dzin zhes bya ba phyug sbyin mang bu 'a spyo mal su gachub som
315a3('dul ba): na pa rnam zas kyi thul nar gyis mgrin pa zhig gnas twa~M/des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blang so nas/dri de dang lhan cig rje bar byed/dga' bar byed/

315a7('dul ba): nga ma yin pa dang / /byam yin paste/dAmyang khab dang stsa ba dang /lan tshwa dang /mang ba dang /ba dang /bska ba sras
315b1('dul ba): kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing do shal dang /se mo dos lus brgyan nas/lha'i bu mo dga' tshal ma rgyu ba bzhin du khri'u nas khri'u dang /khri nas khrir rgyu ste/'og gi sa gzhi la mi
315b2('dul ba): 'babo//de'i tshe khyim bdag gru 'dzin dgos pa 'gra' zhig la rgyal po'i khab tu song //de yang zla ba dgu 'am/bcu lon te/rgyu skar gro zhin la bab pa na/khye'u gzugs bzang
315b3('dul ba): po blta na sdug pa mdzes pa de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam skyes pa zhig bcoso//btsos nas ji tsam na khyim bdag glu 'dzin gyi mi zhig
315b4('dul ba): rings pa rings par rgyal po'i khab tu song nas khyim bdag glu 'dzin la smras pa/khyim bdag dgyes po skyed cig/khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsa so//de dga' ba dang yid deb skyes nas smras
315b5('dul ba): pakye nang rje khyod ci zhogro smras/des smras pa/khyim bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig bca ste//de dga' ba dang /yod bde ba skyes nas yong dris pa/kye nang rje ci zhig smra/des smras pa/khyim
315b6('dul ba): bdag khyod kyi khye'u zhig btsaso//yang dris pa/kye nang rje ci zhig smra/de nas mi de 'di snyam du sems te/ci khyi mo bdag 'di yang nas yang du 'dri ba bdag la kyal ba smra bar mi
315b7('dul ba): 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas cang mi smra bar 'dug/khyim bdag gis smras pa/kye nang rje khyod kyis nyes te gal te khyed kyis lan brgyar sbas par gyur na yang /ngas kyang khyod kyi kha
316a1('dul ba): gser gyis lan brgya bkang bar 'gyur ba zhig/de nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis mi de'i kha gser gyis lan gsum bkung nas/dkor ba la khye'u dkan
316a2('dul ba): dbab pa'i rin gser bye ba nyi shu byin cig ces spring ngo //khyim bdag gru 'dzin dga' ba dang /yid bde bas rgyal po'i drung du song nas lha bdag gi khye'u zhig btsa so//rgyal pos
316a3('dul ba): smras pa/leg so//ngas de la tsam pa gzhi dang bcas pa dang /glang po che bdun gyi tshogs sbyin no//khyim bdag glu 'dzin gyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la bltas te/
316a4('dul ba): par 'ongs nas/de nas khyim bdag gnyen rnams kyis nyi ma bdun gsum nya shu rtsa gcig tu/btsos pa'i bcos ston rgya cher byas nas/khye'u yi ming cir gdags shes
316a5('dul ba): ming 'dogs par byed do//gzhan dag gis smras pa/khye'u 'di rgyu skar gro zhin la bcas la/'di btsas pa na phas kyang dkan dbab pa'i rin du gser bye ba nyi shu byin pas
316a6('dul ba): de bas na khye'u yi ming gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar gdag so//de'i ming gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa zhes bya bar btags te/khye'u gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa ma
316a7('dul ba): ma brgyad la rje su gtad/pang ni 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /rtsod grogs byed pa'i mi ma gnyis te/de ma
316b1('dul ba): mdud+h+yad ba drug gis 'o ma da zho dang mar dang zhun mar dang myur gyi snying wA dang /gzhan yang ma byad kyi bye brag gtso bo glatso bo dag gis skyed par byed/spring bar byed cing rdzi na gnas
316b2('dul ba): pa'i 'ode bzhin myur du skyed par byed/de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/yi ge drung grangs dang /rtsis dang lug rtsis dang /dbyung ba dang /gzhug pa dang gzhag pa lanye
316b3('dul ba): bar zhugs shing /brtag po brgyad po gzhi brtag pa dang /gos brtag pa dang /rin po che brtag pa dang /shing brtag pa dang /glang po che brtag pa dang /rta brtag pa dang /
316b4('dul ba): gzho nu brtag pa dang /gzho nu ma bortag pa dang /'byed pa dang /klog pa la mkhas pa dang /gu yer por gyur to///de bsod nams kyis
316b5('dul ba): skul ba chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes rigs mnyam pa mang pos thos nas/bu srid dag byin no//de'i phas 'dug pa'i khang pa gsum po dgun gyi dang /dpyid kyi dang dbyar
316b6('dul ba): gyi rtsig tu bcug ste/chung ma gsum po chen ma dang bar ma dang chun ma bzhag nas de steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song ste skyes pa med pa na rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga'
316b7('dul ba): dgur spyod par byed//de nyi ma re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas 'tshed cing sbyararo//lhas sbyin gyis gzho nu ma skyes dag la skrod pa/gzhonu rgyal po thams cad ni gang gi tshe/skra skya/
317a1('dul ba): bo skyes par gyur pa de'i tshe/gzho nu'i thu bo shos rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la bzhag nas rab tu 'byung na/khyod kyi yab ni skya kha dog rnam pa gsum pa'i mthar
317a2('dul ba): phyin na 'on kyang 'dod pa rnams la zhe na bzhin te/nye bar zhi bar mi 'gro'i//ma skyes dwags smras pa de nyid kyis shes maud/de la ci byar yod/lhas skyon gyis smras pa//
317a3('dul ba): pha rol gnon pa gyis shig 'dod pa don du gnyer ba rnams ni mi byed pa ci yang med pos ji tsam ni rgyal po gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das mar gsol nas/'jams
317a4('dul ba): gsol bar bzhed pa'i 'jams kyi zhal ta byas te/'od ma'i tshol du song ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas/des rdo rje rtse gcig pa zhig 'phangs pa dang /rgyal po sgra la mkhra
317a5('dul ba): pa yin pas/des g.yon phyogasu thug pa'i rje'u chags par gyur nas/de nyid nas slar log go/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di lta bu mi mkhyen pa 'am//
317a6('dul ba): mi gzigs pa 'am/thugasu ma chud pa'am/rnam par mi mkhyen pa chung zad kyang mi mnga' bas/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen
317a7('dul ba): po la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dgal gyi bu ma skyes dag mi dge bo'i bshes gnyen lhas sbyin gyis zin pas/de basbyin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms ma ma rung bar byas
317b1('dul ba): /kyis sam par gru 'dzin gyi bu'i drung du song la/bsod snyoms khyer te shog shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal byi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das las
317b2('dul ba): gnyan nas ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na mi snang bar gyur te/tsam par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug sngo//bre zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa nyi ma la dad pas de
317b3('dul ba): nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te/nyi ma la phyag byed pa na/tshe dang ldan pa mo ru dgal gyi bu chen po'i rdzu 'phrul gyis nyi mi'i dkyil 'khor bo dz+ha l-i nas babs pa/tshe dang ldan pa
317b4('dul ba): gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bdag gis mngon sum kho nar nyi ma nyid kyi gzugs mthong ngo snyam nas/mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes//mthong nas kyang tshigasu
317b5('dul ba): bcad pas smras pa/nyi ma brtol nas sa steng mngon phyogs myur nyid du//bdag gis gnasu byon pa 'di ko su zhig lags//'di ci nyi ma 'am nori skyon za ba 'am barba byin nam/
317b6('dul ba): 'on te lha yi bdag pa med la gshegs zhig gu/tshe dang ldan pa me'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i sems kyis kyang nga'i bsam pa shes nas kyang tshi gsu btsod de smras pa/kho bo 'od
317b7('dul ba): zer stong gi 'od 'bar nyi ma ma yin rgyu skar bdag po min//kho bo rnam thos ma yin mchog ldan ma yin legs pa'i brtul zhugs dbang phyug min//kho bo thugs zhi gzi brjid kyis
318a1('dul ba): 'bar sangs rgyas sras po yin par shes par byos//kho bo thub la bsod snyoms dgos nas bslang ba'i phyir ni khyod kyi drung du 'ongs/gro zhin skyes
318a2('dul ba): kyis smras pa/ci shes ldan nyid thub po yin nam/des tshigasu bcad smras pa/ji ltar gser gyi ri bo lhun pa zlar ni yungs kar khyer te 'ong ba dang //ji ltar nyi ma'i zlar ni
318a3('dul ba): sa steng srog chags srin bu me khyer 'jal ba dang //rin chen gyis phyugs rgya mtsho'i zla ra ni 'di ni gnag gi rmig rjes skrun pa lta//de bzhin mi mchog bla ma sangs rgyas
318a4('dul ba): la ltos ston pa'i sras bdag rig par gyis//glo zhin skyes kyis smras pa/rjesu dpag pa 'di yis na//bdag gis khyod kyi 'dren pa ni//ji ltar dka' thub rab che ba//
318a5('dul ba): gsal bar rab tu rtogs lagaso//dgos pa ci la byin bka' stsol cig/bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod snyoms phul cig/bcom ldan 'das de su yin/khyim bdag
318a6('dul ba): gi bu dge sbyong go'u ta ma shAkya'i sras shAkya'i rigs las sgra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste/
318a7('dul ba): de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa zhig yid do/khyim bdag gi bu de ni sangs rgyas shes bya'o//des sangs rgyas shes
318b1('dul ba): bya'o//'des sangs rgyas shes bya ba'i sgra sngon ma thos pa thos nas ba spu khung thams cad g.yos shing mngon par dad pa de snod du bcos pa lnga brgya po de nyid tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgul
318b2('dul ba): gyi bu chen po la phulo//de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos dri las bstod snyoms blangs nas/ji ltar sems mnyam par bzheg na tsam pa nas mi snang bar gyur to//
318b3('dul ba): rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan daM ka gnas par phyin pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/des bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te btsam
318b4('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis gsol bar brtsams pa na ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos snod nas bcos pa'i phyi ma shos khyer to//bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar spong ba
318b5('dul ba): dang /ji tsam na 'od ma'i tshal thams cad kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par mthong nas/des bsams pa/gdon mi za bar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam
318b6('dul ba): lha gzhan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsod snyoms phul te/'di ltar 'od ma'i tshol 'di kha zas kyi dri zhim po rnam pa sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur to//snyam du bsams
318b7('dul ba): nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/lha gzhan dag gis bsod snyoms phul ba 'am ci
319a1('dul ba): lag smran/'di ltar 'od ma'i tshul 'di zhal zas kyi dri badra' ba sna tshogs kyis khyab par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
319a2('dul ba): rgyal po chen po lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis kyang ma yin la/lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang ma phul to//de lta mod kyi khyod kyi yul tsam pa na gru 'dzin gyi bu nyi ma re re lnga pa
319a3('dul ba): skyon mo spyod nas 'tshed cing sbyor ba yod de/de nas dge slong mo'u dgal gyi ste bus blangaso//bcom ldan 'das de'i bsngags pa gsungs par brtsams pa thos nas/de
319a4('dul ba): yang mthong bar 'dod pa skyes po dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis de'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po sems can de ni bsod nams kyis skal
319a5('dul ba): pa chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/khyod bsod nams yongasu thun par 'byur du 'ong gis/de la bka' ma stsol cig/de lta mod kyi rgyal po chen po lhung bzed kyi lhag ma long spyad
319a6('dul ba): cig/des gsol pa/btsun pa bdag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas da'ang bsgyur ba legs te/sngon ni su'i lhung bzed kyi lhag myi yang ma 'tshal lags mod kyi bcom ldan
319a7('dul ba): 'das chos tri m+bi bdag gis yob lags pas/gal te bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal na/longs spyad par bgyi'o zhes des longs spyad par brtsam so//bcom ldan 'das
319b1('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon lan 'ga' yang bza' ba dang btud pa 'di 'dra ba ni longasu spyad par yod dam/rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bdag rgya ladzan/
319b2('dul ba): rgyud du bcas/rgyal po'i rgyud las chen por gyur cing rgyal por gyur kyang g.yar zas dang ltung ba 'di 'dra ba ni sngon lan 'ba' yang myong bar ma 'tshal lag so//rgyal po chen po
319b3('dul ba): sems can skal po chen po de ni 'di ltar 'di 'dra ba'i bza' ba dang /btung ba la longs spyod do//de nas ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po gzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos/bcom ldan 'das
319b4('dul ba): kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba shos ldan dag yul tsam par 'dong gis/dpung gi
319b5('dul ba): tshogs yan lag bzhi pa go bkon cig/ci'i slad lags/gru 'dzin gyi bu blta'o//lha'i yul na du mchis pas 'di nyid du dgug tu gsol/de ni sems can bsod nams kyi
319b6('dul ba): skal ba chen po dang ldan pa/yin pas de la bka' mi stsol to//lha ji ltar bka' stsal kyang bdag gis mchis par 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o//de bzhin du gyis shig/de rnams
319b7('dul ba): kyis tsam par yi ge spring ba shes ldan dag rgyal po gshegs par 'gyur gyis grong khyer byi dor gyis shig/rtswa dang tshas dag sta gon gyis shig ces sprid pa de rnams kyis thos
320a1('dul ba): nas/shin tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /yA yi ge spring pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po ni mi gshegs mod kyi gzhonu gshegs par 'gyur zhes spring ba
320a2('dul ba): dang /de rnams skrag ste gzhonu gtum po lan 'ga' zhig 'ongs na yang gnod par 'gyur snyamo//yang spring ba rgyal po yang me gshegs gzhanu yang mi gshegs te/
320a3('dul ba): de lta mod kyi khyed kyis grang ga ji ltar rgyun las bzlog phyogasu 'bab pa de ltar gags brtsigs shig ces spring ba thos nas tsam pa na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams 'dus nas/
320a4('dul ba): shes ldan dog gdon mi za bar rgyal po ni bdag cag la chad pas bcad par bzhed pas des na yi ge 'di skad spring mod ces/de rnams kyis blon po rnams la don de spring ba dang /
320a5('dul ba): de rnams kyis blags te/yang drang por spring ba/shes ldan dag 'di ni bden pa yin te/rgyal po dang gzhanu yang mi gshegs pa la gang ga'i gags ba rtsigs pa yang dgos
320a6('dul ba): pa chung zad kyang medo//de lta mod kyi lha ni gu 'dzin gyi bu blta bar bzhed zhes spring ba dang /dri rnams kyis nyan rna ba'i mi zhig mdag so//des kyang de bzhin du bsnyed //de nas
320a7('dul ba): de rnams 'dus nas khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyi drung du song nas khyim bdag lha gro zhin skyes byed nyi nu pa blta bar bzhed na blon po rnams kyis bdag cag la drang bar spring ste/nyan
320b1('dul ba): rna ba'i mis kyang don de nyid smras na/'di mthong shig/des smras pa/shos ldan dag kho ba'i gags kyi skal ba gang yin pa gser gyi gong bus brtsig kyang bla'i bu mi gtong /de
320b2('dul ba): rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag gal te de lta yin du zin kyang ma'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse bar gyis shig/des smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te/de lta na dam
320b3('dul ba): zhig btso' ste gal te khyod cag gi bu rnams kyang gre zhin skyes dang lhan cig btong ba blta na btang //de rnams kyis smras pa/khyim bdag bdag de bzhin du bgyi'o//'o nr-i shes
320b4('dul ba): ldan dag dongs shig khyim bdag gru 'dzin gro zhin skyes bye bo nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/bre zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pA la/'di skad ces smras//bu grong mi 'di dag 'di
320b5('dul ba): skad ces zer ro//des smras pa/yab gal te de lto na mchi'o//bu gdon mi za bar rgyal po de khyod kyi rkang pa'i'o mthil gyi spu gser gyi kha dog can dge blta bar 'dod kyis/rgyal
320b6('dul ba): ba de dag ni gnus ma yin par khro bas khyod la gnod pa byed par 'gyur du 'ong gis/khyod kyis rkang pa bteg ste de la bstan par mi bya'i/'dir mu tig phreng ba 'di rgyal po de'i
320b7('dul ba): zhabs kyi drung du zhog la/phyag byas nas de'i spyan sngar skyil mo krung chas te 'dug shig dang /des ni sna rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro//khyim bdag gru 'dzin gyis bsams pa/phra zhin/
321a1('dul ba): skyes gzhon pa gang gis btang /ci glang po che'i bzhon pas sam/rta'i bzhon pas sam/shing rta'i bzhon pas sam/'on te gru'i bzhon pas snyam
321a2('dul ba): pa las de 'di snyam du sems te/'di dag gi nang na gru'i bzhon pa mchog yin pas/gru'i bzhon pas btangango snyam du bsams nas chu bo gang ga la gru sbrengs nas de bskyed
321a3('dul ba): mos tshal rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste/me tog dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing ngang pa dang khrung khrung dang rma bya dang /ne tso dang ri skegs dang /khu byug
321a4('dul ba): la sogs pa bya rnams skad 'byin cing rol ma'i cha byang sna tshogs dang /bud med rgyan sna tshogs kyis klubs pa dag 'dug tu bcug ste/'byor pa des chu'i nang nas bta //
321a5('dul ba): de rim gyis rgyal po'i khab deng nye bar phyin pa/rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gru 'dzin gyi bu 'ong zhes thos nas/de nas rgyal po'i khab nas gang gA'i 'bab chu'i bar der/
321a6('dul ba): 'obs brkos nas chus bkang ste/de'i nang nas gru drangaso//rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer yang rdo ba dang /gseg ma dang gyo ma bsal cing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab dri zhi
321a7('dul ba): po'i pog por bzhag dar gyi tshun 'phyang mang po btags/rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs/me tog sna tshogs kyis lha rnams kyi dga' tshal gyi skyed mos tshal bzhon du/
321b1('dul ba): dga' dga' ltar byas te/de 'byor pa des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer du khridado//de nas rgyal po seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i rkang pa'i drung du mu tig gi phreng ba bzhag nas
321b2('dul ba): mgo bos phyag byas te mdun du skyi la mo krung bcas nas 'dug pa dang /rgyal pos de'i rkang pa gnyis la gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba'i spu yod pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kye ma gro
321b3('dul ba): zhin skyes bye bA nI 'gru pa ni bsod nams kyi skal pa chen po dang ldan pa yino//zhes mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes//mthong nas smras pa/gro zhin skyes khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das/
321b4('dul ba): mthong ngamo/lha ma mthong lag so//tshur shog 'dong ngo //des dris pa lha ci/bcom ldan 'das bzhon pas gshegs sam/'on te zhabs kyis lags/rgyal bas
321b5('dul ba): smras pa/de rab tu byung ba yin na/de la bzhon pas ci bya/des smras pa/lha gal te de lta na bdag kyang sug pa kho nas mchi'o zhes de rkang pa kho nas chas pa na/de'i zho shas
321b6('dul ba): 'tshe ba rnams kyis sa la gos dag bting ba dang /des smras pa/ci bcom ldan 'das gding ba las bzhud dam/'on te gding ba med par bzhud/de rnams kyis smras pa/
321b7('dul ba): gding ba med par bzhud//des smras pa/gding ba bsdus shig bdag kyang ga ding ba med par 'gro'o//zho shas 'tsho ba rnams kyis gos rnams bsdus pa dang /mi ma yin pa rnams
322a1('dul ba): kyisu g+hi nas//des smras pa/shes ldan dag dus khyed cag la ma bzlog glum/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bzlog lagas+ho//don yang su
322a2('dul ba): zhig gis bting /lha khyod bsod nams kyi skal ba chen po mnga' bas/mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bting lags drang /de snying nas tshig tu smras pa/mi ma yin pa dag rmA/
322a3('dul ba): rnams bsdus shig/de rnams kyis bsdus nas rkang ba sa la bzhag pa na/sna chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa gyur te/sa chen po 'od g.yos/rab tu g.yos/kun
322a4('dul ba): tu rab tu g.yos/ldeg rab tu ldeg kun tu rab tu ldeg par gyur te/shar phyogs mtho ni nub phyogs dma' nub phyogs mtho na shar phyogs dma' lho phyogs mthu na byed
322a5('dul ba): phyogs dma'/byang phyogs mazin lho phyogs dma'i/mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/dbus mtho na mtha' dma'o bar gyur to//de nos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong
322a6('dul ba): rnams la bka' stsol po/dge slong dag 'di nas bzung ste/bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du/gru 'dzin gyi dus ldan 'ga' yang gding ba med par rkang ngas
322a7('dul ba): las ma bor te/da ltar bor ba yang chos la gus pa yin gyi/bsod names yongasu zad pas ni ma yin te/de nas 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to//de na
322b1('dul ba): gro zhin spros bye ba nyi shu pa/bcom ldan 'das ga na ba dang song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bas phyug byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/da nas
322b2('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyis bsam pa dang /bag la nyal dang /khams deng rang bzhin thugasu chung nas gung thos pas/'phags po'i bden po bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur
322b3('dul ba): ba de lta bu'i chos bshad par mdzad pas/gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'jig tshogs lo lte ba'i ri'i rtse mo mtho ba nyi shu ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
322b4('dul ba): 'bras bu med na sum du byas te/des bden pa mthong ba dang /de stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das gung na bya de log su thal
322b5('dul ba): mAmu sbyar ba btude/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba dang bsnyen pa rdzogs pa dge slong
322b6('dul ba): gi dngos po thob pa lta na/bdagra bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyod pa skyed lag s+ho//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal lo/khyim bdag gi bu de bzhin gi
322b7('dul ba): parnams sam/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams ni phams ma gni rje rje'i rigs kyi phurab tu 'byin pa dang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi byed kyis supa so/pa pa
323a1('dul ba): rtogs shig/rgyal pos gsol pa/btsun pa bdag ni rten pa thams cad kyi dpon lags te/don du 'di na chos nyid kyis bdag gi bu lags
323a2('dul ba): pas 'di bdag gis gnang lags kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis ci lagasu/dbyung du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong tshur shog ces byas pas/
323a3('dul ba): dge slong tshur shog/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces gsungaso//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal me thag kho nar skra byi ba dang /snam sbyar gyon par gyur
323a4('dul ba): te/skra dang kha spu zhag bdun skyes po tsam dang /lag pa lhung bzed dang /bya ma bum gyis brel ba dang /lo brgya lon pa'i spyod la me lta bur gnas par gyur to//'dir
323a5('dul ba): smras pa/de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas/skra byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing //maud la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te//sangs rgyas dgodra
323a6('dul ba): pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur//drug sde rnams kyis de la co dro b.ri brtsams pa/re zhig bstan pa la ni gcig tu brtson par gnas dgos pa yin na/mar sa
323a7('dul ba): gyi gong bu 'dis/khyad par ci zhig rtog par 'gyur zhes de rnams kyis co dris pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa kun
323b1('dul ba): dga' ba la 'di skad ces smras//btsun pa kun+da dga' bo bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gcig tu brtson pa'i rnal 'byor dang mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du gsungs pa gang la///
323b2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes 'chag pas thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhes btsam ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to//des bsil ba'i tshal gyis dur
323b3('dul ba): khrod du seng ste 'chags byas nas/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa rgyal po'i khab kyi bsil ba'i tshal gyi dur khrod du gan rtag tu 'grus pa dang ldan par
323b4('dul ba): byang chub kyi phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams la rnal 'byor gyi rje su brtson pa'i bsgom pas gnas//de nas tshe dang ldan pa glo zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu pa gcig pu dben par song
323b5('dul ba): sti nang du yang dag bzhag pa na/sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di snyam du skyes par gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji
323b6('dul ba): snod cig yod pa de rnams kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/'on kyang bdag len pa med par zug pA rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis/bdag gi nye du rnams
323b7('dul ba): la longs spyod rgya chen po yod pas/ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dag sprin bsod nams dag bya'o snyamo//de nas bcom ldan 'das
324a1('dul ba): thugs kyis tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas dge slong zhig la bka' stsal pa/dge slong tshur shog/khyod gro zhin skyes bya
324a2('dul ba): ba nyi shu ba gang na ba der song la phyin nas/gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba la 'di skad ces gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa khyod la ston pa gsung zhes bsgo shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin
324a3('dul ba): 'tshal zhes dge slong des bcom ldan 'das la mnyon nas/tshe dang ldan pa glo zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyid shu
324a4('dul ba): pa la 'di skad ces smraso//tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes khyod la ston pa gsung //tshe dang ldan pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas dge slong
324a5('dul ba): de las mnyan nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs
324a6('dul ba): gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan b+ha gr-i zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//gro zhin skyes khyod gcig pu dben par song ste nang du
324a7('dul ba): yang dag bzhag pa na/sems la sems kyis rnam par rtog pa 'di lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa ji snyed cig yod pa de//rnam
324b1('dul ba): kyi nang na bdag mchog yin na/'on kyang bdag len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur gyis//bdag gi nye du rnams la longs spyod rgya chen po yod
324b2('dul ba): pas/ma la bdag 'dug la 'dod pa rnams la longs spyod cing sbyin pa dge sbyin bsod nams dag bya'o snyam pa skyes par ma gyur tam/dri nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhon skyes 'di ste
324b3('dul ba): du sems te/bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kyis bdag gi sems mkhyen to snyam du bsams nas 'jigs pa dang skrag pa dang stobs spu zing zhes byed nas/bcom ldan 'das
324b4('dul ba): la 'di skad ces gsol te//btsun pa de lta lag so//de'i phyir gro zhin skyes khyod nyid la dri yis/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa bzhin du/de'i lan thob shig gro zhin skyes
324b5('dul ba): snyam du sems/khyod sngon khyim par gyur pa na pi bang gi rgyud kyi sgral mkhas pa yin nam/btsun pa bdag sngon khyim par gyur pa na pa bang gi rgyud kyi sgra la mkhas pa mdo lag so//
324b6('dul ba): gr-i zhin skyes ji snyam du sems/gang gi tshe pi dang gi rgyud shin tu bsdums pa de'i tshe pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur dri 'am/sgra yid du 'ong ba'am/skye dang ldan pa 'am/lasu
324b7('dul ba): rung bar 'gyur ram/btsun pa ma lag so//'o na gang gi tshe pi beng gi rgyud lhag par lhod par gyur pa de de'i tshe jig pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba'am/sgra yid du 'ong
325a1('dul ba): /ba 'am/sgra dang ldan pa 'am/la su rung bar 'gyur btsun pa ma lagaso//gang gi tshe pi bang gi rgyud shin tu bsdams pa ma yin zhing lhag par lhod pa ma
325a2('dul ba): yin par gyur te/rgyud ran par 'dug pa de'i tshe pi bang gi sgra snyan par 'gyur ba 'am/sgra yid du 'ong ba 'am/sgra dang ldan pa 'am/le su rung bar 'gyur ba yin nam/btsun
325a3('dul ba): pa de lta lagaso//gro zhin skyes de bzhin du ha cang brtson 'grus brtsams pa ni rgod par 'gyuraro//ha cang zhan na ni zhum par 'gyur ro//gro zhin skyes//de lta bas na khyod kyis
325a4('dul ba): ran pa nyid rtogs par bya ste/des kyang nga rgyal du mi bya zhing de la'ang bag yod par bya/de'i tshe mtshan ma yang gzung bar bya'o//gro zhin skyes khyod gnas pa 'dis gnas na ring
325a5('dul ba): po mi thogs pa kho nar zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon/
325a6('dul ba): sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te bdag gi skye ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes sgrogs par 'gyur ro//de nas tshe
325a7('dul ba): dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste/rje su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag
325b1('dul ba): byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis pi bang gi dpe 'dis/tshe dang ldan pa gro zhi na skyes la gdams dag phog nas/gcig pu
325b2('dul ba): dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ljon pa bdag nyid gtod par gnaso//gcig pu dben pa bag yod pa rtun pa dang ldan pa bdag nyid gtod par gnas pa na//gang gi phyir rigs kyi
325b3('dul ba): bu rnams skra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung bar byed pa/tshangs par spyod pa'i mtha' bla na med pa
325b4('dul ba): tshe de nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du byas te bsgrubs nas/bdag gi skyo ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byaso//'di las srid pa gzhan mi
325b5('dul ba): sheso//zhes go bar byed cing tshe dang ldan pa kun shes par gyur to//sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bya ba nyi shu
325b6('dul ba): pa dgra bcom pa thob ste/rnam par grol ba'i dga' ba'i bde ba nyamasu myong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag bcom ldan 'das lta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro
325b7('dul ba): ba'i dus ni 'di yin no snyam nas/de nas tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye bo nyi shu pa dgongs pa nang du yang dag 'dzeg las langs te/bcom ldan 'das gang na bo der song nas phyin
326a1('dul ba): ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/bcom ldan 'das la
326a2('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pas 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun po/dge slong dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor ba/
326a3('dul ba): bdag gi don rje su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongasu zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de/de'i tshe gnas
326a4('dul ba): drug la mos par 'gyur te/nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur ba lags/'tshe ba ma mchis pa la mos par 'gyur ba lags/rab tu dben pa la mos par
326a5('dul ba): 'gyur ba lags/sred pa zad pa dang /len pa zad pa dang /mi brjed pa'i sems la mos par 'gyur ba lagaso//btsun pa/'di na kha cig 'di snyam du/kye ma
326a6('dul ba): tshe dang ldan pa 'di dad pa tsam kho na la gnas pa nges par 'byung ba la mo so snyam du sems na/btsun pa/de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/'dod chags zad pa dang /
326a7('dul ba): zhe sdang zad pa dang /gti mug zad pas nges par 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur ba las so//btsun pa/'di na kha cig 'di snyam du/kye mtshe dang ldan pa 'di tshu khrim
326b1('dul ba): tsam kho na la brtan nas mi 'tshe ba la mos snyam du sems na/btsun pa de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/'dod chags zad pa dang /zhe sdang zad pa dang /gti mug zad pas mi 'cha/
326b2('dul ba): ba la mos par 'gyur lag so//btsun pa 'di na kha cig 'di snyam du/kye mtshe dang ldan pa 'di rnyed pa dang /bkur bsti dang /tshig su bcad pa tsam kho na tshol ba'i sla du rab
326b3('dul ba): tu dben pa la mos snyam du sems na/btsun pa/de ltar blta bar mi bgyi ste/'dod chags zad pa dang /zhe sdang zad pa dang /gti mug zad pa dang /sred pa zad pa dang
326b4('dul ba): len pa zad pa las mi brjed pa'i sems la yang mos par 'gyur lags te/btsun pa dge slong dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bar
326b5('dul ba): ba/rang gri don rje su thob pa/srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/yongasu zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol bar gyur pa gang lags pa de/de'i tshe de gan+da
326b6('dul ba): drug po 'di dag la mos par 'gyur lagaso//btsun pa dge slong slob pa gang yin pa thob pa de/gong ma'i grub pa dang /bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa don du gnyer ba'i
326b7('dul ba): tshul la lan mang du gnas pa ste/de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan pa lagaso//de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas zag pa med pa'i rnam
327a1('dul ba): par grol ba'i sems dang rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te/bsgrubs nas
327a2('dul ba): bdag gi skye ba zad//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni/de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /mi slob pa'i dbang po rnams
327a3('dul ba): dang ldan log so////'dul ba gzhi///bam po brgya gcig pa//btsun pa dper na bus pa gzhan chung ngu zhan pa gan rgyal du nyal ba de ni/de'i tshe
327a4('dul ba): byis pa'i ngang tshul dang /byis pa'i dbang po rnams dang ldan lags la/de dus gzhan na chen por gyur pa'i rgyus dbang po rnams yongasu smin pa de'i tshe ni chen po'i ngang tshul
327a5('dul ba): dang /chen pa'i dbang po dang ldan lagaso//btsun pa de bzhin du dge slong slob pa'i yid ma thob pa gang lags pa de gong ma'i grub pa dang /bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa
327a6('dul ba): don du gnyer ba'i tshul la lan mang du gnas te/de de'i tshe slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /slob pa'i dbang po dang ldan lagaso//de dus gzhan na zag pa rnams zad nas
327a7('dul ba): zag pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab mthong ba'i chos nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas mngon sum du bgyis te/bsgrubs na/
327b1('dul ba): bdag gi skye ba zad do//tshangs par spyod pa bsten to//bya ba byaso//srid pa 'di las gzhan mi sheso/zhes sgrogs pa de'i tshe ni/de mi slob pa'i tshul khrims dang /mi slob
327b2('dul ba): pa'i dbang po dang ldan lagasaso//gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnams mig le shin tu snang bar gyur kyang /de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems
327b3('dul ba): dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab do gtugs par 'gyur te/de'i sems phyin ci ma log pa shin tu rnam par grol ba/shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur
327b4('dul ba): zhing de la zad par yang rje su lta'o//gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes por bya ba'i sgra rnams dang /snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /lces rnam par shes
327b5('dul ba): bar bya ba'i ro rnams dang /lus kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i reg bya rnams dang /yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang //
327b6('dul ba): de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te/de'i sems phyin tse log pa shin tu rnam par grol ba/shin tu bsgoms
327b7('dul ba): de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing /de la zad pa yang rje su lta'o//btsun pa dper na grong khyer ram/grong rdal dang /han+dak+Sha thag mi ring ba zhig nar brog chen po ser ga ma ma
328a1('dul ba): yA shin tu mkhregs pa gcig tu 'thas pa zhig mchis na/de la gal te phyir phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drug po langs kyang de g.yos pa du
328a2('dul ba): 'gyur/de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de nub phyogasu bkur bar mi nus lagaso//gal te lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs nas rlung gi shugs drag po ladra
328a3('dul ba): kyang de g.yos par mi 'gyur/de 'gul bur ma 'gyur zhing de lho phyogasu bkur bar myi nus lags te/grang nAs rlung gri shugs drag po langs kyang des de g.yos
328a4('dul ba): pAr mi 'gyur/de 'gul bar mi 'gyur zhing de gang du yang bkur bar mi nus lag so//de bzhin du gal te de'i mig gis rnam par shes par bya ba'i gzugs rnam
328a5('dul ba): mig la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang /de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab de gtugs par mi 'gyur te/de'i sems phyin ci ma log
328a6('dul ba): par shin tu rnam par grol ba shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing /de la zad par yang rje su lta'o//gal te de'i rna bas rnam par shes par bya ba'i sgra
328a7('dul ba): rnams dang /snas rnam par shes par bya ba'i dri rnams dang /lces rnam par shes par bya ba'i ro rnams dang /lus kyi rnam par shes par bya ba'i the bya rnams dang //
328b1('dul ba): yid kyis rnam par shes par bya ba'i chos rnams yid la shin tu snang bar gyur kyang de'i rnam par grol ba'i sems dang /rnam par grol ba'i shes rab du gtugs par mi 'gyur te//
328b2('dul ba): de'i sems phyin ci mu log pa/shin tu rnam par grol ba/shin tu bsgoms pa de nang du gnas par 'gyur zhing /de la zad par yang rje su lta'o//tshe dang ldan pa glo zhin skyes bya
328b3('dul ba): pa nyi shu pas de skad ces gsol nas/gnas brtan dgra bcom pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to//nges par 'byung la mos pa dang /sems ni 'tsho ba med pa dang //
328b4('dul ba): rab tu dben la mos pa dang //sred pa zad la dga' ba dang //len pa zadra la mos pa dang //sems ni brjed pa med gyur pa//skye mched skye ba shes na su//sems ni rnam par/
328b5('dul ba): grol bar 'gyur//de nas sems ni rnam grol zhing //sems zhi ba yi skyob pa yi//bya ba dag ni byas zin pas//bya ba yod po ma yin no//ji ltar brag gi ri bo la//rlung gi
328b6('dul ba): rab tu mi g.yos pa//de bzhin sdug dang mi sdug pa'i//gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang //dri dang ro dang reg pa dang //chos kyis skyob pa mi g.yo ste//bkrir mi btub pa'i sems
328b7('dul ba): gnas shing //de la'ang zad par rje su lta//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te shA tshem thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa
329a1('dul ba): groshin skyes bya ba nyi shu bas las ci zhig bgyis nA las de'i rnam par smin pas byug cing nor mngal longs spyod che ba'i rigs skyes shing /rkang pa'i
329a2('dul ba): mthil gnyi su spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba skyes pa dang /gdugs re re zhing lnga brgya'i ston mo snod nas sgrol zhing sbyor ba dang /'di nas bzung ste bskol pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig
329a3('dul ba): gri bar du 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis po'i phyogasu rkang pa ma bzhag pa dang /btsas ma thag tu dkan dab bri pi'i rin gser bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing bcom ldan 'das
329a4('dul ba): kyis bstan pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bgyis lugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
329a5('dul ba): slong dag gro zhin skyes 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing
329a6('dul ba): bsags pas gro zhi na skyes 'di nyid kyis/lngas byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/dge slong dag las byas shing bsngags pa
329a7('dul ba): dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams lo mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar
329b1('dul ba): las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mchod rnams la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskul pa brgyar
329b2('dul ba): yang ni//chud mi za bya'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge slong dge sngon byung ba bsgral bya dgu bcu rtsa gcig na 'jig
329b3('dul ba): rten du yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa//bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyer pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sbyar bya/bla na myed pa lha dang
329b4('dul ba): mi rnams kyis ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs shes bya ba byung ste/dge slong drug khri nyis sto nga gis yang su bskor na sa ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs
329b5('dul ba): pa na rgyal po'i pho brang ba shes ldan+da zhes bya bar gshegaso//rgyal po'i pho blang ba shes ljon na dga' ste rab tu mang po gnas te/de rnams kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
329b6('dul ba): par gzigs dge slong drug khri nyis stong gis yongasu bskor to//ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa nu 'dir byin te zhes thos//thos nus kyang thams cad 'dus te/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
329b7('dul ba): sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gang ni ba der dong ste lhags nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/phyogs ga
330a1('dul ba): tu 'dug/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' sde rnams la chos dang ldan pa'i
330a2('dul ba): gtam gyis yang dag par ston par mdzod/yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/yang dag par gzongs stong par mdzad/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad de
330a3('dul ba): rnam grangs du mAr chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan/yang dag par 'dzin du bcug/yang dag par gzeng bstod/yang dag par rab tu dga' bar
330a4('dul ba): mdzad nas cang mi gsung //de nas dga' sde rab tu mang po stan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
330a5('dul ba): par gzigs gang na ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btu de/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
330a6('dul ba): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig la bdag cag dgung zla gsum du na bza' dang chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gzims cha dang /snyun dpyad kyi rkyen sman dang /
330a7('dul ba): yo byad rnams sbyong ni de mchis na/gnang bar mdzad du gas le/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis dga' snga rab tu mang po rnams la cang
330b1('dul ba): gsung bas gan //de nas dga' sde rab tu mang pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis
330b2('dul ba): gsungs pa la mngon par dga' ste rje su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas nas stan las langs te dong ngo //de rnams 'dun khang du 'dus te
330b3('dul ba): te/gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag bdag gis bcom ldan 'das ji ltar gdugs tshod gsol bar bya/ci 'dus te bya 'am/'on te re res bya//de na kha cig gis
330b4('dul ba): smras pa/nyi ma re re zhing 'dus te gdugs tshod gsol na/bdag cag gi zhing las kyi mtha' rnams bar chad du 'gyur bas shes ldan dag gal te 'dod na re mo re mos gdugs chod
330b5('dul ba): gsol bar bya'o zhes de rnams kyis re mo re mos spyi bungs la ston mo bya bar brtsams te/'byor pa ji lta ba bzhin bdag nyid kyi yang smon par byed//de nas dga' sde rnams kyi nang na bram
330b6('dul ba): ze'i khye'u bkren pa zhig yod pa de ma'i drung du song ste smras pa/yum dga' sde rnams kyis khrim su bca' ba re mo re mos bcom ldan 'dis gdugs tshod gsol bar bya'o zhes dam bcas
330b7('dul ba): na/de la bdag gi 'byor pa ni nyung na bdag gis ji ltar gdugs tshod gsel bar bgyi/des smras pa/bu gal te de lta na/khyod kyis nyi ma tha ma zung la dus de'i bar du cung zad
331a1('dul ba): sgrub shig/tshogs kyi rgyu lhag kyang cung zad rnyed grang /des nyi ma tha ma bzung nas don tshogs kyi rgyu lhag rab tu mang po yod pa dang /des kyang cung zad bsgrubs nas/
331a2('dul ba): de nas des gnas khang brtsigs tu bcug ste der gos rnams bti dra nas grwa rnamasu kar sha pa na lnga lnga bzhag/de dom lpags shig bdog pa yang gnas khang gi sgor bting ngo //de
331a3('dul ba): nas lnga brgya'i ston mo snod du bcos shing sbyar nas/bkur bsti chen pos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs gdugs chod gsol te//zhabs la gtugs
331a4('dul ba): nas smon lam btab pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'das bdag phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes shing lan 'ga' yang gding ba ma mchis pa'i sa phyogasu rkang pa mi 'dzag
331a5('dul ba): pa dang /yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi zhabs kyi mthil gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor bzhi tsam 'khrungs pa ji 'dra ba de lta bur bdag gi
331a6('dul ba): yang de 'dra ba dang /yon tan 'di lta bu dag kyang thob cing /ston pa 'di 'dra ba mnyes par bgyid kyi mi nyes par ma bgyid cig ces byaso//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/da'i
331a7('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyi dga' sde'i bram ze'i khye'u gang yin pa de ni gro zhin skyes bye ba nyi shu pa 'di nyid yin te/'dis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs la bya ba
331b1('dul ba): byas shing smon lam btab pa 'di las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pas phyug cing nor mang ba longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skyes pa dang /rkang pa gnyis la spu gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba sor du zhi
331b2('dul ba): tsa'am skyes pa dang /'di nas bzung ste bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bar du lan 'ga' yang gdong ba med pa'i sa phyogasu rkang pa ma bor ba dang /bcas pa na yang dkan dbab pa'i rin
331b3('dul ba): du gsor bye ba phrag nyi shu thob cing nga'i bsten pa la rab tu byung nas kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byaso//dge slong dag de lta bas na las
331b4('dul ba): gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni/gcig tu dkar ba yin/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/
331b5('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar
331b6('dul ba): bslab par bya'o//gang gi tshe/ma skyes dgra mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lhas skyon gyis zin pas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la rdo rje rtse gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe/rgyal po'i
331b7('dul ba): khab na gnas pa'i grong mi rnams kyis 'phye bar brtsams te/de na kha cig ni rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs par byed de/'di ma bcos pa nyid nas yab la dgrar 'gyur zhes
332a1('dul ba): /lung bstan na//ci'i phyir ma bcas pa nyid du ma bsad/gzhan dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal pos mnyes te/ca thams cad kyi lung
332a2('dul ba): bstan pa bden par 'gyur ram/gzhon nyid dul ba yin mod kyi/'on kyang lhas sbyin mi dge ba'i gshes gnyen gyis bslus nas/des na bya ba ngan pa la shin tu zhugs
332a3('dul ba): par gyur to//gzhan dag gis smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po dang lhas sbyin gyis kyang mnyes te/'on kyang lhas sbyin khrid 'jig rten gyis khams kyi bar du mi gzhag
332a4('dul ba): par 'di ltar rab tu 'byin par mdzad pas na/bcom ldan 'das kho nas nongs//kha cig gis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis mnongs te/de gang gis phyir gnas
332a5('dul ba): nas dbyung ba'i las mi byas pas dge 'dun gyis nyeso//de na gang dag rgyal po la mi snyan par sgrogs pa des rgyal po ngo che bar mi byed kyi/sngon gyi tshe rabs rnamasu bdag gis
332a6('dul ba): las 'di dag byas shing bsags pa yin no snya mo//gang dag bcom ldan 'das dang dge 'dun la mi snyan pa sgrogs pa des ni/rgyal po shin tu ngo tsha bar byed de/bdag gis
332a7('dul ba): lus ngan pa gang yin pa des 'jig rten na bcom ldan 'das dang /dge 'dun la mi sbyin brjod do su mo//dge slong rnams the tsho mo skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcong pa sang
332b1('dul ba): rgyus bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa nongs pa gzhan gyis bgyis la skyon gzhan la bsgo ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar
332b2('dul ba): gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zadade/ji ltar 'dis 'das pa'i dus na yang nyes pa gzhan gyis byas la skyon gzhan la bsgos pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer b+hA ra nas
332b3('dul ba): na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang ba na/rgyul srid byed du 'jug/de la khyi gnyis shig yod
332b4('dul ba): pa/'gram dang /nye 'grom zhes bya ste/de gnyis kyis rgyal po'i rta khrab kyi cha spyad 'choso//ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin dra ma la che ba na des blon po
332b5('dul ba): rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag rta khrab kyi yo byad ltos shig/de rnams kyis blta bar brtsams pa na thams cad bcad cing rab tu gtungs par mthong nus/de rnams kyis
332b6('dul ba): rgyal po la smras pa/lha rta khrab kyi cha byed zhes rnams khyis 'tshal to//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyi rnams yongasu spangaso//de nas kha cig
332b7('dul ba): nibs do//kha cig ni bros//ji tsam no yul gzhan gyi khyi zhig yul nas bI ra na ser ni 'ong ba na/des de rnams 'dros pa mthong nas dris pa shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed 'di
333a1('dul ba): ltar skrag/de rnams kyis ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par smras pa dang /des smras pa/khyed ci'i phyir rgyal po la gsol ba ma byas/de rnams kyis
333a2('dul ba): smras pa/gzhan dag ni kha btags/kho bo cag ni bros na/rgyal po la gsol ba byas pa'i gtol ga la yod/des smras pa/'dug shig dang khyed kyi don du kho bos
333a3('dul ba): rgyal po la gsol ba bya'o//des de rnams dbugs phyung nas slar log pa dang /de nas des rgyun ldugs chad tsam na thos pa'i nye 'khor du 'dug nas tshig su bcad
333a4('dul ba): pas gsol ba btab po/rgyal po'i khab na zhes gnyis mchis pa 'gram dang ni//nye 'gram stobs dang kha dog ldan pa gang lags pa//de 'dir dgum rgyu bdag cag
333a5('dul ba): dgum pa'i rgyu ma lags//lhan cig dgum rgyu ma lags dgum pa rigs pa min//rgyal pos thos nas/de nas nam langs pa dang /blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes
333a6('dul ba): ldan dag mdang sum ngal tshigasu bcad pas gsol ba byed pa gang yin pa de tshol cig/de rnams kyi sku srungs rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag ma dang sum lha la tshigasu///
333a7('dul ba): bcad pas gsol ba byed pa de tshal cig/de rnams kyis smras pa/yul gyi khyi lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag ci 'gram dang /nye 'gram gyis zos
333b1('dul ba): sam 'on te khyi gzhan rnams kyis yin pa rtogs shig/blon po rnams 'dus nas gros bya bar brtsams pa/shes ldan dag lhas 'di skad ces khyu rnams rtogs shig ces
333b2('dul ba): bka' stsal nA/de rnams la ji ltar brtag par bya/gzhan dag gis smras pa/de la gzhon pa rtag tu ci yod/sgra'i thum po byin te skyug tu bzhugs mod/de rnams kyis
333b3('dul ba): sgra'i thum po byin te/skyug tu bcug pa las/ji tsam na 'gram dang /nye 'gram gnyis ko ba'i dum bur skyugs nas/rgyal po la rig par byas pa dang /rgyal po de gnyis
333b4('dul ba): spangs te/lhag mA rnams la mi 'jigs pa byin no//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi 'gram dang /nyo 'gram gang yin pa de gnyis ni/lhas sbyin dang
333b5('dul ba): me skyes dgra 'di gnyis yin te/de na yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la sgo'o//da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis nyes pa byas la skyon gzhan la sgo'o//gzhan
333b6('dul ba): yang ji ltar lhas sbyin byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA ra na se na rgyal po chengs sbyin zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed du 'jug
333b7('dul ba): ji tsam ni mi zhig sto re dang khur shing thogs te/shing gi phyir nags khrod du song nas/de de na shing tshol bar byed pa na/seng gos skrag nas bris pa la su ra khung zhig tu lhung ngo //
334a1('dul ba): seng gis kyang de bza' ba'i bsam pasdu de nyid nga //sbrul rgyus b+h+yo da/skrag nas bros pa dang //zas phyis bzla' ba'i phyir bstegs pa las/
334a2('dul ba): ji tsam na thams cad sur khung du ltung ste/de dag thams cad cig la cig bsang por 'dod po'i gnod sems dang ldan par gyur pa dong /seng ges smyos pa/shes ldan
334a3('dul ba): dag khyed thams cad kho bo'i bgrod pa yin te/de lta mod kyi bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dag pa thob pas 'di na gnod pa bya ba'i dus ma yin gyis ma 'gul ba
334a4('dul ba): ba cig/skyes dbang gis zin pa zhig ri dwags rnams tshol zhing phyo gas der phyin pa na/des sur khung der blta bar ba rnams pa las/de rnams kyis brtabs pa'i
334a5('dul ba): tshig smras pa kyi nang rje sgrubs pa yin gyis shig/de nas rngon pa de skyes nas thog ma re steng ge byung ba dang /des rkang pa la gtugs te smras pa/khyod kyi drin gzo bar
334a6('dul ba): byAbya ste 'on kyang 'di na mgo nag po gnas pa dan byas pa chud gzon pa yin gyi/khyod kyis ma daM t+tang shig ces smras nas song ngo //tsi nA ma na rngon pa des thams cad
334a7('dul ba): mthar gyis phyung //ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na song gis ri rigs sh+log bsod pa dang //rngon pa de yid phyogs der phyin pa seng ges dong shes nas rngon pa'i rkang pa la
334b1('dul ba): gtugs te ri dgas de byin no//dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs byin btsun mo dang /lhan cig bskyed mos tshal gyi sar song nas/des bskyed mos tshal dor bde ba nyan su
334b2('dul ba): myong bar byas nas gnyid kyi lag/btsun mo bud med rnams kyang bgro yangasu gnas pas gos drug phud de skyems/rgyan dag bkrol nas phyogs dag tu bzhag ste/bskyed
334b3('dul ba): mos tshal na 'chag par byed/'dug par byed/nyal bar byed gnyid kyis log par byed//ji tsam na btsun mo zhig rgyan rnams bkrol to/phyogs zhog tu bzhag nas//
334b4('dul ba): gnyid log pa dang /khros de blangs nas rngon pa de la byas pa gzo bar bya ba'i phyir byin no//rgyal po tshangs sbyin gnyid kyis snyoms pa bsal nas myur ba myur bar bA ra na ser
334b5('dul ba): zhugaso//btsun mo dang /gzhonu dang /blon po dang /grong mi dang /yul mi rnams kyang rings par dong ngo //ji tsam na btsun mo des rgyan btsal ba las ma rnyed nas/des
334b6('dul ba): rgyal po la smras pa/lha bskyed mos tshal du bdag gi rgyan ltar lags//rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag rgyan stor gyis sus khyer tshol cig/de rnam
334b7('dul ba): kyis btsal bar brtsams po ni/mgo nag po de sngon po'i drung du dus dus su 'gro bas de de'i khyim du song ba ni/mtshan me las de ni rgyan yod par shos nas/byas pa chung
335a1('dul ba): gzon pa des rgyal po'i drung du song nas gsol pa dang /de nas rgyal po mchog tu khros te/rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis ston pa bkug nas smras pa/
335a2('dul ba): kA'e nang rje khyod kyis bskyed mos tshal nas rgyan brkus//de nas de skrag nas ji ltar gyur pa smras te/rgyun de rgyal po la phul na/'on kyang mi de bcings nas brtson par
335a3('dul ba): bzhag/byi bos sod nas sbrul la smras pa/mgo nag pa sdig po byed pa des bya ba byas nas/bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rgyal pos bcings nas btsan
335a4('dul ba): rar bzhag/sbrul gyis smras pa/kye ston pa de ring bdag gis rgyal po la zin par byas/khyod kyis sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dang /sman 'di dag gis gsos
335a5('dul ba): shig drung /de ltar rgyal po de dga' nas khyed gdon mi za bar btang nas longs spyod kyang bgo ba sha' byed par 'gyuraro//des smras pa legs kyis de bzhin gyis shig/
335a6('dul ba): sbrul gyis rgyal po zin pa dang //rngon pas song ste/sngags dang sman dag gis gsoso so//de nas rgyal po mgu nas btsan las btang ste longs spyod dag gis bgo ba sha' yang
335a7('dul ba): bya so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni nga yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byas pa chung
335b1('dul ba): gzon pa'i mi gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mtshar ba yin no//da ltar yang byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mtshar ba yin//
335b2('dul ba): gawAn yang ji ltar 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang /byas pa mi tshor ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba/dus ma yin par lkog bdun du sprin chags te/lhas char phab nas/ne
335b3('dul ba): le zhig byi ba'i cheng du zhog so//sbrul zhig char pas smug nas phan tshun du rgyu ba ni de nyid du zhugs//ji tsam na ne'u le des byi ba de bsad par brtsams pa nA/sbrul gyis smras pa/
335b4('dul ba): snguldan dag bdag cag sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob kyis cig la cig gnod pa ma byed par ma 'gul bar 'khod cig/de na sbrul gyi ming ni dga' sde zhes bya'o//ne'u li'i ming
335b5('dul ba): nri dga' bo zhes bya'o//byi ba'i ming ni gang gas byin zhes bya'o//dga' sde dang /dga' bos gang gis byin la smras pa/khyod 'jab cing song le bdag cag gi kha zas tshol
335b6('dul ba): cig/de drang zhing bsam pa bzang ba yin pas/de gnyis kyi che du snying nas kha zas btsal bar brtsams pa ni ma rnyed do//dga' bos dga' sde la smras pa gal te gang gas
335b7('dul ba): byin kha zas med par 'ongs na/de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o//dga' sdes bsams pa/sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dog pa thob pa na yang 'di de la gsod par rtsom na/
336a1('dul ba): gal te de zas med par 'ongs na lta smos kyang ci dgos pas/ye de la spring bar bya'o snyam nas/des de la spring ba dpa' bo na re 'di skad ces/gal te
