336a2('dul ba): gang gas byin kha zas med par 'ongs na/de nyid bdag gis bza' bar bya'o zhes ze ro//gang gas byin gyis khaM zas btsal ba las cung zad kyang ma rnyed nas/des bsams pa/
336a3('dul ba): gdon mi za bar des bdag zos par 'gyu ro snyam nas/des dga' sde la spring ba/mi bkren ltogs pa'i shugs kyis yongs dub nas//nyam thag snying rje med par 'gyur bas
336a4('dul ba): khyod/byas pa chud gzon sem can de la ni//gang gas byin pa phyir mi 'ong /zhes gsungs/shes spring ngo //dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe da'i dus kyi gang gas
336a5('dul ba): byin gang yin pa de ni nga yin//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ne'u le dga' bo gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'di byas pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yi nod ltar yang 'di byas
336a6('dul ba): pa mi gzo ba dang byas pa mi tshor ba yin//gang gi tshe ma skyes dgras rgya logazur can snying po la rdo rje gcig pa 'phangs pa de'i tshe/rgyal pos de la spong nas gzho nu/ci'i phyir khyod kyis/nga la rdo rje rtse gcig
336a7('dul ba): ba 'phangs/des smras pa/lha tshigs pa 'tshal ba'i sla du ste/lha la longs spyod mnga' na/bdag la ma mchis//rgyalaM pos smras pa/bu gal te da lta na song la tsam pa ga
336b1('dul ba): dang bcas pa khyod kyi yin no//de dga' ba dang /mgu ba dang /rab tu dga' bas/lhas sbyin gyi drung du song ste smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis/tsam pa gzhi dang bcas
336b2('dul ba): pa thob//des smras pa/gzhonu khyod kyis/pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu mthong ngam/'phags pa mthong ngo //de dung yang pha rol gnon pa gyis shig dang /khyod kyis mngon
336b3('dul ba): par 'phel bar 'gyur ro//des tsam pa'i dpyad bab pas gtso bar brtsams te/gtses pa na/skye bo'i tshogs 'bros pa la zhugs te/kha cig gi rgyal po'i khab tu dong ngo //kha
336b4('dul ba): cig ni yul gzhan du dong nas//blon po rnams kyis//rgyal po la pho nyas bzlubs pa/lha gzho nus tsam pa'i skye bo bcos te/btsos pa ni 'bros pags kyis/lha gzhon nu
336b5('dul ba): de las bzlog par mdzad pa'i rigaso//rgyal pos smras pa/gzho nu ci'i phyir yul mi la gnod pa byed/des smos pa/lha dpung rgyas par mi 'gyur lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/
336b6('dul ba): gzhonu gal te de lta na/rgyal po'i khab 'ba' zhig mi gtogs par yul ma ga d+ha khyer cig/des yul ma ga d+hi blangs nas/lhas sbyin gyi drung du song ste/smras pa/'phags
336b7('dul ba): pa bdag gis rgyal po'i khab 'ba' zhig ma gtogs po yul ma ga d+ha thams cad thob//des smras pa/gzho nu pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu ni de 'dras/yang pha rol gnon
337a1('dul ba): paM gyis shig/des yul ma gA d+ha brlag par bya bar brtsams pa na/yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis rgyal po gzugs can snying po
337a2('dul ba): la gsol pa/lha gzho nus yul ma ga d+ha brlag par bgyis kyis zlog mdzod cig/rgyal pos de bkug ste/smras pa/gau zho nu ci'i phyir/yul ma ga d+ha brlag par bya/
337a3('dul ba): des smras pa/lha bdag gi skye bo'i tshogs phal po che rgyas par mi 'gyur lagaso//rgyal pos smras pa/gzhonu gal te de lta na mdzod cigo ma gtogs par thams cad khyod
337a4('dul ba): kho na'i yino//des rgyal po'i khab kyang blangs nas/lha sprin gyis drung du song ste/smras pa/'phags pa bdag gis mdzod cig ma gtogs par longs spyod thams cad tho'o///
337a5('dul ba): depe smras pa/pha rol gnon pa'i 'bras bu de yin mod kyi/'on kyang /rgyal po rnams ni mdzod kyi mthu can yin te/gang la mdzod yod pa de rgyal po yin pos/mdzod kyi
337a6('dul ba): phyir pha rol gnon pa gyis shig/des rgyal po'i khab kyang brlag par bya bar brtsams pa na/rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang /yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i
337a7('dul ba): skye bo'i tshogs dang /tsam pa thams cad sgrog par gyur nas/ji ltar mi skyes dgras mi mthong ba de ltar pho nya btang ste/rgyal po la gsol pa/lhas bdag cag pu bzhin
337b1('dul ba): du so sor bsgyangs na/gzho nus ma 'os pa zhig du bkren par bgyis pas/lha'i yul mi phal cher bros lags te/bdag cag kyang 'bros par 'tshal lags//rgyal po snying rje//
337b2('dul ba): bdag nyid can/chos gtsor byed pa de mi bde ba skyes nas ma skyes dgra bkug ste/dga' ba dang /snyan pa dang /rjesu 'thun pa'i tshig gis mgo la byugs te smras pa/buM ngas
337b3('dul ba): khyod la yul thams cad byin na ci'i phyir yi cad par byas/so sor skyongs shig/des smras pa/lha rgyal po rnams ni mdzod kyi mthu can lags na/bdag la mdzad kyi mthu ma
337b4('dul ba): mchis na/ji ltar 'gyu/des smras pa/gal te lta na btsun mo'i 'khor ma gtogs pa thams cad khyod kho na'i yi no//'on kyang rang bzhin ngan cing /sdig pa'i grogs
337b5('dul ba): po can+da de/'dug tu mi btub cing bklag pa kho nar byed do//rgyal pos spyo ba dang bcas pas smras pa/bang mdzod dang /mdzod dang /yul thams cad khyod kho na la byin na/
337b6('dul ba): ci'i phyir da dung brlag par byed/de skad ces smras pa dang /de khros nas blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la smod
337b7('dul ba): byang yin pa de la ched ba /blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha ched pas dgu ma legs med/des smras pa/nga'i yo ba yin pas ji ltar bsad kyis/de la
338a1('dul ba): zung ste phyag sbal du chug la zhog shig/de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /rgyal po de la grong mi rnams dga' bas/yul de na gnas pa'i smra
338a2('dul ba): tshogs kyis thos nas yid mi bdo bor gyur na/ma skyes dgra gtum pa dang /brlang ba dang /gzu lum che bas de la su yang kha zer mi phogo/rgyal po gzugs tsan+da snying
338a3('dul ba): pos phyag sbrul na/las kho na la rten cing 'dug po de la/lus 'phags mas snod du bac+doMs pa skyel bar byed//mu skyes dgus btson srungs rnams la dris pa/shes ldan
338a4('dul ba): dag rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha khyod kyi yum gyis snod nas btsos pa skye la lag so//ma skyes dgras bsgo ba/phyin chad bza
338a5('dul ba): bA dang btung ba ji ltar yang skyel bar mi 'gyur ba khog shig/btsun mo rnams la yang bsgo ba/sus kyang phyag sbrul du bza' ba dang btung ba bskyal bar mi bya'o//dang
338a6('dul ba): zhig skyel na de chad par gsod do//de zhe gnag pa'i lus can yin par shes pa su yang khwa zas sbyor bar yang mi byed na/skyel ba lta smos kyang ci dgos/de nas lus
338a7('dul ba): 'phags ma khyim thab la sdug par 'chums pa'i snying gis phye'i 'deg gus lus byugs shing rkang gdub kyi sbubs chus bkang nas/skyil bar brtsams te/de des
338b1('dul ba): 'tsho bar byed do//brtson srungs kyi mi rnams kyis de'i thabs shes myod kyi rgyal po de la dga' bas mthong yang ma skyes dgra lam snyan to//ji tsom na yang ma skyes dgras bcan
338b2('dul ba): srungs kyi mi rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed/de rnams kyis rgyas par skyes pa dang /des smras pa shes ldan dag lus 'phags
338b3('dul ba): ma ji ltar phyis skyel bar mi 'gyur bar khog shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyod pa'i phyir skar khung gi drang thaMd kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag
338b4('dul ba): par brtsams nas/rgyal po gzugs can snying po skar khung nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba la bltas nas dga' ba bskyed pas/des na srog dang bral bar ma gyur to//
338b5('dul ba): mA skyes dgras yang btson bsrungs kyi mi rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dge bza' ba dang /btung ba ni bkag na da ltar rgyal po bgres po ji ltar 'tsho bar byed/de rnams
338b6('dul ba): kyis smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rje su bzung po'i slad du skar khung gi drang thud kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'chag par mdzad pa de la/de gdugs re re zhing bzhengs nas ka
338b7('dul ba): lags so//de smras pa/skar khung khog la/de'i rkang pa gnyis kyang spu gris dros shig/de rnams kyis skar khung dag bkag/de'i rkang pa gnyis kyang spa gris dras pa dang
339a1('dul ba): de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas gdungs pas/mchi mas bsnangs shing skad 'gags la/mig mchi mas gang bas bsams pa/bdag sdug bsngal
339a2('dul ba): mi bzad pa dog pa thob na/bcom ldan 'das kyis ma dgongs pa lta zhig skya mo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de lta bu mi mkhyen pa 'am mi gzigs pa'o//
339a3('dul ba): thugasu mi chud pa 'am/rnam par mi mkhyen pa ci yang mi mnga'o//chos nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa/'jig rten la phan
339a4('dul ba): par zhugs pa bsrung ba gcig pu nya ga cig dpa' ba/zla med pa/gnyi su mi gsung ba/zhi gnas dang /lhag mthong gis bzhugs pa/dul ba'i gnas gsum
339a5('dul ba): gyi gzhi la mkhas pa/chu bo bzhi las rgal ba rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la yun ring po nas yongasu
339a6('dul ba): sbyang ba mdzad pa/yan lag lnga spangs pa/'gro ba lnga las yang dag par 'das pa/yan lag drug dang ldan pa/pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa/byang chub
339a7('dul ba): kyi yan lag bdun gyi me tog gis phyug pa/lam gyi yan lag brgyad ston pa/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la mkhas pa/stobs bcu'i
339b1('dul ba): stobs dang ldan pa/phyogs bcur snyan pas yang drug par rgyas pa/brgya phrag bcur dbang bsgyur ba lngas khyad par du 'phags pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis nyin lan gsum/
339b2('dul ba): mtshan lan gsum du 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs nas gang ni nyams/gang ni 'phel/gang ni mi bzad par gyur/gang ni dog par gyur//gang ni sdug bsngal bar gyur//
339b3('dul ba): gang ni mi bzad pa dang /dog pa dang /sdug bsngal bar gyur/gang ni ngan srong la gzhol/gang ni ngan song la 'bab/gang gi dran song la bab/nges gang ni ngan song las
339b4('dul ba): drangs te/mtho ris dang thur pa dang /'bras bu la gzhug par bya/glang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ma skyes pa ni bskyed par bya/gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dag ni yongasu smin
339b5('dul ba): par bya/gang gi yongasu smin pa ni rnam par grol bar bya zhes ye shes gzigs pa 'jug par mdzad//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dag pa gyi dri chen po
339b6('dul ba): la bka' stsal pa/mo'u dragal gyi bu song la de'i tshig gis rgyal po gzugs can snying po la nad med par gyur cig byos la/'di skad ces pa tsam ldan 'das kyi zhal nas
339b7('dul ba): dge ba'i be shes gnyen gyi bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad zin te/khyod sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs
340a1('dul ba): lU dang mi rnams ni rab tu bzha/'khor ba ni mthur byas/khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni skams/rngam pa'i ri bo lngas ni basprul/ngan song
340a2('dul ba): rnams kyi sgo ni bcad/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na/'on kyang khyod nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon
340a3('dul ba): mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod nyid kyis byos shing bsngags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong ba ro 'gyur/rgyal po chen po las byas shing bsags
340a4('dul ba): pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi 'di ltar las
340a5('dul ba): dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang khams dang /skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/las rnams bskal pa brgyar
340a6('dul ba): yang ni//chud mi zla ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//rgyal po chen po de lta bas na/las kyi skyabs can du gyis
340a7('dul ba): shig ces gsung zhes byos shig/btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas/ji ltar sems
340b1('dul ba): gnyam par gzhug na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri las mi snang bar gyur te/phyag sbal du rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i mdun du 'dug pa de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin lnga snyoms par
340b2('dul ba): zhugs te/'di skad ces smraso//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhul nus/khyod nad med par gyur cig ces gsung ngo //btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po bac+doMs
340b3('dul ba): la phyag 'tshalo//rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas/'di skad ces/dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bya ba gang yin pa de ngas khyod la mdzad//khyod sems can
340b4('dul ba): dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro dang /yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/lha dang /mi rnamasu ni rab tu bzhag/'khor ba ni mthar byas/khrag dang mtsho ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/rus
340b5('dul ba): pipo'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bcad/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye na/'on kyang khyod nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin
340b6('dul ba): du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag khyod kyis byas shing bsogs pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/rgyal po chen po las byas
340b7('dul ba): shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/chu'i khams la mi 'gyur/me'i khams la mi 'gyur/rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/'di ltar/
341a1('dul ba): las dge ba dang /mi dge ba'i las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/zin pa'i phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams kho na la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/
341a2('dul ba): las rnaM bskal pa rgyar yang ni//chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams la ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//rgyal po chen po da lta bas na khyod kyis las
341a3('dul ba): kyi skyabs can du gyis shig ces gsung //de phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /spu gris rkang pa dras pa dang /bza' ba dang /btung ba dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal gyis nyon pas smras pa/
341a4('dul ba): btsun pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po gang na kha zas bzang po 'tshal lags/des smras pa/rgyal po chen po rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nA'o zhes smras nas/tshe dang ldan pa
341a5('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen pos ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/phyag sbal de nas mi snang bar gyur to//bya rgod kyi phung po la phyin pa de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
341a6('dul ba): ma skyes dgra'i bu 'char byed bzang po'i 'dzub mo la phol mig zung pos de ngu bar gyur nas ma skyes dgra drung du song ste des de phang por bzhag nas mgul nas 'khyud/'o byas kun
341a7('dul ba): tu 'khyud na 'on kyang de du ste 'dug tu mi btu'o//de nas ma skyes dgras de'i 'dzum mo khar btsug pa dang /pol mig khar rdol nas ma skyes dgras rnag khrag so la pho'o//
341b1('dul ba): gzhon 'char byed bzang pos rnag khrag de mthong nas lhag par ngu bar brtsams pa dang /btsun mo lus 'phags mas 'jub phyung ba ma skyes dgras mthong nas smras pa/yum 'di ji
341b2('dul ba): lta bu zhig/des smras pa/bu nad 'di ni khyed kyi yab mas brgyud de 'ongs pa yin te/khyod kyang de ltar gyur pa nA khyod kyi yab kyis 'dzub mo khar bcug pa dang /phol mig rdol
341b3('dul ba): nas khyod mi ngu bar bya ba'i phyir rnag khrag so la ma pho bar khong dro ming do//des smras po/yum bdag gis pa 'di 'dra bar byams par gyur tamA/des smras pa/de 'dra'o//
341b4('dul ba): nus mo skyes dgra pha la zhe sdang gi kun nas dkris pa dang bral zhing rje su chags pa skyes te/des blon po rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag gang zhig nga la rgyal po bgres pa gson no
341b5('dul ba): zhes zer ba de la ngas rgyal srid phyed sbyin//rgyal po de la krong mi dang /yul mi rnams dga' ba yin pas/skye bo'i tshogs chen pos phyag sbal logasu porgyugs pa'i sgra/rgyal
341b6('dul ba): pos thos nas bsams pa/da ni gnod pa mi bzad pa ci zhig byed par 'gyur ro snyam ste/skrag nas shugs na ro zhes phyung ste shi ba dang /rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i bur skyes
341b7('dul ba): te/pang du 'dug nas lha'i bdud rtsis longs spyod par byed//rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/khyod su zhig/des bdag ni rgyal ba khyu mchog lagaso zhes smras pas/de'i ming rgyal ba
342a1('dul ba): mchog rgyul bu rgyu mchog ces grag sa//dge slong rnams the tshom sbyin te/the tshom thams ca gcod dusangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/brdzun pa
342a2('dul ba): rgyal po gzugs can snyid rdo lnga ci zhig bgyis nA las de'i rnam par smin pas phyug cing nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rig su skyes par gyur cing /bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngo
342a3('dul ba): nus bden pa mthong bar bgyis pa dang /spu dri sug pa rkang pa dras te/phyug sbal du stsal cing bkres pa dang skom pas gziri nas gum par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das
342a4('dul ba): kyis bka' stsam pa/dge slong dag rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'di nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/rkyen yang su bsgyur ba/de pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa//gdin mi
342a5('dul ba): bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsngags pas/gzugs can snying pos las byas shing 'phags pa dgra gzhan su zhig gis so sar myong b.ragyur/
342a6('dul ba): slod du la byas shi sags pa dag ni phyis kyi smra sas la rnam pa'i sbyin pa mi 'gyur//chu'i khams la mi 9/mimi mas la ma 'gyung //ma
342a7('dul ba): lam 'i rgyur gyi/'di snga las dge pa dong /me des byas shing bsags pa degan 'on pa'i dru ba dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams kha nas rna rmi la ni pa gyu /
342b1('dul ba): las rnams bskul ba brgyar yang no//chud ma za ba'ang tshogs dang dus//rnyed na lus can rnams sna ni//'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid//dge sbyong dag sngon byung ba sangs rgyas rnams
342b2('dul ba): 'byung ba med pa na 'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /ngan pa la snying brtse ba can pas mtha'i gnas mal la dpa' ba/'jig rten gyi yon gnas gi tsAg pu dag 'byung bar
342b3('dul ba): 'gyur ba yin pas/dzItsam na rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing spyod pa na/bA ra na ser phyin nas b+hA ra na sel rdzumakhan zhig gis las khang du nub mo nye bar brten te gnas//'don
342b4('dul ba): pa zhig kyang las khang de nyid du gnas btab pa las der 'dren pa des ra shang ba byas nas/nub mo nyid langs te sring ngo //dgra bcom pa rnams dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams ni
342b5('dul ba): bsdams par ye shes mthong ba mi 'jug pa yin pas rang sangs rgyas kyis 'di nyid du bsod snyoms spyad par bya'o snyam nas de nyid du 'dug ji tsam rdza mkhanan ma nangs nas las
342b6('dul ba): kyi khang par zhugs na mi gtsang bas ma rung bar byas pa mthong ngo //mi phal ba rnams na mo rtog pa yin pas de rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdug par byas te/de sems rab tu
342b7('dul ba): sdang bas smras pa/rab tu byung ba khyod kyi rkang po gnyis la spu gres dras sam/cin gang gi phyir khyod kyis las khang du bshang ba byas kyi phyi rol du ma song //des de sgo bcad nas
343a1('dul ba): 'di nyid du skom pa dang bkres pas shi shig ces bzhag/bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/nyon mongs 'di ni nyams kyis/gal te bdag gis/
343a2('dul ba): sgo phye ste/song bar gyur na lhag par yang nyams par 'gyu ro snyam nas de cang mi smra bar 'dug/ji tsam na rdzu mkhan dro'i dus la bab nas/de'i zhe sdang gis kun nas dkris
343a3('dul ba): pa dang bral nas/des smras bya/kye rab tu byung ba gdugs tshad gsol gyis tshur spyon/rang sangs rgyas kyis smras pa/bzhin bzungs kho bo dus su longs spyod pa yin
343a4('dul ba): pa las dus las yol zin to//des smras pa/gal te de lta na 'di nyid du bzhugs te/sang ba shos gsol la gshegs shig/des de la snying brtse ba'i phyir khas
343a5('dul ba): blangaso//des de phyi de nyin par kha zas bsod pas tshim par bya'o//bdag nyid chen po de dag ni lus kyis chos ston gyi/ngag gis ma yin pas/des steng gi nam mkha' la
343a6('dul ba): mngon par 'phags te/'bar ba dang /gsal ba dang /char 'bebs pa dang /glog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsamaso//so so'i skye bo ni rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems
343a7('dul ba): gtod pa yin pas do shing rtsa ba nas bcad pa bzhin du rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smras pa/yon gnas chen po mar spyosgron mar spyon bdag 'dod pa'i 'dam du bying ba lag nas
343b1('dul ba): drang du gsol/de babs pa dang des de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/bdag gis yon gnas dam pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa bgyis pa'i las gang lags
343b2('dul ba): pa de'i skal ba can du ma gyur cig/bya ba byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa 'dis bdag phyug cing /nor mang la longs spyod che ba'i rigasu skye zhing /'di bas khyad par du 'phru
343b3('dul ba): pa'i ston pa mnyes par bgyid kyi/mi mnyes par mi bgyid par 'gyur zhing 'di lta bu'i chos rnams kyang thob par gyur cig ces byas//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe
343b4('dul ba): de'i dus kyi rdza mkhan gang yin pa de ni/gzugs can snying po 'di nyid yin te/rang sangs rgyas la sems rab tu gdugs pas ngag rtsub pa'i las phyung ba gang yin pa de'i
343b5('dul ba): las kyi rnam par smin pas spugs rkang pa gnyis dras pa dang /phyag sbal du bcug pa dang /skom pa dang bkres pas shi ba yin no//des bzod pa gsol nas/smon lam
343b6('dul ba): btab pa gang yin pa de'i las kyis rnam par smin pas phyug pa dang /rgyal po'i rigasu skyes nas kyang /nga'i spyan snga nas 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes
343b7('dul ba): rdo rjes btsam nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du thob par byas//dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa
344a1('dul ba): yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcag tu/
344a2('dul ba): gnag pa rnams dang 'dren marnams sangs tI las gcig tu dkur ba la bal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bsgrub par bya'o///'du
344a3('dul ba): ni/bam pa d+hA gnyis pa//blan pa rnams kyis ma skyes dgul smras / rgyal po bgres pa ni nA sa//des sa nas bor+b+ba m+b+ha te sA lA 'gyes pad
344a4('dul ba): chus gtor nus dbugs spyor phyung nas/mya den gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug/de'i mya ngan desol bar sus kyang mi nus nas/blon po rnams gos de'i mya ngan bsal bar
344a5('dul ba): brtsams pa ji tsam na lho phyogs nas gar mkhan zhig 'ongs nas/blon po rnams kyis de de'i mdun du gar byed du bcug kyang ma skyes dgra yid mi bde ba nyi dgas sus kyang
344a6('dul ba): de la leg so zhes bya ba mo byin nas/gar mkhan phyir byung ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyang phyogs der gshogs//des bcom ldan 'das mthong nas des bsams pa/
344a7('dul ba): skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu dag la byas dang /des bdag la leg so zhes bya ba byin pa zhig snyam ste/de bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad pa rdza rnga chen po brdung so//
344b1('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/zhal nas 'od zer sngon po dang /ser
344b2('dul ba): po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dag byung nas kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/kha cig ni steng du 'gro la/gang dag 'og tu dong ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang
344b3('dul ba): sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /che ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol ba dang /
344b4('dul ba): so thams thams dang /kyi hu zer dang /a chu zer dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/sems can dmyal ba
344b5('dul ba): tsha ba dag gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te/'bab par byed la/sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed//des sems can
344b6('dul ba): dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag de dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shrI 'phos sam/'on te gzhan du skyes snyam
344b7('dul ba): du semaso//de dag dad pa bskyod par bya ba'i phyir/bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad//de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan
345a1('dul ba): dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos pa yang ma yin la gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus padag/
345a2('dul ba): gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun bcad par gyur to snya mo//de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par
345a3('dul ba): byas nas/gang du bden bdag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang /mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byeda'o//gang dag steng du 'dod pa de dag na rgyal
345a4('dul ba): tshon bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan 'phrul dbong byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i
345a5('dul ba): mdun na 'don dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad ming dge dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nam
345a6('dul ba): 'phel dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /
345a7('dul ba): sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra skyugs par byed cing /tshig su bcad pa gnyis po//brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/sangs rgyas
345b1('dul ba): bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'dri la spyod 'gyur ba//skye bar
345b2('dul ba): 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang sgrogaso//de nas 'od zer de dag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byulo nas/
345b3('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste/de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snum logasu nub par
345b4('dul ba): 'gyuraro//ma 'ongs pa'i lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu nub par 'gyur/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du nub par
345b5('dul ba): 'gyur/dud 'gror skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/rting par nub par 'gyur/yi dag su skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/mer skye bar
345b6('dul ba): lung ston par bzhed no ni/pus mor nub par 'gyur/stobs kyi 'khor lo skur ba'i rgyal srod lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/'khor lo
345b7('dul ba): sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/lhar skye bar lung ston par bzhod na ni/lte bar nub par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi byang
346a1('dul ba): chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhal du nub par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdzad spur nub par 'gyur/bla na
346a2('dul ba): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur//de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas
346a3('dul ba): te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la cha dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi//tshogs
346a4('dul ba): rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa//ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//yang tshig suM bcad gsol pa/rgod dral
346a5('dul ba): bum pa rgyugs pa spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dag thul byed rgyu ma mchis pAr//rtswa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi mdzad//de skad
346a6('dul ba): btsun pa nyid thos dus mkhyen na//rgyal ba'i dbang ba thub pa skyes kyi mchog/nyan par 'tshal ba ton pa pa rnams kyi//the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig bstan pa dang /dam pa ba
346a7('dul ba): po dag gis bsal du gsol//tshe chu ri dbang lta bur brtan pa'i mchog/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston//brtan pa ci slad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//skye
346b1('dul ba): bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal//kun dga' bo khyod kyis gar mkhani nga la sems mngon par dad par byas nas rdza rnga chen po rdung bar byed pa de mthong ngam/btsun pa de mthong lags//
346b2('dul ba): kun dga' bo gar mkhan de sems bskyed pa des rang sangs rgyas rnga sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te/nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o//lhas
346b3('dul ba): sprin gyis ma skyes dgra la smras pa/kho bos khyod rgyal srid la bzhag pa yin gyi khyed kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid du bskos shig/des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das ni sku gser
346b4('dul ba): b+h+yo kha dog nyid du 'dug na/re zhig dang por gser gyi kha dog nyid medo//des smras pa/kho bo yang gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar 'gyuraro zhes des gser mgar bkug nas smras pa/
346b5('dul ba): kho bo'i lus gser gyis g.yogs shig/des smras pa/'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phod na'o//des smras pa/da khyod kyis g.yogs shig dang phod par bya'o//
346b6('dul ba): des tsan tsu zhes bya ba'i 'bru mar gyis lus byugs nas/gser gyi khyim phag gis lus g.yog pa dang /de sdug bsngal cho la zad pa che nga brtsub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyams
346b7('dul ba): su myong ngo //dge slong rnams kyis ko ka l-i ka la dris pa/lhas spyan gang na/des smras pa/phyogs che ge mo zhig na gser gyi kha dog tu snang bar bsgyuro//dge slong rnams
347a1('dul ba): phyogs der song ba dang /de rnams kyis de sdug bsngal gyi tshor rabs nyen te ku tsa 'don pa thos nas/de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis sman sngar do rngo//
347a2('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin gyis gser gyi kha dog dran du gnyer ba sdug bsngal
347a3('dul ba): mi bzed pa cha ba rtsub pa yod du mi 'ang ba'i tshor ba nyam su myong ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi de ba' zhig tu ma zad ji ltar 'dra
347a4('dul ba): 'das pa'i dus na yang gser gyi na don du gnyer ba'i phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer b+hA rA nA sa na/rgya la ring bar
347a5('dul ba): ba'i bud med cig yod pa de'i mdun du bya rog cig skud sbyin par 'byin nas/des smras pa/bya rog song shig/bya rog song shig/gal te bdag gi khyim thab bde bar 'khor la
347a6('dul ba): gser gyi zhwa zhig sbyin no//ji tsam na de'i khyim thab de yang bde bar slar 'ongaso//bya rog de gser gyi khwa'i tshad du de'i mdun du 'dug nas spyad sbyin par phyung ba dang de nas de la
347a7('dul ba): gser gyi 'o zhig byin//des ded gyon pa pan tshun du lding ba na/de gser gyi grwa'i phyir byo khrus mgo bca'o//lhas tshig su bcad smras pa/don med gzhi dang ldan pa yi//no
347b1('dul ba): ni phung bar 'gyur ba ste//gang gi mgo la gser yod pa'o//bya rog gis ni phung byed btsal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe
347b2('dul ba): de'i dus kyi bya rog gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'di gsor gyi rgyus tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de ltar yang 'di gser gyi kha dog tu
347b3('dul ba): gnyer ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tshong pa che ba brngub pa yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba nyi ma su myong bar gyur to//gzhan yang lhas sbyin gyis skyes dgra la smras pa/kho bas ni khyod
347b4('dul ba): rgyal srid la bzhag gis/khyod kyis kyang kho bo sangs rgyas nyid chug shig/des smras pa/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyi mtshan pIta yod no//
347b5('dul ba): khyod kyi rkang pa'i mthil la ni 'khor lo'i mtshan gyis mtshan po'i rtag med//des smras pa/kho bos kyang rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags bsgrub par bya'o zhes des lcags
347b6('dul ba): mgar rnams bkug nas smras pa/kho bo'i rkang mthil la 'khor lo 'dri nus sam/de rnams kyis smras pa/'phags pa gal te tshor ba mnags phod na'o//des smras pa/phod
347b7('dul ba): kyis byis shig/de rnams kyis bsams pa/'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas/gal te 'di bzhin du bris na/rdog pas bdag cag srog dang phral bar 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin
348a1('dul ba): ba de ni yod snyam nas/de rnams kyis rtsig pa 'bigasu bcug nas smras pa//'phags pa rtsig pa'i bu gu 'dir rkang pa gnyis chug shig/des rtsig pa'i
348a2('dul ba): bu ga rarA rkang ba gnyis bcug pa dang /lcags mgar rnams kyis 'khor lo mo'i kha dog tu 'dug par byas nas rkang pa bsregs pa dang /de sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba brngub pa
348a3('dul ba): yid du mi 'ong ba'i tsher ba nyamasu myong bar gyur to//dge slong rnams kyis ko ka li ka la dris pa lha sbyin gang na/phyogs ga ge mo zhig na rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags
348a4('dul ba): bsgru'o//dge slong rnams phyogs dor song ba dang /de rnams kyis sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen cing ku tsa 'don po thos nas/de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar dong //
348a5('dul ba): dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin rkang pa'i mthil la 'khor lo'i rtags
348a6('dul ba): dan du gnyer bas sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba brtsub pa yid du mi mchi ba'i tshor ba nyam su myong bar gyur pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong
348a7('dul ba): dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba
348b1('dul ba): grangs can la glang po che zhig yod pa chu 'thung du 'babs pa de'i phyi bzhin wa zhig kyang babs pa dang /des glang po che'i rjes mthong nas bdag nyid kyi gom pas gzhal bar brtsams te/
348b2('dul ba): des bsams pa/rjes 'di ni bdag gi yin//zhes de mchong zhing mchod zhing rjes kyi steng du 'jog pa ni snod dru ma khye'u ka zhig gi steng du rdog 'chos par gyur to//lhas tshigasu
348b3('dul ba): bca de smras pa/mdor na glang chen rkang rjes dang //blun po khyod rjes mi 'dra yis//don med pa 'di spongs byas shig/ngal ba thob par gyur ta re//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems
348b4('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dri rkang rjes kyi phyir tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//da ltar yang 'di rkang mthil la 'kho
348b5('dul ba): lo'i rtags don du gnyar bu'i phyir sdug bsngal mi bzad pa tsha ba brngub pa/yid du mi 'ong ba nyam su myong bar gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung
348b6('dul ba): po'i ro la gnod sbyin kum b+hI ri'-i'aM gan sa na bzhug so//lhas sbyin gyis yang ma skyes dgra la smras pa/kho bos khyod ni rgyal srid lo bzhag na/khyod kyis kho bo sangs rgyas su gtu
348b7('dul ba): ma nus kyi da ni kho bas dge slong go'u ta ma srog dang bral gyis khyod kyis sus bsod dam/gang du bsad ma rma shig/des smras pa/de bzhin du gyis shig/ji tsam nas skye
349a1('dul ba): //phyogs nas 'khrul 'khor m+b+ha rnam rgyu nan na nan spyan N+Da rmA rgyas da d+man /sgyus du/slob dpon khyod kyis mo lnga brgyupa 'dzin
349a2('dul ba): pa de lta bu'i sgyogs nus sam/des smras pa/'phags pa nus//des de la mu tig gi de sha~M l+le brgya stong rab byin zhing mI steng gi gla yang byin nas smras bya/gnas
349a3('dul ba): gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de'i drang zad kyi bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro'o steng der sgyogs ches shig/sgyogs 'phen pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag kyang 'khod du bcug/
349a4('dul ba): gnas gzhan zhig du nyis brgya lnga bcu 'khod du bcug nas bsgob/khyed cig gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma sgyogs kyis ma gsod na/khyod kyis sod cig/de'i don du gnas
349a5('dul ba): gzhan dang /de'i don du gnas gzhan du yang /mi rnams 'khod du btsug nas/thams cad la bsgo ba/khyed cag gang gi sgor dge slong go'u ta ma 'ongs dang /de dag gis
349a6('dul ba): sod cig/bdag nyid kyang phyogs gzhan zhig tu 'dug nas 'di rnams kyis shor dang /bdag nyid kyis bsado sdom//ji tsam na mi lnga brgyas skyugs 'phang bar brtsams te/
349a7('dul ba): smras pa/su'i phyir sgyogs 'phang /ci tsam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shod na bzhugs pa mthong nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag rang gi srog
349b1('dul ba): btang ba ni bla'o/lha dang mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa ni de lta ma yin gyis sgrogs dor ro zhes de rnams kyis sgyogs bor nas/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri
349b2('dul ba): la phan tshun du rgyu zhing gnas gang zhig gnas babs na/lhas sbyin gyis mi mthong bar 'gyur snyamo//de rnams kyis bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugasu chud nas/
349b3('dul ba): them skas shig sprul pa dang /de rnams kyis them skas de mthong nas/'di snyam du sems te/shes ldan dag them skas 'di sus btsugs snyam na/de ni bcom ldan 'dra/
349b4('dul ba): kyi mthus yin snyam nas de rnams lhag par yang bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par gyur te/them skas de las babs nus/bcom ldan 'das gang ni be der
349b5('dul ba): dong ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyang de dag gdul ba kho na la bltos nas/bya rgod phung po'i ri la 'chag cing bzhugaso//de nas de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis
349b6('dul ba): la mgo bos phyag byas te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir spyan snga na 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang rang bzhin mkhyen nas
349b7('dul ba): gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas/de rnams kyis 'jigs tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtha
350a1('dul ba): pa ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te/bden pa mthong ba dang /lan gsum du ched du brjod pas chedadu
350a2('dul ba): brjod pa/btsun pa bdag cag la phas ma bgyis mas ma logs/rgyal pos me lags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/sdug pas ma lags/rang gi skye ba dang /gnyen
350a3('dul ba): gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/dge sbyong dang /bram ze rnams kyis ma lags pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag
350a4('dul ba): la mdzad de/dmyal ba dang /yi dgas rnams nas ni rkang pa drangs/lha dang mi rnamasu ni rab tu bzhag/'khor ba'i mthar ni bgyis/khrag dang mtsho ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams
350a5('dul ba): rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo rnams ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgra rnams ni phye/thog ma dang tha ma'i dus nas bsags pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i
350a6('dul ba): ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bgyis te/btsun pa bdag cag ni 'phag so//mngon par 'phag so//
350a7('dul ba): bdag cag bcom ldan 'das dang chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyab su mchi lags kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag dge bsnyen du bdud du gsol/deng skan
350b1('dul ba): cad ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog dang yang bsngos te/skyabasu mchi bar mngon par dad lagaso zhes gsol nas/bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan snga nas bslab pa'i gzhi lnga rnams blang
350b2('dul ba): bar brtsam so//'khrul 'khor gyi skye rdul gyi slob dpon yang 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par bying pa yin no snyam du bsams nas/de rnams kyi phye
350b3('dul ba): bzhin them skas las byabs nas mu tig gi do shul brgya stong ri ba khyer te drosau//lhas sbyin ni rdo ba 'phen par dga' bas/yang dang yang du lta ba nam 'phangaso snyam nas//
350b4('dul ba): rang nyid kyis mi lnga brgya po gzhan khrid do/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'jog par brtsams pa no//mi lnga brgya po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na chos nyan par mthong ngo ///
350b5('dul ba): mthong nas kyang lhag par yang mi bzod pa skyes te/phyogs gzhan zhig nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'jig po dang /ji tsam na 'khrul 'khor gyi slob dpon yang dros par
350b6('dul ba): mthong nas de rang nyid kyis 'khor lnga brgya nga /sgyogs 'phang bar brtsam so//bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa/nga nyid kyis tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongs su sgyur ba/'od pa
350b7('dul ba): bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas/nga nyid kyis las byas shing bsagos pa dag/gzhan su zhig
351a1('dul ba): gis so sor myong bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs nas/myi lnga brgya po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//shes ldan dag lhas sbyin kun nus
351a2('dul ba): dkris pa drag po la gnas nas/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la 'jigs/deng shig/'di dag ni nga'i las yin no//de nas mi lnga brgya po de dag briso//lha rnams kyi shes
351a3('dul ba): ba mthong ba ni 'og tu 'jug pa yin pas/de nas gnod sbyin lag nu rdo rje 'di snyam du sems te/lha sbyin ni bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa'i phyir pha rol tu gnon pa byeda'o//
351a4('dul ba): snyam nas bsams nas/gnod sbyin kum bi ra gang na bo dor drong ste phyin pa dang //gnod sbyin gum bri ral 'di skad ces skyes//lhas sbyin ni bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la sgyogs kyis
351a5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das la rdo 'phen par rtsom la/bcom ldan 'das ni khyod kyis gnas na bzhugs pas 'di la kho bos 'bad do rdo ba bar snang la rdo rjes phye ma rlag na gal ton bye mar
351a6('dul ba): brlags pa'i dum bu bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du 'bab par 'gyur gyis/khyod kyis grogs gyis shig/des smras pa/bka' bzhin 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das ni bla gab
351a7('dul ba): med pa na bzhugs nas ri'i phug tu gsheg so//lhas sbyin 'khor lnga brgya pas sgyogs drangs te bcom ldan 'das la rdob 'phang so//gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje'i rdo rjes bye mar
351b1('dul ba): pa las de'i phyed bcom ldan 'das kyi gnasu lhung du cha ba gnod sbyin kum bi ras legs par ma zin pas des bsad nas/rdo ba'i dum bu yar ba zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
351b2('dul ba): la rma byung bar gyur to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigasu bcad pas bka' stsal pa/gang du gnas na las kyis mi rdzi ba'i//sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te//
351b3('dul ba): bar snang nyid min rgya mtsho'i nang min zhing //ri bo'i phug tu zhugs pa'ang ma yino//gnod sbyin kum bi ra yang /dge ba'i sems kyis shi ste shi nas/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha
351b4('dul ba): gya nim pa rnams kyi nang du skyeso//chos nyid kyis lha'i bu dang /lha'i bu mo ni skyes nas ring ba ma lon par/sems gsum skye bar 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang
351b5('dul ba): du skyes pa dang /las gang gis yin pa'o//des gnod sbyin las shi 'phos pa dang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gya nom pa rnams kyi nang du skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems
351b6('dul ba): mngon par dad par byas pas yin par mthong ste/de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed pa'i lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/zhag lon nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni/bdag
351b7('dul ba): gi cha ma yin gyis ma la bdag gis zhag ma lon par bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyam nas/de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu rna
352a1('dul ba): cha gdub 'khor dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs pa/do shal dang se mo dos lus brgyan nas/de nyid kyi mtshan mo lha rnams kyi me tog ud pa la dang /pad+ma
352a2('dul ba): dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man+da ra ba rnams kyis thu ba bkar ste/bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/bcom ldan
352a3('dul ba): 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug/bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsom pa dang bag la nyal dang /khams dang /rang
352a4('dul ba): bzhin thugasu chud nas gang thos pas 'phags pa'i bden po bzhi so sor rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu 'jig tshogs
352a5('dul ba): la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas te/bden pa mthong nas lan gsum du ched du brjod pas ched du brjod
352a6('dul ba): pa/btsun pa bdag la phas ma lags mas ma legs/rgyal pos ma lags/lha rnams kyis ma lags/sdug pas ma lags/rang gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis
352a7('dul ba): ma lags/sngon gyi 'das pa rnams kyis ma lags/dge sbyong dang bram zes ma lags pa gang lags pa/de bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la mdzad/khrag dang mchi ma'i
352b1('dul ba): rgya mtsho ni bskabs/rus pa'i ri bo dag las ni bsgral//ngan song rnams kyi sgo ni bkum/mtho ris dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/lha dang mi rnams su ni bdag rab tu bzhago/yang
352b2('dul ba): gsol pa/khyod mthus nyes pa mang ldan mi bzod pa'o//ngan song lam bkag bsod nams bzang po yi//mtho ris 'gro ba phye zhing bdag gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i lam
352b3('dul ba): yang thob par gyur//khyod la brtan nas shin tu rnam dag mig/nyes bral dag pa de ring bdag gis thob//go 'phang zhi ba'i 'phags pa dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i
352b4('dul ba): pha rol rgal lag so//'gro ba lha min lha dang mis mchod pa//skye dang rga dang na 'chi bral ba po//srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' ba//thub pa dang khyod mthong ba'i 'bras bu mchis//
352b5('dul ba): de nas do shal rab 'phyang dga' gyur pa//zhabs gnyis la ni mngon par phyag 'tshal nas//dag thul ba la g.yas nas bskor byas nas//lha yi 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha'
352b6('dul ba): la song //de nas sngon gnod sbyin byed byed pa'i lha'i bu tshong pa khe spogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /dpa' bo g.yul las rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa
352b7('dul ba): nad thams cad las yongasu thar pa lta bur/'byor pa gang gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis rang gi gnasu song ngo //dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod
353a1('dul ba): dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjesu brtson pas glanas pa na/de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngu na snang ba rgya chen po de mthang //
353a2('dul ba): mthong nas the tshom zos te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang gsum bcom ldan 'das la blta bo'i skedu mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs
353a3('dul ba): pa 'am lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag nga blta ba'i phyir
353a4('dul ba): 'ongs pa ni/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/de lta mod kyi lho sbyin
353a5('dul ba): bsad pa'i phyir 'bad pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri lA sgyogs kyi rdo 'phangs pa gang yin pa de bar snang nyid la gnod sbyin lag ni rdo rjes phye mar byas pa de'i phyed nga'i steng du lhung ba
353a6('dul ba): gnod sbyin kum bi ras bzung nyes pas de des bsad//nga la sems mngon par dad nas/shi bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha gyo nom po rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te//
353a7('dul ba): de ma dang gsum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas/ngas de la chos bshad/bden pa mthong bar byas nas/rang gi gnasu song ba yin no//dge slong dag de lta bas no/las gcig
353b1('dul ba): tu gnas pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi ni gcig tu dkar ba yin la/'dren ma rnams kyi ni 'dren ma yin pas/dge
353b2('dul ba): slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren ma rnams ni spangs la/las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab
353b3('dul ba): par bya'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa gnod sbyin ku mi bai ras bcom ldan 'das
353b4('dul ba): kyi slad du bdag nyid yong su btang ba la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'dis
353b5('dul ba): nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongasu btang ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA ra na se na rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs
353b6('dul ba): pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug/de'i tshe grong khyer bA ra na se dang ha cang yang ma ring po zhig na yod pa'i bis+t+ra gnas rtsa ba dang /me tog dang 'bras
353b7('dul ba): bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig na/drang srong dka'o thub drag po sprod 'a chu dang rtsa ba dang /'bras bu la longs spyod pa/lpags pa dang shing shun
354a1('dul ba): gyon pa zhig gnas//de'i baspyi gnas kyi nye 'khor na ston pa zhig ri dgas bsad cing 'tsho bar byed de/de dus dus su drang srong de'i gan du 'ong ngo //
354a2('dul ba): drang srong des kyang de la ci nas kyang ston pa 'dis bdag gi nye 'khor na gnas pa'i ri dgas rnams gsod par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir de dal sos nas rtsu ba dang /'bras bu
354a3('dul ba): stobs par byed pas/de gnyis cig la gcig pa dang /bu'i 'du shes skyes par gyur te/rngon pas ni drang srong la pa zhes tshig tu 'dodado//drang srong gris kyang rngon pa la
354a4('dul ba): buMbu zhes 'bod//dzI tsamA na dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po tshangs sbyin nang par sbyar langs te/ri dgas shor du phyir byung ba des/ri dgas shig la mangs shi bsor du bstan par
354a5('dul ba): dang /drang srong de'i bsti gnasu zhugaso//der yang rgyal pos lcags mnges gnang du bsnun pas shi bar gyur te//de nas drang srong de khro ba'i kun nas dkris pas smras pa//
354a6('dul ba): rgyal po khyod ni phung grol spyod pa den pa zhig ste/des na ri dgas dA la sgrubasu 'ongs pa bsad zhes de skad ces smras pa dang /rgyal po zhe sdang gis kun nas dkris pa la zhen
354a7('dul ba): pa'i blos blun pa rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba la kha ches zer ba gang yin po de la chad pe cis bcad/blon po rnams kyis
354b1('dul ba): smras pa/lha chang pa dgu ma lags mod/rgyal bas smras pa/gal te de ltar drang srong 'dri ngas yongasu spang so//dron po rnams kyis drang srong gsad par brtsams pa na stes dbang gis
354b2('dul ba): dzin pa de yang drang srong de'i nye 'khor na 'dug nas/des dasams pas/bdag gson bzhin du drang srong ci'i phyir gsod du gzhug snyam nas des g.yul 'gyed par brnams pa na
354b3('dul ba): drang sprong de bros nas/dpung chen po'i tshigs kyis de bsladado//bcom ldan 'das kyis bklu'e'i sprul pa/dge slong drug ji snyamA du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin
354b4('dul ba): ba de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rngon pa gang yin pa de ni gnod sbyin kum par 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dis nga'i phyir bdag nyid yongasu btang //de ltar yang 'dis
354b5('dul ba): dra'i phyir bdag nyid yongasu btangango //bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs rdo ba'i dum bus rma byung ba khrag chad du ma btub nas de'i bzhin du 'dzag/sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed bac+doMs
354b6('dul ba): kyi skyon brtag pa'i phyir dus gsum du spyan sngar 'gro'o//rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye ba'i tshogs dang pa can dang /yul sna tshogs nas lhags pa'i yang dag paji lta ba dang
354b7('dul ba): ldan pa nor can dang /tshong dpon dang /ded dadon rnams kyang 'dzes te/de ni kha cig gis smras pa/'tsho byed rgyun 'di ni de la ri ngo //gzhan dag gis smras pa/'di ni de bas
355a1('dul ba): kyang bzung ngo //sman pa'i rgyal po 'cha byed kyis smras bya/'di la mod la gdangs par 'gyur ba'i sman yid phyed kyi ni rnyed par //2/tshe dang ldan pa
355a2('dul ba): kun dga' bos smras pa/'tsho byed de ci yin/des smras pa/tsan dan sa mchog yin no//de'i tshe can dan sa mchog rnyed pa nyid mdo//ji tsam no tshong dpon zhig yod pas
355a3('dul ba): 'di ltar bdag gis tsan dan sa mchog dus dus su btsongs pas/rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di ni gtum pa brlang pa gzu lums can yin pas/gal te ma stes te de la/
355a4('dul ba): tsan+da naMs mchog dgos par gyur la/de ma snyed na gdon mi za bar mgo gcod par yang 'gyur ro snyam nas can dan sa mchog bskyis te bzhag pa zhig yod do//des smran
355a5('dul ba): pa'i rgyal po 'tsho byed kyis ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi snyun la ni tsan ngan sa mchog gis gdangs par 'gyur ro//zhes bstan pa this nas des bsams pa/ma skyes dgra 'di
355a6('dul ba): lhas sbyin gyis spong bas/bcom ldan 'das la zhe'i gras pa'i blo yod do//gal te bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan sa mchog phul na/bdag la gnod
355a7('dul ba): ba byed pa'i gnas gang yin pa de yod snyamo//yang bsams pa/bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mis mchod pa gang yin pas gal te de'i don du srog dang phral na yang phral
355b1('dul ba): du zad/ma la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la can dan nas mchog dbulo snyam nas/de nas tsan dran sa mchog khyer te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas zhabs la ga tu/
355b2('dul ba): te gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la tsAn sa mchog gis bgyi ba mchis par glo bar chud na/bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse bar dgongs te 'di
355b3('dul ba): bzhesu gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo bdag nyid chen po 'di nyid las can sa mchog long shig/tshe dang
355b4('dul ba): ldan pa kun dga' bos blangaso//de nas tshong pa de dga' ba dang /mgu ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
355b5('dul ba): snga nas song ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nas 'od zer sngon
355b6('dul ba): po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod kha dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/kha cig ni steng du 'gro/gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba dag ni sems can dmyal
355b7('dul ba): pa yang sos dang /thig nag dang /bsdus 'joms dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu che ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur
356a1('dul ba): rdul pacan dang /sa rnams rnam sa dang/tsu rlu dang /a nu dang /ud pal ltar dgus pa dang /d+ma lta gas pa dang /t+pawA
356a2('dul ba): gas pa chen por song ste/sems can dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni bsil bar gyur te/'bab par byed la/sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag
356a3('dul ba): tu ni dro bar gyur te/'bab par byedado//des sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyan gcod par byed cing /de dag 'di snyam du/shes ldan dag ci bdag
356a4('dul ba): cag 'di nas shi 'phos sam gal te gzhan du skyes snyam du semaso//de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/de dag
356a5('dul ba): gis sprul pa mthong nas/'di snyam du sems te//shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phes pa yang ma yin le gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/'di ltar
356a6('dul ba): sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyamo//de dang /sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur
356a7('dul ba): nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur par 'gyur ba'i lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams
356b1('dul ba): sbyor ba len par byed do//gang dag sted du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen can sa dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dpa' ldan dang /'phrul dka' dang /gzhan 'phrul
356b2('dul ba): dobang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dge dang /dge rgyas
356b3('dul ba): dang sprin med dang /bsod nams 'phel dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang ba dang /shin tu mthong ba dang /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi nang
356b4('dul ba): du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshig su bcad pa gnyis po//brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//
356b5('dul ba): sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod par//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur/
356b6('dul ba): ba' skyo ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur//zhes bya ba yang sgrogaso//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
356b7('dul ba): khams byul nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du 'gro ste/de la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das
357a1('dul ba): lags //mdzem pa ston par nanano//dun ga na pa rmA mas can ma u su ldan pa /
357a2('dul ba): nu/sa ra byu/du //8 m+bu na ra shed ni ni sh+tsam+WA /ngas skye na pa na ni/
357a3('dul ba): nga dru par 'gyur/m-i ri skye bar sbyin par bad na na//thus mir nub par 'gyur/sa chos 'khor mi sbyar ba'i rmyil skyod lung ston par byed na na/
357a4('dul ba): pa'i mi ladu bar 'gyur/'khor gyur sa skyed 'du stun par ban+de nan+ti/ga g.yas pa'i mtho la du par gyur/lhur ste ra rje na
357a5('dul ba): ni da ni/lci ba'i rung par gyur/na oMchub tu lung ljon par 'a na pa byar 'gyur/ra sa rgya suM spangs ni par bzhud na ni//mdzad
357a6('dul ba): par 'byung /dz+nyAn med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chu ts+tsha sbyin par bzhid na no//gtsug tor du hU~M ra 'gyuraro//donas 'dir dag gis/
357a7('dul ba): da'i pa lan gisum bskor ba byas nas/mdza sbyar chu par gyur to//de nas cha dang ldan pa kun dga' ba thil mo sbyar hU~M/bcom ldan 'das mi zhus pa/
357b1('dul ba): tshogs stong gis bkra ba yi//tshogs rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa//ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//yang tshig su
357b2('dul ba): bcad gsol pa/rgod bral zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal ba dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par//rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum
357b3('dul ba): ston mi mdzad//de slad brtan pa nyid blos dus mkhyen nas//rgyal ba'i dbang po thub pa skyes kyi mchog/nyan par 'tshal ba nyan pa po rnams kyi//the tshom skyes pa gsung tshig bstan
357b4('dul ba): pa dang //dam pa bzang po dag gi gsal du gsol//tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum mi ston//bstan pa ji skad 'dzum pa ston
357b5('dul ba): mdzad pa//skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal//kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/de de bzhi no//de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni
357b6('dul ba): rgyu med rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mjed/kun dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la chong pas sems mngon par dad par byas nas tsan dan sa mchog phul ba gang yin pa de
357b7('dul ba): mthong ngom/btsun pa mthong lag so//kun dga' bo tshang pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang sbyin pa'i chos yongasu ba tang ba des/rang sangs rgyas can dan zhes bya ba
358a1('dul ba): 'gyur ro//de'i sbyin pa'i chos ni 'di yin te/nga la sems dad par byas pa gang yin pa'o//'on kyang khrag de chad du ma btub nas/de bzhin du 'jug
358a2('dul ba): 'tsho byed kyis smras pa/da ni bud med gzhon+da'i 'oms gdab 'tshu lo//dge slong rnams kyis bud med gzhonu ci 'dra ba zhig ma shes nas/des smras pa/bu thon bu btsas pa
358a3('dul ba): gang yin pa de ni bu med gzhon nur 'dod do//de'i 'o ma gang yin pa de ni bud med gzho nu'i 'o ma zhes bgyi'o//tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ltas sbyin dang /lhas sbyin
358a4('dul ba): gyi phyogs ma gtogs par 'khor bzhi po//dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dag bsnyen ma dang /rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs pal cher la
358a5('dul ba): yang bsgo nas thams cad kyis bud med gzho nu'i 'o ma btsal bar brtsam so//'khor bzhi po dang /skye bo'i tshogs rnams tshol ba na de rnams kyis thabs yod kyis gegs
358a6('dul ba): byed//ji tsam na rgyal po'i khab na bu thon bu bcas pa'i bud med gzho nu'o ma nyung ste nga gi bu lnga'om mi ngos na gzhan la sbyin tu lta ga la yod pa zhig 'dug pa des/ji ltar bcom ldan
358a7('dul ba): 'das la bud med gzho nu'i 'o ma'i dgos pa byung ba thos nas des bsams pa/gal te phul na ni bdag gis bu nyam chungs pas 'o ma med na 'chi bar 'gyur la nyes dam Da
358b1('dul ba): 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi gzhan 'di yang yod de lhas sbyin bcom ldan 'das la yun ring po nas/phyir rgol ba dgrar gyur pa yin te/des spad pa ni rgyal po ma skyes dang /yin//
358b2('dul ba): lha sbyin gyi phyogs ko ka li ka dang /khan da drab bya dang ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mchos byin yin pas/'di dag gis gdon mi za bar bsad par 'gyu ro snyamo//yang bsam
358b3('dul ba): pa/bdag bsad pa dang /bu dang /bral ba ni bla'i/lha dang mis ma chad pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das snyun gyis 'o brgyal ba'i tshor ba sku nyam su btar nas/de nas rgyal
358b4('dul ba): bo'i khyab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs thams cad 'khrugs par gyur pa ni lha ma yin gyis/me la bdag gis 'o ma khyer la 'gro'o snyam ste de bcom ldan 'das la soms
358b5('dul ba): shin tu dad par byas nas snod sar par 'o ma bzhos te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song nas/phyin pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas
358b6('dul ba): te/'di skad nas gsol to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'tsho byed kyis bud med gzhonu'i 'o ma bstan par bdag gis 'tshal na/bdag rje su bzung ba'i slad du bud
358b7('dul ba): gzho nu'i 'o ma 'di bzhe su gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo bsam pa bzang po can gyi bu mo 'di las
359a1('dul ba): 'o ma long shig/des blangs pa dang /des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas sang
359a2('dul ba): de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzod//chos nyid kyis gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe zhal nus 'od zer sngon po dang /seng
359a3('dul ba): po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dag byung nas/kha cig ni 'og tu 'gro/kha cig ni steng du 'gro la/gang dag 'og tu 'gro ba de dag ni sems can dmyal ba yang sos
359a4('dul ba): dang /thig nag dang /bsdus gzhom dang /ngu 'bod dang /ngu 'bod chen po dang /tsha ba dang /rab tu tsha ba dang /mnar med pa dang /chu bur can dang /chu bur rdol dang /
359a5('dul ba): so thams thams dang kyi hud zer ba dang /a chu zer ba dang /ud pa la ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa dang /pad+ma ltar gas pa chen por song ste/sems can
359a6('dul ba): dmyal ba tsha ba gang yin pa de dag tu bsil bar gyur te/'bab par byed la/sems can dmyal ba grang ba gang yin pa de dag tu ni dro bar gyur te 'bab par byed//des
359a7('dul ba): sems can dmyal ba de dag gi gnod pa'i bye brag dag rgyun gcod par byed cing /de dag 'di snyam du shes ldan dag ci bdag cag 'di nas sho 'phos sam/'on te gang+gA
359b1('dul ba): du skyes snyam du semaso//de dag dad pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis sprul pa gtong bar mdzad de/de dag gis sprul pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems te/shes/
359b2('dul ba): ldan dag bdag cag 'di nas shi 'phos po yang ma yin lo gzhan du skyes pa yang ma yin te/'di ltar sems can sngon ma mthong ba 'di'i mthus bdag cag gis gnod pa'i
359b3('dul ba): bye brag dag rgyun chad par gyur to snyamo//de dag sprul pa la sems mngon par dad par gyur nas/sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de zad par byas nas/
359b4('dul ba): gang du bden pa dag gi snod du gyur pa'i lha dang /mi rnams kyi nang du nying mtshams sbyor ba len par byed do////'dul ba gzhi////bam po brgya
359b5('dul ba): gsum pa//gang dag steng du 'gro ba de dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang /sum cu rtsa gsum dang /'thab bral dang /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang /gzhan
359b6('dul ba): dbang byed dang /tshangs ris dang /tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /tshangs chen dang /'od chung dang /tshad med 'od dang /'od gsal dang /dge chung dang /tshad med dag/
359b7('dul ba): dang /dge rgyas dang /sprin med dang /bsod nams 'phel dang /'bras bu che ba dang /mi che ba dang /mi gdung ba dang /gya nom snang dang /shin tu mthong dang /'og min
360a1('dul ba): gyi lha rnams kyi nang du song nas/mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med pa zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs par byed cing tshig su
360a2('dul ba): bcad pa gnyis po//brtsams par bya zhing 'byung bar bya//sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya//'dam bu'i khyim la glang chen bzhin//'chi bdag sde ni gzhom
360a3('dul ba): par bya//gang zhig rab tu bag yod byor//chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba//skye ba'i 'khor bar rab spangs nas//sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/zhes
360a4('dul ba): bya ba yang sgrogs par byed//de nas 'od zer de dag gis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byul nas/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi rjes bzhon du song
360a5('dul ba): stede la gal te bcom ldan 'das 'das pa'i las lung ston par bzhed na ni/bcom ldan 'das kyi snyam logasu nub par 'gyur ro//ma 'ongs pa'i las lung
360a6('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni/mdun logasu nub pa 'gyur/sems can dmyal bar skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthil du nub par 'gyur/dud 'gror
360a7('dul ba): skye bar lung ston par bzhed na ni/rtid par nub par 'gyur/yi dge su skye b.ro lung ston par bzhed na ni/zhabs kyi mthe bor nub par 'gyur/mir skye bar yang
360b1('dul ba): ston par bzhed na ni/pus mor nub par 'gyur//stobs kyi 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed na ni/phyag mthil g.yon par nub par 'gyur/'khor/
360b2('dul ba): l-i sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lung ston par bzhed ni ni/phyag mthil g.yas par nub par 'gyur/lhor skye bar lung sbyin par bzhed na ni/lte bar nub par 'gyur/nyan thos kyi
360b3('dul ba): byang chub tu lung sten par bzhed na ni/zhal du nub par 'gyur/rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni/mdzod spur nub par 'gyur/bla na med pa yang dag
360b4('dul ba): par rdzogs par byang chub tu lung ston par bzhed na ni gtsug tor du nub par 'gyur/de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas
360b5('dul ba): bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nu'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te zhus pa/kha dog sna tshogs stong gis bkra ba yau//
360b6('dul ba): rnams zhal gyi sgo nas byung gyur pa//ji ltar gdugs ni shar bar gyur pa bzhin//de yis phyogs rnams kun tu snang bar bgyis//yang tshig su bcad gsol bya/rgod
360b7('dul ba): brel zhum dang rgyags pa spangs pa yi//sangs rgyas 'gro nang mchog gi rgyur gyur pa//rgyal po dgra thul byed rgyu ma mchis par//rtsa lag dung ltar dkar 'dzum ston mi ma
361a1('dul ba): de skad brtan pa nyid thos dus mkhyen nas//rgyulta ba'i dbang po sgrub pa smras kyi mchod//nyan par 'tshul ba nyan pa po rnams kyi//the tshom
361a2('dul ba): skyes pa gsung tshig brtan pa dang //dam pa bzang po dag gis gsal du gsol//tsha chu ri rgyal lta bur brtan pa'i mchog/rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams glo bur 'dzum
361a3('dul ba): mau stan//brtan pa ji skad 'dzum pa ston mdzad pa//skye bo phal chen 'di dag de nyan 'tshal//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bi khyod kyis
361a4('dul ba): nga la bud med kyis sems mngon par dad par byas te/bud med gzho nu'i 'o ma phul ba gang yin pa de mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lags//kun dga' bo bu mo
361a5('dul ba): de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /sems bskyed pa dang //sbyin pa'i chos yongasu bting ba des/rang sangs rgyas 'o mu sbyin pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/de'i sbyin pa'i rjes ni'ong
361a6('dul ba): yin te/nga la sems mngon par dod pa gang yin pa'o//'on kyang khrag du chad du ma btub nas//de bzhin du 'dzag/yum sna tshogs na gnas pa'i dge slong rnams
361a7('dul ba): dang gzhan yang bram ze dang /khyim bdag dang pa can mang pos/bcom ldan 'das de ltar thugs mi bde'o zhes thos te lhags nas/de na kha cig ni sman dag
361b1('dul ba): 'debs par byed do//kha tsaka ni sngags kyi dpyad byed do//tshe dang ldan pa 'od spyang stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol byar bzlums pa/bcom ldan khyod kyi thugs la ni/
361b2('dul ba): sras dang dgro bomatshungs shes ni//bden po'i tshig ni 'di yis//rma yi 'jig pa 'chad par shog/bden pa gsol zin pa'i mod kho nar khrag de mi 'jog par gyur
361b3('dul ba): dang /lha sbyin dang ma skyes dgra dang /ko ka li ka dang /khan da dang byA dang /ka ta mo rak+Sha tI sh+yA dang /rgya mtshos sbyin rnams ma gtogs par/dge slong dang /dge sbyong
361b4('dul ba): ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma rnams dang /rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs phal cher thos rab tu dga' bar gyur te//bcom ldan 'das
361b5('dul ba): mkhyen bzhin du gang zhig ji ltar dpyad byed pa de mde bzhin du rna su dgyes par mdzad de rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/
361b6('dul ba): thams cad gtsang ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung stobs bcu ldan gyis bden pa gsol pas/bcom ldan 'das kyi
361b7('dul ba): khrag 'dzag pa chad par gyur pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zade ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang
362a1('dul ba): da dug 'bags nas kun tu 'khrugs par gyur pa na 'dis dug zhi bar byas pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor dang ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig
362a2('dul ba): nA/bskyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang /sdong bu dang /me tog dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod de/de na drang srong chu dang /rtsa ba dang 'bras bu
362a3('dul ba): longs spyod pa lpags pa dang /shang shun gyon pa rig sngags dang /gsang sngags 'chang ba zhig gnaso//ri'o de na khyim bdag cig gnas pa des rigs mnyam
362a4('dul ba): pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed/de rtse bar byed dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed
362a5('dul ba): pa las/dus gzhan zhig nA chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to//dri zla ba brgyad dum dgu lon pa dang /khye'u zhig btsas te/nyi ma bdun bsu ma nyi shu rtsa
362a6('dul ba): gcig tu de'i bcos ston rgya cher byas te ming btags nas/de bskyed bsgyings te chen por gyur to//de 'chag pa 'am 'greng ba 'am/'dug pa 'am/nyal ba
362a7('dul ba): na yang dge ba sems shing dge ba'i las byed pas de skye bo'i tshogs kyis chos 'dod ces bya bar ming brtag so//de dge ba ci yin zhes tshol ba'i phyir ni ri 'or nas
362b1('dul ba): dus dus su drang srong de'i drung du 'gro zhing de la bsnyen bkur byed//dka' thub kyis drung du 'gro bas dka' thub ldan dka' thub ldan zhes byar yang grags//de dus gzhan zhig na ru
362b2('dul ba): shig gis 'bigs pa langs nas/de la dug sman du mo dang sngags kyi sbyor bas dpyad byas na yang de'i nad de zhi bar ma gyur nas/de'i pa dang ma gnyis drang srong de'i drung du song
362b3('dul ba): ste/drang srong chen po khyod kyi rim gro bgyid pa ni dug gis 'bags nas srog dang bral lo thug gis/dpyad mdzod cig/des bden pa gsol bar brtsams te/bu cig khyod
362b4('dul ba): kyi sems la nI//dgra dang mdza' bo mtshungs shesta na//bden pa'i tshig ni 'di yi su//khye'u khyod du bla ni med par shog/des bden pa gsol ma thag kho nar dug zhi bar gyur to//
362b5('dul ba): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khye'u gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin//drang srong gang yin pa de ni 'od srung stobs bcu ldan pa 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'das
362b6('dul ba): bden pa gsol bas nga sos par byas//da ltar yang 'di'i bden pa gsol bas du sos par byas//stu sbyin sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba dang /'gyod pas sems pa/
362b7('dul ba): bdag gis dge sbyong go'u ta ma la rdo 'phangs pa ni don med pa zhig byas te/dge sbyong go'u ta ma yang ma sod lo/skye bo mang pos kyang rab tu shes par gyur to snyam nas/de shing
363a1('dul ba): drung zhig tu song ste/sems khongasu chud cing skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug/dge slong rnams gnas pa dang rnamasu btsun pa dag gzigs shig/lhas
363a2('dul ba): sbyin 'di 'dra bar zhe gdug ste/gang gi phyir/bcom ldan 'das rab tu byung ba de la yang pha rol gnon pas steng du rdo 'phe no zhes smod par byed/gzhog 'byas byed/kha zer
363a3('dul ba): bopor byed pa dang /ko ka lA ka dang /khan do drab bya dang /ka ta mo ra ka ti sh+ya dang /rgya mtshos sbyin rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag ma brtags par byung rgyal du ci rdol
363a4('dul ba): lhas sbyin shing che ba mo zhes bya ba'i drung na bsams tan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs pa ma mthong ngam/bdag nyid chen po de de lta bu byed par ga la 'gyur/dge slong
363a5('dul ba): rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa ko ka li ka dang /kha na da dra ba bya dang /kA ta mo ra ka ti
363a6('dul ba): sh+ya dang /rgya mo tshos sbyin rnams bdag nyid ngo tsha ma mchis pas lhas sbyin ngo tsha ma mchis pa'i sngags pa sgrogs pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
363a7('dul ba): stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad ji ltar 'das na yang ngo tsha med pa'i sngags pa smra ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba rgyal po'i khab kyi
363b1('dul ba): marnams dang rgyal pos dgos pa 'ga' zhig myur tham su bcas pa/dur khyod gnyis bshams la/TIg tu ni smras pa rnams dor bar bya'o//ts+tshig+hat+pa na sna myed nam nan
363b2('dul ba): ban so//ji tsam dus gzhan zhib na/ma ning zhig shi nas/de dur khrod gcig tu yang glunas skabs ma rnyed cing gnyis par yang ma rnyed//rgyal po'i khab kyi phyogs shig na
363b3('dul ba): bskyed mos tshal rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang /me tog phun sum tshogs pa bya sna tshogs skad 'byin pa zhig yod do//de na drang srong spyi cher chu dang rtsu ba dang /'bras bu la longs spyod pa/
363b4('dul ba): lcogs pa dang /shing shun gyon pa zhig gnaso//phyogs de na yang zhing gru gsum zhig la shing e ran du zhig skyes nas mnong gi r-i daM/de bor ro//ro de'i dri tshar nas wa zhig
363b5('dul ba): 'ongs te/des me ning gi ro de bza' bar brtsamaso//bya rog cig kyang e ran da'i kha na tshang bcus te 'dug/de'i blo skye ba/lnga la bsngags pa/smra ba dang /gal te nA zos pa'i
363b6('dul ba): lhag ma ste ro snyam nas/des de la tshig su bcad de bsngags pa smra bar brtsams pa/ji ltar khyod ni seng ge'i mgrin pa dang /ji ltar khyu mchog ga shul dang ldan pa yi//rid
363b7('dul ba): rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal na//gsol ba'i pham phebs las ni thugs dpag mdzod//was bltas te slar tshigasu bcadade smras pa/bya yi rab mchog 'a khra 'gro ba
364a1('dul ba): phyogs kun gsal bar mdzad nas ni//rin chen snam ltar mdzes gyur pa//shing mchog rtse la bzhugs 'di gang //bya rog gis smras pa/
364a2('dul ba): skal ldan chen po lta ba'i phyir//khyed kyi drung du bdag mchis te//ri dgas rgyal khyod phyag 'tshal na//gsol ba'i pham pa sa thugs dpag mdzod//was smras pa
364a3('dul ba): rma bya'i mgrin pa lta bu yi//pho rog lta na sdug pa khyod//kun dga' byed pa rnams kyi gtse//ci bder gsol gyis mar spyon cig/de babs nas wa dang lhan cig ma
364a4('dul ba): ning gi ro la za bar byed pa/drang skyong gis mthong nas ngos tshigasu bcad smos pa/ljon shing tha cad grib ma la//ngo tsha med par 'dus na su//tha cad rol longs spyod pa//
364a5('dul ba): e ma'o ring zhig lon nas mthong //bya rog gis thos nas/de ma bzod nas tshig su bcad smras pa/'di ltar seng ge rma bya dag/dam pa'i sha la longs spyod no//
364a6('dul ba): gzhan gyis byin pas 'tsho ba yi/spyi cher 'dir ni ci zhig gtogs//drang srong de yang mi bzod pa skyes nas tshig su bci de smras pa/mdab chags tha tsad bya rog
364a7('dul ba): dang rkang pa ni tha cad wa dang ni//ljon shing tha cad e ran nga //mi yi tha cad ma ning ngo ro//zhing gi tho cad gru gsum ste//ngo tsha med rnams 'dus la ltos//de nas
364b1('dul ba): byi gau lhag par yu ma bad pa skyes nas drang skyong gA mo khang bu zhub pA ta sgrub rnams pa las/tsa yang mau snang na snga ral ba sgyu blugs gtsug ste nas//ji tsaman dang drang ma khang /
364b2('dul ba): du zhugs na/ril du chag pa mthong nas/nges bsams po/'di ni byi dog gdug pa de'i las kyis ljags kyi gnan na su yang ma yin snyam du rig nas/tshig su brgyad
364b3('dul ba): smras pa/su la 'di 'dra'ang mi smra ste//ngo tsha med pa'i gdug sems kyis//mi khang ma rung byas pa ni//ril ba yang ni bcag par gyur//sngags 'os smad par 'os
364b4('dul ba): deng rung //yong ye cung zang sku mi gyi//blo gros ldan pas rtagri tu ni//kha rog pas ni bde ba thob//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi drang srong gang yin pa
364b5('dul ba): de ni de nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lce gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya rog ni ko ka li ka yin te/de na yang ngo tsha med pa de dag gis ngo tsha med
364b6('dul ba): pa'i bsngags pa brjod do//da ltar yang ngo tsha med pa 'di dag ngo tsha med pa'i bsngags par brjod do//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs
364b7('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dang /lhas sbyin thog mar gang du mi mthun par gyur lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge
365a1('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba shang shung twe'u gnyis lus cig tu gyur nas rgya mtsho'i 'gram na gnas te/chos can dang /chos ma yin pa zhes bya'o//ji tsam
365a2('dul ba): na chos ma yin pa ni gnyid log/chos can mel tshe byed pa dang /des bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu zhig chus khyer ba mthong nas/des de blangs te bsams pa/ci re zhig 'di
365a3('dul ba): yang bslang ngam/'on te bza' snya mo//yang bsams pa/ci zos kyang lus 'di go cig kho nas gso bar zad snyam nas/des de ma spang ba dang /rang nyid zos te/de
365a4('dul ba): sad pa na/chos can la bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i sgregs pa byung ba chos ma yin pas tshor nus des smras pa de gang gi skegs pa yin/des smras pa/bdud rtsi'i 'bras
365a5('dul ba): bu'i de gang nas rnyed/des smras pa/khyod gnyid log pa na/kho bos bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu rnyed nas lus cig kho na gso bar zadado//snyam nas khyod ma bslang par kho bos
365a6('dul ba): zos//des smras pa/khyod kyi sde ma logs pa zhig byas te/ngas kyang dus shes par bya'o//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/chos can gnyid log nas chos ma yin
365a7('dul ba): ba mel tse byed pa na//des dug gi 'bras bu chus khyer ba zhig mthong nas/des de zos pa dang /de gnyi ka brgyal bar gyur to//chos ma yin pa dug gi 'bras bu
365b1('dul ba): kun nas 'khrugs pas smras pa/gang dang gung du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang /de dag tu khyod la gsod pa dang /phyir rgol ba dang /dgu bor gyur cig/rnaMs can gyis smras pa/
365b2('dul ba): bdag kyang gang dang gang du skyes pa'i tshe rabs de dang de dog tu khyod la byams pa bsgrub par gyur cig ces byaso//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag ji snyam du
365b3('dul ba): sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos can gang yin pa de na nga nyid yino//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chos ma yin pa gang yin pa de na lha sbyin yin te/der thog mar de dang mi mthun par
365b4('dul ba): gyur to//ngas kyang de la byams pa'i thugs bzhug/gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas pa dang /ngas kyang 'di la byams par bsams pa de nyon cig/dge
365b5('dul ba): slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer ba ra na si nA rgyal po sku rtsi ldan zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang /mi mang pos rab tu gad ba na/rgyal
365b6('dul ba): srid byed du 'jug/des yul gzhan gyi rgyal po'i bu mo zhig blangs nas/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//de rtse bar byung //
365b7('dul ba): dge' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/bu mo de dus gzhan zhig na sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyad dam dgu lon po'i nyi ma rtson/khyo'u
366a1('dul ba): gzugs bzang po mdzes pa blta na sdug pa zhig btsas te/de btsas pa'i btsas ston rgya cher byas nas/khye'u'i ming cir gdags shes ma
366a2('dul ba): bar byedado//blon po rnams kyis smras pa/lha khye'u 'di gdugs kyi rtse na btsas pas de'i slad du khye'u'i ming nyi mo'i mu khyud ces bgyi bar bdag so//zhes de'i ming
366a3('dul ba): ma'i mu khyud ces bya bar btags nas khye'u nyi ma'i mu khyud ma ma brgyad po bang na 'tsho ba'i ma ma gnyis dang /nu ma snun pa'i ma ma gnyis dang /dri ma 'phyi ba'i ma gnyi/
366a4('dul ba): dang /rgyud grogs kyi ma mo gnyis la rje su gratade/de ma ma brgyad po drag gis 'o ma dang /zho dang /mar dang /zhun mar dang /mar gyi snying khu dang /gzha
366a5('dul ba): yang yo byad kyi bye brag gtso bo gtso bo dag gis sring bar byed skyed par byed cing rdzing na gnas pa'i pad+ma bzhin du myur du skye bar byed//de gang gi tshe chen por gyur pa de'i tshe/
366a6('dul ba): yi ge dang /grangs dang /rtsis dang /lag rtsis la nye bar zhugs shing /rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo na sa dbang bskur ba yul dang /dbang phyug dang /mthu thob
366a7('dul ba): pa sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par zil gyis mnan nas/gnas pa rnams kyis/gzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas tha dad par gyur pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste
366b1('dul ba): glang bro che'i gnyar zhon pa dang /rtu la zhon pa dang /shing rta'i thabs dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /'phong dang /phyir bsnur ba dang /mdun du bsdu ba dang /lcags kyus sbyar
366b2('dul ba): thabs dang /mna' che 'phen pa dang //zhags pa gdab pa dang /gcad pa dang /dral ba dang /dbug pa dang /'dzin stangs dang /gom sbyangs dang /thor tshugs dang /
366b3('dul ba): rgyang nas phog pa dang /sgra grags par phog pa dang /gnad du phog pa dang /mi 'tshorare bar phog pa dang /tshabs cher phog pa ste/bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas lnga po
366b4('dul ba): de dag la yang byang bar gyur nas/phas de rgyal tshab tu bcug/rgyal po sra rtsi ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa ni chos ldan zhes bya'o//blon po'i mchog ni phyugs 'dug ces bya
366b5('dul ba): ste/de la rgyal po lhag par snying 'jog/ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na/rgyal po sra rtsi ldan/chos ldan ma dang /lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur/
366b6('dul ba): spyod par byed do//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod pa la so chos ldan ma sems can dang ldan par gyur to//de mtshan mkhan rnams kyis khye'u zhig bac+doM/
366b7('dul ba): par gyur to/des rgyal po srog dang phral nas/rang nyid cod pan bcings te/rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur ro//zhes lung bstan to//ji tsam na rgyal
367a1('dul ba): posra rtsi ldan nad kyis thebs par gyur nas/de lnga rtsa ba dang sdong bu dang /mdab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu'i sman rnams kyis bsnyen
367a2('dul ba): bkur byas kyang de'i nad de zhi bar me gyur te/des lus kyi gnas skabs rig par byas nas/des bsams pa/bdag 'das nas/nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal por
367a3('dul ba): 'gyur te/des gdon mi za bar chos ldan ma bsad par 'gyur bas 'dir ye ji ltar bya ba'i dus la bab/yang bsams pa/blon po phyugs 'dug 'di la
367a4('dul ba): bdag gis longs spyod bzang po dag bgo bsha' byas shing spyan ras gyis bcas pa yin gyi 'di la chos ldan ma gtado snyam nas/des phyugs 'dug bkug ste bsgo
367a5('dul ba): ba/de'i btsun mo dam pa ni chos ldan ma yin la/blon pa mchog ni khyod yin te/nga lus kyi gnas skabs shes nas/gdon mi za bar nga sreg dang 'bral bar
367a6('dul ba): 'gyur gyi/khyod kyis nga la sdug par sems na/nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis chos ldan ma ji ltar yang srog dang phral bar mi 'gyur ba/de ltar gyis shig/des smras pa/
367a7('dul ba): lha de tsam yang rngo mi thog gam//lha thugs las chu ngur mdzod cig dang /de ltar mi bkum pa de ltar bgyi'o//bsags pa kun gyi mtha' zad cing //mthon po
367b1('dul ba): rnams kyi mtha' ltung 'gyur//phrad pa'i mtha' ni 'bral ba ste//gastan pa'i mtha' ni 'chi ba yin//rgyal po spyi rtsi ldan shi nas/de gdugs dang /rgyul mtshan dang /bdun na//
