367b2('dul ba): sogs pa bzang po rnams kyis bkur bsti cher byas te bsreg so//nyi ma'i mu khyud rgyal po'i rgyal srid chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur//des blon po rnams la bsgo ba chos
367b3('dul ba): ldan ma skrod cig/phyugs 'dug gis smras pa/lha ma brtags par bskum ste ci rung /ci khye'u bca' bar 'gyur ram/'on te bu mor 'gyur/sus 'tshal/gal te khye'ur
367b4('dul ba): bcos par gyur na/de nyid dgum mod/rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud kyis smras pa/de bzhin du gyis la khyod kho nas srungs shig/des khyim du ba zhag pa na zla ba brgyad da dgu lon pa dang
367b5('dul ba): khye'u zhig bcaso//de nyid kyi nyi ma la nya ba'i chung ma zhig la bu mo zhig bcas//des de btsas ma thag kho nar nye ba'i chung ma la/nor phyis bring ba rjes nas/phyugs 'dug
367b6('dul ba): gi rgyal po la smras pa/lha chos ldan ma la bu mo zhig bcas lagaso//legs pa zhig smraso//khye'u de nya ba'i chung mas bstan bsnyod bsod te/chen por gyur nas yi ge 'bru
367b7('dul ba): dang /klag pa bslabs te/snyan dngags bya bar brtsams nas/de'i ming nya ba'i khye'u snyan dngags mkhan nye ba'i khye'u snyan mingags mkhan zhes bya bar gyur to//phyugs 'dun
368a1('dul ba): gos chos ldan ma la smras pa/khyod la ni khye'u snyun dngags mkhan zhig bcas par gyur to//de ci 'dra ba zhig yin ta re zhig blta'o//des smras
368a2('dul ba): pa/de blta ci dgos zhog shig/dbulamangon par dga' zhing bste 'ad pas rtswa na mi bajug/blugs 'dug gas dnges par gal gyis 'cha byur shes rnaM/
368a3('dul ba): thabs shig pa shAms te nya zhig bskur nas bta //de nang du zhugs pa kha na na/mtshon mkhan rnams kyis/nya ba'i khye'u stan dngags mkhan 'dis ni rgyal po sreg
368a4('dul ba): dang bral te/rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal snyid byed par 'gyuraro//zhes lung bstan pa/rgyal pos thos nas/des blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ci nas kyang mi shor bar
368a5('dul ba): zung shig/ngas cig nas cig tu brgyud pa las thos nas/de phan tshun bros pa las/rgan ma zhig gi khyim du zhugs pa dang dus de smras te/de nas yungs dang /'bru
368a6('dul ba): mar gyis lus bsdus nas/khyogs kyi steng du bzhag ste/ra lta bur btsas nas phyung ste/dur khrod du ngar ba dang /langs te bros pa dang /phyogs den ma zhig me tog da
368a7('dul ba): 'bras bu la tshol ba des/de bros pa mthong ngo //de'i phyi bzhin bskyegs shing rgyug pa'i mi de rnams kyis/mi de la dris pa kye nang rje bong tshod dang /kha dog 'di 'dra ba'i mi//
368b1('dul ba): 'ga' zhig/lam 'di nas 'gro ba khyod kyi ma mthong ngam/des smras pa/mthong ste lam 'di nyid nas song ngo //de rnams de'i rjes bzhin song ngo //yang ri bor de btso blag mkhan zhig go/
368b2('dul ba): khyim du zhugs nas de la ji ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /snyegs ma'o mi rnams kyis ri bor btsal bar brtsams pa na/gtso blag mkhan gyis gos kyi thum po'i nang du bcug nas/bong du
368b3('dul ba): la bkal te ri ber nas phyir byung ste/khrus byed pa'i sar khyer nas btang ba dang /langs te phyogs bzhir bltas nas bris so//der yang mi gzhan zhig gis mthong nas/
368b4('dul ba): des snyegs ma'i mi rnams la smras pa/shos ldan dag khyod gang gi don du ri bor na tshol ba'i mi de ni lam 'di nas song gis myur du dang shig/de rnams dong ba las de yang grang
368b5('dul ba): gzhan zhig tu lham mkhan gyi khyim zhig tu zhugs nas/des de la ji ltar gyur pa bsnyad nas smras pa/mchil lham bo la rting par bltas pa zhig gyis shig/des smras pa/
368b6('dul ba): bdag gis sngon lan 'ga' yad mchi lta l+h+wam pA lta bu byed ma myong ngo //des tshigs bcad smras pa/blo gros sna tshogs rang bzhin du ma ste//de dag srang gcig tu ni gzhol
368b7('dul ba): ba mang //lcem mkhan khyod kyis nga yi cho ga bzhin 'diraro//rting pa gang de mdug du lta bar gyis//des lcem mkhan de la bslabs nas/lham mkhan gyis de 'dra ba'i maN+Da/
369a1('dul ba): ldum zhig byas so//ra bar rabs bskur ba yin pas//de mchil lam de byin nas/gtog+sa khrung nas 'dzul te bris//stegs ma'i mi rnams kyis mtshan/
369a2('dul ba): lam gyi rjes bzhin ri bo de nyid bskor ro//chur zhugs pa dang /klu rnams kyis gnasu khrid do//rgyal pos gcig nas cig tu brgyud pa las de ji ltar ba klu rnams kyis
369a3('dul ba): kwa'i gnasu khrid do zhes thos//rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/shes ldan dag pa'i yul na sbrul khas sdigs ji snyed gnas pa/de dag thams cad nga'i spyan sngar khug
369a4('dul ba): deg/de rnams kyis yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sbrul khal sdigs rnams rgyal po la phu'o//rgyal pos de rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag deng la klu'o gnas
369a5('dul ba): ge mo zhes bya bar/klu zung shig/lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes sbrul khas sdigs thams cad kyis rgyal po las mnyan nas klu'i gan ste dngango //'brog gcig na/
369a6('dul ba): gnod sbyin sor skya zhes bya ba khrag dang /sha za ba zhig yod de/des sgrog pas/gcan zan rnams kyis kyang 'breg de yongasu spangs na mi rnams kyis lta smos kya
369a7('dul ba): dgos te/de sor spyi brod rje bya bar grag so//sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis sngags kyi mthus ji ltar klu de la gnod par 'gyur ba de ltar byas pas de skrag nas de ser skye'i 'brog de
369b1('dul ba): rgal bar mi nus par bor ro//klu rnams kyis gros byas pa/bladag gis 'di ltar ngo sor skya'o 'phrog las ma bsgral ba ni ma logs bzhog bya tu/d+mo yang gnod skyon sang smras
369b2('dul ba): bsad la/bdag cag kyang de'i phyir bcos par 'ongs na de la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/klu'i rgyal po des smras pa/don de sbrul khas sdigs rnams la rig par bya'o zhes de rnams
369b3('dul ba): kyis sbrul khas sdigs rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag gang gi phyir bdag caga'i khrigs par byis pa de ni bdag cig gis thebs kyis bsad pa nyid de 'di ltar ser skya'i
369b4('dul ba): 'brog tu bor ro//sbrul khas sdigs rnams kyis don de rgyal po la smras pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/gral te lta na yang 'on kyang tshol cig/de ser skya'i 'brog ni phan tshun
369b5('dul ba): 'khyim par brtsams pan+d+ha gnod sbyin ser skya yang phyogs zhig na khyi rnams kyis yongasu bskor te 'dug/de dang khyim rnams kyis de rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong nas des bsam
369b6('dul ba): pAci 'dis bdag shi bar gyur te zhes thos nas//des na de 'dir 'ongs sam snu ma//ngos de l-i khyi rnams spong ba las/de bras te shing ljon pa zhig la 'dzegs pa dang
369b7('dul ba): khyi rnams dang /ser skyas ljon shing gi drung du bsdad/ser skyas smras pa/kwa'i nang rje khyod kyis ser skya'i 'brog na/mi me yon pa ser skya zhes bya ba gnas te/der
370a1('dul ba): song ba gang yin pa de des gsod par 'gyuraro zhes ma thos sam/khyud dus la bud kyis byongs shig/des smras pa/ji srid la 'tsho ba
370a2('dul ba): de srid du 'dug/gnod sbyin ser skya bus spyad kyis bcings te/sgrim pas 'dug nas/de yur po na des de'i steng du gos shig bor ro//khyi rnams kyis bsams pa/
370a3('dul ba): 'di ni mi de kho na lhung ba yin snyam nas/de rnams kyis gnod sbyin ser skya zos nas dong ngo //de ljon shing las ngal gyi dal gyis babs te song nas/de dang de na
370a4('dul ba): 'khor shing bsams pa/bdag gi zhang po drang srong rnams kyi nang du rab tu byung ba zhig yod kyis de'i drung du 'gro'o snyamo//drang srong de la yang ri bor zhig na bskyed mos
370a5('dul ba): tshal rtsa ba dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa shing rnam pa sna tshogs tshang tshing gis mdzes par byas pa/bya sna tshogs skad 'byon pa zhig
370a6('dul ba): yod de/de rim gyis de thos pa cig nas cig tu brgyud pas/de'i drung du 'ongs nas/gnyen du 'brel pas smras te 'du'o//dor yang rgyal po'i mi rnams kyis btsal te/
370a7('dul ba): de rnams kyis de bzung bar brtsams pa las des ri'i g.yangs nas bdag nyid mchongaso//des mchongs pa ni mi zhig gis gtsug pud nas bzung ba las/gtsug
370b1('dul ba): dud byung nas de lhungango //de rnams kyis bsams pa/'di ni shi bas 'dong ngo zhes gtsug bud khyer te rgyal po'i drung du song nas de rnams kyis smras pa/lha nya ba'i khye'u snyan
370b2('dul ba): dngags mkhan de bkums nas/gtsug puphud kyang 'di lags//rgyal po mgu nas des de rnams la longs spyod kyi bgo ba sha'i byaso//de nis drang srong gi bskyed mos tsha ldan
370b3('dul ba): gnas pa'i lha gang yin pa des/drang srang de la smras pa/khyod kyis che bo ni sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/dog pa nyams nga ba thob na ma dgongs sam/des smras pa gal te bdag gis
370b4('dul ba): ma bsams par gyur na/de ring nyid du srog dang bral bar 'gyur ro//drang srong de ni rig sngags dang gsang sngags 'chang ba yin te/gang gis ni skyes pa bud med du 'gyur zhing
370b5('dul ba): phyir yang skyes par 'gyur ba'i rig sngags shes pas/des de la rig sngags de bslabs te smras pa/de ni song la 'jigs pa dang /bag tsha ba med pas 'dug shig/des
370b6('dul ba): rig sngags kyis dpes bskrun par mi nus pa'i bud med kyi cha byad du mngon sprul nA bA ra na ser song sa rgyal po'i daskyed blo tshal na 'dug pa bskyed mos tshal gyi srungs mas mthong nas/mchog tu ngo
370b7('dul ba): mtshare skyes te/des myur ba myur bar song nas rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud la smras pa/lha bskyed mos tshal na/bud med gzugs phun sum tshogs pa/dar la bab pa zhig mchis
371a1('dul ba): des bsgo ba khrid de shog shig/des dpal gyis 'byor pa chen pos blangs te/rgyal po'i pho brang du khrid nas/de la rgyal po nyi ma'i mu khyud lhag par cha/
371a2('dul ba): par gyur pa dang /des skabs rnyed nas/dben pa na 'dug pa las bas de slar yang rig sngags bzlas te/skyes par gyur pa dang /de nas rang nyid kyis cod pa na bcings te/
371a3('dul ba): blon po phyugs 'dug la go bar byas nas/rgyal srid la 'dug go/lhas tshig su bcad smras pa/gang gi mgo ma bcad pa de bsad min//phyir yang langs nas las ni
371a4('dul ba): byed par 'gyuraro//ji ltar snyan dngags mkhon des klags rnyed nas//sra rtsi can bu lta bu de bsad yin//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po sra rtsi
371a5('dul ba): ldan gyi bu nyi ma'i mu khyud ces bya ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi snyan dngags mkhan gang yin pa de ni 'di nyid yin te/de na yang 'dis pa la shar
371a6('dul ba): gnyer la/da ltar yang 'dis shar gnyer ro//gzhan yang ji ltar 'dis nga la shar gnyer ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ra bor zhig na/nor bu mkhan
371a7('dul ba): gnyis shig gnas te/de gnyis kyis lam po che dang grong bgroso//de'i tshe tshong pa 'byor pa yang yongasu zad pa zhig yod pa de nor bu'i snod khyer nas ri 'or der phyin to//
371b1('dul ba): de nas lam gyis dub pa ngal sos nas/nor bu mkhan cig gis drung du song ste smras pa/nor bu'i snod 'dir nu thang tshod cig/des de'i rin thang chu ngu zhig tu bcad pa dang /des
371b2('dul ba): smras pa/'di ltar kho bo longs spyod las nyams kyang /shes rab las ma yin pas kho bos 'di ci ri lta shes na/de skad du smras pa ci'i tha tshig/de de'i drung nas log ste
371b3('dul ba): cig shos kyi drung du song nas smras pa/nor bu'i snod 'dir na thang chod cig/des de'i rin thang thog tu bab par bcad nas des smras pa/'di snyed kyi rin thang re shig bdag la mi
371b4('dul ba): bdog/des smras pa/ci bi dog pa de byin la khyor cig/des blangaso//nor bu mkhan cig shos po des thos nas/de mi bzod pa skyes te/de'i drung du song nas/bdag
371b5('dul ba): gis 'di thog mar khyim du khrid cing /bdag gis 'di'i rin thang yang gcad nas/khyod kyis ci'i phyir bkur/de gnyis phan tshun kho na byung bar gyur te//dge slong dag ji ste
371b6('dul ba): du sems/dri'i tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhyen nor bu'i snod rin thang chung ngur/gcod pa gang yin pa de ni/lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin no//de tshe de'i dus kyi nor bu mkhan
371b7('dul ba): cig shos rin thang thog tu bab par gcod pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/de na yang deng phan tshun mi mthun par gyur te/da ltar yang ded pa na tshun mi mthun par gyur/
372a1('dul ba): to/gzhan yang ji ltar dred mi mthun par gyur pa nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na/khyim bdag cig gnas pa des//
372a2('dul ba): rig mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur/
372a3('dul ba): spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur nas/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa na/khye'u zhig btsaso//btsas nas drir
372a4('dul ba): tshung ma shau'o//des bsams pa khye'u gsor gzhug pa'i phyir gzhan zhig blango snyam nas/des gzhan zhig blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dka'
372a5('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/de las kyang khye'u zhig btsas nas de yang shi'o//khyim bdag des bsams pa/gal te gzhan blangs na de yang
372a6('dul ba): 'tsho bar 'gyur gyis khye'u phu bo shes kyi khyim dbub par bya'o snyam nas/des khye'u phu bro shos kyi khyim phub pa las//de las khye'u dang bu mo mang du btsaso//de'i
372a7('dul ba): chung ma des smras pa/rje'i sras khye'u 'di khyod kyi cir mchi/des smras pa/spun du 'ong ste nu bo yin no//des smras pa/rje'i srasau khyed la ni sras mang la/'di ni
372b1('dul ba): gcig tu lags na/'di dag dang /'dra'i khyim dang /'ongasu spyod mnyam par rgyal lam/bzung ma 'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos yin no//des smras pa/rje'i sras gal te deltan 'a/
372b2('dul ba): khum shig/'dod pa la so sor sbyin pa ni sdig pa'i las mi byed pa ci yang med pas/des de me tog dang /'bras bu la bying nas/dgon par khrid de rdos bstan te bsad do//dge
372b3('dul ba): slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi khyim bdag gi bu phu bo shos gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi nu bro shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid
372b4('dul ba): te/de na yang 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas//de ltar yang 'dis nga la mi mthun par byas/gzhan yang ded ji ltar mi mthun par gyur pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon ri
372b5('dul ba): zhig na bram ze zhig gnas pa des/rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs te/de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur sprod par byed do//de rtse bar byed//
372b6('dul ba): dga' bar byed dga' dgur spyod par byed pa na/chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te/de zla ba brgyad dam/dgu lon pa dang /bu mo gzugs bzang blta na sdug pa mi
372b7('dul ba): 'azhig bcom//bram ze des bsamos pa/de ring bdag gi khyin du/bram ze suM bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa de la bu mo 'di bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no mo//ji tsar na
373a1('dul ba): nubram ze'i khye'u zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir de'i khyim du zhugs nas/bkra shis par gyur cig/bsod snyoms byin cig/bram ze des de la bos rta
373a2('dul ba): smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u bu mo gzhon 'di bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin no//des smras pa/de ring mi blangs gri/nyi ma dang yud tsam dag bstun nas blang
373a3('dul ba): zhes de song ngo //ji tsam na bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir/de'i khyim du zhugs nas bkra shis par gyur cig/bsod snyoms byin cig/bram ze des
373a4('dul ba): de la smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u bu mo gzhan 'di bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi gor sbyin//des smras pa/'dir bram ze'i khye'u gzhan zhig bsod snyoms la zhugs na/
373a5('dul ba): de la ci'i phyir ma byin/des smras pa//de na re rgyu skar mi bzang zhes ze ro//des smras pa/gal te de lta na blang bar bgyi'o//bram zes smras pa//khyod rgyu skar la ci'i phyir mi
373a6('dul ba): sdod du des tshigasu bcadade smras pa/don rnams grub par gyur na ni//de dag thams cad 'thun pa ste//rgyu skar thams cad bzang po yin//nyi ma thams cad dge ba yin//rgyu
373a7('dul ba): sker rtsib lhur len pa'i//mi rnams don ni nyams 'gyur te//'di yi don ni rgyu skar yin//skar ma rnam skye ci zhig bya zhes smras pas/des khyer te song ngo //bram ze gzhan
373b1('dul ba): po des/bram ze de las/bram ze che ge mo zhes bya bas bu mo khye ro zhes thos nas/de de'i drung du song ste smras pa/bram ze'i khye'u bdag gis bu mo de sngar thob zin na/khyod kyis ci'i phyir
373b2('dul ba): bskur des smras pa/rgyu skar rtsi ba lhur len pa khyod/re zhig rgyu skar la rtogs shig/kho bo la ni rgyu skar bzang po zhes byas pa dang /de khros par gyur to//dge slong dgra ji snyam du
373b3('dul ba): sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u snga ma shos gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di yin//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bram ze'i khye'u phyi ma shos gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin te/
373b4('dul ba): de na yang 'di dang mi mthun par gyur to//de ltar yang 'di nga dang mi mthun par gyur to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na/
373b5('dul ba): bzhugaso//de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dga'i glang po che gdug pa nor skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod pa de nyin re zhing khyim nas phyung ba na skye bo mang po kha 'dog par bye //rgyal po'i khab na
373b6('dul ba): gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis/rgyal po ma skyes dgra la gsol pa btab pa/lha glang po che gdug pa nor skyong gdugs re zhing gnas nas byung ba na lam po che dang /srang dang /bzhi
373b7('dul ba): mdo dang /sum mdo rnamasu skye bo mang po kha 'dogs par bgyid kyis/lhas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal to ci nas gdugs re zhing mi byung bar sang lta
374a1('dul ba): bu 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogasu stsal ba'i rigaso//rgyal pos smras pa/de bzhin du byas khyed dang shig/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba
374a2('dul ba): shes ldan dag glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams khug shig/de rnams kyis glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams bkug pa dang /rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag rgyal
374a3('dul ba): po'i khab na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis nga la gsol pa/glang po che gdugs pa nor skyong gdugs re re zhing gnas nas byung ba na/lam po che dang srang dang /bzhi mdo dang /
374a4('dul ba): sum mdo rnamasu skye bo dang mi mang po kha 'dog par bgyid kyis/lhas glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams la bka' stsal te ci nas gdugs re zhing mi dbyung bar/sang lta bu
374a5('dul ba): 'byin pa na yang dril sgrogasu stsal pa'i rigaso zhes gsol gyis/khyod kyis de nyin re zhing ma dbyung bar sang lta bu 'byin pa na yang /dril sgrogs shig/lha bka' bzhin
374a6('dul ba): 'tshal zhes glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis/rgyal po ma skyes dag las mnyan nas/rkang pa la gtugs te dong //rgyal po'i khab ni khyim bdag phyug pa nor mang ba/
374a7('dul ba): longs spyod che ba zhig gnas pa des/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangaso//lhas sbyin gyis ji ltar khyim bdag che ga
374b1('dul ba): mo zhig gis/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun srung khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs pa thos nas/des glang po che'i 'dul mkhan la mu tig gi do shUl
374b2('dul ba): brgya stong ri ba byin nas smras pa/khyim bdag che ge mos/dge sbyong gau'u ta ma nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang /thabs gcig/sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs kyis/
374b3('dul ba): de la khyed kyis glang po che nor skyong skrod cig/des smras pa/'phagros pa de bzhin du bgyi lags kyis/'on kyang 'ol byi lha la yang mkhyen par mdzod cig/de nas lhas sbyin
374b4('dul ba): rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste/phyin nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smraso//khyod kyis ni bdag sangs rgyas nyid du gzhug ma nus na/khyod kyis yab
374b5('dul ba): srog dang bral nas rgyal srid la 'dug na/bdag gis kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma bsad la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid byas/glang po che dam pa nor skyong sprod cig mo skyes dgras
374b6('dul ba): smras pa/khyod kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ma dul ba 'dul bar mdzad pa yin no nga zhes ma thos sam/des smras pa/gal te ma dul ba 'dul ba yin par gyur
374b7('dul ba): ni/'dis re zhig bdag kho na 'dul bar 'gyur grang zhes/des de la 'ol byi smras pas/glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyi drung du song ste smras pa/lha la yang bdag
374'a1('dul ba): gis rig par byas kyis/khyed kyis snang glang po che dam pa nor skyong sdod cig/de nas glang po che'i 'dul mkhan rnams kyis/rgyal po'i khab tu
374'a2('dul ba): grong khyed du dril skrags pa/rgyal po'i khob na gnas pa'i grong mi shes ldan dag nyon cig/seng glang po che dam pa nor skyong gtong gis/de bas na khyed cag thams cad
374'a3('dul ba): sang rang dang bsrung ba la sgrims shig ces bsgrags pa/khyim bdag des thos nas/bdag 'dra bar byur dan pa/bdog gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa/dge slong gi
374'a4('dul ba): dge 'dun sang khyim du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs na/glang po che gdug pa nor skyong yang sang gtong na/bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ji ltar
374'a5('dul ba): gdugs tshad gsol bar bya snyam skye sems khongasu chud cing 'dug/yang bsams pa/g.yos byas la de nyid du khyer te//bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshad gsalo snyam
374'a6('dul ba): nas/des de nyid kyi nub mo nas gtsang zhing bsod pa'i bza' ba dang bcabya ba dag lta gon+da byas nas nong par sngar langs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song nas/btsam
374'a7('dul ba): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu dril sgrags pa/sang glang po che dam pa nor skyong gtong gis khyed cag rang rang bsrung ba la sgrims shig ces mchis pas de bas na bcom
374'b1('dul ba): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab tu ma gshegs shig/zhal zas dang gtung ba 'tshal te/bdag 'di nyid du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyim bdag khyod
374'b2('dul ba): sems las chu ngur gyis la/zhal zas dang btung ba lta gon byos shig dang /de bzhin gshegs pa ni glang po che'i bsnyings pa dang bral ba yin pr-i nga nyan thos kyi dge 'dun
374'b3('dul ba): dang thabs gcig rgyal po'i khab du gshegaso//de nas khyim bdag de yid dga' nas/rang gi khyim du song ste/zhal zas dang btung ba sta gon byas/gdan bshams
374'b4('dul ba): nas bcom ldan 'das la sdod cing 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dron bza' chos gos mnobs/lhung bzed bsnams te/dge slong lnga brgya dang thabs gcig rgyal
374'b5('dul ba): po'i khab tu zhugs pa na/glang po che dam pa nor skyong yang sprad//glang po che'i dam pa nor skyong gis/bcom ldan 'das rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang 'gying
374'b6('dul ba): zhing skad phyung nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logasu modado la shugs ci yod pas dang zag pas brgyugs//de nas ltas sbyin ma skyes dga'i grogs can steng gi khang
374'b7('dul ba): bzangs kyi gzhir 'dzegs nas/dge sbyong go'u ta mas gsod pa la lta zhing 'dug/de nas lha sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das de mthong nas/dga' ba dang mgu ba dang /rab
375a1('dul ba): du dga' bas gsang bstod de/tshogasu bcad pas smras pa/glang po tsa yas las bltas na//khyod ni blang chen mthus brdzis pas//shAkya'i bu khyod/
375a2('dul ba): ring du//nyan thos bcas te re snyam med/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/lhas sbyin ngan khyod da la ni//khyad bsad co 'dri smra bar byed//stobs bcu'i stobs
375a3('dul ba): ldan rmad byung bI/stobs bcu'i mthu la da ltos shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyog g.yas pa'i mthil nas seng gre ral pa can lnga sprul to//des de rnams
375a4('dul ba): kyi dri tshor nas/gcin dang rtug pa shor te 'bros par brtsams pa na/bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi zhabs kyi drung /grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par phyogs
375a5('dul ba): thams cad 'bar rab tu 'bar/kun tu rab tu 'bar te/me lce gcig tu gyur par byin gyis brlab so//de nas glang po che dam pa nor skyong phan tshun du brgyug par brtsams
375a6('dul ba): pa na/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung grang zhing bsil bar gyur pa ma gtogs par phyogs thams cad 'bar/rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar te/mi lce gcig tu
375a7('dul ba): gyur par mthong //nor skyong 'khrugs par mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ma gtogs par/dge slong thams cad broso//de nas nor skyong dregs pa'i shu
375b1('dul ba): dang bral nas dal gyis 'gro ba'i 'gros kyis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /bkra shrIs dang /g.yung drung 'khyil pas
375b2('dul ba): brgyan pa bsod nams brgya phrag du mes bskyed bya/skrag pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas de'i mgo la byugs nas/tshigasu bcad bka' stsal pa/gling tshon gtso bo
375b3('dul ba): la ni 'am 'tsham//glang chen de la 'tho 'tshal sdug bsngal 'gyur//go tso la gnod pa byas pa pha rol tu//'gro ba bzang bar 'gyur ba ma yin no//bzhin bzangs
375b4('dul ba): khyod re shig sngon gyi nyes par spyad pas/smad bdud 'gro'i skye gan su skyes na khyod da dung gzhan gyi srog gcod cing /gzhan gyi srog gcod pas yongasu dga' bar byed pa
375b5('dul ba): 'odi nas shi 'phos nas/khyod kyi 'gro ba cir 'gyur/skye bo ni gang /tshe phyi mo ni cir 'gyur/bzhin bzangs de lta bas na 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba/chos thams
375b6('dul ba): cad ni bdag med pa/mya ngan las 'das pa na zhi ba yin gyis/nga la sems mngon par dad par gyis la/ci nus kyang dud 'gro'i skye gangs la 'dod chags dang bral bar gyis
375b7('dul ba): shig ces bka' stsal nos/khyim bdag gi khyim gang na ba der gshegs te/byon nas gdan bshams pa nyid la bzhugs//nor skyong yang bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes
376a1('dul ba): bzhin rjes bzhin song ste/bcom ldan 'das nang du gshegs pa na//de sgo drung du sdod pa las/bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas/khyim
376a2('dul ba): gzhig par brtsam so//bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim de shel gyi rang bzhin du sprul nas/de la sangs rgyas kyi sku sgrib pa med par snang ngo //des bcom ldan 'das
376a3('dul ba): mthong nas ma bshig/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang thabs gcig gdugs tshad gsol nas/yan bsngo ba mdzad de gshegaso//de bcom ldan
376a4('dul ba): 'das kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du song ba'i skabs de/blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la rig par byas//ma skyes dgras lha sbyin la smras pa/khyod kyis bdag la
376a5('dul ba): gnod pa byas te/glang po che dam pa 'di lta brten nas/mtshams gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kho bo la gnod pa byed par mi 'gyur na/de yang khyod kyis dul bar
376a6('dul ba): byas//de cang mi smra bar 'dug/rgyal pos blon pa rnams la bsgo ba/gang gi tshwa bcom ldan 'das phyir byung por gyur pa de'i tshe/glang po che ngom pa nor skyong rje
376a7('dul ba): ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi 'gyur bar sgo chod la zhog shig/blon pa rnams kyis glang po che 'dul mkhan rnams la bsgo ba/glang po
376b1('dul ba): che dam pa nor skyong ji ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyi bzhin 'gro bar mi 'gyur bar sku chang la zhog shig/des bcom ldan 'das ma mthong nas rdog pas sna brdzis nus shi
376b2('dul ba): ba dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyeso////'dul ba gzhi//bam po brgya bzhi pa/chos nyid kyis lha'i bu 'am/lha'i bu mo ni skyes nas
376b3('dul ba): ring por ma lon par/sems gsum skye bor 'gyur te/gang nas shi 'phos pa dang /gang du smyos pa dang /las glang gis yin pa'o//des glang po che las shi 'phos
376b4('dul ba): pa dang /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnamasu skyes pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas pa yin par mthong nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i
376b5('dul ba): bu 'di snyam du sems te/bdag zhag lon nos bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'gro ba ni bdag gi tshwa ma yin gyis/ma la bdag gis zhig ma lon par bcom ldan
376b6('dul ba): 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro'o snyamo//de nas sngon glang po che byed byed pa'i lha'i bu rna cha dri ma med cing g.yo ba thogs la dro shal dang se mo des
376b7('dul ba): lus brgyan nas/de nyid kyi mtshon mo lho rnams kyi me tog ud pa le dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu di dang /pad+ma dkar po dang /man+da ra ba rnams kyis thub bkang ste/
377a1('dul ba): 'od ma'i tshal byak+ka ldan dka'i gnas thams cad snang ba rgya chen pos gsal bar byas nas/bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor te/bcom
377a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos mnyan po'i phyir 'dug/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bsam pa dang /bag la nyal ba dang /khams dang /rang bzhin mkhyen nas
377a3('dul ba): gang thos pas 'o gas pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bshad pa mdzad pas/sngon gyi glang po che lha'i bus 'jig tshogs lam
377a4('dul ba): lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba/ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas te badren pa mthong nas/lan gsum du ched du
377a5('dul ba): brjod pas che du brjod pa/btsun pa bdag la phas ma bgyis te/mas ma lags/rgyal pos ma lags/lho rnams kyis ma lags/sdug pas ma lags/rang
377a6('dul ba): gi skye bo dang gnyen gyi tshogs kyis ma lags/sngon gyi 'das pas mu lcags/dge sbyong dang /bram zer ma legs pa gang lags pa de/bcom ldan 'das kyis
377a7('dul ba): bdag la mdzad khrag dang mchi ma'i rgya mtsho ni bskams/rus pa'i ri bo las ni bsgral/ngan song gi sgo rnams ni dkum/mtho rim dang thar pa'i sgo rnams ni phye/bdag
377b1('dul ba): g+hu dang mi rnamasu ni bzhag/yang gsol pa/khyod mthus rab drag nyes pa mang ldan pa'o//dana? song shul bkrab bsod nams rab ldan pa'o//mtha ris 'phro bra phye zhing bdag
377b2('dul ba): gis ni//mya ngan 'das pa'i shul yang thob par gyur//shin tu rnam dag khyod brten bdag gis ni//de ring skyon bral dag pa'i mig thob cing //go 'bang zhi po 'phags pa
377b3('dul ba): dgyes thob ste//sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i pha rol rgal bar gyur//'gro bar lha min mi dang lhas mchod pa//skye dang rgo dang ni 'chi bral ba po//srid pa stong du mthong bar rab dka' bya//
377b4('dul ba): thub pa de ring khyod mthong 'bras bu mchis//de nas 'dud byas do shal rab 'phyang bas//zhabs la phyag 'tshal rangs pa skyes gyur nas//dgra thul g.yas nas yongasu bskor
377b5('dul ba): byas te//lha'i 'jig rten mngon phyogs mkha' la song //de nas sngon blang ngo che byed byed pa'i lha'i bus/tshong pa khe sprogs rnyed pa lta bu dang /zhing pa lo tog legs pa lta bu dang /
377b6('dul ba): dpa' bo g.yul dor rgyal ba lta bu dang /nad pa nad thams cad las yang bu thar pa lta bur 'byor pa gang gis/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs pa'i 'byor pa de nyid kyis
377b7('dul ba): rang gi gan su song ngo //dge slong rnams nam gyi cha stod dang cha smad la mi nyal bar rnal 'byor la rjesu brtson pas gnas pa nA/de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na
378a1('dul ba): /snang ba rgya chen po mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang yid gnyisu gyur te/bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das ci lags/mdang sum bcom
378a2('dul ba): ldan 'das la blta ba'i slad du/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'am/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin nam/'jig rten skyong ba bzhi mchis lags sam/bcom ldan
378a3('dul ba): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong drug nga blta ba'i phyir 'ongs pa ni mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang ma yin/lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin yang ma yin/'jig rten
378a4('dul ba): skyong ba bzhi yang ma yin te/de lta mod kyi dge slong dag khyod kyis glang po che dam pa nor skyong zhes bya ba 'di ltar gdug pa/'di ltar gtum pa des de bzhin gshegs pa
378a5('dul ba): ngo grongs pa'i phyir/pha rol gnon pa byas pa gang yin pa de mthong ngam/btsun pa mthong lagaso//ngas de btul nas/nga la mngon par dad par byas te/shi nas rgyal
378a6('dul ba): tshun bzhi'i ros kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes pa yin te/de ma dang sum nga'i spyan sngar 'ongs nas/ngas de la chos bshad/bden pa mthong bar byas nas/rang gi gon su
378a7('dul ba): song ba yin no//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa nor skyong gis las ci zhig brgya
378b1('dul ba): no/las de'i rnam par ston pa sna dung 'gror skyes lags/lus ci zhig bgyis n+ya dAs+thAn/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sgra rnams kyi na du skyes nas/bdon pa mthong bar brgyas
378b2('dul ba): legs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsol pa/dge slong dag nor skyong 'di nyid kyis las chags rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'dre ba bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/gdon mi
378b3('dul ba): zla bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas zhes bya ba nas/lus can dag las 'bras bur 'gyur/zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag
378b4('dul ba): sngon byung ba bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la skye dgu rnams kyi tshe la nyi khri thub pa na 'jig rten du sbyin pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rigs pa dang zhab su ldan pa/bde bar ga shem
378b5('dul ba): po 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i khyi la sbyar ba blan mod pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/'od srung zhes bya ba byung ste/de grong khyer b+hu ra na ser nye bar brten nas
378b6('dul ba): drang srong smra ba'i ri dgas kyi nags na bzhug so//de'i bstan pa la 'di rab tu byung ste/zhal tu byed pa na dri na 'di bslab pa'i gzhi pra me phra mo rnams la gus par mi byas pa
378b7('dul ba): de'i lus kyi rnam par smin pas dud 'gror skye bar gyur to//de na 'dis dge 'dun la bkur bsto byas pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des bza' ba dang /btud
379a1('dul ba): pa thob par gyur to//ngal sems mngon par dad par byas te/shi ba gang yin pa des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyeso//
379a2('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srung la rab tu byung nas/klag pa dang gadron pa byas shing phung po la mkhas par byas/khams la mkhas par byas/skye mched
379a3('dul ba): la mkhas par byas/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas par byas pa gang yin pa des lhar gyur nas/nga las bden pa mthong bar byaso//dge slong dag de lta
379a4('dul ba): bas na/las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas/las gcig tu dkar ba la brtsal bar bya ste/dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i///
379a5('dul ba): bar gong ma bzhin du'o//sdom ni ngang pa gad rgyangs dbyung ba dang /ri dgas rul dang spre'u dang ni//glang po che dang byi la dang //ba lang zla ba rdo ba dang //gling chen waM dang
379a6('dul ba): bram ze'o//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun po bcom ldan 'das dge slong lnga
379a7('dul ba): brgyas yongasu btang na/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos yongasu ma btang ba la gzigs bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu me
379b1('dul ba): zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang kun dga' bos 'dis nga yongasu ma btang ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba/mtsho chen po ma dros pa na ngang pa'i dpon po yul 'kho
379b2('dul ba): skyong zhes bya bar gyur te/de la bu gnyis yod pa/gang ba dang bzhin rgyas shes bya ba ste/gang ba ni phu po yi no//bzhin rgyas ni nu bo yino//de gnyis las gang ba ni gtum pa//
379b3('dul ba): borlang ba/gzu lums can zhig ste/rtag tu dang pa rnams la bsdigs par byed/kha cig la ni sgron 'byin/kha cig la ni rder mos rma 'byin par byed cing /de lta bu dang gawA/
379b4('dul ba): yang gnod pa brgya phrag dag byed de/ngang pa rnams nyi ma re re zhing ngang pa rnams kyi dben po yul 'khor skyong gi gran du song ste/rig par byed nas des bsams pa/gang ba gtumi
379b5('dul ba): pa brlang ba gzu lums can yin pas gal te bdag gis 'di rgyal che ba la bzhag na bdag shi nas/'dis dang pa'i tshigs pa shog par 'gyur gyis/de la thabs shig/
379b6('dul ba): bsham par bya'o snyam//des gang ba dang bzhin rgyas gnyis bkug nus bsgo ba/'brab chu'i dong dang mtsho dang /mtshe'u rnams bltas nas/de'i drung du thog ma ru su 'ongs pa
379b7('dul ba): dengang pa rnams kyi dpon por gzhug/de gnyis kyang cig la cig 'bran pa'i phyir/'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya dang dong ste de gnyis kyis phan tshun gyi 'bab chu'i dong dang mtsho
380a1('dul ba): dang mtshe'u rnams ltas nas/mthar gyis grong khyer bA ra na ser phyin to//de'i tshe gropa byar zlar na se na/rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba 'byor pa//
380a2('dul ba): dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /le legs pa skye bo dang mi mang pos rab tu gang bA na rgyal srid byed du 'jug go/des bA ra na si'i bskyed mos tshal-i dang ha tsang yang mi ring
380a3('dul ba): ba zhig tu tshangs ldan zhes bya ba'i rdzing bu mtshe'u bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa zhig bskor bcug ste/der chu nas skyes pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed de
380a4('dul ba): 'gram dang phyogs bzhi kun tu yang /me tog dang 'bras bu'i shing stong phrag du ma bskyed//der ud pa la dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu da dang /pad+ma dkar pos yog par
380a5('dul ba): byas shing tshang tshing du mas mdzes pa bya sna tshogs mang po skad 'byin pa'i 'byor pa de lta bu des mthong nas/ngang pa gang ba 'khor lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te babs
380a6('dul ba): nas/ci dga' ba'i spyod pas rtse bar brtsam so//bzhin rgyas la yang rang gi tshogs kyis smras pa/khyod kyang bobs la rtsed mo gyis shig/des smras pa/re zhig
380a7('dul ba): rgyal srid blangs la de nas phyis log ste rtse bar bya'o//zhes de rings pa rings par song ste/rgyal srid blang so//de nas ngang pa lnga brgyas yongasu bskor te bA ra na
380b1('dul ba): ser 'ongs nas/tshangs ldan gyi rdzing bur babs te/bag rkyong zhing bag rkyong zhing gnas pas rtse bar brtsams te/de de ltar bag yod pas gnas pa skye bo'i tshogs kyis
380b2('dul ba): mthong nas mchog tu ngo mtsher skyes te/kye ma ngang ba'i dpon po mchog tu gzugs blta na sdug pa/gang nas 'dir 'ongs te gzugs bzang pos chu nas rgyu ba'i mdub
380b3('dul ba): chags thams cad zil gyis monan nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing gi rgyun byed cing ci lags par gnas shing 'jig rten dgu ba bskyed par byed//bA rA na saM na gnas pa'i skye
380b4('dul ba): bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang thos nas tshangs ldan gyi rdzing kun nas bskor te/de'i gzugs bzang po dang /bag rkyong zhing gnas pa la rtog cing 'khod do//blon pa
380b5('dul ba): rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/lha ngang pa rnams kyis dpon po zhig ga zhig nas 'dir mchis te/de tshangs ldan gyi rdzing du byabs nas/ngang pa brgya phrag du mas
380b6('dul ba): yongasu bskor cing gzugs bzang pos chub na rgyu ba'i mdab chags thams cad zil gyis mnan nas 'jig rten dga' ba bskyed cing bag rkyong zhing mchis lpag so//rgyal
380b7('dul ba): pos smras pa/shes ldan dag gal te de lta ni bya ba rnams khug shig/de rnams kyis bkug pa dang /rgyal pos bsgo ba/shes ldan dag tshangs ldan gyi rdzing na/ngang
381a1('dul ba): ba'i dpon po gzugs mchog tu blta na sdug pa zhig ga zhig nas 'ongaso zhes thos kyis/khyed kyis de gcig pu smos mu smad par zung la ngal phul/
381a2('dul ba): cigade rnams kyis de mchog tu spyi 'jam pos ma snad par bzung ba dang /des tshigasu bcadade smras pa/kho bo snyas ni dam par bzung zin te//mi'i dbang du song bas
381a3('dul ba): kho bo la//dpyad byar med kyis ngang pa'i tsho gas ded de//ma dros par ni myur du 'dong bar gyis//ngang pa gcig gis lnga brgyar ma tshang ba ni bros//gcig pu zhig snyis zin
381a4('dul ba): pa de nyid la mya ngan byed cing 'dug pa de bya ba rnams kyis mthong nas mechog tu ngo mtshar skyes shing rgyal po skrag nas ma bzung ma bas de/de rnams kyis ngang pa'i dpon
381a5('dul ba): po de khyer nas/rgyal po'i drung du song ba dang /cig shos ma bzung ba de yang chags pa'i skyes gzung bas rang nyid 'ongaso//ngang pa'i dpon po rgyal po la phul ba dang /
381a6('dul ba): rgyal pos smras pa/shes ldan dag cig shos 'di ci'i phyir khyer te 'ongs/de rnams kyis smras pa/lha bdag gis 'di ma bzung ma btang mod kyi rang nyid mchis
381a7('dul ba): leg so//rgyal po mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes nas smras pa/gdon mi za bar 'di ni de'i chung ma yin pas 'ongs kyis ngang pa'i dpon po 'di dang /spa shugs lhan cig/
381b1('dul ba): thong la khyed cag su yang 'di gnyis ma gsod cig/bya ba rnams kyis smras pa/lha gzhan gyis bkum du mchis/bka' stsal du gsol/rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsku
381b2('dul ba): ba/shos ldan dag deng lnga grong khyer bA ra na ser dril sgrogasu chug ste/lha nyid kyis bka' stsal pa/dra'i yul na gnas pa sus kyang chu nas rgyu ba'i mdab chags rnams ma
381b3('dul ba): bsad cig ces sgrogs shig/de rnams kyis dril bsgrags//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus na ngang pa'i dpon po bzhin rgyas gang yin pa de ni nga nyid
381b4('dul ba): yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi de'i chung ma gang yin pa doni kun dga' bo yin no//ngang pa gcig gis lnga brgya sa ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni/dge slong lnga brgyar gcig gis
381b5('dul ba): ma tshang ba 'di dag nyid yin te/do na yang 'di rnams dang par gyur pa na/nga yongasu btang ste/kun dga' bo dang par gyur pas ni nga yongasu ma btang //de ltar yang nga 'di
381b6('dul ba): dag gis yongasu btang gi/dge slong kun dga' bos ni yongasu ma gta ngo //dge slong dag gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongasu btang nu/dge slong kun dga' bos yong
381b7('dul ba): su ma btang ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong bye bAr na so na rgyal po gad rgyangs can zhes bya ba 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa skye bo dang
382a1('dul ba): mi mang pos rab tu gang ba na rgyal srid byed du 'jug/de la blon po lnga brgya yod de/de rnams kyi mthus mtshams kyi rgyal po rnams kyi zil gyis mi non
382a2('dul ba): to/ji tsam na lho phyogs kyi lam nas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can zhes bya ba dmag ste thub pa zhig 'ongs nas/de blon po gzhan zhig gis rgyal po la phul te/lha bya ma
382a3('dul ba): bum gyi dbyugu can zhes bgyi ba dmag stong thub pa 'di lha'i slad du lho phyogs kyi shul nas mchis kyis lhas 'di yongasu bzung ba'i rigaso//rgyal pos de yongasu bzung nas
382a4('dul ba): longs spyod kyis bgo bsha' yang byas//ci tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po gang rgyangs can gyis yul gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams mthu dang dpung chen por gyur te/de rnams
382a5('dul ba): dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po//glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta ba'i chags dang /shing rta'i tshogs dang /dpung du chung gi tshogs gro bskon nas/rgyal po gad rgyangs
382a6('dul ba): can dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir 'ongaso///rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi po glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tsho gas dang /
382a7('dul ba): shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go bskon nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir spags te bslu'o//rgyal po gad rgyangs can gyis sa
382b1('dul ba): gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams bcom/bred par byas thag bcug/pham par byas/rgyab kyis bltas par byas s+ho/rang rang gi yul du dong ngo //de rnams slar yang 'dus nas/rgyal
382b2('dul ba): po gad rgyangs can gyi blon po lnga brgya le khyed cag tshur shog shig dang /khyed drug la longs spyod ches khyad par du 'phags pa dag gis bgo ba sha'i bya'o zhes yo byad kyis kha drangs
382b3('dul ba): pab dang /de rnams kyis khas blangs//de nas sa gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams kyis slar yang dpung gi tsho gas yan lag bzhi po glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing //
382b4('dul ba): rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs po bskon nas rgyal po gang+gA rgyangs can dang /g.yul spyad pa'i phyir 'ongaso//rgyal po gang rkyangs can gyis kyang dpung gi tshogs yan
382b5('dul ba): lag bzhi po glang po che'i tshogs dang /rta pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta pi'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung gi tshogs go skon nas so gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams dang g.yul sprad pa'i phyir
382b6('dul ba): spags te bsu'o//gad rgyangs can gyi blon po lnga brgya g.yul spyod pa na/phyir log nas bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can dmag stong thub dang lhan cig gi yul 'gyed par brtsams pa/
382b7('dul ba): rgyal pos mthong nas bag tsha bar gyur pa dang /bya ma bum gyi dbyu gu can domag stong thub gyis tshig su bca de smas pa/khyod ni bya ma bum gyi dbyug/grogs po cig pus ma dang
383a1('dul ba): gi/yun ring po nus gnang ba yi//grogs po kun gyis khyod ga ngo //des de dag thams cad kha bta'o//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/dang
383a2('dul ba): tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po gang rgyangs can gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yino//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bya ma bum gyi dbyug gu can gang yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin//blon po lnga brgya po gang yin pa de/
383a3('dul ba): dag ni dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/de na yang 'di dag gis nga yongasu btangango //da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongasu btango //kun dga' bos ni yong su ma btang ngo //gzhan yang ji ltar
383a4('dul ba): 'di dag gis nga yongasu btang gi/kun dga' bos yongasu ma btang ba do nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na ro'i
383a5('dul ba): phyogs shig na/ri dgas kyi dpon po seng ger gyur te/de'i lhag ma za ba wa lnga brgya rjes bzhin du 'brang zhing ri la nye bar brten te gnaso//seng gres srog chags rnams
383a6('dul ba): bsad de sha'i dam pa dang khrag gi dam pa 'thungs nas bor te 'gro bas de rnams de lta bus dus ring mo zhig 'das par gyur to//ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na re dgas kyi rgyal
383a7('dul ba): bopo seng ge mtshan mo srog chags tshol ba na/khron par ltung ba dang /wa lnga brgya po de rnams las wa lnga brgyar gcig gis ma tshang ba so sor dang ste/wa gcig pu zhig
383b1('dul ba): seng ge la rtog cing khron pa'i khar 'dug ste/gang gis na 'di phyin par 'gyur ba'i thabs de ci yod snyam sems shing /de khron pa'i nye 'khor phan tshun song ba las//ji tsam
383b2('dul ba): na khron pa dang /ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mtshe'u zhig mthong nas des brtags nas phyogs gcig nas 'og brus bcug ste khron par mtshe'u yi chu bkang ba dang /seng
383b3('dul ba): ge rang nyid byung bar gyur to//lhas tshigasu bcad smras pa/skyobs che ba 'am zhan kyang rung //go gas po drug tu bya dgos te//wasA ni khron pa rnying banas//seng ge
383b4('dul ba): phyung bar gyur la ltos//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi seng ge gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gcig po de ni dge slong kun
383b5('dul ba): dga' bo yin no//wa gcig gis lnga brgyur ma tshang ba gang yin pa de ni/dge slong lnga brgya po 'di dag nyid yin te/de na yang 'di dag gis nga yongasu btang gi/kun dga'
383b6('dul ba): byos ni yongasu ma btang //da ltar yang 'di dag gis nga yongasu btang gi/kun dga' bos ni yongasu ma btang ngo //gzhan yang ji ltar 'di dag gis nga yongasu btang na kun dga'
383b7('dul ba): bopos yongasu ma btang ba de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba byang chub sems dpa' ma nges pa'i phung po la gnas pa na/phyogs shig na ri dgas lnga brgya'i ro dgas kyi dpon
384a1('dul ba): bor gyur to//ji tsam na rngan pa zhig gis ri dgas rnams pashor ba'i phyir 'jol dang /sI dang /rnyong rab tu mang po drug bcug so//ri dgus
384a2('dul ba): kyi dpon po de dag rkyong zhing gnas pas/'khar lnga brgya dang /ri dgas kyi nags nA t+yA zhing de ri dogs kyi tshogs rnams kyi sA la 'gro ba na/skyes zin to//skyes zin
384a3('dul ba): pa de mthong nas ri dgos thams cad ni blos so//ri dgas mo gcig pu zhig chags kyi dngon po'i rlung na 'dug/re dgas kyi dpon po de 'bad kyang ste bcad par ma nus
384a4('dul ba): shing de de ltar 'phra shugs byed pa/ri dgas mo des mthong nas/tshigasu bcadade smras pa/snyi 'di gang gis gtsugs pa yi//rngon pa de ni mchis lags kyis/skal
384a5('dul ba): chen po ni 'bad mdzod cig/ri dgas dam pa 'bad mdzod cig/des kyang tshig su bcad smras pa/tshig pa sar btsugs then kyang ni//'breng ba'i snyi ni dam po yis//
384a6('dul ba): bdag gi rkang pa rabasmras kyi//gtsud mi nus na ci byar yod//de nas rngon pa de mda' dang gtsu lag na thogs shing /gos ngur smrig bsgos nas phyogs der byin to//
384a7('dul ba): dgas mo des rngon pa de ri dgas kyi dpon po bsad pa'i phyir bsgrims pas nye bar 'ongs pa mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang rings pa ring bar tshig su bcad smras pa/spyi 'di//
384b1('dul ba): gang gis btsugs pa yi//rngon pa 'di ni mchis lags kyis//skal chen po ni 'brad mdzod cig/ri dag sna dam pa 'bad mdzod cig/des kyang tshogasu bcad smras pa/rmig pa//
384b2('dul ba): sar bcugs then kyang ni//'breng ba'i snyi ni dam po yis//bdag gi rkang pa rab smras kyi//gcad mi nus na ci byar yod//de nas ri dgas mo de snying skyong nas//rngon pa de'i mdun du
384b3('dul ba): mngon du song ste/de la bsnyen nas tshigasu bcad smras pa/rngon pa gzhu ni phob mdzod la//rngon pa ral gri blung mdzod//thog mar bdag khum de nas ni//ri dgas dpon po la mdzad
384b4('dul ba): cig/de nas rngon pa de ngo mtshar gyis bsdus pa'i blas smras pa/'di khyod kyi cir 'ong des smras pa/khyim tha'o//des de la tshig su bcud slar smras pa/bdag gis khyod kyang
384b5('dul ba): mi bsad la//ri dgas dpon po'ang mi bsad par//snying du sdug pa'i khyim thab dang //khyod ni lhan cig 'grogs par bya//des kyang tshig su bcad smras pa/ji ltar rngon pa bdang /
384b6('dul ba): dang ni//sdug pa'i khyim thab dga' ba ltar//de bzhin rngon pa gnyen kun dang //lhan cig tu ni dgar gyur cig/de nas rngon pa de lhag par yang ngo mtshwar skyes nas/ri dwags
384b7('dul ba): de bkrol nas lhan cig dong ngo //dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ri dgas kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni de nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus ri dgas mo gang
385a1('dul ba): yin pa de ni kun dga' bo yin no//ri dgas gcig gis lU brgyar ma tshar ba gang yin pa de dag ni/dge slong gcig gis lbu brgyur ma tshang ba 'ang//
385a2('dul ba): dag nyid yin te/de na yang nga 'di dag gis yongasu btang gi/kun dga' bas ni yongasu ma gtangango //da ltar yang de 'di dag gis yongasu btang gi/dge slong kun dga'
385a3('dul ba): zos ni yongasu ma gtang //dge sbyong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin rul po
385a4('dul ba): pa dang /bkur bsti rul pas bcom pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad tau/jo ltar 'das pa'i
385a5('dul ba): dus na yang rul pa 'di/rnyed pa dang bkur bsti rul pas bcom pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri'i phyogs cig cig na/pad+ma'i rdzing chen po zhig yod de/de
385a6('dul ba): dang nye ba na glang po che zhig gnas//phyogs gzhan zhig na wa zhig kyang gnaso//ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na/glang po che pad+ma'i rdzing de nas chu 'thungs nas 'gro ba dang /wa 'ong
385a7('dul ba): ba des glang po che la smras pa/'thob ma bya 'amalam las 'dzur/glang po ches bsams pa/rul pa nyon mongs pa ci rdol can 'di gal te/bdag gi rkang lag gis
385b1('dul ba): samasmras sam/mche bas bsad na/mi gtsang bas ma rung bar gyur pas mdor na rul pa 'di ni rul ga do nas gsad do snyam du bsams nas/tshogasu bcad de smras
385b2('dul ba): pa/khyod ni rkang lag bris mi bsad//mche bas ma yin snas min te//rul pa rul pas bsad bya bas//khyod ni rul pas bsad par bya//glang po ches bsams pa la ma
385b3('dul ba): bzur te song dang gdon mi za zla 'di bdag gi rjes bzhin 'ong ngo snyam nas/des lam bzur nas myur ba myur bar song ba dang /was bsams po/tshig tsam kho nas bdag gis 'di
385b4('dul ba): bcom pa yin te/des na myur ba myur bar bros so snyam nas/de de'i rjes bzhin 'brangs pa dang /glang po ches nyer bar 'ongs par shes nas shugs drag pos de'i steng du drug
385b5('dul ba): pa byor pas phog nas shi bar gyur te/dge slong dag ji du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi lha gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang rul pa 'di rul pas
385b6('dul ba): mo da ltar yang rul pa 'di rnyed pa dang /bkur bsti rul pas bcomo//gzhan yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan
385b7('dul ba): 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las logs par rgal
386a1('dul ba): bar gyur pa la/lhas ston lta bA dz+hasu 'thun par gyur pa grang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lags pas ma rgyu ba byur bu la gzugs/
386a2('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'bo'i zhig tu ma zad/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang /de'i tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs
386a3('dul ba): po chen po las thar la/lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas mi rung bar gyur pa de nyan cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig dang
386a4('dul ba): ba mye tog dang /'bras du dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa na spre'u yi tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis shig gnas te/rIr la yang lnga bad+ma lnga brgya yid//de na tshebs kyi
386a5('dul ba): dan pa cig shes gnyid len pa'i rmi la men bdag ga na po nyid rdul bar lnga brgyu pa su tsun par mthong //mthong nas kyang //ga sungs nad skye du zhes skyed
386a6('dul ba): nas/namra do mnangs te nangs pa dang /spre'u rnams bsags te rmi lam bzlas par brnams pa/shes ldan dag mdangs gsum des rmi lam den pa zhig mthong
386a7('dul ba): gnas 'di nas 'dir 'dod //spre'u rnams kyis smras pa/de bzhin du bgyis te 'bros par bgyi'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rmi lam rnod yin pas/bdag
386b1('dul ba): nyid chen po des tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos la smras pa/bdag gis rmi lam 'di 'dra ba rmis nas 'dod na/gzhan na 'dong ngam/de yid ma ches nas smras pa/ci rmi lam
386b2('dul ba): du rmi sngo cog bden par 'gyur ram/gal te khyod 'gro na song shig/kho bo ni spyod yul ches yangs par 'gyur pas mi 'gro'o//des de yid mi ches par rig nas
386b3('dul ba): bdag nyid kyi tshogs ded de dong ngo //ji tsam na dus gzhan zhig na ri bor de na bran mo zhig theb na yos rdo ba na/ma skyes pas lug cig 'khyam zhing phyogs der phyin nas/de
386b4('dul ba): nas de dag bza' bar brtsams pa dang /des mgal dum gyis bsnun pas me 'bar bzhin rgyal po'i glang po che'i brasu zhugs pa dang 'bor ba de ste glang po che'i bras bsregs
386b5('dul ba): te/glang po che mang po zhig tshig/rgyal pos sman pa bkug te smras pa/glang po che mes chog pa rnams la dpyad tse yod/sman pa de'i nas kyi shing spre'u rnams kyis ma
386b6('dul ba): rung bar byas pas/des bsams pa spre'u 'di rnams la shar gnyen pa'i dus la bab bo snyam du bsams nas spros pa/lha spre'u yi zhag gis glang po che rnams la bskus
386b7('dul ba): na sos par 'gyur//rgyal pos blon pa rnams la bsgo ba shes ldan dag spre'u zhag sta gon gyis shig de rnams kyis kyang rngon pa rnams la bsgo ba dang /rngon pa rnams kyi
387a1('dul ba): ri byor gyi nye 'khyor na gnas pa'i skye'u thams cad bzung ste/phul lo//sman pa yun rnying po nas shA khon rje su 'brel bas gson po nyid duzangasu bcug//
387a2('dul ba): tshig su bcad smras pa/grong rdal dang ni grong khyer na//mi mthun yod par gan sI mI bya//lu ga dang bran mo mi mthun pas//spre'u rnams dag ni brlag par gyu//dge slong dag rje m+b+hi
387a3('dul ba): du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u tshogs kyi dpon po rmi lam rno ba gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos gang yin pa de ni ltas sbyin
387a4('dul ba): 'di nyid te/de na yang nga'i tshig nyen pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jigs pa chen po las thar to//lhas sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur
387a5('dul ba): to/da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/'khor ba'i 'jigs pa chen po las rab tu thar to//lhas sbyin gyi lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur
387a6('dul ba): pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas ma rung bar gyur to//gzhan yang nga'i lta ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/bde leg suM dong bar gyur cing /lhas
387a7('dul ba): sbyin gyi lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal du gyur pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na/spre'u gyi
387b1('dul ba): tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya pa gnyis shig gnas//don cig shos tshogs dang lhan cig ljongasu dong ste/rIm gyis ri bor zhig tu phyin pa dang /ri bor de na shong kim
387b2('dul ba): pa ka zhes bya ba 'bras bus yal ga g.yur za bar 'dug nas/spre'u rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po la smras pa/tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing lhag par 'bras bu chags pa
387b3('dul ba): 'bras bus yal ga g.yur za ba zhig ma ches kyi skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams gsolo//tshogs kyi dpon pos shing de la brtags nA/tshig su bcang smras nas/grong
387b4('dul ba): gi drung na bdug kyang ni/byis pas 'di la ma zlos bri//rje su dang grasA na shing 'di yi//'bras bu bzar mi rung bar shes//zhes smras na sna drong ngo //tshogs kyi dpon po cig shos
387b5('dul ba): kyang /tshogs de nyid kyi rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brangs nas rim gyis ri bor du phyin pa dang /spre'u rnams kyis kim pa ka'i ljon shing de mthong nas/de rnams kyis tshogs kyi
387b6('dul ba): dpon po la smras pa/tshogs kyi dpon po ljon shing gi 'bras bu mchis kyis/skol dub pa 'bras bu rnams la gsol la bde bar bzhudado//des smras pa/legs kyis de bawI
387b7('dul ba): du gyis shig/de rnams kyi zos pa dang /thams cad tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po
388a1('dul ba): dang po pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi tshogs kyi dpon po gnyis pa shos gang yin pa la ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na
388a2('dul ba): yang nga'i lta ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde legasu dong ngo //lhas sbyin gyi lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin po de dag ni tshul ma yin pas
388a3('dul ba): sdug bsngal bar gyur to//da ltar yang nga'i lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni//bde leg su 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las rgu'o//lhas sbyin
388a4('dul ba): gyi lta ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas mi rung bar gyur to//gang gi tshe lhas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das la dgrongs pa'i phyir
388a5('dul ba): rdo 'phangs pa de'i tshe/bram ze dang /khyim bdag rnams 'khrugs nas/lhas sbyin bsdad kyis 'odongo zhes byas pa dang /'jig rten na mdza' ba dang /mi mdza'
388a6('dul ba): ba dang /bar ma dag yod pas gzhan zhig gis lhas sbyin la bran nas/de skrag nus shing drung zhig tu brten te/spyod lam zhi bas 'dug/de rnams kyis de ltar
388a7('dul ba): spyod lam zhi ba mthong nas/de nas kyis smras pa/shes ldan dge lhas sbyin bdag nyid chen po 'di bcom ldan 'das dgrongs par ga la 'gyur/kha cig gis bdag
388b1('dul ba): cag bsgyus kyis tshur 'dong ngo zhes de rnams dong ngo //dge slong rnams kyis lhas sbyin de lta bu'i spyod lam gyis gnus byas des na grong mi 'khrugs kyang ma bsodado zhes zlos nas de rnams
388b2('dul ba): the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgya me bcom ldan 'das la zhus pA/btsun pa lhas sbyin gyis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslus pa la gzigs/btsam
388b3('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i rus na yang 'di chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams bying ba de nyon cig/dge slong
388b4('dul ba): dge sngon byung ba phyogs shig na/byi ba rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po 'khor lnga brgya pa zhig gnas//byi la me skyes shes bya ba zhig yod de/de gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na/phyogs
388b5('dul ba): gang du gnas pa'i nye 'khor du des byi ba thams cad bas do//de yang dus gzhan zhig nA rmA sa par gyur te/rgas pas pha rol gnon pas byi ba bzung mi nus nas des bsams pa/sngon
388b6('dul ba): bdag gzhon pa'i gnas skabs na ni/pha rol gnon pas byi ba 'dzin nus na/da ni mi nus te/'on kyang thabs shig bshams la bza'o snyam nas/de 'jab cing 'jab cing byi
388b7('dul ba): ba rnams btsal bar brtsams te/des btsal ba na byi ba lnga brgya'i tshogs yod par shes nas/de byi ba de rnams kyi khung bu dang ha snga rdza mi ring ba zhig tu ngan g.yo'i dka' thub kyis
389a1('dul ba): dka' thub byed pa na/bya ba rnams phan tshun 'khyam pas spyod lam zhi bas gnas pa de mthong nas de rnams kyis rgyung ring por 'dug nas smras pa/zhang pa
389a2('dul ba): ci byed des smras pa/kho bo gzhon po'i gnas skabs na/bsod nams ma yin pa mong du byas pas/de zad par bya ba'i phyir dka' thub spyod do//de rnams kyis 'dis/dam
389a3('dul ba): pa mo yin pa'i chos sdig pa spangaso zhes de la chos kyi rgyu las byung ba'i dad pa skyes par gyur to//de rnams de la nyi ma re re zhing bskor ba byas nas khung du 'jug pa na/des de
389a4('dul ba): rnams kyi nang gi tha ma bzung zhing bcu zhing za'o//ji tsa na tshogs de bgribs nas tshogs kyi dpon pos bsams pa/bdag gi byi ba rnams ni nyung bar gyur la/byi la 'di ni nyim skyes
389a5('dul ba): par gyur pas/'di la rgyu zhig yod par 'gyur ro snyam nas/des byi la dri la brtag par brtsams pa dang /ji tsam na rtug pa spu can du mthong nas/des bsams pa/gdon mo
389a6('dul ba): zo bar 'dis byi ba rnams bsad par gyur gyis/ma la bdag gis 'di mngon sum du bab par bya'o snyam nas/des de mi mngon pa'i sa nas brtag pa lhur len cing gnas pa na/
389a7('dul ba): ji tsam na des/des de tha ma'i byi ba za ba mthong nas/de de log su song ste rgyang ring por 'dug nas/tshigasu bcad de smras pa/zhang po'i yan lag rgyas gyur cing //bdag gi
389b1('dul ba): chogs ni grongs gyur la//'bras bya rtswa ba zab yi//rtag pa spyan+dan mo 'byung bas//dka' thub 'di rgyas pa/ thub min///'byu 'dzin dran phyir te//byi bla rnams rna
389b2('dul ba): 'gribs 'gyur bas//me skyes khyod ni bkra shis shog/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi byi la me skyes shes bya ba gang yin po ni/lha sbyin yin te/
389b3('dul ba): de ni yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas byi ba rnams zos//da ltar yang 'dis chos lta bu'i sgo nas 'jig rten bslu so//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad
389b4('dul ba): gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi gzigs pa'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag bde ba dang legs par 'khor
389b5('dul ba): ba'i 'brog dgon pa las rgal cing /lhas sbyin gyi lte ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang lags pa de dag ni tshul ma lagasuM pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pA la gzigs/bcom
389b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag de ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zad te/'das pa'i dus na yang nga'i lta ba'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dgra ni/ba ba
389b7('dul ba): dadeng legs par 'brog dgon pa las thar la/lhas sbyin gyi lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de nyon cig/dge slong
390a1('dul ba): dag sngon byung ba/tshong dpon granyis shig shing rta lnga brgya lnga brgya dang /lhan cig tshong sbyar zhing dgon pa'i lam zhig tu zhugs te/de gnyis dgon
390a2('dul ba): ba'i lam zhig tu phyin nas/gleng rnams res 'ga' ni rtsa nyung //res 'ag ni chu tung /ris 'ga' ni med do//de nas tshong pa de glang rnams dang bcas te lhag par dub pas
390a3('dul ba): sdug bsngal gyis/dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa las phyogs shig na gsing ma dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas tshong ba rnams kyis der glang rnams btang rang rang khrus
390a4('dul ba): byas nas chu med du 'thungaso//de nas glang chu nyungs pa dang rtsa nyungs pas yongasu dub pa de rnams kyis rtsa 'drangs par zos chu 'thungs te ngal sos pa dang /de rnams kyi nang
390a5('dul ba): na glang gtso bo gang yin pa des de rnams la shes par byas pa/shes ldan dag bdag cag rtsa cung ngu dang chu cung ngus yongs dub pa las/phyogs 'di ni gsing ma dang /chu
390a6('dul ba): phun sum tshogs pa yin gyi gal te khyed cag 'dod na/'di nyid du then te 'dug par bya'o//glang gtso bo cig/shos kyis rang gi tshogs rnams la smras pa/shes ldan
390a7('dul ba): dag mi rnams ni mthu dang ldan zhing gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa yin gyis gnod pa 'thob par 'gyur du 'ongs pas/bdag cag khal ji ltar bkal ba de bzhin du
390b1('dul ba): khyer cig/de skad ces smras pa dang /glang gtso bo cig shos khros nas/rang gi chags rnams la smras pa/shes ldan dag zla ba'i rgyab sus mthong /'di dag khal khyer la/
390b2('dul ba): rAgA/yu bus ni mi bkur ro//ji tsam na tshong pa rnams kyis gleng rnams bstad par brtsams pa na gling de rnams phyi lang byed cing 'dug pa dang /tshong pa rnams kyis mang du brdegs
390b3('dul ba): shing lhag gzer bu can gyis gzus pas khrag 'dzag cing shing rta dang sbyar to//gzhan ni cang mi byed par khal gnos pas de dag la cung zad kyang ma byasgo//lhas tshigasu bcing
390b4('dul ba): /glang gis pa lang 'di dag ni//log pa dag tu gtams byas na/rma dag 'byung zhing khrig 'jug la/lcogs shing sgom par ldan pa ltos//glang gis b+ha
390b5('dul ba): 'di dag ni//legs pa dag tu btams pas na//de rnams dgon pa las rgal nas//bsil bya'i tshul 'thung ba ltoste//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i
390b6('dul ba): dus kyi glang gtso bo legs par ston pa gang yin pa de ni nga nyid yin//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi klung gtso bo slu bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/de na yang
390b7('dul ba): tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de ni de ba dang /legs par dgon pa las rgal to//lha sbyin gyi tshig nyan pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pos sdug bsngal bar gyur to//de
391a1('dul ba): da ltar yang ldi lta bu'i rjesu 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni/byede ba dang /legs par 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa nas rgal to//lhas sbyin gyi
391a2('dul ba): lta ba'i rje su 'thun par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa songs
391a3('dul ba): rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin blun zhing 'khor blun pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal bya/dge slong drug da ltar gyi 'di 'bal
391a4('dul ba): zhig tu ma zad/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang /lhas sbyin blun zhing 'khor blun pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba dgon pa'i gnas zhig na/spre'u gi chags
391a5('dul ba): shig gnas te/de 'khyam pa na/khron par zla ba'i gzugs brnyan shar ba mthong nas/tshogs kyi dpon pos smras pa/shes ldan dag zla ba khron par lhung gis 'jig rten
391a6('dul ba): zla ba med par bya 'am cing byung //de rnams kyis smras pa/legs kyis dbyung //de rnams kyis gras bya bar brtsams pa/de ji ltar dbyung bar bya/gzhan dag gis
391a7('dul ba): smras pa/do tso mi shes sam/spre'u brgyas la de byung mod ces/de rnams kyis spre'u brgyas to//deng ba lus shing gi yal ga la 'jus nas/de'i 'jug ma gzhan
391b1('dul ba): 'jus shing /de la gzhan gyis 'jus te/de bzhin du thams cad 'jus pas//yal ga lhags par g.yur zos//chu klongs pa dang /zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang mi mngon par
391b2('dul ba): gyur/yal ga yang chag nas thams cad khron par lhung ste/tshul ma yin pas sdug bsngal bar gyur to//lhas tshigasu bcad smras pa/'dri na blun po gang drug la//
391b3('dul ba): 'dren pa blun po yod gyur pa//de dag thams cad brlag 'gyur ti//zla ba 'byin pa'i spre'u bzhi no//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi spre'u gyi chags
391b4('dul ba): kyi dpon po gang yin pa de ni lhas sbyin nyid yin te/de na yang 'di blun zhing 'khor blun pa yin no//da ltar yang 'di blun zhing 'khor yang blun pa yin no//sangs rgyas bac+doMs
391b5('dul ba): rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyis kun dga' ra ba ni bzhug so//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te/de bzhin gshegs pA nyid kyis las byas
391b6('dul ba): shing tshogs rnyed pa rkyen yongasu bsgyur ba/'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i las dag byas shing bsags pas nga nyid kyis las byas shing
391b7('dul ba): bsags pa dag gzhon su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/las byas shing bsags pa dag ni/phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba nas/
392a1('dul ba): lus can dag la 'bras bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gau mabazhin du'o//gdon mi za bar lhas sbyin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun 'byod/
392a2('dul ba): par 'gyur//rgyu lngas na dge 'dun bye byer mi 'gyur te/ro zhig por sa sa rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba'i tshe/dge 'dun 'bye bar mi 'gyur te/kye ma'o grogs po dag/
392a3('dul ba): sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung zhes groglo zhes/'jig rten de la phyogs paso//ston pa yongasu mya ngan las 'das na/dge 'dun 'bye bar mi 'gyur te/gang la la zhig
392a4('dul ba): 'di skad du/nga nyid ston pa yin no zhes zer na/de la gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhal bzhugs shing 'tshe la gzhes pa de'i chos khyod gar song zhes brjod par zad paso//
392a5('dul ba): lta ba'i nyes pa dang /tshul khrims kyi nyes pa'i nyes pa ma byung ba'i tshe dang /nyen thos zung mchog tu ma bstan pa'i tshe dge 'dun 'bye bar mi 'gyur te/ci'i phyir zhe na/dge
392a6('dul ba): 'dun bye ba gdon mi za bar nyan thos zung gis sngags byed nga so//mtshams ma bcad pa na dge 'dun bye bar myi 'gyur te/dri ci'i phyir zhe na/mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dren
392a7('dul ba): 'byi bar 'gyur gyi mtshams kyi phyi rol du ni ma yin no//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dag sa te//deng gi sbyong gi dge 'dun skyon med pa las tshul khrims
392b1('dul ba): du/\u0f7f /smyas du / dun rlu smras m+b+ha s+yA/rgyud na su na
