392b3('dul ba): gleng dgi rnams da /bas gzhig rgyam po'i kha rgyan san+d+he/lhas sbyin gyis dge tsun hU~M b+hinA bya bya mi sa /ma 'i de pan skye bo dge ba'i gang bag rnam
392b4('dul ba): sa gci 'gro'o b+h+yAm s+t+wa~M/hU~M nyan yad du tsam ban kyi bar du sa nas/rim byed po tsho dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin dang /dge slong sna brgya dang /
392b5('dul ba): dgon pa skyongs mo nges zas rnyed par dka' ba byung //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' phral pa/dge slong dag dang dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'dri
393a1('dul ba): lnga nang du yang dag 'jug par bzhed kyis/bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /gas stong de nyid kyi tshe ma gtogs pa/dge slong dag su yang nga'i spyan sngar ma
393a2('dul ba): 'ong shig/dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis kyang khrimasu bcas pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po 'di la bsod snyoms stobs pa dang /gso sbyong de nyid kyi tshe ma
393a3('dul ba): gtogs pa bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir bdag cag su yang 'gro bar mi bya'o zhes bcas//de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gnyis ni lho phyogs kyi ral
393a4('dul ba): dbyar gnas par dam bcas//lhas sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun la chos gos dang bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang /nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnam
393a5('dul ba): kyis bstabs te/zla ba gsum 'das pa dang /des dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag dge sbyong go'u ta ma ni nyan thos rnams la 'di skad ces dge slong dgon pa
393a6('dul ba): pa nyid kyis ni dag pa dang /grol ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal las 'da'o ba dang /bde ba dang /sdug bsngal las 'das pa yang thob par
393a7('dul ba): 'gyuraro//bsod snyoms pa nyid dang /phyag dar khrod pa nyid dang /chos gos gsum pa nyid dang /zla gab med pa nyid ni dag pa dang /grol ba dang /nges par 'byung ba dang /
393b1('dul ba): bde ba dang /sdug bsngal las 'das pa dang /sdug bsngal las 'das pa thob par 'gyuraro zhes chos 'chad kyis/tshe dang ldan pa dag gang su dag brtul zhugs kyi gzhi lnga po 'di dag mi
393b2('dul ba): 'dod pa dang /mi bzod pa dang /yid la mi 'bab pa de ni dge sbyong go'u tA ma las rang du 'gyur/thag ring du 'gyur gyis/de tshul shing long shig ces byas pa dang /dge slong lnga
393b3('dul ba): brgyas tshul shing blangs te/lhas sbyin stan las langs te song ba'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin du dge slong lnga brgya 'brang //tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sgo na 'dug pa des de dag lce sbyin
393b4('dul ba): gyi rjes bzhin du 'brang ba mthong nas des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ci'i phyir/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spangs te/sdig pa
393b5('dul ba): 'dod pa 'di'i rjes bzhin rjes bzhin 'brang /de rnams kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin mu ge'i dgon pa nyam nga ba 'di 'dra ba byung na bcom ldan 'das ni mi snang ba na bzhu
393b6('dul ba): te/bdag cag lhas sbyin gyis mthus srog dang mi bral mod/gal te lhas sbyin gyis zla ba gsum du dge slong gi dge 'dun ma gsos par gyur na/dge slong gcig kyang gson
393b7('dul ba): por mi 'gyur ro//gong gi tshe lhas skyon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'thun pa bya ba de'i tshe/sa chen po 'di g.yos par gyur/skar mda' ltung phyogs
394a1('dul ba): rnams dmar por gyur/bar snang la lha rnams rnga'i sgra 'byin/nges pa la ma zhugs pa rnams nges pa la mi 'jug 'bras bu mi 'thob/'dod chags
394a2('dul ba): dang bral bar mi 'gyur/zag pa rnams zad par mi 'gyur/lung mi 'bogs mi klog mi 'don/mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /chos mngon pa 'dzin pa dang /dgon pa
394a3('dul ba): pa rnams mdo sde dang /'dul ba dang /chos mngon pa dgon par sems pa la rab tu sbyor bar mi byed/nyan thos kyi byang chub kyi sa bon skyed par mi byed cing /rang sangs rgyas
394a4('dul ba): kyi byang chub kyi ma yin la/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ma yin no//lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'gro ba yang 'khrugs par gyur to//stong gsum gyi stong
394a5('dul ba): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi 'khor lo rgyun cha de/sems can gyi rgyud la mi 'byung //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bus bsams pa/ci'i phyi sa
394a6('dul ba): chen po 'di g.yos par gyur snyam//dgra bcom pa rnams ni ma bsams par shes pa mthong ba mi 'jug pas de gnyis kyis bsams pa la zhugs na/lhas sbyin gyis btso
394a7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye bar mthong nas/de gnyis 'di snyam du sems te/song la bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun slar sdums bya'o//snyam mo//
394b1('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan/chos gos zin pa dang ldan nas/chos gos dang lhung
394b2('dul ba): bzed thogs te/rgyal po'i khab gang na ba der rgyu zhing dong nas rim gyis rgyu zhing dong ba dang /rgyal po'i khab du phyin to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bus chos
394b3('dul ba): gos dang /lhung bzod mkhosu phab nas/rkang pa gnyis bkrus te/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ngo //de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin sgo na 'dug/de nas tshe dang ldan pa
394b4('dul ba): sgra gcan zin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras//mkhan po lhas sbyin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phye'o//des smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa
394b5('dul ba): bdag cag don 'di kho na'i phyir 'ongs kyis khyod sems las chung ngur gyis shig/slar sdu mas bya'o zhes smras nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste lhags nas/bcom
394b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal
394b7('dul ba): gyi dus 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa bdag cog de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums bgyid du mchi'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
395a1('dul ba): shA ra bu dang mo'u dgal ste bu dag leg so legs so//ga zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar snrums byed bu da ni bstod nams
395a2('dul ba): mang po tshad med cing grangs med pa skyed par 'gyuraro//dper na 'ga' zhig gis sgra dum bu brgya rabatu bas pa 'phro dang 'phror sbyor bar byed pa de bzhin du gang zhig de bzhin gshegs
395a3('dul ba): pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba skor snrums byed na de ni bsod nams mang po tshad med cing grangs med pa skye bar 'gyuraro//shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi gang zag bzhi po 'di dag
395a4('dul ba): ni tshangs pa'i bstod nams bskyed par 'gyur//bani gang zhe na/gang zag gang zhig sngon mi bzhugs pa'i sa phyogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung gi mchod rten gnas
395a5('dul ba): bar byed pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa'i gang zag dang po yin te/bskal par mtho ris rnams dga' bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang gang zag grang zhig sngon med
395a6('dul ba): pa'i sa phyog su phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gtsugs lag khang byung du 'jug pa 'di ni tshungs pa'i bsod nams bskyed pa'i gang zag gnyis pa yin te/bskal par
395a7('dul ba): mtho ris rnam su dga' bar 'gyuraro//gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye ba slar sdums byed pa'i 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams
395b1('dul ba): skyed pa'i gang zag gsum pa yin te/bskal par mtho ris rnamasu dga' bar 'gyur/gzhan yang gang zag gang zhig byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa/mgranA zla med
395b2('dul ba): poganod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa/tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas/rdzogs par byas te gnas shing /de bzhin du
395b3('dul ba): gnyis pa dang /de bzhin du gsum pa dang /de bzhin du bzhi pa dang /bla dang /'og dang /thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di byams pa dang
395b4('dul ba): ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa mgron zla med pa/gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa shin tu bsgoms pas mos te/khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te
395b5('dul ba): granas pa dang /de bzhin du snying rje dang /dga' ba dang btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems kho na med pa mgran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa/
395b6('dul ba): shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas shing de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /de bzhin du gsum pa dang /de bzhin du bzhi pa dang
395b7('dul ba): bla dang /'og dang /thod kar rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems khon med pa mgran zla med pa/gnod pa med pa/yangs pa rgya
396a1('dul ba): chen po 'gyur ba tshod med pa/shin tu bsgoms pas myos te/khyab par byas nas/rdzogs par byas te/gnas pa 'di ni tshangs pa'i bsod nams bskyed
396a2('dul ba): pa'i gang zag bzhi pa yin te/bskal par mtho ris rnamasu dga' bar 'gyur ro//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dag lci bu/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
396a3('dul ba): pa la mngon par dga' ste/rje su yi rang nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas chas te/lha sbyin
396a4('dul ba): gang na ba der dong ngo //de'i tshe lha sbyin lho phyogs kyi ril ko kA li ka ni de'i g.yas phyogasu bzhag khan daM dAb bya ni g.yon du bzhag nas/sangs rgyas ltar 'chos shing
396a5('dul ba): chos 'chad pa na/lha skyon gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis rgyang ring po kho na nas mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang bsams pa/bdag gis
396a6('dul ba): nyan thos chen po dag kyang dbang du byas pas/da ni bdag thams cad mkhyen pa yino snyam nas ko ka li ka dang /kha na da drab bya la longs shig longs shig ces gru dugs byas
396a7('dul ba): pa dang //de gnyis kyis bsams pa/bdag cag gis 'di ltar 'di dge 'dun 'byed pa'i grogs byas pa de nyid bdag cig gis nyes te/'di mthu dang ldan pa yin pas gal
396b1('dul ba): te/bdag cag brdegs nas gdon mi za bar 'chi bar 'gyur gyis lhung ngo //snyam nas/de gnyis langs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ni g.yas phyogasu 'dug/tshe dang ldan
396b2('dul ba): pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ni g.yon phyogasu 'dug/de nas lha sbyin gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la smras pa/shA ri'i bu de rgyab thugs mi bde ste re shig de bsal gyis khyod dge
396b3('dul ba): slong rnams la chos kyi gtam sboms par gyis/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus cang mi smra bas lha sbyin li khAs blangs//de nas lha sbyin bla gos bzhi bltab tu bting /snam sbyar
396b4('dul ba): btab ste snga su bcug nas glo g.yas pa phab ste/gnyid log pa las/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ji ltar lus gan rgyal gyiso sbur pa'i sgra 'byin cing 'dug pa de lta buro
396b5('dul ba): byin gyis brlabaso//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge slong rnams la smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa dag ston pa lus gan rkyal gyis skur cing ginyid log pa'i gnas skabs la ltos
396b6('dul ba): de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa mi'u dgal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras//tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po 'khor rnams skyo ba skyed cig/de nas tshe dang
396b7('dul ba): ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag na/shar phyogs kyi steng gi na mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/spyod la mo rnam pa bani byed de 'chag pa
397a1('dul ba): dang 'bring ba dang /'dug pa dang nyal ba spyod//ma'i ting 'dzin la snyoms phyur 'jug ste/mar ting 'dzin lnga snyoms par zhugs pa na tshe dang ldan pa
397a2('dul ba): mo'u dgal gyi bu chen po'i lus las 'odi zer sbyin pa dang /ser po dang /dmang po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka/dang /shes gyi kha dog dge 'byin par byed//tshe 'phrul
397a3('dul ba): zung du yang ston par byed/lus kyi skad nas mi'i bar bar byed cing rgyas kyi spyod nas rgyu mang ma'i rgyun 'bebs par byed//lus r+b+ba snod nas mi 'bor bar byed cing lus kyi
397a4('dul ba): sma nus r+b+ba glai ma rkyen 'babs par byed pa de lta 'i ting 'dzin pa snyoms par zhug so//shA daphyogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs nga/byang
397a5('dul ba): yid de bzhin te/phyogs bzhid rdzu 'phrul gyi tshe 'phrul rnam pa dz+nyAn bsnun nas rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du byed pa de dag bsdusate/spyan pa shams pa nyid la 'dug pa
397a6('dul ba): dang de tshe dang ldan pa mo'u dgal gyi rje chen pos dge slong rnams skye ba bskyed//de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus dge sbyong de rnams kyis gang byis na b+hU sbyin spyod bur 'gyur ba
397a7('dul ba): de lta 'i chos bshad nas yid sgrub po/tshe dang ldan pa dag khyod cag yos gang dag ston pa le dgra' ba de dag ni las shig 'ding ngo zhes tshad rdzun pa shA ri'i bung ba
397b1('dul ba): dgal kyi thas nyis nas blan/dran smyanams nga de rnaMs na na drung gan smyung ba yongs yongs rgyanam tshon ba dag gos dzin dak+Sha/
397b2('dul ba): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/gal+le te sbyin gyi 'khor ma mthong bar khrid na khrig dron du skyugs nas 'tsho bar 'byung ba'i gnas gang yin pa 'di yod kyis mdo
397b3('dul ba): namanong pa kho nar byes la bkri'i snyam nas/de dag dal gyis 'gro bya'i spyod lam gyis dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /lhan cig dong ba na/lha sbyin kun nas dkris pa drag pos mig
397b4('dul ba): sdog cing bstsags pa las/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'obs mchog tu 'jig su rung ba sa'i gting snang ba zhig sprul pa dang /lha sbyin ko ko li kl-i dang khan+t+ra drab byA dang /ka tA mo ra
397b5('dul ba): ke ti sh+ya dang rgya mtshos byin rnams dang lhan cig 'obs de'i mtha' kun tu bskor ba rung rnams bya na/rmilam nus nas des bsnams po/'khor mi 'thob par mthong tshul ma yin
397b6('dul ba): par sdug bsnol bar 'gyur snyam du dasums nas skur log/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang mo'u dgal gyi bus kyang dge slong gi dge 'dun khrid nas bcom ldan 'das gdon pa der dang
397b7('dul ba): de nas dge slong de rnams bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa spangs nas/lha sbyin sdig pa can la rton pa ci tha tshig ces 'gyod pa skyes yid lags
398a1('dul ba): pa skyes/yul yul por byas/phrag pa bcu ma mgo smad/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dang //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs kyis dge slong da
398a2('dul ba): rnams kyi sems mkhyen nas/dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed 'ongs pa leg so//rab tu byung ba leg so//khyed kyis mi'i rnyed pa ni legs par rnyed pa
398a3('dul ba): yin te/brgya lam nA lan 'ga' 'phags pa'i gan su skye ba dang /dbang po mtshungs pa ma yin pa dang /glen pa ma yin pa dang /lug ltar lkugs pa ma yin pa dang /lag
398a4('dul ba): brda' byed pa ma yin zhing legs par smras pa dang /nyes par smras pa rnams kyi chos kyi don shes par nus brgya lam na lan 'ga' de bzhini gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
398a5('dul ba): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung /brgya la ma nA lan 'ga' de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba 'jig rten la chos bshad
398a6('dul ba): pabapasnang //dge slong dag de lta bas na rnyed par dka' ba bas kyang shin tu dka' ba ni 'di yin te/'di lta ste/'phags pa'i gan su skye ba dang /dbang po ma tshung ba ma yin
398a7('dul ba): pa dang /glen pa ma yin pa dang /lug ltar lkugs pa ma yin pa dang /lag brda' byed pa ma yin zhing legs par smras pa dang /nyes par smras pa rnams kyi chos kyi don shre/
398b1('dul ba): par nus pa'o//da ltar 'jig rten du ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabasu ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig
398b2('dul ba): rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba/khaM lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang /mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas rjes dbyung zhing chos bshad pa de nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ba yo su mya ngan lnga 'ang
398b3('dul ba): 'gyuranamangon par byang chub par 'gyur pa bde bar gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa 'di lta ste/'di yod pos 'di 'byung la/'di skyes pas 'di skye ba/'di lta ste ma rig pa'i
398b4('dul ba): rkyen gyis 'du byed 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/rnam par shes pa'i rkyen byis ming dang gzugs/ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/skye mched drug gi
398b5('dul ba): rkyen gyis reg pa/rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/sred pa'i rkyen kwi ba len pa/len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/skye ba'i
398b6('dul ba): rkyen gyis rga shi dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mo bde ba dang /'khrul pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshon po
398b7('dul ba): 'ba' zhig po 'di 'byung bar 'gyuraro//'di lta ste 'di med pas 'di mi 'byung la/'di 'gags pas 'di 'gag par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ma rig pa 'gegs pas 'du byed
399a1('dul ba): 'gag 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ming dang gzugs 'gags
399a2('dul ba): pas skye mched drug 'gag/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag/tshor ba 'gags pa dgrin pa 'gag/sred pa 'gags
399a3('dul ba): bas lon pa 'gag/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag/srid pa 'gag pas skye ba 'gag/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /mya nga na gam+ba sngags 'don pa dang /byu ga
399a4('dul ba): bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di 'galnga dang 'gyu ro//dge slong dag de
399a5('dul ba): lta bas na bdag gi don dang /gzhan gyi don dang /gnyi ka'i don la rje su lta ba rnams kyis ni 'di la rab tu bslab par bya ste/ci nas kyang rab tu byung ba don yod pa dang /
399a6('dul ba): 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang /bde ba skyed pa dang /rnam par smin pa bde ba dang /gang dag gis chos gos dang /bsod snyoms dang /gnas mal dang /nad kyi rkyen
399a7('dul ba): sman gyi yo byad rnams la yongasu longs spyod pa de dag la ci nas kyang de dag gis phan btags pa'i 'bras bu shin tu che ba dang /phan yon che ba dang /gze byin che ba dang /
399b1('dul ba): shing rgyu che bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge slong dag khyod kyis bsgrub par bya'o//gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de rnams lnga 'ongs pa lag so zhes bya ba dang /rab tu byung
399b2('dul ba): leg so//zhes bya ba gsungs pa de'i tshe de rnams kyi zhum pa dang /mi dga' ba dang /'gyod pa dang /rnam par 'gyod pa dang /yid la gcags pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad
399b3('dul ba): kyi thams cad du bral bar gyur to//de nas dge slong gzhan rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshomya thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa bcos
399b4('dul ba): kyis phrin las ci zhig mdzad na/phrin las de rnam par smin pas bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye bar gyur logs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
399b5('dul ba): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs gzhan rnamasu phrin las byas shing bsags pa dang /tshogs rnyed pa dag ni zhes bya ba nas lus can dag la 'bras
399b6('dul ba): bur 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong dag sngon byung ba'i bsti gnas rtsa ba dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /chu phun sum tshogs pa dang /
399b7('dul ba): shing sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/bya'i tshogs du mas bstan pa gzhan zhig na/drang srong lnga brgya'i gtso bo drang srong zhig gnaso//ji tsam na drang srong gzhan zhig
400a1('dul ba): ljongs rgyu zhing song ban bsti gnas der byin na drang srong des de la bkur bsti legs par ma byas pas de mi bzod pa skyes nas de'i 'khor 'byed par byed de/drang
400a2('dul ba): srong sdig pa 'dod pa 'di cung zad kyang mi shes na/ci ste de'i drung na 'dug/tshur kho bo dang lhan cig 'dong ngo //kho bos khyed rnams mngon par shes pa lnga rnams la rab tu dgod do
400a3('dul ba): zhes des de rnams phye bas drang srong de'i gdams ngag nyan du mi btub bo//drang srong des bsams pa/sdig pa byed pa 'dis bdag gi drang srong 'di rnams phye'o snyam na des
400a4('dul ba): de la bzhams te smra bar brtsams pa/tshe dang ldan pa 'khor 'byed par ma byed cig/'di ni drang srong gi chos ma yin//'on kyang de 'byed bzhin te/'dug tu ma btub nas drang
400a5('dul ba): srong de yod mi bde zhing thabs shig sems shing gnaso//sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa na/'jig rten du rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang /ngan pa la snying brtse ba
400a6('dul ba): can bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba 'jig rten gyi yon gnas gcig pu rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas/de nas rang sangs rgyas zhig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na/drang
400a7('dul ba): srong de'i bsti gnasu phyin pa dang /drang srong des de'i lus mdzes pa dang spyod lam zhi ba mthong ngo //mthong nas des de la dad pa bskyed nas des de la bya ba byas te/smon lam
400b1('dul ba): log par btang pa/drang srong sdig pa can gang yin pa des bdag gi 'khor phye bas bdag gis shes bya thams cad la dbang thob na yang 'khor 'byed pa byed par gyur cig ces byaso//
400b2('dul ba): dge slong dag ji snyam du sems de'i tshe de'i dus kyi ljongs kyi drang srong gang gis de'i 'khor phye ba de ni nga nyid yino//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi gnyug mar gnas pa'i drang srong gang yin/
400b3('dul ba): pa de ni lhas sbyin yin te ngas de'i 'khor phye ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yin pa des na smon lam log par btab nas sung /'dis nga'i dge 'dun phye ba yin no//
400b4('dul ba): dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag po rnams kyi zhes bya ba nas dge slong dag khyed kyis de lta bu la bslab par bya'o//zhes bya ba'i bar gong ma bzhin du'o//dge slong /
400b5('dul ba): rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lhas sbyin gyi phyi ba dag ni nang par bgyis/nang ba dag ni phyi bar bgyi
400b6('dul ba): pas 'khor 'phrogs pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyis 'di 'bo' zhig tu ma zad de/ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang
400b7('dul ba): 'dis phyi ba dag ni nang par byas/nang pa dag ni phyi bar byas pas 'khor phrogs pa de nyon cigadage slong dag sngon byung ba phyogs shig na/srog chags lnga zhig nas

401a6('dul ba): sus kyi kha dog sngon ma mthong ba las ni/gdon me ba bar du kho nA yin snyam nas/la rnams kyis rgyung bzhi pa sems cad la rig par byas//steng gyi rnams kyis
401a7('dul ba): bsams pa/bdag cag las khyad par du 'phags pa su zhig yod na/de nang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal por 'gyur/re zhig dong la/rang gi tshogs kyi dpon pa la rig
401b1('dul ba): par bya'o//snyam nas/de rnams kyi tshogs kyi dpon po ral pa can zhig ri'i phyogs zhig na gnas pa de la de rnams kyis smras pa dang /des rkang bzhi pa gzhan zhig la bsgo
401b2('dul ba): pabasong la/rkang bzhi pa'i dpon de rkang bzhi pa 'ga' zhig gis mthong ngam/ma mthong rtogs shig/de de'i drung du song ste brtags na/sngon ma mthong ba yin zhing seng ge
401b3('dul ba): rnamaso ma gtogs par rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor bar gyur nas/de de'i drung du song ste/ji ltar mthong ba dag smras pa/des thos nas seng ge'i tshogs yongasu
401b4('dul ba): bskor te de'i drung du dong ngo //de ni rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor cing /glang po che la zhon nas rgyu ba na seng ge rnams kyis yongasu bskor cing de nas ni stag rnamaso//
401b5('dul ba): de nas ni rkang bzhi pa rnamaso//de rnams kyi phyi rim rgyang ring po nas ni wa rnams 'dong ngo //de'i ma ri sul zhig na gnas pa de la des wa zhig mdags te/pus rgyal srid
401b6('dul ba): tam su myong gis tshur spyon cig ces spring pa dang /des smras pa/de'i 'khor ci 'dra ba zhig/des smras pa de'i 'khor nang pa ni/seng ge dang /stag dang /glang po che
401b7('dul ba): dag yin no//phyi ba ni bdag cag nyid yin//des smras pa/ma rung zin gyis song shig/des tshig su bcad pas kyang smras pa/bdag ni raM 'di'i sul na bder
402a1('dul ba): gnas shing /bsil ba'i tshul bstod snyoms 'thung bar byed//dwe ni ji srid zhwa smra mi grag pa//de ni glang ba che yis bder 'gro 'gyur//de sang
402a2('dul ba): des wa rnams la smras pa/rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi rgyal po 'dri ni waM kho na yin te/bdag gis de'i mA ri su la ga ge zhes bya ba 'dug pa mthong //de rnams kyis smras pa
402a3('dul ba): gal te de lta na de wa yin nam/ma yin pa wa bdag cag gis brtag/chos nyid kyi wa rnams ni gang zhig gis wa skod thos nas skad ma phyung na de'i spu rnamasa'i bye bar 'gyur
402a4('dul ba): bas/wa skad dbyung bar brtsams nas des bsams pa/gal te bdag gis skad ma byung na ni gdon mi za bar bdag gi spu rnams 'bye bar 'gyur li/gal te glang po
402a5('dul ba): che las babs nas skad phyung na ni 'dis bdag bsad du 'ong gi 'di nyid du skad dbyung snyam nas/des glang po che la zhon bzhin du skad dbyung bar btsams pa dang /glang po
402a6('dul ba): ches shes nas/wa bdag la bzhon nam zhes des de bor te/rkang pas brdziso//lhas tshig su bcad smras pa/gang dag nang pa phyi ba dang /phyi ba nang par byed de dag
402a7('dul ba): 'di 'dra bar ni brlag 'gyur te//glang po che yis wa bzhin no//dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi wa gang yin pa de ni/lhas sbyin 'di nyid yin te/
402b1('dul ba): d+han+ya yang 'dis nud pa dag ni phyi rol par byas/phyi rnam pa dag ni na par byas pasdu/tshul ma yin pa sdu sdug bsngal bar gyur to//da ltar yang 'dis nang pa dag ni phyi rol par byas/
402b2('dul ba): phyi rol pa dag nI nang par byas pas 'khor rnams phrogs par gyur to//glang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin gyi 'khor phrogs pa de'i
402b3('dul ba): tshe/lha sbyin gyis ko ka li ka dang /kha na da drab bye la khyed gnyis kyis nga'i 'khor 'phrog tu bcugo zhes brdag so//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad
402b4('dul ba): gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa lha sbyin gyi 'khor ni gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la 'dis sdug bsngal bskyed po la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das
402b5('dul ba): kyis bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag da ltar gyi 'di 'ba' zhig tu ma zode/de ji ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang 'di'i chung ma gzhan gyis phrogs la/gzhan dag la tshul ma yin
402b6('dul ba): pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed pa de nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba/phyogs gzhan zhig na/glang po che'i tshogs shig gnas//de na glang po che zhig ba lang mo zhig la sdug
402b7('dul ba): par 'dzin na/de na glang po che'i phru gu gzhan zhig yod pa la lhag par chags nas/des glang po che'i phru gu de la smras pa/tshor du 'ong gis bdag cag 'bros sam/de nas
403a1('dul ba): glang po che'i phru gu des smras pa/gang gis na bdag cag 'bros pa'i thabs ci yod des smras pa/bdag gis thabs sheso zhes des glang po che de la
403a2('dul ba): smras pa/khrus bya ba'i phyir rdzing du 'jug par bya'o//de zhugs pa dang /des smras pa/bdag cag la su yun ring du nub par 'dug pa blta'o//blun po'i phung po
403a3('dul ba): tsan de dang lhan cig chu nang du nub par 'dug pa na de langs te/glang po che'i phru gu dang lhan cig broso//glang po che ring zhig 'dug nas langs na/mi snang nas dbras bsams
403a4('dul ba): pa/bdag pham par 'gyur du 'ong gis slar yang nub par bya'o snyam nas/des slar yang nub par byas nas mche ba sa la btsugs te 'dug/de ring zhig lon nas dbug
403a5('dul ba): do chad de langs na/glang po che mo de ma mthong nas/des rdzing bu dro phan tshun du dkrug par brtsams pa dang /des der nya dang ru sbal dang /sbal pa la sogs pa srog chaDa
403a6('dul ba): mang po tshul ma yin pas/sdug bsngal bar byas//lhas tshigasu bcad smras pa/kye ma'o sha yi phung po che//'di la shes rab yod ma yin//gzhan gyis chud ma
403a7('dul ba): phrogs gyur na//gzhan la sdug bsngal sten par byed/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi glang po che dam pa gang yin pa de ni/lha sbyin yin te/
403b1('dul ba): de na yang chung ma gzhan gyis phrags la//gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal bskyed//da ltar yang 'khor gzhan gyis phrogs la gzhan la tshul ma yin pa'i sdug bsngal
403b2('dul ba): bskyod//sdom ni////glags dang mthong ba nyid dang ni//ud pal mdog ni bsad pa dang //ril ba dang gsum 'o ma dang //sa tshe ma dang bzod gsol dang //glang dang
403b3('dul ba): sems pa nyid dang ni//bya dang tha ma bzhi yin no//dge slong rnams the tshom skyes te/the tshom thams cad gcod pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/btsun pa che
403b4('dul ba): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /mo'u dgal gyi bu gnyis kyis lha sbyin la glags btsal ba las/glags rnyed pa la gzigs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dge

403b6('dul ba): nyon cig/dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri bor zhig na/'phong gi slob dpon zhig gnas te/des rigs mnyam pa las chung mo blangs nas//de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga'
403b7('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed//de rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed pa las/dus gzhan zhig na chung ma sems can dang ldan par gyur te//
404a1('dul ba): de zla ba brgyad dum/dgu lon pa na du ma zhig bcas nas zhug bdun gsum nyi shu rtsa gcig tu de'i bcus pa'i bcas ston rgya cher byas nas rigs
404a2('dul ba): dang 'thun pa'i ming btags te//de bskyed bsrings nas chen mor gyur to//'phong gi slob dpon gyis bsams pa/bu mo 'di ni bdag gis gzugs dang ldan pa 'am
404a3('dul ba): tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'am/nor tsan su le yang sbyin par mi bya ste/bon kyang bdag las gnas lnga bslabs te/byang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la bdag gis 'di
404a4('dul ba): sbyi na sgyu mo//de las bram ze'i khye'u gnyis shig 'phong bslabs pa las de na cig ni gnas lnga la byang bar gyur to//cig shos kyis ni bcod pa la byang bar gyur to//
404a5('dul ba): de gnyis las gnas lnga la byang bar gyur pa gang yin pa de la/des bu mo byin pa dang /cig shos po de ni mi bzod pa skyes nas chom rkun pa rnams kyi nang du zhugs te/
404a6('dul ba): tsho dun lnga brgya'i sde dpon du gyur nas/de phyogs gcig cig na lam btsal nas 'khod//snga ma po des/bu mo de bag mar blangs nas/mda' lnga brgya shong ba'i
404a7('dul ba): dong pa gnyis thogasate/shing rngur zhugs nas rang gi khyim du dang //ji tsam na tshong pa tshim rkun gyis 'jigs pa mdun du dong bsdad pa dang /des smras pa/shes ldan
404b1('dul ba): dod shig ci sdod/de rnams kyis smras pa/chom rkun pa rnams kyis lAm bcud//des smras pa/chur ci zhig byar yod ces de chas pa dang /tshong pa de rnams kyis smras pa/
404b2('dul ba): shes ldan dag re zhig sdog cig/'di ni 'gro la rag ste/'di bdag nyid 'chi ba dang /chung ma phrogs par 'gyur ba'i gnas gang yin pa de yod do//rkun po rnams shing ljon
404b3('dul ba): pa zhig le 'dzegs nas/phyogasu lta bar byed cing 'dug pa dang /de rnams kyis de shing rtar zhugs pa mthong nas/de rnams kyis smras pa/shes ldan dag mi zhig shing rnyer
404b4('dul ba): zhugs nas 'ong ngo //chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gyis de la pho nye zhig btang ste/shing rta slar bzlog pa dang /des smras pa/shes ldan dag dpa' bo la dpa' bo'i lan byin cig
404b5('dul ba): de rnams kyis smras pa/bdag cag kyang dpa' bo yino zhes sde dpon gyis mi rgod lnga brgya btang ba dang /des de rnams bas do//de bzhin du nyi shu zhig 'ongs pa de rnams kyang
404b6('dul ba): bas de/ji tsam na thams cad bsad nas/chom rkun pa'i sde dpon 'ba' zhig lus pa dang /des ral gri blangs te mdun du bsdadado//des mda' 'phangs par brtsams pa na//
404b7('dul ba): de'i ral gris btub so//ji tsam na des mda' lnga brgya 'phangs pa de dag thams cad des btubs nas/mda' gcig cig lus te des de ma 'phangs pa dang /bu mo des
405a1('dul ba): smras pa/mnga' bzhag ste ci bgyi phongs shig/des smras pa/mda' 'di 'ba' zhig lus te//'di 'phangs mkho bo bsad nas/khyod kyang
405a2('dul ba): phrogs par 'gyur ro//de nas bu mo des lus kyi sgyur stangs kyis ldan bu bcos par brtsams pa na/de la chom rkun pa'i sde dpon rtog par byed pa na/des de'i gnad
405a3('dul ba): du mdas bsnun pa dang /de 'chi ka na tshigasu btsod smras pa/shing rta can gyis bdag ma bsad//'dod chags sdig pa'i sems kyis ni//bdag ni grayul gyi dbus//
405a4('dul ba): zhugs nas//bag med bzhin la blta bas bskrad/dge slong dag ji snyam du sems/de'i tshe de'i dus kyi shing rta can gang yin pa de ni shA ri'i bu 'di nyid yin no//
405a5('dul ba): de'i tshe de'i dus kyi bu mo gang yin pa de ni/mo'u dgal gyi bu yin no//de'i tshe de'i dus kyi chom rkun pa'i sde dpon gang yin pa de ni lha sbyin yin te/de na yang 'di
405a6('dul ba): gnyis kyis de la glags bcol ba las glags rnyed de//da ltar yang 'di gnyis kyis de la glags btsal ba las glags rnyed//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal
405a7('dul ba): po'i khab 'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed kyi a mra'i tshal na dbyar bzhugs par zhal gyis bzhes//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra dbyar nye bA
405b1('dul ba): bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nye dbu ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo yin par shes shing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo la//blon po'i tshogs kyi yongasu bskor te/steng gi khang bzangs kyi gzhir song
405b2('dul ba): nas blon po rnams la smras pa/kye grong pa dag dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa/dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma de nyid kyi mtshan mo yin par shes shing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu langs
405b3('dul ba): ci zhig bya/de nas pho brang slas kyi bud med cig gis/lus 'phags ma'i bu rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smraso//lha dbyar nye bar bsgrub par dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya
405b4('dul ba): dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pa sa/rol par mdzad/dgyes par mdzad/dgyes dgur
405b5('dul ba): spyod par mdzad na/lha'i bgyi bo ni de lags pa snyam/bdag sems lag so//des pho brang slas gzhan zhig gis yang 'di skad ces smraso//lha dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa
405b6('dul ba): dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan pas/rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer
405b7('dul ba): kyi nye 'khor gyi shul phra mo rnams byul zhing rol par mjed/dgyes par mdzad/dgyes dgur spyad par mdzad na/lha'i bgyi ba ni de legs pa snyam/bdag sems
406a1('dul ba): lags//gzhon+d+ra 'char byed bzang pos 'di skud ces smras//stu dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa dashAr zla 'brang ba'i nyu bu ma'i mtshan ma lags par mkhyen/
406a2('dul ba): cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la lha dpung gis tsho gas yan lag bzhi pa/glang po che'i tshogs dang /dzI pa'i tshogs dang /shing rta pa'i tshogs dang /dpung bu chung
406a3('dul ba): gi tshogs go skon nas gzhan gyi yul 'khor dang /gzhan gyi yul du gshegs te/g.yul chen po'i g.yul sprad nas/g.yul las rgyal bar bgyis te/rgyal
406a4('dul ba): nas g.yul de nyid las pags te zhugs na lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lagaso//de nas blon po rgan po gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras//lha
406a5('dul ba): dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi ma 'di lta bu la lha 'od srung rdzogs byed 'dus pa can tshogs can tshogs
406a6('dul ba): kyi slob dpon skye bo mngo bos gzugs bzang por bkur ba/skye bo mang pos mdun gyi bkur ba kun tu 'tsho lte brgya'i gtso bo de rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par dam ban+de
406a7('dul ba): pa de la lte bsnyen bkur mdzod cing /lha'i dgyi ba ni de la gso ba snum bdag sems lags//yang blon pa rgan po gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces smras//lha da
406b1('dul ba): nye bar bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya dbu ma'i mtshan mo legs par mkhyen cing /mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la/kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu dang /slu 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu
406b2('dul ba): yang dag rgyal ba can dang mi 'pham skya'i la ba can dang /ka t+ya'i bu nog can dang /lha gtsor bu pa gnyen gyi bu 'dus pa can tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo mang pos gzugs
406b3('dul ba): bzang por bkur ba/tshogs chen pos mdun gyi bltas pa zhig mchis te/de rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid du dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa de la lha bsnyen bkur mdzod cing /
406b4('dul ba): lha'i bgyi ba ni de la gsal snyam bdagu sems lagaso//de'i tshe 'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed 'khor de nyid kyi nong na 'dus shing 'dug par gyur to//de nas lus 'phags ma'i
406b5('dul ba): bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed la smras pa/kA'e 'tshe byed tso'i phyir cang mi smra/ci cung zad mi smra 'am/lha dbyar nye bar bsgrub pa dbyar zla 'bring po'i
406b6('dul ba): nywa'i mtshan mo lags par mkhyen cing mngon pa'i zla nyi mo 'di lta bu la//lce bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa can tshogs can tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo mang bas gzugs bzang
406b7('dul ba): ngor bkur ba/tshogs chen pos mdun gyi bltas pa de rgyal po'i khab 'di nyid kyi bdag gi a mra'i tshal na dbyar bzhu ru bar zhal gyis bzhos pa de la lha bsnyen bkur
407a1('dul ba): mdzod cig/lha'i bgyi ba ni de lags pa snyam bdag sems lags//de'i tshe lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das la
407a2('dul ba): sems gzhol bar gyur/bcom ldan 'das la 'bab par gyur/bcom ldan 'das la bab par gyur to//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bum gau d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras
407a3('dul ba): 'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed la 'di skad ces smraso//'tsho byed song la glang po che'i dam pa chen po stod cig dang /de la kho bo zhon nas bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i phyir 'gro'o//
407a4('dul ba): lha bko' bzhin 'tshal zhes 'tshe byed gzhi nus bskyed kyis lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas glang po che ngem pa chen po de dang po lang mo lha
407a5('dul ba): brgya tsam bstad nas pho brang slas lag na sgron ma thogs pa lnga brgya tsam ba lang mo re re zhon nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra gang na ba der song ste phyin nas
407a6('dul ba): lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ge d+ha'i rgyal po mo skyes dgra la 'di skad ces smras//lha glang po che'i dam pa chen po bsgron lags te/lha da de'i dus la bab par mkhyen par mdzad du
407a7('dul ba): gsol/de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu mo pa d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra glang po che dam pa chen po la zhon nas po breng slas lag na sgron ma thogs pa lnga brgya tsam pa lang mo re re zhon
407b1('dul ba): sa mdun du bdar nas rgyal ba'i khab nas byung ste/bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar sad+mo//de'i tshe lus 'phags rAhA/
407b2('dul ba): bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra yul sbeng byed pa rnams dang mi 'thun par gyur to//de nas lus 'phags mi'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dge rgyal po'i khab nas byung ma thag kho nar bdag
407b3('dul ba): byed gzho nus bskyed 'dis bsad par 'dod pa 'am/bslu bar 'dod pa 'am/khas len du gzhug par 'dod pa 'am/gshed ma pa 'am/phyir rgol ba 'am/mi mdza' ba dag la
407b4('dul ba): gtad par mi 'dod grang snyam du bsams nas skrag par gyur/bag tsha bar gyur/spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed la 'di skad ces smra so//'tsho byed kho
407b5('dul ba): la bsad par 'dod pa 'am/bslu bar 'dod pa 'am/khas len du gzhug par 'dod pa 'am/gshed dam pa 'am/phyir rgol ba 'am/mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par mi 'dod
407b6('dul ba): grang /des 'di skad ces smra so//lha khyod la bdag dgongs par 'tshal ba 'am/bsgre bar 'tshal ba 'am/sgrar gzhug par 'tshal ba 'am/gshed ma pa 'am/phyir rgol
407b7('dul ba): bi 'am/mi mdza' ba dag la gtad par 'tshal ba ma leg so//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras/'tsho byed gzho nus bskyed la 'di skad ces
408a1('dul ba): smraso//'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das de la 'khor ci yod/dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu lhag tsa mo//e ma'o 'tsho byed khyod kyis nga ji ltar bsang
408a2('dul ba): bar mi 'dod/bslu bar mi 'dod/sbyor gzhug par mi 'dod/gshed ma pa 'am/phyir rgol ba dang /mi mdze' ba dag la gtod par mi 'dod/da ltar bcom ldan
408a3('dul ba): 'das de la 'khor de snyed yod na/lu ba'i sgra yang mi glago/sbrid pa'i sgra yang mi grago/lha bcom ldan 'das de ni sgra chung ba bzhed/sgra chung ba la dgyes/sgra chung bas
408a4('dul ba): 'dul/sgre chung ba'i bsngags pa mdzad pas 'khor yang sgra chung ba nyid//lha de lta bas na myur bar glang po che dam pa chen po thob shig/'di ltar 'khor gyi khyam ne 'bru mar
408a5('dul ba): gyi zhugs mAr gyi 'od gda'o//de nas lus 'phags me'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgras myur ba myur bar glang po che'i dam pa chen po btab nas des ji tsam gzhon pas
408a6('dul ba): rung ba'i sa'i bar du gzhon pa dang song ste/gzhon pa las babs nas rkang pa kho nas kun dga' ra bi'i nang du zhugaso//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi
408a7('dul ba): gung la mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la rnyog pa med par bzhugaso//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'khor gyi khyams dang nye bar son nas 'cha
408b1('dul ba): byed gzhon nu bskyed la smras pa/'tsho byed bcom ldan 'das de gang na bzhugs/lha bcom ldan 'das de ni dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la mtsho ltar dang sa'i gas byas la la
408b2('dul ba): rnyog pa med pa ro bzhugs pa pha bi kho na logaso//de nas lus 'phags ma'i bu ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste/nges bla gos phrag

408b4('dul ba): to//btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thugs dul ba nye bar zhi ba ji lta bu dang ldan pa de bzhin du gzhonu 'char byed bzang ba yang sems dul ba dang /1
408b5('dul ba): bar zhi ba de 'dra ba dang ldan par gyur cig/rgyal po chen po rang nyid dga' ba rab tu bstan pa legaso legaso//rgyal po chen po rang gi stan la 'dug shig/de nas lus 'phar

409a1('dul ba): phye ba lta na/bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lagaso//rgyal po chen po ci dang ci 'dod pa zhus shig/btsun pa las kyi gnas dang /bzo'i
409a2('dul ba): gnas tha dad pa gang lags pa 'di lta ste/phreng brgyud pa dang smyug ma mkhan dang /gdan pa dang /rtswa thun dang /'dul mkhan dang /glang po che la 'tshal ba dang /rta la

409a7('dul ba): 'dul ba gzhi//bam po brgya drug pa//rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'di 'dra ba'i zhu ba 'di las sngon dge sbyong dang /bram ze gzhan rnams la dris pa dran nam/btsun
409b1('dul ba): pa dran lags te/btsun pa dus gcig cig na bdag 'od srung rdzogs byed gang na ba der mchis te/mchis nas 'od srung rdzogs byed la bdag gis 'di skad ces btsun pa 'od srung

409b5('dul ba): gnas rnams kyi bya ba byed cing /sbyin pa dag gtong bsod nams dag byed la/gso ba rnams gso zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas rtse bar byed/dga'
409b6('dul ba): bar byed/dga' dgur spyod par byed na/de lta bu rnams la yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu gdags pa 'thob bam zhes dris pa na/de 'di skad ces
409b7('dul ba): rgyal po bdag ni 'di ltar lto zhing 'di skad smra ste/sbyin pa mdo//mchod sbyin medo//sbyin sreg medo//legs par spyad pa medo//nyes par spyad pa medo//legs par
410a1('dul ba): spyad pa dang /nyes par spyad pa'i las rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mdo//'jig rten 'di medado//'jig rten pha rol med//ma mdo//pha
410a2('dul ba): med do//sems can brdzus te skye ba medo//'jig rten na dgra bcom pa yang dag par song ba yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag tshe 'di nyid la rang gi mngon par shes pas

410a4('dul ba): mi sheso zhes gro bar byed pa dag medo//srog ni 'di nyid la 'tsho zhing de phyis chad par 'gyur/zhig par 'gyur te/shi ba'i 'og tu mi 'byung //skyes bu'i lus ni 'byung
410a5('dul ba): ba chen po bzhi las gyur pa yin te/de ni gang gi tshe shi ba na de'i sa'i lus ni sa'i bag la zha/chu'i lus ni chu'i/me'i lus ni mo'i/rlung gi lus ni rlung gi bag la na
410a6('dul ba): bar 'gyuraro//dbang po rnams ni na mkha'i rjesu 'gro bar 'gyuraro//skyes bu'i ro ni khri dang /lnga'i mi dag gis khyer te dur khrod du 'gro zhing bsregs phan chad mi mngon par
410a7('dul ba): 'gyur//bsregs bye dag ni thal bar 'gyuraro//rus pa dag ni tho ba'i mdog 'dre bar gnaso//'di ltar rmongs pas nye bar bsten pa ni sbyin la/mkhas pas
410b1('dul ba): bar bstan pa ni len to//de la gang dag yod par smra ba de dag thams cad ni gsob gsog brdzun du smra ba rdol pa yin no//'di ltar byis pa dang mkhas pa de gnyis ni phyis chad par
410b2('dul ba): 'gyur zhig par 'gyur te/shi ba'i 'og tu mi 'byung zhes mchi ste/btsun pa dper na mi zhig a mra'i 'bras bu rnams dris na la ku tsa'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid

410b4('dul ba): gyis 'bras bu dris na/ma mchis pa nyid lung ston par bgyid na/btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu/mkhas pas gzugaso bzang
410b5('dul ba): por bkur ba yul na gnyug mar gnas pa'i dge sbyong ngam bram ze la mngon sum du smad pa ni bdag gi cha ma lagaso snyam nas/bo tsun pa bdag gis 'od srungs rdzogs byed

410b7('dul ba): nas/bdag kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu gang na ba der mchis te mchis nas/kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la 'di skad ces btsun pa kun tu rgyu 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas
411a1('dul ba): dang /bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/phyed brgyad pa dang /smyug ma mkhan dang /gdan pa dang /rtswa thun dang /'dul mkhan
411a2('dul ba): dang /glang po che la zhon pa dang /shing rta mkhan dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /gzhu'i 'dri na stangs pa po dang /zham 'bring byed pa dang /gor long dang /bro gar len pa dang

411a6('dul ba): 'di ltar ste zhing 'di skad ces smra ste/sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba la rgyu med rkyen med do//sems can rnams rgyu med rkyen med par kun nas nyon

411b1('dul ba): rnams shes pa med par 'gyur ba dang /mthong ba med par 'gyur ba la/rgyu med rkyen med do//sems can rnams rgya med rkyen med par shes pa med pa dang /mthong ba med par

411b7('dul ba): dros na a mra'i 'bras bu rnams lung ston par bgyid pa de bzhin du kun tu rgyu gnag lhas kyi bu la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu des na//

412a5('dul ba): can las kyi gnas dang gzo'i gnas gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/phreng brgyud pa dang /smyug ma mkhan dang /gden po dang /rtsa thun dang /'dul mkhan dang /glang po che/
412a6('dul ba): la zhon pa dang /rta la zhon pa dang /shing rta mkhan dang /ral gri'i thabs dang /gzhu'i 'dzin stangs pa dang /zham 'bring byed pa dang /go re long dang /bro gar len pa

412b3('dul ba): rgyal po chen po bdag ni 'di ltar lta zhing 'di skad smra ste/byed pa dang /byed du 'jug pa dang /gcod pa dang /ge co du 'jug pa dang /sreg pa dang /sreg tu 'jug pa dang /rdeg
412b4('dul ba): po dang /rdeg tu 'jug pa dang /srog chags la 'chi ba dang /ma byin par len pa dang /'dod pa dag la log par spyod pa dang /shes bzhin du brdzun du smra ba dang /myos par
412b5('dul ba): 'gyur ba'i ltung ba 'thung ba dang /khyim 'bugs pa dang /mdud po 'grol ba dang /ral gris 'phrog pa dang /lo mo 'gog cing 'dug pa dang /grong 'joms par byed pa
412b6('dul ba): dang /grong khyer 'joms par byed pa dang /yul 'joms par byed pa dang /sa gzhi chen po 'di la sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad 'khor lo'i mtha' spro gri la
412b7('dul ba): byas pas/de dag thams cad kun tu gcod par byed/kun tu 'tshogs par byed/kun tu rdung bar byed/kun tu 'dral bar byed cing de dag thams cad kun tu bca
413a1('dul ba): rgyunanan du/na /nan ldanan nas mnas/du na nanan tu rgyu rgyu gtsug /

413b1('dul ba): bu rnams lung ston pa de bzhin du smra 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyul ba can la bdag gis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu dri ba dris na/byed pa nyid ma mAchi
413b2('dul ba): par lung ston par bgyid do//btsun pa de la bdag 'di snyam du sems te/bdag 'dra ba'i skyes bu/mkhas pas gzugs bzang por bkur ba yunag nyug mar gnas pa'i//
413b3('dul ba): dge sbyong ngam/bram ze la da ji ltar mngon sum du smad par bya snyam nas/bdag gis sgro 'dod kyi bu mo'i bu yang dag rgyal ba can la mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyid//
413b4('dul ba): smad pa yang mi bgyid de/mngon par bstod pa yang mi bgyis/smad pa yang ma bgyid par stan las langs te mchis nas/bdag mi 'pham skra'i la ba can gang na ba der
413b5('dul ba): mchis te/mchis nas mi 'pham skra'i la ba can la 'di skad ces btsun pa mi pham 'jig rten gyi las kyi gnas dang bzo'i gnas tha dad pa gang dag 'di lta ste/phreng brgyad
413b6('dul ba): pa dang /smyug ma mkhan dang /gdan pa dang /rtswa thun dang /'dul mkhan dang /glang po che la zhon pa dang /rta la zhon pa dang /shing rta ma khan dang /ral gri'i thabs
413b7('dul ba): dang gzhu'i 'dzin sbyangs pa dang /zham 'bring byed pa dang /gau re long dang /bro gar len pa dang /rgyal po'i bu rab gnon chen po che dpa' brtul phod pa rnams dang ma
414a1('dul ba): par byed pa dang /sgra mkhan dang /khrus mAkhan de rnams rang rang gi bzo'i gnas dang /las kyi gnas skabs kyis bya ba byed cing sbyin bdag gtong
414a2('dul ba): bsod nams dag byed la/gso ba rnams gso zhing /'dod pa'i yon tan lnga 'byor cing ldan par gyur nas/rtse bar byed/dga' bar byed//dga' dgur spyod par

414b1('dul ba): bsod nams dang sdig par 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ram/sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ramya/bde ba sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir gA yo bA mi byad na//

414b4('dul ba): dran par byed pa 'am/dran par byed du bcug pa 'am/skul bar byed pa 'am/skul du bcug pa 'am/rnam par rig par byed pa 'am/rnam par rig par byed du bcug pa
414b5('dul ba): 'ga' yang med do//byis pa 'am/mkhas pa gang dag yin pa dog ni skye gnas gtso bo dang ldan pa khri bzhi stong dang /rtog pa chen po drug khri dang /drug brgya dang /las lnga
414b6('dul ba): dang /las gsum dang /las gnyis dang /las dang /las phyed dang /lam drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /rtog pa bar ma drug cu rtsa gnyis dang /'du shes bdun dang /sems
414b7('dul ba): can dmyal ba brgya nyi shu dang /dbang po brgya sum cu dang /rdul gyi khams sum cu rtsa drug dang /klu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /na mkha' lding gi rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /
415a1('dul ba): kun tu rgyu'i rigs bzhi khri dgu steng dang /kun tu 'tsho ba'i rigs bzhi khri dgu stong dang /gcer bu pa'i rigs bani khri dgu stong dang /'du shes
415a2('dul ba): can gyi gnas bdun dang /'du shes med pa'i gnas bdun dang /lha ma yin bdun dang /sha za bdun dang /lha bdun dang /mi bdun dang /mtsho bdun dang /ma

420b6('dul ba): po'i spyan sngar dong la gra so lo//zhes de rnams khyod kyi drung du 'ongs nas smras pa/lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/lha 'khyim bdag zhing pa bskrun pa bskyed pa/rgyal po'i dngo mdzod
420b7('dul ba): 'phel bar bgyid pa zhig mchis pa de skra dang kha spyi bregs te/gos ngur smrig bogos nos dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du
421a1('dul ba): srog gcod pa spangs te/srog gcod pa las slar log/ma byin par len pa dang /mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /brdzun du smra ba dang /phra ma dang /tshig/
421a2('dul ba): rtsub po dang /tshig khyal pa dang /brnab sems dang /gnod sems dang /log par lta po spangs te/log par lta ba las slar log ste/yang dag pa'i lta ba dang ldan lagaso /
421a3('dul ba): zhes smra na/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems ji ga khyed kyi ska de smra ba la/shes ldan dag deng la mi de khug shig dang slar yang nga'i zhing pa skrun pa bskyed pa rgyal po'i bang mdzod
421a4('dul ba): 'phel bar 'gyur zhes smra bar 'gyur ram/btsun pa ma lag so//gzhan du na bdag de la blta ba'i slad du mchi ste/des sngon bdag la mngon du smra ba dang phyag 'tshal ba dang ldang
421a5('dul ba): ba dang thal mo sbyar ba dang 'dud pa'i las gang dag lags pa bgyid lags pas de nyid la bdag gis de dag bgyi zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du de la 'di lta ste chos gos dang /bsod snyom
421a6('dul ba): dang ngaganas mal dang /nad kyi rkyen sman gyi yo byad rnams kyis bstabs par bgyi'o//rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/de lnga yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong
421a7('dul ba): gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/btsun pa mad lags te/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthob pa'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lag so//rgyal po
421b1('dul ba): chen po 'di la ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhab su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes du 'dul
421b2('dul ba): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/des chos bshad pa ni thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/tha mor dge ba
421b3('dul ba): don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po/ma 'dres pa/yongasu rdzogs pa yongasu dag pa rnam par byung ba/tshangs par spyod pa rab tu ston to//chos de khyim bdag gam/khyim bdag gi bus mnyan te/
421b4('dul ba): des chos de thos nas/gnas gsum po 'di lta ste/tshogs pa'i chos dang /zhe sdang gi chos dang /gti mug gi chos la ston pa'i rnam par dag pa tshol bar byed//ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di la/
421b5('dul ba): chags pa gang gi zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar sheso zhes smra//ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong zhes smra zhing /gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring
421b6('dul ba): por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang /yongasu ma shes pa dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsal ba'i
421b7('dul ba): chags pa de yod dam/'on te tshe dang ldan/'di la chags pa gang gi zil gyis non cing /sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar sheso zhes smra ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo ngo/
422a1('dul ba): zhes smra zhing /gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags
422a2('dul ba): pa ma spangs pa dang /yongasu ma shes pa dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsal ba'i chags pa de med snyam na/de 'di snyam du sems te/tshe dang ldan pa 'di la chags pa gang gi
422a3('dul ba): zil gyis non cing sems la khyab na/mi shes bzhin kho nar sheso zhes smra/ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod/
422a4('dul ba): pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i chags pa ma spangs pa dang /yongasu ma shes pa dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsal ba'i
422a5('dul ba): chags pa med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/ma chags pa'i lus kyi 'du byed dang /ngag gi 'du byed dang /yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag/tshe dang ldan pa 'di la yod
422a6('dul ba): la 'di chos gang mdor bsdus pa 'am/rgyas par chad kyang rung /'di'i chos ni zhi ba/gya nom pa/zab pa zab por snang ba/mthong bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka' ba/
422a7('dul ba): brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa/zhi mo brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin na/de yang 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig
422b1('dul ba): tu chags pas ni shes par sla ba ma yin pas/tshe dang ldan pa 'di ma chags pa yin te/tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni chags pa ma yin no snya mo//gang gi tshe 'di dang po chags pa'i chos la
422b2('dul ba): rnam par dag par mthong nas/de'i 'og tu gnyis pa zhe sdang gi chos dang /gsum pa gti mug gi chos tshol bar byed/ci tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyis non
422b3('dul ba): cing sems la khyab na mi shes bzhin kho nar sheso zhes smre/ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma
422b4('dul ba): yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang /yongasu mi shes pa dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsal ba'i gti mug de yod dam
422b5('dul ba): 'on te tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gi zil gyis non cing sems la khyab nas mi shes bzhin kho nar sheso zhes smra/ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan
422b6('dul ba): dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar ston pa'i gti mug ma spangs pa dang /yongasu ma shes pa
422b7('dul ba): dang /ma bkag pa dang /ma bsal ba'i gti mug de med snyam na/de 'di snyam du sems te/tshe dang ldan pa 'di la gti mug gang gis zil gyi non cing sems la khyab na/mi shwe
423a1('dul ba): bzhin kho nar she so zhes smra ma mthong bzhin kho nar mthong ngo zhes smra zhing gzhan dag la yang gang de dag la yun ring por gnod pa dang /phan pa ma yin pa dang /sdug
423a2('dul ba): bsngal bar 'gyur bA de lta de ltar ston pa'i/gti mug ma spangs pa dang yongasu ma shes pa dang /ma bkug pa dang /ma bsal ba'i gti mug de med do//de ci'i phyir na/gti
423a3('dul ba): mug med pa'i lus kyi 'dri khyod dang /dag gi 'du byed dang /yid kyi 'du byed gang dag yin pa de dag tshe dang ldan pa 'di la yod la/'od chos gang mdor bsdus pa 'am/rgyu
423a4('dul ba): bar 'chad kyang rung /'di'i chos ni zhi ba gya nom po/zab pa zab par snang po/mthong bar dka' ba/rdzogs par dka' ba/brtag par bya ba ma yin pa/rtog gro'i spyod
423a5('dul ba): yul ma yin pa/zhib mor brtags pa'i mkhas pa dang /mdzangs pas rig par bya ba yin na/de yang 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa 'di gcig tu gti mug pas ni shes par
423a6('dul ba): sla ba ma yin pas tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni gti mug pa ma yin te/tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni gti mug med pa yin no snyam mo//gang gis tshe 'di gsung ba gauti mug pas ni chos la
423a7('dul ba): rnam par dag par mthong nas/de'i 'og tu 'di la rnam pa dang ldan pa'i dad pa skyed par byed//dad pa skyes nas 'di ltar slob par byed de/khyim na gnas pa ni gnod pa can//
423b1('dul ba): rdul khrod na gnas pa yin la/rab tu byung ba ni mngon par skabs yod pa yin te/ khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gcig tu sel gyis dag par tshangs par spyod pa
423b2('dul ba): yongasu rdzogs pa/yongasu dag pa rnam par byang ba 'ba' shig po 'di la spyad par smra ba ma yin pas/ma la bdag sgra dang kha spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas/dad pa
423b3('dul ba): yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung bar bya'o snyam ste/des de ltar thag bcad nas nor gyi tshe gas mang po 'am/nyung ngu spangs te nye du'i 'khor mang po 'am
423b4('dul ba): nyung ngu spangs nas skra dang /kho spu bregs te/gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung //de de bzhin du rab tu byung nas de tshul
423b5('dul ba): khrims dang ldan pa la gnas pa yin/so sor thar pa'i sdom pas bsdams pa yin/spyod pa dang /spyod yul phun sum tshogs pa yin/tha nu kha na ma the ba phra mo la yang
423b6('dul ba): 'jigs par lta ba yin/bslab pa'i gzhi rnams blangs te slob pa yin no//de srog go cod pa spangs nas/srog gcod pa las slar log pa yin te/chad pa spangs pa yin//
423b7('dul ba): mtshon cha spangs pa yin/'dzem pa dang /snying rjer ldan pa yin/sems can srog chagasu gyur pa thams cad la chung ngu na srog chags grog sbur yan chad srog gcod pa
424a1('dul ba): las slar log pa yin//de ma byin par len pa spangs nas ma byin par len pa las slar log pa yin te/byin pa len pa yin/byin pa la dga' ba yin/byin/
424a2('dul ba): pa lhug par btang ba la dga' ba yin te/rkun ma ma yin/brkam chags mo yin/gtsang ma yin/dag pa yin/bdag nyid kha nas ma tho ba med par srung zhing ma byon
424a3('dul ba): par len pa las slar log pa yin no//de mi tshangs par spyod pa spangs nas/mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar log pa yin te/mi tshangs par spyod pa ma yin/spyod pa ngon
424a4('dul ba): pa spangs pas dag pa yin/gtsang ba yin/dri nga ba med pa yin/'khrig pa dang bral ba yin/smad rims kyi chos dang bral ba yin/mi tshangs par spyod pa las slar
424a5('dul ba): log pa yino//de brdzun du smra ba spangs nas/brdzun du smra ba las slar log pa yin te/bden par smra ba yin/bden par smra ba la dga' ba yin/mnyan par 'os pa
424a6('dul ba): yin/yid ches pa yin/brtan pa yin/'jig rten la mi slu ba yin te/rdzun du smra ba las slar log pa yino//de phra moma'i tshig spangs nas phra ma las slar log pa
424a7('dul ba): yin te/de tshu bi dag las thos te/de dag dbye ba'i phyir pha bi dag la smra ba ma yin/pho bi dag las thos te de dag dbye ba'i phyir chu bi dag la smra ba ma yin bye ba rnams
424b1('dul ba): sdums byed pa yin no//'thun pa rnams la gzeng bstod pa yin/'thun pa la dga' ba yin/'thun pa la mgu ba yin/'thun byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin te/phra ma las slar
424b2('dul ba): log pa yin no//de tshig rtsub po spangs nas/tshig rtsub po las slar log pa yin te/de gang yang tshig gdug pa dang /rtsub pa dang /pha rol so mi snyan pa dang /pha rol sde
424b3('dul ba): 'gong bar byed pa dang /skye bo mang po'i yid la mi 'thad pa dang /skye bo mang po'i snying du mi sdug pa dang /skye bo mang po mi dga' ba dang /skye bo mang po'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang /
424b4('dul ba): mnyam pa bzhag pa ma yin pa dang /mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba ma yin pa de lta bu'i tshig spangs nas gang yang mi tshugs dang /rnor snyan pa dang /snying la 'bab pa dang /
424b5('dul ba): dga' bar byed pa dang /grong khyer pa dang /snyan cing 'jebs pa dang /rnam par gsal ba dang /rnam par rig par byed pa dang /mnyan par 'os pa dang /mi rten pa dang /
424b6('dul ba): 'gal ba ma yin pa dang /thub pa med pa dang /skye bo mang po la sdug pa dang /skye bo mang po mgu ba dang /skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /skye bo mang po'i yid du 'ong ba dang /mnyam
424b7('dul ba): bapar bzhag pa dang /mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig smra bas/tshig rtsub po las slar log pa yin no//de tshig kyal po spangs nas tshig kyal pa las slar log
425a1('dul ba): pa yin te/des dus su smra ba yin/yang dag par smra ba yin/de kho na nyid smra ba yin/don smra ba yin/chos smra ba yin/rtogs pa smra ba yin/nga
425a2('dul ba): du chud par byed pa'i tshig smra ba yin te/du su dang 'dren ma ma yin pa dang /gleng gzhi dang bcas pa dang /dan rtags dang bcas pa dang /chos don dang ldan pa yin te/tshig
425a3('dul ba): kyal pa las slar log pa yin no//de nyo tshong spangs nas/nyo tshong las slar log pa yin te/de gzhal glugs la g.yo byed pa dang /srang la g.yo byed pa dang /tshad la g.yo
425a4('dul ba): byed pa spangs nas gzhal glugs la g.yo byed pa dang /srang la g.yo byed pa dang /tshad la g.yo byed pa las slar log po yin no//de gsug len pa dang /'drid pa dang /

425a6('dul ba): bcad pa dang /dbugs pa dang /brdeg pa'i bsam pa spangs nas/bsod pa dang /'ching ba dang /gcod pa dang /'bigs pa dang /brdeg pa nyam su myong bar
425a7('dul ba): byed pa las slar log pa yin no//de 'od dang bud med dang lhan cig nyal ba spangs nas 'od dang bud med dang lhan cig nyal pa las slar log pa yin no//de zhing gi gzhi dang /
425b1('dul ba): khyim gyi gzhi dang /tshong khang gi gzhi len pa spangs nas/zhing gi gzhi dang khyim gyi gzhi dang /tshong khang gi gzhi len pa las slar log pa yin no//de glang po che dang /rta dang /ba
425b2('dul ba): long dang /lug dang /bya gag dang /phag len pa spangs nas/glang po che dang rta dang /ba lang dang /lug dang /bya gag dang /phag len pa las slar log pa yin no//de dran po dang /bran
425b3('dul ba): mo dang /las byed pa dang /zho shas 'tsho ba len pa spangs nas/bran pho dang /bran mo dang /las byed pa dang /khye zho shas 'tsho ba len pa las slar log pa yin no//de bud med
425b4('dul ba): dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo len pa spangs nas/bud med dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo len pa las slar log pa yin no//de gser dang /dngul len pa
425b5('dul ba): spangs nas/gser dang /dngul len pa las slar log pa yin no//de 'bru rngon len pa spangs nas/'bru rten pa len pa las slar log pa yin no//de za cig pa yin te/nub
425b6('dul ba): mo'i spangs shing dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs pa yin/dus su rgyu zhing dus su spyod pas sbyor ba la brtson pa yin te/de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyi cho ga shes shing tsher
425b7('dul ba): zin pa yin/bsod snyoms lto 'drangs kyi chog shes shing /tshod zin pa yin no//de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyi cho ga shes shing tshod zin/bsod snyoms lto 'drang
426a1('dul ba): kyis chog shes shing tshod zin pas gang dang gang du 'gro ba na lhung bzed dang bcas/chos gos dang bcas pas 'gro'o//dper na mdab chags bya gang dang gang du
426a2('dul ba): lding ba der mdab chags gshog pa dang chas te lding ba de bzhin du/de lus 'tsho ba tsam gyi chos gos kyis chog shes shing tshod zin/bsod snyoms lto 'drangs kyis chog
426a3('dul ba): shes shing tshod zin pas gong dang gang du 'gro ba ni/lhung bzed dang bcas chos gos dang bcas pas 'gro'o//'dul ba gzhi////bam po brgya bdun pa//
426a4('dul ba): rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze khA cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/sa bon gyi tshogs dang /'byung po'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson
426a5('dul ba): pas gnas pa 'di lta ste rtsa ba'i so bon dang /sdong bu'i sa bon dang /thor to'i sa bon dang /'gas pa'i sa bon dang /lta ba sa bon gyi sa bon nyid de/dge sbyong gi sa bon
426a6('dul ba): gyi tshogs dang /'byung po'i tshogs sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig
426a7('dul ba): dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/sogs 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/zas kyi sogs 'jog dang /skom gyi sogs 'jog dang /
426b1('dul ba): gos kyi sogs 'jog dang /dri'i sogs 'jog dang /me tog phreng gis sogs 'jog dang /lo ma'i sogs 'jog dang /me tog gi sogs 'jog dang /'bras bu'i sogs 'jog ste/dge
426b2('dul ba): sbyong ni sogs 'jog sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad
426b3('dul ba): nos/gnas mal mthon po dang /gnas mal chen po sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor bas gnas par byed pa/'di lta ste/stan dang /khri dang /khri snam bu can dang /ras kyi sna mo bu
426b4('dul ba): can dang /be'u ras kyi g.yogs pa dang /ras yug chen gyis g.yogs pa dang /ras khra bos g.yogs pa dang /ba le la'i ras kyis g.yogs pa dang /glang po che'i 'thab sbyin dang /
426b5('dul ba): rta'i 'thab sten dang /ngos cig bal las byas pa dang /ngos gnyis ka bal las byas pa dang /stod bal las byas pa dang /rgyab bal las byas pa dang /ka ling ka'i gos kyi steng
426b6('dul ba): g.yogs dang /steng g.yog dang bcas po'i gos dang /phyogs gnyisu sngas dmar po bcug ste/dge sbyong ni gnas mal mthon po dang /gaunas mal chen po rtsom pa la sbyor bar
426b7('dul ba): brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yino//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas cha ba dang /gzhag pa sna tshogs rtsom po la sbyor
427a1('dul ba): bar brtson par gnas pa 'di lta ste/gnye ba dang /bkru bA dang /dril phyi dang /me tog gi phreng ba dang /dri dang /byug pa dang /kha dog 'chang ba dang /sen mo'i
427a2('dul ba): kha dog sgyur ba dang /so byi dor byed pa dang /khar phye ma 'debs pa dang /gdong gi byi dor dang /gdong me long la lta ba dang /gtsug phud 'ching ba dang /gdugs kyi rtsa spr-i bu
427a3('dul ba): can dang /ral gri dang rnga yab nor bu'i yu ba can dang mchil lham khra bo dang /gos rab dang sar pa kha tshar can 'chang ba'i rang bzhin dag ste/dge sbyong ni bzhag pa dang /cha ba sna tshogs
427a4('dul ba): rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yino//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin po dag spyad nas/ltad mo sna tshogs
427a5('dul ba): rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/glang po chos 'gyed pa dang /rtas 'gyed po dang /shing rtas 'gyed pa dang /dpung chung gis 'gyed pa dang /dbyug pas
427a6('dul ba): 'gyed pa dang /khu tshur gyis 'gyed pa dang /khyu mchog gis 'gyed pa dang /ma hes 'gyed pa dang /rA 'gyod pa dang /lug 'gyed pa dang /bya gag 'thab pa dang /mchil
427a7('dul ba): pa 'thab pa dang /'ur pa 'thab pa dang /bya gag dang /mchil pa dang /'ur par 'thab pa dang /bud med 'thab pa dang /skyes pa 'thab pa dang /gzhon nu 'thab pa dang /
427b1('dul ba): bAtsun nu ma 'thum pa dang /shing 'jog pa dang /bro bar rgya tshogs dang /phyug pa nas 'god ba dang /rgyal mtshan gyi rngo mo dang /dpung gi tshogs dang /g.yul ba shams pa dang /nga /
427b2('dul ba): tshogs la lta ba dang /'dun dul chen po lta bar 'dod pa de/dge sbyong ni ltung myo sna tshogs rlom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las slar log pa yin no//rgyal po chen po
427b3('dul ba): ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad naso//sgra sna tshogs nyan pa rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/glang pa che'i skad dang /rta'i sgra
427b4('dul ba): dang /shing rta skr-i dang /dpung du chung gi sgra dang /rnga poT ha'i sgra dang /dung gi sgra dang /rnga bo che'i sgra dang /rol mo'i tshogs pa'i sgra dang /gar mkhan gyi sgra dang /glu'i sgra dang /
427b5('dul ba): ba'i sgra dang /so gol gyi sgra dang /thal mo'i sgra dang /bum+b+ha pa'i sgra dang /rang bzo dang /snyun de dag dang /tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs dang 'jig rten rgyang pan dung ldan pa pa
427b6('dul ba): brags de'i gta mnyan 'did pa dag ste/dge sbyong ni sgra sna tshogs nyan par rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson pa de lta bu las sgyur log pa yin no//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong
427b7('dul ba): ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/ug shud dang /khras dang /rgyan po rtsom pa la sbyor bar brtson par gnas pa 'di lta ste/mig brgyad pa dang /mig
428a1('dul ba): ba dang /na ya'i mig dang /phyogs phyogs nas 'gyed pa dang /bum pas rtse ba dang /tsa l+le dang /su kha la dang /pheg gis rtse ba dang /gul ca ba dang /thur ma
428a2('dul ba): dang /lag rgyan dang /skugs ji lta bar 'gyed pa ste/dge sbyong ni ug shud dang /khras dang /rgyan po rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yino//rgyal po chen
428a3('dul ba): po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin pa dag spyad nas/gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor por brtson pas gnas pa 'di lta ste/rgyal po'i gtam
428a4('dul ba): dang /chom rkun gyi gautam dang /dmag gis gtam dang /zas kyi gautamra dang /skom gyi gtam dang /gos kyi gtam dang /tshong dus kyi gtam dang /smad 'tshong gi
428a5('dul ba): gtam dang /las dran pa brjod pa'i gtam dang /rgya mtsho chen po brjod pa'i gtam dang /'jig rten brjod pa'i gtam dang /ljongs dang /sna chen po la rtogs pa brjod
428a6('dul ba): pa'i gtam ste/dge sbyong ni gtam sna tshogs rtsom pa la sbyor ba de lta bu las slar log pa yin no//rgyal po chen po 'di ltar yang dge sbyong ngam/bram ze kha cig dad pas byin

428b1('dul ba): 'dus pa 'di kun shes mod kyi de'i ni rigs pa dang /khyod kyi rigs pa dang mi ldan no//nga'i n-i 'grol la khyod kyi ma 'al to myur smra bar bya bani phyis smras/phyis smra bar bya ba ni sngar smras

428b4('dul ba): cig dad pasna byin pa dag spyod nas/po nyer 'gro ba dang /gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho bas tsho bar byed pa 'di lta ste/de dag rgyal po'i 'am/blon po chen po rnams kyi 'am/blam

428b6('dul ba): 'drin par byed pa dang /ba byi nas po nya khrid de chu bIr sna 'dren por byed pa ste/dge sbyong ni pho nyar 'gro ba dang /gtong ba log pa'i 'tsho ba de lta bu las slar ldog pa yini//rgyal po

430b4('dul ba): lugs kyi sbyin sreg dang /nyi myo la bkur bsti byed pa dang /rgyu skar la bkur byesti byed pa dang /lha la bkur bsti byed pa dang /kha cig dmag mang po 'dren pa ste/dge sbyong

432b7('dul ba): dben po dgon pa da /shing drung dang /khang stong dag tu gnas pa yin te/de dgon par sed kyang rung /shing drung du son kyang rung /khang stong du sen kyang rung /'dug ste
433a1('dul ba): rtul mo krung bcas shAng sus dang po ba srung nas drun pa mngon du bags ste/de 'jig rten la brlab sems smras te/brnab sems dang bral ba'i snyomyas kyis
433a2('dul ba): ldan mang du gnas shing brnab sems yongasu stong bya yin no//'jig rten la gri nang sems dang /rdugs pa dang /bya nyid dang /rgod pa dang /'gyod pa dang /the tsom stu ste/

433a4('dul ba): sbyin po zhig blangs nas/zhing blas kyi mtha' rnams la brtson par byas te/de'i las kyi mtha' de rnams chung ma zos shing grub nas/ngas de las bu lon de yang gzhal

433a7('dul ba): bar gyur pa dang /med bde bar gyur pa dang /dper na min pa nad chabs rtse ba sdug bsngal ba zhig yong la/de zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur mi btub/skom 'thungs
433b1('dul ba): pani khong du gnod par gyur pa las/de dus gzhan zhig na nad med cing mthu dang ldan par gyur nas/de 'di snyam sems twa/bdag sngon nu ba nad tshabs che ba sdus bsngal bar gyur/
433b2('dul ba): pan/bdag gis kha zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur mi btub/skom 'thungs pa ni khong du gnod par gyur pa las/da ni bdag nad med cing mthu dang ldan pas bde ste/bdag gis
433b3('dul ba): zas zos pa ni lus la 'jur btub/skom 'thungs pa ni khong du gnod par ma gyur to snyam ste/gzhi des dga' ba dang /rab tu dga' bar gyur pa dang /dper na mi zhig dran

433b7('dul ba): ni mi zhig btson du bzung ste/phying ka log tu dam du bocings pa las/de de las nor gzhal ba med par bde bar legs par thar bar gyur ba dang /de 'di snyam du sems te/
434a1('dul ba): bdag sngon btsan du bzung nas phying ka log tu dam du bcings par gyur pa las/da ni de las nor gzhal mi dgos par bde bar legs par thar tau s+thAm nas/

434a3('dul ba): bdag skrag pa las bde bar gyur cing /lo nyes pa las lo legs par gyur to snyam ste/de gzhi des bde bar gyur/yid bde bar gyur pa de bzhin du/rgyal po
434a4('dul ba): tshan po des bdag nyid kyi sgrib pa lnga po 'di dag skyin po ji lta ba dang /nad ji lta ba dang /bran ji lta ba dang /brtson ji lta ba dang /'jigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du spangs pa yang
434a5('dul ba): dag par rjesu mthong ngo //de sgrib pa lnga po sems nye ba'i nyon mongs par byed pa shes rab nyam chud par byed pa/mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang 'thun pa/mya ngan las 'da' bar
434a6('dul ba): mi 'gyur ba dag spangs nas/de 'dod pa rnams las dben/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben/rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes
434a7('dul ba): pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas nas gnas//des lus de nyid dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' bo'i bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/
434b1('dul ba): yongasu rlan par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu khyab par byed de/de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bas ma khyab pa'am/khyab
434b2('dul ba): par ma gyur pa chung zad kyang med do//dper na khrus mkhan nam/khrus mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig khar phor ram/gzhong bu 'am/nya phyis kyi nang du 'dag tshal gyi phye ma zhi ba mo
434b3('dul ba): blubs te chus btab ste bangs na/'dag tshal gyi gong bu de gsher dang ldan/gsher gyis zhen te/gsher gyis phyi nang khyab pas 'bo bar mi 'gyur/'dzag par mi
434b4('dul ba): 'gyur pa de bzhin du ngas lus de nyid dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/yongasu rlon par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu khyab par
434b5('dul ba): byed de/de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//rgyal po chen po
434b6('dul ba): ji snyam du sems/de lta yin na ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/btsun pa med lags te/de lta lags na/bcom
434b7('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gis tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lag so//de rtog pa dang /dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongasu dang ste/sems kyi rgyud
435a1('dul ba): gcig tu gyur pas/rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas
435a2('dul ba): shing /des lus de nyid ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa dga' ba dang /bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/yongasu rlan par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu khyab par byed//
435a3('dul ba): de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/ting 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//dper na ri'i rtse mo'i
435a4('dul ba): phyogs shig na bkod ma'i mtsho bran zhig yod par gyur l-i/der ni shwar phyogs nas kyang chu mo 'bab par gyur la/nub phyogs nas ma yin zhing /byang phyogs nas kyang
435a5('dul ba): chu mi 'bab la/der lhas kyang dus dus su char gyi rgyun mi 'bebs te/gzhan du na bkod ma'i mtsho bran de nyid nas bkod ma'i chu'am/bkod mi'i chu chen po lud nas/
435a6('dul ba): bkod mA'i mtsho bran de thams cad chu bsil bas gang bar byed/yongasu gang bar byed/shin tu grang bar byed/yongasu khyab par byed de/bgrod ma'i mtsho bran de thams
435a7('dul ba): cad 'di lta ste/chu bsel bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang ming do//de bzhin du des lus de nyid ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang /bde bas
435b1('dul ba): mngon du rlan par byed/yongasu rlan par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu rgyas par byed de/de'i lus thams cad la ni 'di lta ste/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang
435b2('dul ba): bde bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/de lta yin na ras yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras
435b3('dul ba): bu bstan pa ma yin nam/btsun pa mad lags te/de lta lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lagaso//de
435b4('dul ba): dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang /shes bzhin can yin te/bde ba lus kyis myong la/'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa
435b5('dul ba): dad ldan pa/bde ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas te/des lus de nyid dga'
435b6('dul ba): ba med pa'i bde pas mngon du rlan par byed/yong su rlan par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu khyab par byed de/de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/dga' ba med
435b7('dul ba): pa'i bde ba de bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zod kyang medado//dper na uta pa la 'am/pad+ma 'o ma/ku mu ta 'am/pad+ma dkar po chu las skyes shing /chu
436a1('dul ba): nas chen por gyur pa rtses btags shing 'dug pa de dag gi rtsa ba nas rtse mo'i bar gyi gsab gseb 'di lta ste/chu bsil bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur
436a2('dul ba): pa cung zad kyang med pa de bzhin du/des lus de nyid dga' ba med pa'i bde bas mngon du rlan par byed/yongasu rlan par byed/yongasu tshim par byed/yongasu khyab par byed de
436a3('dul ba): de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/dga' ba med pa'i bde bas ma khyab pa 'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//rgyal po chen po ji snyam du sems/de lta yin na
436a4('dul ba): ngas yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/btsun pa med lags te/de lta lags na/bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par
436a5('dul ba): mthong ba'i dag sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan lagaso//de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang /mi bde ba yang nub pas/bde ba
436a6('dul ba): yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang /dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas nas gnas te/des lus de nyid yongasu
436a7('dul ba): dag pa dang /rnam par byeng pa'i sems kyis lhag par mos te/khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te/gnas pa de'i lus thams cad la 'di lta ste/yongasu dag pa dang /
436b1('dul ba): rnam par byung ba'i sems kyis ma khyab pa'am/khyab byar ma gyur ba cung zad kyang rjod do//dper na khyim pa dag gum khyim bdag gis bus ras khru brgyud pa 'am/dgu dus ngom
436b2('dul ba): dang /log pa dang /rkang pa g.yogs nas/de'i mgo dang ldog pa nas/rkang pa'i bar lus thams cad 'di smra ste/ris gtsang ma yongasu dag pas mo yig pa'am/yog par
436b3('dul ba): ma gyur ba cung zad kyang med do//de bzhin du des lus de nyid yong su dag pa dang /rnam par byung ba'i sems kyis lhag par mos te/khyab par byas nas/rdzogs par byas te
436b4('dul ba): gnas pas de'i lus thams cad 'di lta ste/yongasu dag bya dang /rnam par byung gA'i sems kyis ma khyab pa'am/khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do//rdul
436b5('dul ba): chen po ji snyam du sems/de lta yin na des yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyis 'bras bu bstan pa ma yin nam/btsun pa med lags te/de lta lags na/bcom
436b6('dul ba): ldan 'das kyis yang dag par mthong ba'i dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bstan legaso//rgyal po chen po gang gi cha 'phags pa'i nyan thos bde ba yang spangs te sta nas kyang /sdug
436b7('dul ba): bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub pa'i//bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang /dran pa yong su dag pa/
437a1('dul ba): bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i tshe/de'i sems rgod pa ma yin/zhum pa ma yin no//rgod pa med cing zhum pa med pas mi g.yo bar
437a2('dul ba): gnas pa thob bo//dper na khang pa brtsegs ma 'am/khang pa brtsegs ma'i khyam su 'bru mar gyi me mar bus pa de'i me lce rlung nas/bya dang mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis
437a3('dul ba): ma bskyed pa ma bskul ba de'i me lce de rgod pa ma yin zhum pa ma yin no//rgod pa med cing zhum pa med par gnas pas mi g.yo bar 'bar bar de bzhin du/gang gi tshe 'phags
437a4('dul ba): pa'i nyon thos kyi bde ba yang spangs te/snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /yid bde ba dang /yid mi bde ba yang nub pra/bde ba yang ma yin/sdug bsngal ba yang ma
437a5('dul ba): yin pa/btang snyoms dang dran pa yongasu dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de'i tshe de'i sems rgod pa ma yin/zhum pa ma yin no//rgod pa med
437a6('dul ba): cing zhum pa med pas/mi g.yo bar gnas pa thob nas/de 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis lus kyi gzugs 'di ni rags pa 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i rgyu las byung
437a7('dul ba): ba yin te/'di la bdag gi rnam par shes pa rten cing 'di la gnas te/'di la khyab par gnas kyis rna ma la bdag gis lus 'di las yid bskyod de/lus gzhan
437b1('dul ba): yid las byung ba'i gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing /dman pa ma yin pa zhig mngon par sprul to snyam nas/de lu sde las yid bskyod de/lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i
437b2('dul ba): gzugs dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin zhing /dman pa ma yin pa mngon par sprul par byed//dper na nor bu bai DUr+ya bzang po rigs dang ldan pa/gsal ba/dang bu/dri ma med pa/
437b3('dul ba): tshun+da rgud sna lnga pa 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /leb rgan lnga brgyus pa de skyes bu mig dang ldan pas mthong na/'di ni skud pa yin
437b4('dul ba): 'di ni nor bu yin te/skud pa 'di la nor bu brgyu so zhes bya bar shes pa de bzhin du/de lus de las yid bskyod de/lus gzhan yid las byung ba'i gzugs/dbang po mtshang
